Lamaana aɣerbaz n dunit tezmer ad teselmed aṭas i medden imi tilufa ik 3eddan fellas mačči d yiwet : tamettant n gmas Ramḍan di trad mgal Franṣa (1954-1962), tamettant n gmas wayet Amar di yiwet n laksida n tkarust deg segwas 1993, lehlak n wergaz-is d acḥal isegwasen armi d tmettant-is deg 1985. 
Anecta yakw ig ɛeddan fellas, Ferruǧa Sudad tsuqlit-id ar isefra. Aṭas isental (sujets) af ayen i-t-sefra, gar asen: trad mgal irumyen, af watmaten-is imuten, af wargaz-is, tidyanin n tefsut tabarkant di tmurt n leqbayel (2001), af inig (lɣwerba) n leqbayel, tilufa n twaculin s umata. Tebda tamedyazt asmi tesɛa 24 isegasen, mi yemut kan gma-s Remḍan deg 1958. D tilufa n ddunit, akw d umenɣi af izerfan n wemdan d tutlayt tamaziɣt, d anecta yakw id yibwin Ferruǧa Sudad s anar isefra. 
AYEN YEDRAN DI TMURT, IBRIR 2001.
Tidyanin n tefsut tabarkant i yebdan di tagara n ibrir (kuzyur) 2001 ar nant i Ferruǧa Sudad afud amuqwran i waken a ttkemel deg mecwar n tmedyazt. Imi anect-nni iqerḥitt nezeh, aken yakw iqreḥ izwawen, u yal amdan isɛan ul. Asmi id ḍrant tidyanin aki, yufatt lḥal di tmurt n Kanada di Marikan ugafa, ar yellis. Din t-tteka di yal temesbanit id yellan din sɣur leqbayel, ama di tɣimant n Muriyal neɣ tin n Uṭawa, tamanaɣt n Kanada. Illa wanda teṭef ula d asawaḍ i waken ad sebgen urfan-is s isefra i texdem ilmend n tedyanin aki n tefsut tabarkant. A tnan kra isefra i texdem ilmend n tefsut tabarkant:
Ayen yeḍran di tmura
Nettwaḥqer
Ḥkemn-aɣ-tt Waɛraben
Asefru agi tewit-id Ferruǧa Sudad asmi i teḥder i tikelt tamezwaru di yiwet n tmesbanit di Kanada deg yunyu (sedyur) 2001.
Aṭas i mazal gnen
Ferruǧa Sudad imi twala amek leqbayel gan afus deg fus di yakw timesbaniyin id yellan di Kanada akw d lwilayat n marikan ugafa (USA) di 2001, texdem-ed yiwen usefru af wanecta.
Iɣriben
Asefru aki d tajmilit i texdem Ferruǧa Sudad i leqbayel i gellan berra n tmurt, af uqedcen nsen af tmaziɣt
akw d izerfan n weɣref aqbayli. 
LɣWERBA D IɣEBLAN N TWACULT.
Ferruǧa Sudad tsufri s tmettant n Yemma-s, , n wergaz-is, n sin n watmaten-is, n mis awḥid. T rebbad u tsekred krad (3) n tullas. Deg 1985, argaz d win i t sɛeda 28 isegwasen yebweḍ tisureft n yakuc. Mraw yan (11) isegwasen ar zdat, yellis tamecṭuḥt tuneg ar tmurt n Kanada. Anecta iǧad degs aṭas n leḥzen imi d nettat i gellan d amwanes-is deg uxxam acku snat nniden yufad lḥal fɣent zewǧent. Af tilufa aki yakw n ddunit: lɣwerba, iminig n yellis, tamettant n wergaz-is, d ttin n yemas, atg., tebbwid fellasen isefra, atnan kra seg sen: 
Lɣwerba
Tafsut Imaziɣen di Kanada
Asefru id iteddun af wasmi i temut yemma-s n Ferruǧa Sudad. Mi tekcem yemma-s ar ṣbiṭar n Tizi Wezzu, azekka-nni tesewjad i wakken a tterzu fell-as ar ṣbiṭar. Tekred af 5 n tifawin (ṣbeḥ) i waken ad taweḍ zik ar Iwaḍiyen, azal n 5km si taddart-is, s wanda lkiran (Bus) ttruhun ar Tizi Wezzu. Ihi tebbweḍ uqbel lawan s waṭas, tella tettraǧu, s wayen yakw i yasdeqḍa i yemma-s. Yufad lḥal tella temut, u srabes n ṣbiṭar sawḍen isalen (lexbar) ar taddart-is af tmettant-is mebla ma tezra yell-is Ferruǧa i tt-ittrajun di berra d acḥal n swaya. Anecta ijjad degs aṭas n later, ladɣa ayen id yernan mačči d yiwet: tazwara tawacult ilaq ad taf iman-is aṣenduq. Mi ruḥen a t idqelben uɣalend, yufad lḥal, ixedamen ay zemlen (signer) tawafɣa n tmerḥumt fɣen. Isyin akin anwa ara yzemlen, armi bessif i tuffa.
Imir-en akin, nnan asen belli ulac takaruct n Ambulans a yawin tamerḥumt. Tara tmara tawacult a-tt-tawi di tkarust menwala. Anecta yak tebbwid fell-as asefru, atan:
Assagi ggujlent tulas.
Asefru id iteddun af tmettant n wegaz-is Lemsawd. 
Asmi yemmut Lemsawd
"Imawlan" is a tribute to the poet's parents. The metaphor as male and female partridge is recurrent in Kabyle poetry and symbolizes beauty.
Imawlan: iferraǧ d tsekkurt
LGIRRA N LZAYER & LMUT.
Akend nenna Ferruǧa Sudad tlul deg 1934 d akud asmi i llan i Franṣiyen di tmurt irumyen. Tesɛa aṭas
n teḥkayin af traḍ mgal irumyen aki. Ura d tettat tetteka, tefkad amur-is. Amek yakw i tuder i traḍ, teḥkat-id di kra isefra.
Atnan kra degsen:
Amǧahed
Awi snen ad yessefru
Ur neqbil ara
Asefru yaki n yiwet n tmettut i sittilin i tmedyazt Ferruǧa Sudad, isem-is Faṭima n At Musa, umi d cfa fell-as. Atan ihi: 

Aɛrab Sexxi:
Aɛrab Sexxi d amedyaz, d argaz umezgun, d awaziw n tilizri azwaw yettidiren di Kanada, di marikan ugafa. D yiwen ger iɛegalen n Tidukkla Tadelsant Tamaziɣt di Uṭṭawa-Ḥull, d anamzul uselway ines.
Ilul deg 1959 deg At Abdelmumen, di tama Iwadiyen. Ger waṭas n leqdicat ixedem, illa d ameskar n yiwet n tcequft umezgun ifazen, umi isema : "Tidak Nna Fa".

Cendrillon:
Cendrillon d yiwet n tmacahutt taqburt i d yura umeskar (auteur) a latini Élien ("Claudius Ælianus") deg tidmi tis ⅠⅠⅠ seld tlalit n asar Ɛisa. Élien iḥka-d amezruy n yiwet n teqcict tamaṣrit, umi qqaren Rhodope ("Ῥοδόπη"), umi yuker Igider taṣebaṭ-is, u yeweḍa-s ugelid ferɛuni Psammétique, i g wehmen deg ṣebaḍ aki. Dɣa yahed i waken slid taqcict isɛan aṣebaḍ aki ur izeweǧ ara.
Tamacahutt aki n Cendrillon telḥa d acḥal n tidmi u deg acḥal n tmura akw d imenzaw (continents). Tura akka llant azal n 500 ilqam (versions) ines, akk mgaraden-t : si tmacahutt n Rhodope, ar tin n w-alqem n tmurt n Cenwa i y ttwarun deg tidmi tis ⅠⅩ, ar win n tmurt n Arminya n Bo Than, neɣ alqem n uṭalyani Giambattista Basile umi isemm-a "Tamcict m’iɣiɣden" ("La Chatte des cendres") deg 1634, neɣ asummur (ballet) n Rudolf Noureev, i y-llan d tumgi taskilant (mythe littéraire) i sqedcen, umi yawden aṭas n imeskar atraren am : Luc Plamondon, ameskar usaru azawan "Cindy, la Cendrillon des temps modernes" id yefɣen deg 2002.
Isem n Cendrillon ikka-d seg awal Iɣed. Di tmacahutt n Cenwa, taqcict nni isem-is Ye Xian ("葉限"), i cuban ar w-awal almani Aschen, i bɣan ad yini Iɣed, dɣa am w-awl n teǧlizit "ashes" i d-yusan seg iwen n w-azar.
Tamcahutt n Cendrillon wid i-s yefkan iman, u aran-tt tettwasen ar ugar n medden di yal tamurt, d imyura n tmucuha Charles Perrault deg 1667 s w-alqem ines umi yefka isem "Cendrillon ou la Petite Pantoufle de verre", akk d win n w-atmaten Almaniyen Jacob d Wilhelm Grimm deg 1812, umi fkka-n isem "Aschenputtel", neɣ s tefranṣiṣt : Cendrillon.
Amyaru d umedyaz azwaw Essaid At Maamar, yerra-tt id daɣen ar tazwawt. Isemm-a-yas aken i yella w-azar n awal Cendrillon M-iɣiɣden. Di tmacahutt agi, anaf akk isem-awen, akk di medqan n tmurt tazawt. Atan wedris amek i gella (sɣuṛ imyura.net) : M-iɣiɣden.

Hänsel d Gretel:
Hansel d Gretel, neɣ s tutlayt talmanit Hänsel und Gretel d wiyet n tmacahutt mucaɛen si tmurt n Alman (Jirmani), id yefɣen deg 1812 sɣur imyura : Wilhelm Grimm d gma-s Jacob Grimm. S tewzel, wiki d sin watmaten, aqcic Hansel s weltma-s Gretel, d arraw n yiwen umzenzu n tesfaḍ, s baaden seg wexxam i waken ad qelben af yiwen ugummu di tisgi. Yufa-d lḥal d iḍ, dɣa ṭsen armi s tufat (taṣebḥit), zdat n yiwet n tiɣremt (château) iččur d cakulat d yal tawsit (genre) n tiziḍanin. Lamaana ur zran ara belli d yiwet n temhergit (taseḥart : sorcière) i g zedɣen din, isem-is 'Massepain'. Hansel i ttwatef d ameḥbus, ma d Gretel tenna-yas d temhergit ad sewǧed i w-sebbwi, dɣa Gretel teḍqer-is ar timest, u tesefɣ-ed gma-s d yal aqcic i yellan di takurmut (prison). 
Hansel d Gretel d yiwet n tmacahutt imucaɛn aṭas ger yakw t i-g uran watmaten Grimm. Tefɣ-d di Franṣa deg 1985 ar tizrigin 'Michel Albin', teḥka-tt-id 'Sarah Hayes' s tugniwin n 'Colin Hadley'.
Amyaru d umedyaz Essaid At Maamar yesuqel-d u yemsas-d (adapter) tamacahutt aki ar tutlayt tazwawt. Isem-awen n "Hänsel akw d Gretel", yer-aten s tezwawt : "Ḥmiṭuc d Duduc". Attan amek i tella temsast n tmacahutt aki ar tazwawt. Atan wedris amek i gella (sγur imyura.net): Ḥmiṭuc d Duduc

Slimani:
Slimani, d isem n ccna n unazur azwaw Meṭref Sliman. Ilul ass n 08 uwenbir 1945 di taddart Agni Ḥmed di tɣiwant n Ayt Yanni. ɣur-es 4 n warrac. 
Iɣra deg uɣerbaz amezwaru deg Ayt Yanni, i syin ikemmel taɣuri ines deg CNET n Tizi Wezzu. Yuɣal ay xeddem di seḥra n Lezzayer di Lbiṭrul, iḥbes axeddim deg Yebrir n 2005. Tuddert n taẓuri ines teqqim azal n 10 isegasen kan.

Takfarinas Ḥsen Zermani:
Ḥsen Zermani, s yisem-is n taẓuri, Takfarinas, d yiwen unaẓur n ccna atrar azwaw. Ilul deg taddart n Tqesray deg useggas n 1958. Tiqesray d yiwet n taddart i d-yezgan di Ledzyer tamanaɣt, teččur d izwawen.
Lameɛna Ḥsen Zermani, yefruri-d deg wul n tmurt n Leqbayel, di taddart n Tizi Tɣideṭ, taɣiwant n Iɛekkuren di temnaṭ n Tizi Wezzu.
Ḥsen Zermani, akken d ameẓyan yufa-d iman-is d anaẓur am waṭas n iɛeggalen di twacult-is. Iḥemmel ad yecnu maca, werǧin yerra di ddehn-is d akken a d-yas wass ad yaweḍ ɣer wanida yewweḍ ass-a acku, di tallit-nni n 70, yeqwa-d lḥers ɣef tmurt labaɛda ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt. 
Ḥsen Zermani iḥemmel aṭas aẓawan, imeddukal-is d tawacult-is ladɣa baba-s, sḥersen-t akken ad iruḥ ɣer nnuba n iḥeffaḍen uzekka n umaṭṭaf wis II yella a yeselḥay unaẓur Crif Xeddam, acku walan-t icennu akken iwata.
Amecwar-is di ccna.
Deg useggas n 1976 iɛedda-d di tesgilt-agi, anda yewwi arraz amezwaru. Akken ad t-yessebɣes, baba-s yuɣ-as-d snitra-s tamenzut acku, yella yetturar s snitra i d-yexdem s tebelyunt n zzit. Dɣa dinna yekcem s annar n tẓuri s yisem i yefka i yiman-is "Takfarinas", i yellan d isem ugelid deg umezruy imaziɣen. Mi d-yufrar Takfarinas di nnuba n iḥeffaven, yessekles aḍebsi-ines amezwaru "Yewwa ṛṛemman" ɣer Maḥbubati d l’Oasis, maca, amahil-agi d win ur s-neɛǧib ara.
Deg useggas n 1979 iruḥ ɣer Fransa, din Yemlal d Yidir i d-yesnulfan axxam n usizreg Azwaw anda yessewjed ad iɛiwed i usekles n uḍebsi-nni-ines maca, ɣer tagara yessuffeɣ-it-id ɣer tezrigin "Triomphe music".
S wakka Takfarinas yuɣal d iminig, am netta am tugti n icennayen izwawen yerwa lḥif, yerwa aksar d usawen akken a d-iḥelli amḍiq-is. 
Almi d asmi i yexdem Yidir tameɣra di l’Olympia deg useggas 1980 i yebda yettifrir-d Takfarinas. Imi yecna di tmeɣqra-yagi. Deg wakken yeɛǧeb aṭas i lɣaci, yenced-it-id Buǧemɛa Semɛun, neɣ Buǧma Agraw akken ad cnun lwaḥid, yeqbel ad yiki deg "Agraw" imir-nni i d-suffɣen tasfift "Ccef n uparti" maca ikemmel deg usuffeɣ n iḍebsiyen i yiman-is: "Aɛessas n zher-iw"; "Zzin d wedrim" deg useggas n 1983. Yuɣal yemsefraq netta d tarbaɛt n wegraw.
Deg useggas n 1986 yessuffeɣ-d sin iḍebsiyen "Way telha"; "Arrac", deg-sen iɛawed yessefti deg umareg, akken ad t-yesnerni. Deg wayen yeɛnan isefra yexdem d imedyazen imeqranen yecban Ben Muḥemmed, Muḥya, Bessaɛud Muḥend Aɛrab, Muḥend Umusa, Mulud Ayt Ɛmer, ma d tura ixxedem d Kader.
ɣer tama n imedyazen-a Takfarinas yugem-d aṭas di tgemmi n ccna aɣerfan wid yecban Lɛenqa, Ccix Lḥasnawi, Sliman Ɛazem... atg.
Mbaɛɛd Arrac, Way telha, Aɛessas, Zzin d wedrim, Takfarinas yessuffeɣ-d aḍebsi "Ṛṛemman" s wayes yettiki deg tesgilt n "Hit parade de world music Europe charte", din i d-iḥella amḍiq wis ukuẓ deg useggas 1994.
Deg useggas n 1996 yessuffeɣ-d "Salamat", deg useggas n 1999 yerna-d sin iḍebsiye n "Zaεma zaεma", Ddu deg wa d iḍebsiyen i isekren lhul deg umaḍal meṛṛa ladɣa di tmurt n Lezzayer. 
Deg useggas n 2004 yessuffeɣ-d ukuẓ n iḍebsiyen ideg yerra tajmilt i tlawin anda bɣunt ilint.
Takfarinas d anaẓur ameɣradan.
Takfarinas yexdem d inaẓuren n umaḍal am tarbaεt "Sixun" i deg yella Michel Alibo, Louis Winsberg, Karim Ziad, atg. Ma deg uḍebsi-yagi aneggaru yexdem d umaṛṛuki "Idbasaεid", rnu ɣer-s inaẓuren n ddunit meṛṛa am "Jef de la Cruse", Yin Jian, Jamaikan Sly Dunbar d Robbie, atg.
Takfarinas yefka isem n YAL i ccna-ines, ɣef wanect-agi yenna-d :

Farida At Ferrux:
Farida At Ferrux d tamusnawt di tusna n wemdan d laṣel. Tlul di taddart Iɣil Bugni di tmurt n Izwawen. D taselmadt di tesdawit 'Aix-Marseille I' di Franṣa anda tesɣaray tusna n laṣel (ethnologie). Tesufɣed adlis akw d umyaru Nabil Fares isem-is : de l’anthologie Effraction. Poésie du tiroir di 1993. Tetteka deg udlis aneggaru n Ṭaher Ǧawut umi isema : La Kabylie, photographies de A. Marok. Adlis i d yefɣen di 1997.
Adlis aneggaru n Farida At Ferrux d win umi tsema: "Cheikh Mohand, Le souffle fécond" (Volubilis, Paris, 2001. Tazwart n Muḥemmed Arkun).

Yalla Seddiqi:
Yalla Seddiqi d yiwen umyaru d umnadi n tasuta tamaynut i zemren ad yefk iman amaynut i yedles azwaw. Yelluled ass n 1 yennayer 1970. Tira ines tettmekatay-ed imyura imuqranen am Ṭaher Ǧaɛut.
Yalla Seddiqi yettidir di Franṣa, yura aṭas n isefra deg waṭas n tesɣunin, u yarad yakw tizlatin n unazur Lwennas Meɛṭub ar tefranṣiṣt di yiwen n yedlis, umi isema "Lounès Matoub, Mon nom est combat", id ifɣen ar tizrigin "La Découverte", di 'Paris' di 2003. Isufɣed daɣen yiwen n wuṭun af tmurt izwawen di tesɣunt "Europe". 
Yalla Seddiqi, akw d umyaru Yazid Bekka, ssufeɣ-d yiwen n wedlis umi seman: "Kabylie belle et rebelle", di 'Paris' deg 2006.

Muḥamed Igerbucen:
Muḥamed Igerbucen d argaz uẓawan azwaw i yettwasnen nezeh ama di tmazɣa ama berra deg umadal.
Ilul deg 1907 di taddart At Uccen, taɣiwant Aɣrib, di Tizi Wezzu. Imut deg 1954. Asmi isɛa 17 isegwasen ill yeqqar timsirin uẓawan. Deg 1923, yunag ar tmurt n Leǧliz akw d yiwen n wergaz n Ikus (Ecosse), Mas 'Fraser Ross'. Illa yesɛa akal di Cercal. Yiwen w-ass illa di tmurt leqbayel, yesla i tjewaqt n umeksa amecṭuḥ Muḥamed Igerbucen. Icaṭew, dɣa yebbwi-t yid-s i waken ad yelmed aẓawan. 
Ikcem ar uɣerbaz ageldan uẓawan (Royal Academy of Music), anda yelmed azawan seg ufus n uselmad Livingson.
Mas 'Fraser Ross' illan isɛa akal di tmurt n Tuṭrict, yewwi yid-s Muḥamed Igerbucen ar tɣiwant n 'Wien' i waken ad ikemel almad uzawan deg iɣerbazen uẓawan imuqranen i yettwasen di 'Wien', sddaw ifasen n usnelmad 'Alfred Grunfeld'.
Muḥamed Igerbucen ise 18 isegasen asmi ifka 'Concert' ines amezwaru di 'Bregenz' deg wasif n Konstanz. Mi ɛeddan 3 isegasen u ulmad, yuɣal-d ar tɣiwant n Lezzayer, i waken ad izer imawlan-is. Lamaana ur iɛeṭel yuɣal. Isem-is yuɣal mucaɛ imi yuɣal iqedec ula d Aẓawan n isura. Asaru amezwaru umi yexdem aẓawan, d 'Aziza'. Isyin ixdem win usaru 'Dzair' af umḍiq n 'La Casbah'. Amseḍru isura Mas 'Duvivier' i sutra-s i waken ad yexdem aẓawan usaru yettwasnen: "Pépé le Moko". 
Isyin ixdem aẓawan usaru "Terre idéale" af tmurt n Tunes.
Deg 1938, imlal d unaẓur Salim Ḥelali, yettwasnen imiren nezeh, i sekla-s azal n 50 n tezlatin. Isyin tebɛent-id inazuren wiyaḍ, ṭaqa deg-sen d leqbayel. Deg usegqas aki, ixdem daɣen aẓawan n usaru 
"Kaddour à Paris" n Mas 'André Sarrouy'. 
Takubanit 'Metro-Goldwin' n marikan t sawl-as-d i waken as-yexdem aẓawan n usaru 'La Casbah', neɣ "Pépé le Moko" s marikanit. amaṭaf BBC n Legiz i sawlased i waken ad iselḥu 'orchestre symphonique' ines. Imnezhen igliziyen ur tǧeɛlen ara d azwaw, ḥesbent d arusi, dɣa fkan-as isem arusi "Igor BOUCHEN".

William Shakespeare:
William Shakespeare d amedyaz yettwasnen ugar, d argaz umezgun, d amyaru n yedles aglizi. Ilul ass n 23 ibrir (kuzyur) 1564. Immut ass n 23 ibrir (kuzyur) 1616. 
Ticequfin n Shakespeare
Ticequfin umezruy n Shakespeare
Ticequfin n tayri n Shakespeare
Tasekla nniḍen n Shakespeare
Tamselyut.
Af tuddert n Shakespeare

Imaziɣen ittwasnen:
Gret Tamawt
Win izemren, ad ikemmel umuɣ aki n idmawen imaziɣen di yal aḥric n tmeddurt.

Pablo Picasso:
Pablo Ruiz Picasso, d anaẓur n Taklut Aspanyuli. Ilul di tɣiwant n Malaga di tmurt n Spanya ass n 25 tuber 1881, immut ass n 8 yebrir 1973 di Mugins di Fransa.

At Yenni:

Camy Lbaz:
Camy Lbaz neɣ s yisem-is unṣib Abdelqader Cmini d yiwen yettekkan di tlalit n terbaɛt n Abranis. Daɣen d amyaru. 
Ilul ass n 26 tuber 1944 deg At Wertiran di temnaṭ n Leqbayel. Yunag ɣer tmurt n Franṣa netta di leɛmer-is 14 iseggasen. Ar ass-a d iminig, yedder gar Fransa d tmurt-is Lezzayer. Camy Lbaz mačči kan d anaẓur maca d amaru daɣen. Yura aṭas n wungalen, yessekles timucuha n zik ɣef iḍebsiyen CD Rom. ɣur-s mačči d yiwen usenfar deg wennar n tsekla.

Dihya Tadmut:
Dihya, neɣ Tadmut neɣ Tadmayt (s taεrabt : "Kahina"), aken i s-semman waεraben asmi d kecmen Tamazɣa, tella d tagellidt tamgarayt tamaziɣt i yettmenɣan mgal unekcum n weεraben s tamurt-is ger useggas 695 d 705. Tfrurɣ-d di lεarc Igerwan n Iznaten di Wawras. Aken llan igelliden imezwura imaziɣen n Numidya, teffeɣ-d d tagellidt si tefranin n usqamu n tidukla n laεrac d tudrin. 
Dihya d udem amenzawi, nettat d Aksil n wazbu amaziɣ di tefriqt n ugafa mgal unekcum n yemselmen seg usamar ger isegasen n 695 d 705. Asmi kan i d kecmen dɣa, tadukli tasartit d tadeblant n tmazɣa usamar akw d tlemast (Awras n tura) tela s daw ufus n Aksil neɣ Kusayla s taɛrabt. Asmi yemmut di 688 d Dihya i yuɣalen d aqerru n wazbu mgal iεraben.

Tacawit:
Tacawit neɣ Tawrasyant d-tutlayt iy ttmeslayen Yicawiyen, di temnaḍt en wedrar en Wawras (umi qqaṛen Yiṛomanen: "Aurasius Mons"), di tmurt en Dzayer. Tacawit tettekki deg tutlayin Timaziɣin. Asmi dd-yura tajerrumt tameẓẓyant en Tcawit, G. Mercier (1896) yenna belli Imaziɣen izedɣen Awras semman iman nsen "Qbayel", semman tutlayt-nsen "haqbaylith". Awal en Teɛrabt "cawiya" yella kra en yir awal, anamek-is d-"imeksawen". Maca d-awal iy seqdecen aṭas, alarmi tura ula d-Imaziɣen en Wawras semman iman nsen "Icawiyen" yerna tutlayt nsen "Tacawit".
Timaẓlayin (elwilayat) anda ttmeslayen tutlayt agi d: Tabatent, Xenclet, Suq Ahras, Um Lebwaqi, Tbessa, Qsenṭina, tɣiwanin di wenẓul en Sṭif ed umur en ugafa en tmaẓlayt (tawilayt) en Tbeskert. 
Tasnimeslit en Tcawit.
eg > ey "sker" ; 
mger > myer ; 
bzeg > bzey/bziy 
tagrest > tajrest ; 
mger > mjer ; 
ajenna (< agenna) "igenni" ; 
ajertil (<agertil) ; 
aniji (<anebgi) "inebgi"
neknin > necnin "nekni" ; 
(a)kal > cal "akal" 
kkat > ččat "wwet" ; 
nekkenti > neččenti. 
Wanag, aznaɣri amaziɣ /y/ tezmer ad tuɣal d tiggeɣt tanɣant /g, gg/ : 
Zdat tiggeɣt taɛeẓẓugt – /y/ ad yuɣal /k/ > : Tazdayt > Tazdaçt ; 
Tahyuyt > Tahyut, "Taqcict"...

Takfarinas agellid:
Takfarinas neɣ Takfarin yella d aqerru n trad mgal Rruman di tidmi amenzu baɛd talalit n Ɛisa (yemmut deg useggas 24).
Isem-is s tlaṭinit d "Tacfarinas" (ljenitif "Tacfarinatis"), anamek-is d "win n Takfarin" wissen yella "Takfarin" (neɣ "Tikfarin") d isem n teddart ansi d-yekka.
Takfarinas yella d aserdas aqbur n lɛasker n Rruman. Yessemlal-d kra iserdasen yid-es, u ffγen-d si lɛasker n Rruman, anda ruḥen ad nnaγen mgal ugellid n Muritanya Yuba II, i ḥesben ixeddem ilmend Rruman, u d wigi i t-yesulin ar udabu n tgelda n Tmazγa.
Mi εeddan 7 iseggasen n trad, yuγal yenγa-t lkunsul n Rruman di Tmazγa Dolabella.

Idrisen n tuɣac n Lunis At Mengellat:
Idrisen n tuɣac n Lunis At Mengellat
Gret Tamawt
Win izemren ad yarnu ayen umi yezmer.

Isallen:
Inedbalen imaynuten.
Ar ass-a kab.wiki mazal ur tesɛi ara "inedbalen" (administrateurs) n tidett. Ilaq a ten-nefren s lvoṭ, am wakken i xeddemen deg wikipediyat nniḍen. Ruḥet ar i wakken a nefren inedbalen-nneɣ!

Mali:
Mali d isem n tmurt d-yezgan di tefriqt, tamanaɣt-ines d Bamaku. Zedɣen-t 11 340 480 n medden.

Muḥ Crif:
Muḥ Crif d argaz umezgun, d amedyaz yernu d anaẓur n taklut azwaw ittidiren di Marikan ugafa. Illul deg At Dwala di Dugembeṛ 1954. 
'Lemri'
Di targit muqleɣ
Ɣer lemri beddeɣ
Amecwaṛ akk-a yenna-k
A wlid-i tuɣeḍ tannumi
A k weṣṣiɣ beddel tamuɣli

Ili-k d lefḥel akw-id bedd s ibeddi
Mel-iyi-d win yellan deffir tannumi
Nniɣ-as ugadeɣ, yuɣal yenna-k
Bru i takurt
Ma telliḍ d mmis n tmeṭṭut

Tiyita udem-ik ad icceqqeq
Ma teqqimeḍ akk-a ul ad yeɛweq
Nniɣ tkellxeḍ-iyi, yuɣal yenna-k

Ṛuḥ agwem-d kkes bufessus i wudem-nni

Igenni iberreq
Si tafat ul yebɣa ad ifelleq
Awal ur s izmir ara
Win tt ifran yefhem-iyi
Leɛnaya n Ṛebbi d nnbi
Tafat ɣer sdat ar tt iwali
Awal ur s izmir ara
Tafat-agi am tteswiṛa
Tettezzi teddawaṛr akk-a d wakk-a
Tettawi lewhi deg wul-iw Ṛebbi yeẓra.
Win di ddunnit
Win di ddunnit ur nezhi
Am izimer ur yerzi
Mi yewweḍ ar din, a d-yezzi
Ma d win yewwi zzhu
Itteffeẓ kan irennu
Yexleḍ uqeṛḥan d leḥlu
A Ṛebbi lmizan yewɛeṛ
Abrid wwiɣ d axeṣṣaṛ
Afḍis ay-en iwala d amesmar
Ifassen n teslit reqqmen
Allen-is ttberriqen
Ttawant neɣ d laẓ yectaqen
Ay isli wenneɛ tikli
Ul-ik awi-t deg icimi
Ili-k d lefḥel qim ɣef yiri
Issin, fhem tadukli
S tiṭ talemmast tamuɣli
Ṛebbi yiwen yid-ek d anagi
Xas bbid si zik-nni
A k d-iban webrid s tziri
Ḍfer ul aleqqaq ini-as mel-iyi
Tamussni gar-awen
Arwal i yemcumen
Anef ad asmen seg wid yemḥemmalen.
Ger Tamawt : wagi d aseɣti n tira, ma yella way-en zegleɣ arut-iyi-d akk-en a t rnuɣ.
Tanemmirt nwen(nkent).

Tafrikt tasebgast:
Tafrikt Tasebgast d tamnatt n tefriqt ɣef way yettɛeddi usebgas (équateur).
Igduden.
Timiwa-yagi ttwassnent s Yefɣulen (pygmées). Wigi d imezdaɣen ineṣliyen n tmiwa-yagi. Xas ma yella zik, tamurt-nsen meqqret (tiẓegwa n Tefriqt Talemmast, Zayir, Kamirun, atg.), ass-a, ciṭṭaḥ kan maḍi ay d-yeqqimen deg-sen, imi aṭas n lumur ay ten-icewwlen. Ifɣulen d imecṭaḥ, ur ttimɣuren ara. Imeqranen deg-sen sɛɛan azal n lmitra d wezgen di teɣzi. Maci d aḍḍan ay uḍnen, wanag akka kan ay tga ccetla-nsen. Zik, medden llan ttewḥacen-ten imi ay d imeẓyanen yernu ttidiren kan di tẓegwa, anda ay ttṣeggiden ayen tetten. Ass-a, idles-nsen atan la inegger yernu yessefk ad d-rren medden lwelha-nsen ɣur-sen.

Aḥmed Ǧennadi:
Aḥmed Ǧenadi d yiwen ger imenzawiyen n tilizri izwawen. D amseḍru isura d tasgilin. 
Mmis n Bgayet isɛan 50 isegasen, d bab n ṣaṭ (7) n derya.
Iɣra tizrawt n umzenzi, u yesɛa agerdas di tusna usedhan 'Comptabilité' i d yebbwi di 1974, d ayen icban lbak n tura. Isyin iɣra azal n kuz isegasen di yiwen uɣerbaz n Lyon di Franṣa anda id yebwi agerdas n CED (Diplôme d'Expert Comptable). Anecta yella-d s wudem amneɣray imi di talit nni tawafɣa ar berra tella s ttesriḥ sɣur adadu n Lezzayer n imiren. 
Di tuddert-is Aḥmed Ǧenadi ixdem aṭas n tasɣunin. Illa d asedhan, d amdebbar (aɣella) usedhan, d anemhal n tedrimt, d anemhal amatu n tkebanit deg weḥric n lebni neɣ usali alama d 1984. Seg usegwas aki yuɣal d alellam (Libéral), dima deg weḥric usali. 
Seg usegas n 1980, iger idaren-is deg weḥric usliqqel (Audio-visuel). Imiren ila ixeddem s Kamira n 'Super 8' s wayes ixdem aṭas n tugniwin i yeffer d cfawat. Deg 2001, imi yella iteddu ar Franṣa imlal-d d yiwen uwaziw n tilizri yettwasnen Muḥand Tafarka deg unafag Aban Ramḍan n Bgayet. Yarḍit ar Rradyu n tmaziɣt n BRTV, i syin iɛedad di tilizri ines. Anecta ibeddel amecwar-is imi s tmusni ines deg usliqqel, akw d teqbaylit, ur iɛeṭel ara yuɣal ger iɛegalen n tilizri n BRTV ifazen ar assa. Seg ass-nni ara assa, i sewǧad yiwet n tasgilt yal amalas, umi isemma Tamurt-iw. Ar tagara n 2006, tasegilt aki tesɛa azal n 483 n tedwilin. Gar asent, ma nezmer ad nader tidiwinin i yexdem akw d uneɣlaf amezwaru iɛedan Aḥmed Uyaḥya deg wexxam udadu, d kra udmawen n umussu n Laɛrac, am Belɛid Abrika d Ali ɣerbi. 
Deg 2006, i sufɣed yiwen ussaru ɣezifen s tutlayt tazwawt, umi isema Aɛziz aken yebɣu y-ili.
Anecta yella-d s illalen ines d lemɛiwna n kra n tkubaniyin am CRISTOR n Burǧ Buɛririǧ, EPB n Bgayet, d SOVAC n Lezzayer tamanaɣt. Deg 2007, isufɣ-d assaru xezifen wayed isɛan mraw (10) iḥricen umi isema Ussan Nni. Ma d assaru ɣezifen wis krad atan deg ubrud u sufeɣ. Azwel-is Asirem.ɛ

At Bu Ɣerdan:
Adrum n At Bu Ɣerdan, aṭas tuddar i yellan deg-s (At Hiǧa, At Lkassem, At Hagun).
Tezga-d ger Amecras ak° d At Mendas. Tebɛad aka 10 Km si Buɣni.
Tella d Tamurt n Leqbayel n essaḥ. Tura, attan teččur d at icumar.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n At Bu Ɣerdan tella ar 40km deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.

Lhewwari Ɛeddi:
Lhewwari Ɛeddi (neɣ Addi Lahouari) d amusnaw n tussna n tmetti, tura d aselmad deg uɣerbaz n tizrawt n tsertit n Lyon di Franṣa. Illul di 21 ibrir 1949 di Wehran. Yura aṭas n yeḍrisen d tizrawt af tsertit amek i tleḥu di Lezzayer. Gar-asen(t): "De l’Algérie pré-coloniale à l’Algérie coloniale" (1985), "L’impasse du populisme" (1990), d "L’Algérie et la démocratie" (1994). 
Lhewwari Ɛeddi yettwasen imi yella d bab n wawal-agi regression féconde i yeqqimen deg umezruy, af wayen i yeḍran di Lezzayer di temrawt taberkant n iseggasen 90.

Ɛebdelkrim Ǧeɛɛad:
Abdelkrim Ǧeɛad d yiwen uneɣmas azwaw illul deg Aqbu.

Legliz:
Legliz, s teglizit United Kingdom ("Tagelda Yedduklen"), d tamurt tigzirt d-yezgan di Turuft, deg-s 4 tgeldiwin yedduklen : "England" ("Legliz" n tidett), "Tamurt n Yigaliyen", "Tikust" (tigeldwin agi d "Great Britain", "Britanya tameqqrant" di 3 yid-sent) rnu-asen"Northern Ireland" ("Irland n Ugafa").

Muḥand Tafarka:
Muḥand Taferka, isem-is unṣib Muḥand Barrache, d yiwen umedyaz azwaw n tama n Weqbu, di Bgayet. Daɣen d awaziw n tilizri n tmaziɣt BRTV di Franṣa, anda yesεa yiwet n tesgilt (nnuba) umi isema Tamedyazt war tilas.

Ǧamila n Tferka:
Ǧamila n Tferka d yiwet n tamedyazt tazwawt ifazen. Tlul-d deg taddart n At Yemɣur, deg tɣiwant n Amecras di tama n Buɣni (Tizi Wezzu). Tura yiwen n wedlis umi tsema Tiregwa n Nnfiḍ. Atan wayen yura fellas uneɣmas Salem Amran n weɣmis n Dépêche de Kabylie, di Yebrir 2007, tasuqilt sɣur Omar MOUFFOK.
Aṭṭuqqet n lxir ur yettḍurru. Akk-a ay as-yeqqar yiwen n wanzi inefεen deg wakk inurar n tudert, ladɣa deg wenrar n tmaziɣt, imi s kra n wedlis ara d-yeffɣen s yiles-a, nesteṛḥib yes-s imi ara yejj tamaziɣt ad taf amkan-is u ad tejhed.
Ussan-a, yeffeɣ-d wedlis n yisefra n Djamila n Tferka, tamedyazt-nni yettwassnen deg tesgilt (nnuba) n « Tamedyazt war tilas », ay d-yettqeddim Muḥand Taferka deg BRTV.
”Tiregwa n Nnfiḍ”, ammud (recueil) n Ǧamila, d Muḥand Taferka s timmad-is ay as-d-yuran timsegrit (post-face) ay deg nezmer ad nɣer Ttawil inefεen akk ay tesseqdac tmeṭṭut taqbaylit akk-n ad d-tessiwel ɣef ddunit d yiɣeblan-ines netta d isefra. Ǧamila n Tferka tessen amek ara d-tecnu kullec s usefru, u tid yettgen am nettat, tikkwal yettwakkes-asent wawal.
Adlis n Ǧamila yesεa 180 n yisebtar yernu ulac deg-s tisuqilin (asṭerjem) ɣer tefṛensist (akk-n nennum nettaf deg kra n wammuden n yisefra niḍen). Taqcict-a tlul-d deg taddart n At Yemɣur, deg tɣiwant n Amecras (Tizi Wezzu). Deg wammud-ines, tefka Ǧamila amur ameqran i tayri akk-n ad d-tessken i medden dakk-n ɣas ma yella nesmeεreq nettu-tt, tayri dima tetteqqel-d, dima nesmektay-itt-id. Dɣa, Ǧamila tcennu ɣef wakk idisan n tayri, ula ɣef uḥemmel n tayri u mi ara nɣer isefra-ines, ur nettḥulfu i trutint, wala i uεiwed. Isefra n Ǧamila ccuṛen d tamitafuṛt akk d tugniwin n tmedyazt.
Deg usefru-ines ”Mi iḍaq ṛṛuḥ”, teqqar-d :
Tettkemmil :
Tamuɣli-a tumliḥt ay tesεa Djamila teddukkel d tmussni-ines ijehden deg teqbaylit. D ay-a ay d-yettafken isefra ẓiden i tɣuri.
Nnig temsalt n tayri, Ǧamila Taferka tessawal daɣen ɣef tmedyazt s timmad-is, ɣef tegnit n tmeṭṭut, ɣef waḍḍan, ɣef tmetti (société), ɣef lḥif, ɣɣef tudert, ɣef talwit d waṭas n tlufa niḍen.
Deg way-n yerzan tamṣukt (structure), Ǧamila tebna isefra-ines s yiberdan yemgerraden. Kra deg-sen d iskendriyen (alexandrins), maca tebna-d daɣen ifyar (vers) s 8 n tunṭiqin (octosyllabe), akk d yisefra itteddun s ṛebεa yefyar neɣ s ttesεa yefyar. Tameɣrut (rime) n Ǧamila d tin ay deg teṭṭuqqet temṣ̣ukt n AAB, u tesseqdec tameɣrut tanmidegt (rime croisée).
Yessefk ad d-nger tamawt dakk-n Djamila tesseqdec aṭas tamitafuṛt deg yisefra-ines, u llan kra deg-nsen, deg wezwel-nsen (titre) yagi ad tt-naf am “Ajejjig n Lekdeb”, “Tabrat i zzheṛ”, “Snulfu-iyi-d”.
Ammud-a (recueil) tessuffeɣ-it-id Djamila i ddemma-ines, d acu kan , tettekka deg-s BRTV. D tiẓrigin ”Le Savoir” Wezzu ay t-id-yessuffɣen. Axxam-a n ussuffeγ n yedlisen, melmi kan ay d-yebda leqdic u la yettnerni cwiṭ, cwiṭ.
Ǧamila n Tferka, tesεa daɣen zzheṛ imi argaz-ines, Salem Saεd, yebded s idis-is, yettεawan-itt. Tanaẓurt-a la tt-yettṛaju waṭas n lxir ɣer sdat. Ihi a Ǧamila, ɣas faṛes !

Busad Abdic:
Busad Abdic d aneɣmas u d amyaru azwaw, ilul di 17 yulyu 1943 di taddart Azuza, di Laṛebɛa n At Yiraten. Immut di mayu 1997, di rebraben i t yenɣan mi sṭerd.qen lbumba di ḥusin Day, di Lezzayer tamanaɣt. Ibda taɣamsa si 1965, ixdem i tesqamutt n tɣamsa APS, i tesɣunt "Révolution Africaine", i weɣmis n "Algérie Actualité". Si 1970 yuɣal ar weɣmis n "El Moudjahid" asmi i d yebbwi agerdas seg uɣerbaz n tɣamsa di Paris. Asmi i yarḍen s uḥetem isertiyen udabu n Lezzayer ad skecmen tagdut d tileli umeslay si 1988 ar tmurt, Busad Abdic ixdem i yeɣmisen "El Manchar" (1991), d "Liberté" (1992), d "Horizons" (1994).
Busad Abdic yura idlisen, garasen:
D aɣen isεa kra n yedlisen mazal ur d-neffɣ ara, izwal nnsen d :
Tamselyut, Iseddagen & Izdayen Iberraniyen.
Aɣmis izuran-Racines

Tafelsuft:
Awal tafelsuft yekka-d seg tegrigit φιλοσοφία "philosophía", yesduklen aẓar n φίλειν "phílein" « ḥibb » d win n σοφία "sophía" « tamussni ». Daɣnetta anamek-is d « tara n tmussni ».
"Tagduda" n Platon

Ɛebdelḥamid Ben Haduga:
Ɛebdelḥamid Ben Haduga d argaz aseklan, yiwen ger yergazen iseklanen imeqranen n tmurt n Dzayer. Ilul-ed g 9 yennayer 1925 di Menṣura yemmut g 21 tuber 1996 di Dzzayer tamanaɣt.
Yeɣra g uɣerbaz arumi, yetbeɛ taɣuri-s s teɛrabt g al-ketania di Qsentina umbeɛd g tesdawit n Zituna g Tunes tamanaɣt, mmi d-yeqqwel ar tmurt n Dzzayer, yexdem kra n isallen s teɛrabt i mataf n BBC akk d ORTF aken ad iɛiwen iɣelnazrien xaîar netta yella d ameɣnas aɣelnazri, tmuql-it temsulta imir-nni, yerwel ar Fransa g 1955, yekcem ar FLN asmi yella g tmurt n Tunes g 1958, iɛiwen g umataf n « Ssut n Dzayer »
Netta i yuran ungalen-is seg "Rīḥ El-Janūb" ("Abeḥri n wenzul", "Le Vent du Sud", 1971) ar "Ɣadan Yawmun Jadīd" ("targuɣ yiwen wemdal", "Je rêve d'un monde...", 1997, baɛd tmettant-is), isuql-iten-id ar tarumit Marcel Bois.

Aristot:
'"Aristot" (s tegrigit Ἀριστοτέλης, 384-322 Qε) yella d afilusuf agrigi. Ilul-ed g teddart n Stagire g tmurt n Tmaqdunit (Masedwan). Yezdeɣ g Atena, yella d anelmad n Platon g takadimit.

Tamrikt:
Tamrikt neɣ Marikan d amenẓaw deg idis ugafay (umalu) n umaḍal. Tebḍa ɣef sin yeḥricen, Tamrikt n Ugafa id Temrikt n Wenẓul.
Aẓar n wawal.
Awal Tamrikt/Marikan yekka-d si "Amerigo Vespucci". Isem-agi urant i tikkelt tamezwarut di 25 Yebrir 1507 deg yiwet n tkarḍa tarakalant . Yessufɣ-itt-id yiwen uressam n tkarḍiwin, Almani Martin Waldseemüller deg Saint-Dié-des-Vosges, isemma amenẓaw amaynut "America" ilmend n Amerigo Vespucci, imsilel aṭelyani.
Tarakalt.
Kanada, Iwunak Yedduklen, Groenland (Danmark), Meksik, Gwatimala, Salvador, Handuras, Kusta Rika, Panama, Kuba, Bermuda (Lingliz), Jamaika, Haiti, Republik n Dominik, Puerto Riko, Gwadilup,Martinik, Saint-Pierre ed Miquelon (Fransa), Tigzirin i India.
Gwatimala, Belize, Honduras, Nicaragua, Kusta Rika , Salvadur , Panama
Kolombi, Venezuela, Brazil, Tarjentint, Cili, Paraguay, Peru, Ikwador, Bolivia, Galapagos (Ekuator), Tigzirin n Falkland (Tabritanit Tameqrant), Tagwiwant, Surinam, Tagwinant Tafrensist (Fransa), Belize.

Biljik:
Tigelda n Biljik d yiwet tmurt n Turuft n Umalu, tesɛa tilisa id Fransa, Timura n Wadda, Lalman akw d Luxembourg. Deg tama ugafa-umalu ad naff Ilel n Ugafa ɣef taɣzi n 318 Km ger De Panne id Aarlen.

Prison break:
Prison Break d isem n yiwet ta seri tilizrit tamarikanit, teffeɣ-d deg 29 ɣuct 2005. Amseḍru-ines Paul Scheuring. Tamacahut-is ɣef yiwen wemdan yebɣa ad iseffeɣ gma-s seg lḥebs.

Le tuteur de Madame la Ministre:
Le tuteur de Madame la Ministre ("Lwali n Lalla taneɣlaft") d asaru n Djamila Amzal, ɣef wayen yezmer ad iḍru i tmeṭṭut n Dzayer s "le code de la famille" n tura. Tameṭṭut tezmer ad tuɣal ula d taneɣlaft (ministre), maca ma tebɣa ad taɣ argaz, ilaq-as lwali, (le tuteur), amzun tezga d taqcict tamecṭuḥt.

Asya:
Asya d nettat ay d amenẓaw ameqran akk deg umaḍal. Tajumma-nnes 44.579.000 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen). D nettat daɣen ay yesɛan aṭas akk n yimezdaɣen deg umaḍal. Zedɣen-tt 4.164.252.000 n (2011) yimezdaɣen (Asyawiyen).

Amenẓaw:
Amenẓaw d amur meqq°ren n wakal.

Mesṭafa Daḥleb:
Mestafa Dahleb, neɣ Mus akken s-qqaren, yella d yiwen umarir n takurt uḍar azwaw. Ilul ass n 8 furar 1952 di Bgayet. Illa d yiwen ger imurar i mucaaen. Iruḥ ar n terbaɛt n Paris PSG si terbaɛt n Sedan deg 1974 s wazal n 1,35 imelyan n Francs. D suma muqren nezzeh imir-en. 

Tacelḥit:
Tacelḥit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen Icelḥiyen/isusayen (""Chleuhs""), d yiwet si tutlayin timaziɣin, yuɣ lḥal tettas-d d nettat i d tamezwarut si tama n wemḍan n yemdanen i tt-iheddren, seg wakken wwḍen ahat 12 imelyan, syin teṭṭafar-itt-id teqbaylit.. Ma ɣas tutlayt tamaziɣt, zik, tettwaru s isekkilen n tifinaɣ , ila Ɣila mas titaran s isekkilen ilatiniyen neɣ s isekkilen aɛraben , maca iseggasen-a igguran iɛawd daḥ IRCAM isfaɣd yiwet lmarka tajdidt f tifinaɣ taqburt. Imyura i d-yessufuɣen idlisen, nutni deg tuget deg-sen ttarun s isekkilen ilaṭiniyen n temεemmrit.
Γas akken ula d tacelḥit kecmen-tt wawalen n taεrabt, nezmer ad d-nini belli d tantala ideg ttuḥerzen ddeqs n wawalen imaziɣen iḥeqqaniyen ; meḥsub ugar tiyaḍ, amedya d izwilen (chiffres) i d-mazal deg-s ar assa, ayen yeǧǧan Iqbayliyen i d-yelhan d usegmi n tutlayt-nsen d usekfel n tgemmi tutlayant taqburt, ad d-agmen aṭas seg-s, ladɣa seg iseggasen-nni n 70 ɣer da.
Awalen Iberraniyen deg Tcelḥit.
Kra n wawalen i-d yekkan seg Teɛrbat :
Kra n yimedyaten akked awalen kikkif akked Talatint:
Kra n imedyaten umgirred gar tcelḥit d teqbaylit :

Ɣ:
Ɣ d asekkil seg ugemmay alatini ameqqran, yekka-d aẓar-is seg usekkil agrigi : gamma (γ).

Ɛ:
Ɛ d asekkil seg ugemmay alatini ameqqran, yekka-d aẓar-is seg usekkil agrigi : ipsilen (epsilon ε).

Tarifit:
Tarifit (qqaren as Tamaziɣt di Arif) d tantala d Tamaziɣt i ssawalen Irifiyen di ugafa n tmurt n Merruk. 
Tantala Tarifit (Tamaziɣt n Arrif) ssawalen-it 3,5 imelyan n imdanen. 
Haten imgirrden ger Tarifit d tanaliwin Timaziɣin nniḍen:
Lemmer tella tiɣra mbeɛd /r/ a t-nenteq, Amedya : nenṭeq /r/ n "tamara".

Tazayant:
Tazayant d tutlayt i ttmeslayen Iziyan. D tantala n tmaziɣt n Lmarruk alemmas. Tamaziɣt tettikki deg tutlayin timaziɣin. 

Tamaziɣt (Amerruk):
Imaziɣen n Umerruk alemmas semman tutlayt-nsen d Tamaziɣt. Imusnawen n tesnawalt qqaren-as daɣen beraber. D yiwen n yeḥricen imeqranen n tmaziɣt i meslayen deg Lmerruk : wiyaḍ d tacelḥit (Merruk n Wenẓul) ak-d tarifit (Amerruk n Ugafa). 
Tamaziɣt n Umerruk alemmas, deg-s aṭas n tentaliwin, nezmer a nefrez deg-sent sin yeḥricen : win n ugafa d win n wanẓul.

Nicolas Sarkozy:
Nicolas Sarkozy, ilul-d g 28 yennayer 1955 g Paris, d aselway n Fransa seg 16 mayu 2007.
Tameddurt.
Isem-is ameqqran : Nicolas, Paul, Stéphane Sarközy de Nagy-Bocsa, meɛna isem-agi ur yettusseqdac ara aṭas. baba-s, Pál Sárközy, yekka-d seg Hongri u yuɣal-d d arumi, yezweǧ akk d Andrée Mallah, yelli-s n ṭbib uday iwumi yekcem ɣer tamasiḥt.arnu sarkozy d miss lahram

Israyil:
Israyil (s taɛebrit יִשְרָאֵל‎, Yisra'el; s taɛrabt: إسرائيل‎, "Isrā'īl") isem ines unṣib Awanek n Israyil (s taɛebrit: מְדִינַת יִשְרָאֵל‎ , "Medinat Yisra'el"; s taɛrabt: دَوْلَةْ إِسْرَائِيل‎, "Dawlat Isrā'īl"), tamurt tezgad g umalu n umenẓaw Asya d rrif asammer n ilel agrakal, tesɛa tilas d Lubnan s ugafa, Surya s ugafa asammer, s usammer Urdun, s unzul asammer Maser , yezgad gar-as d tamurt n l’Urdun ilel amettan , Awanek n Israyil d yiwen awanek uday kan i yellan g ddunit, ulac wayed am netta, tajumma ines mectuḥet maca llan g-yes tigwti n udayen d tadersi n waɛraben inselmen, ineṣriyen, idruzen d isamariyen. Llant daɣen tasfift n Ɣezza d tama tanẓulit neɣ tama turdunit.
Awanek atrar n Israyil mɣind iẓuran-is s takti n Tamurt n Israyil ("Eretz Ysra’el") i g-yellan g’allaɣ n udayen g azal n 3000 iseggasen deqqal amgaru amedlan amenzu, tametti n iɣlanen teǧǧad l'eḥkem n wegmuḍ alemmas d Falaṣṭin ger ifasen n ibritaniyen bac ad xleq axxam aɣelnaw i-udayen, g useggas n 1947, iɣlanen i dduklen bḍan tamurt n Falesṭin ɣef sin iwanaken, yiwen awanek uday, wayed aɛrab, g 14 magu 1948 teḍra taseɣrut n uzarug n awanek n Israyil s umtawa n iɣlanen i dduklen, deqqal-is krend iɛraben s umgaru mgal udayen axater ugin ad qeblen azarug n awanek n Israyil, rnan imgura nniden maca israyiliyen rebḥen g yal imenɣiyen, rnan sbaɛden tilas isen tefkan iɣlanen idduklen uqbel, g’imir nni udayen d iɛraben kecmen g yiwen azenzab n imenɣiyen ur yetfak
Tezmel Israyil imtawayen n telwit akk d timura n Maser d Urdun 
Awanek n Israyil yewweḍ ɣef kra imanzyen am tugdut timgensest, angaraw awamni, afran amegradi, Aneglaf amenzu d netta i gellan ixxef n unabad akk d l Kneset.
Tadamasa taɣelnawt n Israyil tella tis 44 g ddunit, taneflit talsant, tilelli n tifeffegt. Urcalim d tamdint tamaneɣt d tamdint i muqqren g Israyil, din i yella asutel n unabad maca ammas n tadamsa d tiẓraf yella g tamdint n Tel Aviv.
Isem.
Issem n Israyil ybined i tikkelt tamenzut g aẓru n Merenptah g useggas 1200 uqbel talalit n Ɛisa, issem agi yella d win n Tagelda n Israyil tamzikit.
Issem n Israyil d yessem i s-yefka illu i Yeɛqub ass mi yennuɣ ar tama n lmalayek n Illu anamek ines « win innuɣen ar tama n Illu »
Yeɛqub d babas n 12 n tiqbilin i yeffɣen s Maser imir semmanten arraw n Israyil neɣ « israyiliten »
G taseɣrut n’uzarug n awanek n’Israyil id ixelqen g’useggas n 1948 yettef issem n Israyil yeǧǧa issmawen niḍen am Ṣehyun, Tudayt (Judea).
Amezruy.
Iẓuran imezwura.
Tamurt n Israyl (awal-agi itwassen s tɛebrit s "Erets Yisrael") yella kra i sɛan azal ameqqran ɣur udayen; g Turat yura belli Illu yefkad amiru i udayen bac asen-yefk tamurt n Israyil faken a tili tamurt-nsen neg axxam-nsen
Azarug.
Deg lqern 19, akk d Theodor Herzl yexleq taṣionit (Ṣionism) : udayen bɣan a d-uɣalen ɣer tmurt taneṣlit-nsen. Assmi kksen yingliziyen Falesṭin seg ifassen n Tturk, udayen zemren ad ruḥen ɣer Falesṭin, uɣen-d akal seg weɛraben, bnan u zedɣen.
Di 1948, Langliz teffeɣ-d seg falesṭin, tuddsa n iɣlanen i dduklen U.Ɣ.D (l'ONU) tegzem akal-agi di sin : 
Udayen qeblen, aɛraben ugin beṭṭu-yagi, 7 timura n weɛraben ttnaɣen akk d tmurt tamaynut n wudayen : Israyil terbeḥ imenɣ (lgirra), terbeḥ akal s wazal n 28% kter n wayen i-ten-id-ifkan tuddsa n iɣlanen i dduklen(l'ONU). Kra n weɛraben i yellan deg Israyil rewlen, meɛna kra qqimen: tutlayt-nsen tutlayt tunṣibt. Akk udayen i yellan deg tamurt n Falesṭin rewlen ɣer Israyil.
G 1967, tskker Maṣer abrid n lebḥer n Tiran, ihi Israyil tebda lgirra amgal Maṣer, timura n weɛraben nniḍen bɣan ad ɛawnen Maṣer meɛna akk xesren, Israyil terbeḥ daɣen kter akal.
G 1973, aɛraben xeddmen lgirra tikkelt nniḍen akk d Israyil, meɛna xesren daɣen : lgirra d wakal. Israyil tuɣal-d tameqqrant zdat Israyil n 1948.
Tarakalt.
-- 04:14, 7 Ctember 2008 (UTC)

Death Note:
Death Note d manga seg Japon, yura-t Tsugumi Ohba u iresm-it Takeshi Obata. Tamacahutt-is ɣef yiwen unelmad g lycée i yesɛan taktabt : "Death Note", taktabt n lmut, asmi yettwura isem n yiwen deg tektabt-nni ad yemmet. Anelmad-agi isem-is "yagami light", yebɣa ad yekkes lecrar seg ddunit s lemɛiwna n "shinigami", yakuc n lmut.
Yeffeɣ-d lmanga g bujember 2003 ar Mayu 2006, s 108 timucuha. Yeffeɣ-d asaru (film) fell-as g yunyu 17 2006, anime yeffeɣ daɣen g Japon seg Tuber 3 2006 ɣer Yunyu 26, 2007.

Code Geass:
Code Geass d anime seg japon, yura-t Ichirō Ōkouchi u resment-t Clamp. Yeffeɣ-d g tiliẓri n japon g Wamber 2006 u mazal ur yekfi ara. 
Tamacahutt-is deg 2010 ɣef yiwen unelmad g lycée, yemmegred yiwet n teqcict tefkaya-s lpouvoir n "geass" : yezmer ad yeḥkem di akk n medden, mi yenna-yasen taɣawsa a tt-xeddmen, meɛna lpouvoir agi yelḥu yiwet n tikkelt kan akk d yiwen bnadem.
S lGeass, yebɣa tilelli n japon, yuɣ lḥal, japon g 2010 testeɛmri-t britania. 

Tunes:
Tezga-d tmurt n Tunes neɣ Tinast (s tmaziɣt : ⵜⵉⵏⴰⵙⵜ, s teɛrabt تونس) g Tefrikt n ugafa tamanaɣt ines isem-is daɣen Tunes tamanaɣt, tesɛa talast akw d tmurt n Lezzayer (Dzzayer) g ama ataram, d tmurt n Libya g ama amalu, ilel Agrakal s umalu, d ugafa, 40% n tmurt-is d Aneẓruf (Ṣṣaḥra), ameslay amensawi n tmurt n Tunes d tutlayt taɛrabt, lamaεna, llant kra n tudrin anda ttmeslayen s tmaziɣt g wenzul.
Dinna daɣen i yella Dduḥ n tɣerma taqerṭajt g timdi tis 3 uqbel talalit n Ɛisa.
Tewwi-d tilelli ines ass n yella isem-is tagelda n Tunes, seg imir ass n 25 Yulyu 1957 tbeddel isem-is d tsertit-is, yeql-ed isem-is "Tagduda tatunsit".
Amezruy.
Tunes amezruy ines mitɛlleq s imaziɣen,si zik n zik imaziɣen ḥekmen di Tunes yerna llan deg-sen Iqabsiyen d imezwura n imaziɣen ,d iɣellaten imeqqranen Imaziɣen fɣen seg Tunes am Massnsen, Hannabaal, Dunatus, Aksil,Dihya, U Ɛerfa (Ibn Âarfa), U Seḥnun, Iziriyen, Iḥafsiyen, Ɛli Ben Ɣeḍehem... 
Tunes, isem-ines d Amaziɣ yusa-d seg yensa d tunes d amken anda ensen iqarṭajiyen qbal ass elli fɣen deg-s bec ddan zdaxel Tamazɣa.
Tadimugṛafit.
Imaziɣen di tunes.
Di Tunes llan imaziɣen , d lâdad nsen 168 igmimen di tutlayt d 6,5 imelyan di lɛireq ḥasseb test adn, d gar 800 igmimen d 1 miliun ssnen sawalen s tmaziɣt.
Tawssna tamaziɣt di tunes tella,maca ur llant tidduklin n Imaziɣen n Tunes d tella lbideya n lwaɛy af tamaziɣt di tamurt tagi.
Tagzirit n Ǧerba,iɣrmen n Maṭmaṭa,iɣrmen n Sened, Tameɣza, Cninni, Dwiret, Amekraḍ n Yezwawen (Zwawa) (Zriba, Takruna, Jradu), Idurar n Xmir, Icawiyen n Lgasrin d aṭas iɣermen de tsawal s tmaziɣt ar ass-a.
Di tunes ula aṭas tiqbaylin ɣur-sent aẓar amaziɣ am Wlad Jlass, Wlad Ɛayr, Lefracic, At Majer, Sewsi, Wlad Xmir, Iwerɣemmen (Werɣemma), Nefzewa (Inefzawen), Amdun, Wlad Ɛun.
Ẓeṛ daɣen.
Ablog n Duktur Wirghmi

Qurayc:
Adrum n At Qurayc tella zik d adrum ameqqran izedɣen deg temdint n Mekka (anida tura tezga-d tgelda taɛrabt tasaɛudit). Deg wedrum-nni ilul-ed wizer (rrasul) Muḥemmed.

Ajjed:
Ajjed neɣ ddin d tagrumma n wayen ttamnen medden d leɛwayed i teddun yid-sen.
Tudayt.
Tudayt d ajjed amezwaru ideg ttamnen medden belli yella yiwen yakuc (dieu) kan. Isem-is s tɛebrit : Yahvé naɣ Allah. Udayen ur nezmir ara ad neṭqen isem-agi axaṭer ɣur-sen ḥram. Yakuc g tudayt yesɛa lemluk i t-ttɛawanen, yuzen rruṣel ɣur medden akken ad ttamnen yis-es. Yahvé yextar agdud : agdud n israyil akken ad necren awal n yakuc.
Tamasiḥit.
G Tamasiḥit, Yakuc d yiwen, iṣubb ɣer medden s wedmaw n bnadem : Ɛisa.
Lislam.
G lislam, Yakuc d yiwen meɛna ur iṣubb ara, Ɛisa ɣur inselmen d nnbi kan.

Jean-Jacques Rousseau:
Jean-Jaques Rousseau ilul ass n 28 yunyu 1712 g Jenev, anda yemmut 02 yulyu 1778.

Agemmay agrigi:
Agemmay agrigi d agemmay yettuseqdac di tira n tutlayt tagrigit segmi lqern wis 9 uqbel Ɛisa. Yekka-d uẓar-is seg ugemmay afiniqi. 
Igrigiyen ṭṭfen agemmay afiniqi, beddlen isekkilen-is u rnan-t tiɣra (voyelles), yuɣ lḥal agemmay agrigi d agemmay amezwaru i yesɛan tiɣra.
Agemmay agrigi yettwura seg uzelmaḍ ɣer uyeffus. Yettubeddel geddac tikkwal u yefka-d aṭas n igemmayen : Alatini, Aqebṭi, Ssirilik... atg. 
Agemmay atrar.
Ṭṭabla deg ukessar tesskan isekkilen n ugemmay agrigi atrar, mkul asekkil yesɛa aẓari-is deg ugemmay afiniqi.

Addad:
Addad d awal yesɛan kra n inumak :

Addad (tajerrumt):
Addad d awal amaynut yesnulfa Mulud At Mεemmer mi yura tajerrumt-is n teqbaylit s teqbaylit. Addad d taskant (lxeṣla) ger teskanin n yisem deg tutlayin timaziɣin merra, siwa kra n tantaliwin n Libya, n Maṣer, ak° d Mawritanya.
Ismawen ineṣliyen n tmaziɣt (mačči d ireṭṭalen seg tutlayin-nniḍen) sɛan sin n waddaden: addad ilelli (s tefransist "état libre") d waddad amaruz ("état d'annexion"). 
Addad amaruz n yismawen yezmer ad yili : 

Agemmay ssirilik:
Ssirilik d agemmay ixelq-it-id Siril g lqern 9, ttarun syes tutlayin am tarusit, tukranit, tutlayin tislaviyin nniḍen.

La Dépêche de Kabylie:
La Dépêche de Kabylie ("Tabratt n Tmurt n Leqbayel") d aɣmis (ajernan) azzayri yettwarun s tefransist. Uṭṭun amezwaru yeffeɣ deg wass 13 yunyu 2002. Wi t-ixelqen d Lamara Benyounes, aneɣlaf aqbur n Butefliqa. Aɣmis-agi iḥemmel aṭas Butefliqa d ukabar n Benyounes l'UDR. 
Azday (aseɣwen) aberrani.
Asmel (adeg) n weɣmis

Tifeffeɣt tadzayrit:
Tifeffeɣt tadzayrit yettwarun s tefransist
Tifeffeɣt tadzayrit yettwarun s teɛrabt
Tifeffeɣt tadzayrit yettwarun s tmaziɣt

Agraw imaziɣen:
Agraw imaziɣen (neɣ "Académie berbère" s tefransist) d tiddukla tettwanulfa d (tettwaxleq) di 1966 g fransa, llan deg-s Muḥend Arab Besaɛud, Ṭawes Ɛemruc, Sliman Ɛazem, Muḥemmed Arkun ...atg.
Agraw imaziɣen mechur (yettwassen) isem-nsen axaṭer d nutni i ssidiren tifinaɣ, u snulfan-d asenǧaq amaziɣ. Tikkwal, Agraw imaziɣen uran deg lmagazin "Imazighen" s ugemmay n tifinaɣ.

Tafada:

2004:

2005:

Yulyu:
Yulyu d ayyur 7 n useggwas. Deg-s 31 wussan. Isem-is yekka seg tlatinit "Iulius", isem n Yulyus Sizar, amenukal n Rum, win isemma ayyur agi.

5 yulyu:
Ass 5 yulyu d ass wis 186 n useggas (wis 187 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 179 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
= Ayen yeḍran =
= Wid ilulen =
= Wid immuten =
= Leɛwacer =

23 yunyu:
Ass 23 yunyu d ass wis 174 n useggas (wis 175 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 191 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
= Ayen yeḍran =
= Wid ilulen =
= Wid immuten =
= Leɛwacer =

Lqern wis XIX:
Lqern wis XIX yebda aseggas 1801, yekfa aseggas 1900.

11 ctember:

Ayyur:
Ayyur neɣ Aggur neɣ eccheṛ d amur n useggas. Aseggas, deg-s 12 waguren, yal yiwen yesɛan 30 neɣ 31 n wussan (28 neɣ 29 deg wagur n furar kan). Ismawen n waguren s teqbaylit kkan seg Tlatint.
Ismawen n wagguren s tlatinit ak d s teɛrabt (ddarja) neɣ s tmaziɣt deg Tefriqt n Ugafa 

11:

14 yulyu:
Ass 14 yulyu d ass wis 195 n useggas (wis n 196 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 170 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas

Yennayer:
Yennayer (neɣ nnayer) d ayyur amezwaru n useggas. Deg-s 31 wussan. Isem-is yekka seg tlatinit "Ianuarius", ayyur anda llan leɛwacer n yakuc "Ianus" (isem-is seg "ianua" "tawwurt"). Yanus yesɛa sin wudmawen : yiwen yeskaden ɣer deffir (ar useggas i d-iɛeddan), wayeḍ yeskaden ɣer zdat (ar useggas amaynut).
Yennayer s te maziɣt yen akk d ayyur, anamek is ayyur amenzu.
yennayer d'ayyur amenzu daɣen d'ass amezwaru n we seggas anda i maziɣen ttmagaren't s te meɣra.
Leɛwacer.
Ẓer daɣen Yennayer agellid n wayyuren

Furar:
Furar d ayyur 2 n useggwas. Deg-s 28 wussan ; kull 4 iseggasen irennu ass igan 29. Isem-is yekka seg tlatinit "Februarius".

14:

Tihudit:
Tihudit d ajjed amezwaru ideg ttamnen medden belli yella yiwen yakuc (Rebbi) kan.
Isem yakuc-nsen s tɛebrit d יהוה (Yahweh), maca udayen ur nezmir ara ad neṭqen isem-agi, axaṭer ɣur-sen ḥram. Inin nitni אדני "adonay" ('agellid-iw') deg tẓallit d השם "Hacem" ('Isem' s tmaziɣt) deg wawal.
Yakuc deg tudayt yesɛa lemluk i t-yettɛawanen, yuzen rrusel ɣur medden akken ad ttamnen yi-s. Yahweh yextar agdud : agdud n israyil akken ad zzuzren awal-is.
Udayen ttganin lmasiḥ,ara ten-iselek d ad yebnu tamurt n Israyil tamqqrant: Erezt Israyil, lmasiḥ-agi ɣur-s tazmert n wessidir wid yemmuten. Udayen ur ttamnen ara belli Ɛisa d lmasiḥ axaṭer ur yezmir ad yexdem ayen yettwuran deg wedlis-nsen (turat), ur yebni ara tamurt n israyil tameqqrant, ur ten-yeslik ara seg ifassen n Rruman, tella daɣen yiwet tamacahutt ɣef Ɛisa sɣur imasiḥiyen, mi asen-d-yenna bell netta d lmasiḥ, udayen ṭṭfen-t rnu ddan yid-es ɣer tameqqbert, nnan-as : "ssidir wid yemmuten!". Udayen n tura ur qbilen ara Ɛisa d lmasiḥ axaṭer deg tmasiḥt, Ɛisa d mmi-s n Rebbi, ɣur Udayen, Rebbi ur yesɛi mmi-s.
Mazal ar tura udayen ttganin lmasiḥ. Yuɣ lḥal, udayen xelqen tamurt n Israyil mebla tallalt n lmasiḥ deg 1948, kra n wudayen nnan-d d akken ayen-agi d leḥram, yessefk ad gganin lmasiḥ.

Tamasiḥit:
Tamasiḥit niɣ Tamettumsa d ajjed iy deg ttamnen medden belli Ṛebbi d yiwen, iṣobb ɣer medden s wedmaw n bnadem: Yeccu (Ɛisa). Imasiḥen (Imettumsen) ttamnen belli Yeccu ur yesɛi ara baba-s : ilul ala seg yiwet n tmeṭṭot (Meryem) s tezmert n Rebbi. Imasiḥen ttamnen belli Yeccu (Ɛisa) d Elmasiḥ ay ad isellken Udayen d ad yexelq tamurt n Israyil tameqqrant, ɣas akken ur yexdim ara akk tiɣawsiwin agi, nutni ttamnen belli a d-yuɣal tikkelt nniḍen akken a tt-yexdem. 
Imasiḥen umnen di Adlis Uɣris (iqedsen) neɣ Abenǧil (Inǧil), ayen isɛan tira s tɛebrit d tira s Tegrigt.
Tisuqilin n Yinjil ɣer tutlayt Tamaziɣt.
Ttwagent (ttwaxedment) aṭas n tsuqilin n Yinjil s tutlayt Tamaziɣt, s tintaliwin am Tamaziɣt Tarifit, Tamaziɣt Tacelḥit, d Tamaziɣt Taqbaylit.
Tasuqilt n Yinjil s Tmaziɣt Taqbaylit tella da:
Injil s Tefṛansist - Tamaziɣt Taqbaylit.
Llant tsuqilin Timaziɣin n:
- Arkawal Azayku ("Ancien Testament").
- Arkawal Amaynu ("Nouveau Testament").
- Izlan n Dawud (Psalms)...

Islam:
Islam yella d-ajjed (eddin) iy deg ttamnen yinselmen belli Yakuc neɣ Rebbi d-yiwen, wer yesɛi acrik. D-Netta iy dd-ixelqen akk ameɣrad ("the universe"), ala Netta iy yestahellen ad yettwaɛbed. 
Deg laxert, wid i yumnen s-yes, gan ayen iy yefreḍ fell-asen ad aten-iger ɣer lǧennet, ma d-wid wer yuminen s-s-yes, ɛsant ad aten-iger ɣer ǧahennama (times).Deg Lislam, Allah Ixleq-d Lmalaykat seg tafat, Leǧnun seg tmes, amdan seg wakal. Yuzen imazanen ("les messagers") ɣur medden akken ad amnen s yes ad rnun ad at-ɛebden s wayen isen-id icareɛ d wayen id-asen d-mlen imazanen-is. Deg Lislam amazan (Rrasul) aneggaru id iceggaɛ Rebbi d Muḥemmed.
Isem n yemdanen i yettamnen s Lislam, Inselmen. Inselmen ɣur-sen 5 n tamara (lefroḍ):
Deg Lislam, yella yiwen wedlis : Leqran: D adlis id yessuder Rebbi ɣef umazan Muḥemmed fell-as taẓallit d sslam n Rebbi. Yella daɣen Lḥadit: D imeslayen, igiten, neɣ ayen ɣef i yessusem (Aprobations)Muḥemmed. Inselmen ttamnen belli Injil d Turat ttubeddlen, wer qqimmen amek i ten-id yuzen Rebbi.

Maṣer:
Tamurt n Maṣer (s teɛrabt: مصر) niɣ Igibt tella g Tefriqt n ugafa. Isem-is unṣib d Tagduda Taɛrabt n Maṣer (s teɛrabt جمهورية مصر العربية). Tamanaɣt ines d Taqahirt, tutlayt-is tunṣibt d taɛrabt.
Amezruy.
Tamurt n Maṣer tettuneḥsab si tid i d-yecfan i tɣermiwin tiqburin maḍi, tεedda-d ɣef waṭas n tilla deg umezruy : tallit taferεunit, tallit taṛuminit, targrigit ( tabizanṭit), tallit n tneslent, d tallit n wassa.
Aεraben.
Maṣer tella seg imeḍqan imezwura i kecmen waεraben segmi d-yennulf ddin n tneslemt, dɣa syin i d-ldin abrid ɣer Tefriqt Ugafa s lekmal-is. Asteεmer-is yeḍra-d seddaw unabaḍ n Σumar ibn Lxeṭṭab, ɣef ufus n Σemru Ben Lεaṣ (592-682) mi tt-id-ikksen i Ibizaṭiyen yellan ṭṭfen-tt lawan-nni. Imezdaɣ n Maṣer imir tuget seg-sen llan d imasiḥiyen (tacḍaṭ taqebṭit) ttmeslayen tutlayt-nsen tajaddit taqebṭit i d-yeqqersen seg tin Iferεunen ; ɣef akken d-ttεawaden imazrayen, nnan-d akeččum-is yeḍra-d s tekriṭ d idammen, d imyaten n igiman imaṣriyen i yettwaεdmen, ladɣa wid yugin ad ḍefren ddyana tamynut i d-wwin imnekcamen.
Ajjed.
Inselmen.
Atmaten Inselmen Wid ixelqen tarbaɛt agi d Ḥasan Al Banna ak d Sayed Quṭb.
Iqubṭiyen.
-- 01:40, 10 Ɣuct 2008 (UTC)

Surya:
Tamurt n Surya tezga-d g wenẓul ataram n Asya , isem-is unṣib d "Tigduda Taɛrabt n Surya" (s teɛrabt الجمهورية العربية السورية) tamanaɣt ines Dimacq . tutlayt-is tunsibt d taɛrabt.

Urdun:
Tamurt n Urdun tella deg wenẓul ataram n Asya: Isem-is unsib d "Tagelda Tahacimit n Urdun" (s teɛrabt المملكة الهاشمية الأردنية). Tamaneɣt ines d Ɛemman. Tutlayt-is tunsibt d taɛrabt.

Orcalim:
Orcalim neɣ Jerusalem d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Israyil, bɣan-tt daɣen Ifalesṭinyen s tmanaɣt n tamurt-nsen, qqaren-as s tɛebrit ירושלים ("Yerucalayim"), s teɛrabt "Al Quds" neɣ "Orcalim Al Qods". I tamdint-agi azal ɣur ladyan aṭas.
Amezruy.
Imaziɣen, agellid-nsen n zik, Cocenq (win yuɣalen d ferɛun n Maṣer) yekcem tamdint almi yella deg-s ugellid Reboam.
Ajjed.
D tamdint i yesɛan azal ameqqran ɣur udayen axaṭar yella g yes aẓekka n Sliman yegra-d gi-s el ḥiḍ qqaren-as Ḥiḍ n imeṭṭi. Yerna tesɛa azal ameqqran ɣur inselmen axaṭar yella deg-s Tamezgida n Laqṣa y d yessali Brahim ; ɣur imasiḥiyen axaṭar dinna i yemmut Ɛisa.

Le Soir d'Algérie:
Le Soir d'Algérie ("Tameddit n Dzayer") d aɣmis (ajernan) azzayri yettwarun s tefransist. 
Azday (aseɣwen) aberrani.
Asmel (adeg) n weɣmis

Liberté:
Liberté ("Tilelli") d aɣmis (ajernan) azzayri yettwarun s tefransist. Bab-is Isseɛd Rebrab.
Azday (aseɣwen) aberrani.
Asmel (adeg) n weɣmis

El Watan:
El-Watan ("Tamurt") d aɣmis (ajernan) azzayri yettwarun s tefransist (ɣas akken isem-is d awal s teɛrabt, yettwarun s ugemmay alatini).
Azday (aseɣwen) aberrani.
Asmel (adeg) n weɣmis

Saɛid Butefliqa:
Sɛid Butefliqa d gma-s n uselway n Tmurt n Dzayer Ɛabdelɛaziz Butefliqa. Yella d acrik n Mumen Xalifa.

Tel Aviv:
Tel Aviv (s teɛebrit תל אביב = "tawrirt n tafsut") yella d tamdint n Israyil. Tel Aviv d taɣremt tatrart, azal-is azal tamanaɣt tasertit n tamurt n Israyil maca, ala, tamanaɣt n Israyil teqqim Orcalim. Tella Tel Aviv tamanaɣt tadamsant, yella g yes asagen i ism-is Yaffa, amaffag taseddawit
Isem.
"Tel" s teɛbrit lmaɛna-s d "tawrirt", "Aviv" lmaɛna-s d "tafsut" : "Tawrirt n Tafsut". Yella ism-is seg wedlis n Yeḥezqel (Ézéchiel) 3:15.

Madrid:
Tamdint n Madrid d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Spanya.

Tokyo:
Tamdint n Tokyo d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Japun. Isem-is yettwaru 東京, anamek-is d "Tamanaɣt n Wegmuḍ (tacerqit)" (tamanaɣt n zik tella d Kyoto, yezgan deg utaram).

London:
Tamdint n London d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Langliz.
Igemmamen n London.
Central London.
Ad nezmer ad nebḍu London Alemmas (Central London) deg krad (03) imuren : 
Outer London.
Deg Outer London ad naf Barking ed Dagenham, Barnet, Bexley, Brent, Bromley, Croydon, Ealing, Enfield, Haringey, Harrow, Havering, Hillingdon, Hounslow, Kingston upon Thames, Merton, Newham, Redbridge, Richmond upon Thames, Sutton, Waltham Forest.

Dublin:
Tamdint n Dublin (Baile Átha Cliath [blʲa:ˈklʲiəh] s Tirlandit (Gaeilge (Gaylxa))) d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Irland.

Istambul:
Aɣrem n Istambul "Sṭambul" d taɣremt tis snat n Tmurt n Tturk . Zik tella tamanaɣt ines.
Tesɛa 13 imelyan n imezdaγ (akken i d-tenna TUIK g useggas n 2007) 
Tesɛa yun uḍar g Turuft, wayed g Asya, ulac taɣremt nniden g umadal amm nettat yebḍan f sin xas azgen i meqren yezga-d g Asya, maca Istambul tecba mlih timdinin n Turuft
= Timezzayin =
Tamdint n Sṭambul tebḍa af 31 n timezzayin, garasent llant :
= Tarakalt =
Tamdint n Sṭambul tezgad gar Asia d Turuft ygezmits g'ulemmas ilel n Marmara d ilel Aberkan abrid b'w aman Bosfor yessiweḍ garasen, tamdint n Sṭambul tmoqer aṭas tura g yal snat timiwin n'u Bosfor tswadlent s tamdint n Sṭambul.

Spenyul:
Tamurt n Spenyul d tamurt ger tmura n Turuft. Tamanaɣt-is d Madrid.
Timnaḍin n Spanya (autonomías).
Plazas de soberanía (deg wakal n Umerruk) 

Guantanamo:
Tamdint n Guantanamo tezga-d g tmurt n Kuba, maca wi tt-ilan d USA, yesɛan deg-s axxam n lɛasker ak d lḥebs.

Kuba:
Tamurt n Kuba (s tespanyulit "Cuba"), tezga-d g Tamrikt n Wenẓul neɣ Tamrikt Talatinit. Tutlayt is taspanyulit, aselway ines Fidel Kastro tamaneɣt-is Habana.

Malaga:
Malaga tella d tamdint tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Kefrida:
Taddart n Kefrida tezga-d g temnaṭṭ n Bgayet qrib n At Idris deg Tasaxriwt. Deg-s acercur yettwasnen.

Isfahan:
Isfahan tella d tamdint tamuqrant tezga-d g Iran.

Pactun:
Pactun d isem n wegdud yellan ger Afɣanistan d Pakistan.

Kurd:
Agdud n Ikurdiyen yella g Ɛiraq yerna g Tmurt n Tturk. Ttmeslayen tutlayt takurdit. Tamurt anda zedɣen, isem-is Kurdistan, maca ur sɛin ara tamurt imzireg (indépendant) i nutni kan. Yiwen deg imeqqranen n tagrawla nsen af uzarug, isem-is Ɛabdellah Uǧalan.

Honcu:
Honcu (neɣ Honshu) d tigzirt tameqqrant n tmurt n Japon. Deks Timdinin timeqqranin am Tokyo (tamanaɣt n tmurt), Hiroshima, Kawasaki, Kobe, Kyoto, Nagoya, Nara, Osaka, Sendai, Yokohama atg.

Iṛan:
Iṛan d tamurt tezga-d g alemmas n Asya, tamanaɣt-is Ṭehran. Ttmeslayen tutlayt Tafarsit.

Cadli Benjdid:
Cadli Benjdid yella d aselway n Tegdut n Dzayer seg 7 furar 1979 almi 11 yennayer 1992. Ilul g Sebɛa (Tadayra n Butelja, Ṭṭerf) ass n 14 ibrir 1929 immut ass n 6 tuber 2012 g sbitar n Ɛin Nnaɛǧa (Dzayer Tamaneɣt).
Di lweqt n ṭrad mgal fransa yekcem g ALN. Akk d usarug n dzayer yuɣal ad yexdem g lɛesker. Asmi yemmut Hewwari Bumedyen, Cadli yella d yiwen amdan i yesɛan legrad ameqqeran akk : Colonel. Lɛesker g lweqt-nni bɣan amdan am netta g wemkan Bumedyen.
Cadli yebɣa ad yeffeɣ seg Tanemla (socialisme) axaṭer dzayer texser aṭas idrimen, meɛna azal n lpitrul iṣubb aṭas di lḥekm-is. Idzayriyen inṭarren (deg tazwara nsen ilmaẓyen) fɣened ɣar ivarden ass n 5 tubar 1988 anida yekker umennuɣ amuqran. Ayen id yeḍran ussan-nni yettwasen s Tubar 88 (Octobre 88). Ihi Cadli yexdem tamendawt (constitution) tamaynut, yeǧǧa akk ikabaren, seg-sen FFS, RCD, FIS. Cadli yebɣa ad yerbeḥ lvoṭ s ukabar ines (FLN) lameɛna idzayriyen voṭan FIS.
Xaled Neẓẓar, i yellan d aneɣlaf n lɛesker g lweqt-nni, yura g wedlis ines belli yanna-yas i Cadli "Ilaq-ak ad teǧǧeḍ amkan-ik akken anehves lvoṭ". Cadli yeqbel ayen yenna-yas-d Nezzar. Akabar n FIS ur yeqbil ara, bdan rrevrav mgal lɛesker u yebda ṭrad gar-asen. 
Гar tagara ttudart-is, Cadli yettili d tmeṭṭut-is deg Wehran.

Fuket:
Fuket neɣ Phuket d tigzirt yerna d tamnaṭṭ n tmurt n Tayland, yennul-itt-id tsunami g useggas n 2004 (26 bujember).

Pattaya:
Pattaya d tamdint tezga-d g tmurt n Tayland, yennul-it-id tsunami g useggas n 2004 (26 bujember).

Diana:
Diana Spencer, tageldunt n Yigaliyen tluled ass n g Sandringham g Legliz tejweǧ d ugeldun Carl Windsor ass n tebrayas g useggas n 1996, temmut ass n 31 ɣuct 1997 s ddaw tileggit n Alma g tamdint n Paris akkd umdakkel-is ameṣri Dudi Alfayed.
Twasen s isem n Lady Di neɣ Lady Diana, tiffefeɣt tella tqaras tageldunt Diana maca awal aki maci n tides axater neqqar issem n tgeldunt i tageldunt n idammen.
Tella daɣen tetwasen f cɣalis nel xir d w'ayen yelhan iu gellilen d'imuḍan.
Seg w’ass ass mi twaxḍeb d’ugeldun Carl Windsor nel Gal g’aseggas n 1981 armi temmut g’aseggas n 1997 sddaw ntileggit nl’Alma g Pari s laksida n tkarrust, Diana, tella tamettut gar tullas timsunin g ddunit , d tin i thibi yal agdud, akter tagellidt Elizabet II 
Tameddurt-is.
Jjwaǧ-is d Carl.
-- 14:42, 30 Ɣuct 2008 (UTC)

Zuntar:
Zunṭar

Federiko Garcia Lorka:
Federiko Garcia Lorka, amedyaz aspanyuli ismis s ta spanyulit "Federico Gracía Lorca", ilul g 5 yunyu 1898 ymmut ass n 19 ɣuct 1936 yella g tarbaɛt n ta suta n 27.

Salim Iles:
Salim Iles (ilul-ed 14 mayyu 1975 deg Wehran, Dzayer) d albub d addal accaf

Tsunami:
Tsunami (seg ajapuni 津波, tsu nami, meskuli « tayyugt n usagen ») d amazrar n timdeswalin n tallit tameqrant aṭas yetzreɛen seg tawennaḍt n waman (agaraw, ilel neɣ agelmim), yussad seg taswiɛt kan n awliwel n ubleɣ ameqran n waman, yettwaweḍen sɣur tizenzelt, tuccḍa n wakal adu-awlal neɣ aṭṭerḍeq n uburkan, dɣa yezmer ad yuɣal tayyugin tisedramin timeqranin.

Zenzla:
Zenzla d yewet gar tiwuɣa i derrun g ddunit, ma thuzz tammurt s ddaw iḍaren nneɣ, a kat ines s ta skala n Ricter

21 mayyu:
Ass 21 mayyu (maggu) d ass wis 141 n useggas (wis 142 deg iseggasen bisekstil). Llan 224 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.

Mayyu:
Mayyu (inṭeq daɣen maggu) d ayyur 5 n useggwas. Deg-s 31 wussan.

Tasdawit n Bab Zzewwar:
Tasdawit n Bab Ezzewar isem-is unsib d Tasdawit n tusniwin n tatiknolojit Hewwari Bumedyen (USTHB) tezga-d deg wedcir n Bab Zzewwar g temdint n Dzayer Tamanaɣt.

Lqern wis VI:

Lqern amezwaru q.Ɛ. |

Iseggasen 50 | Iseggasen 60 | Iseggasen 70 | Iseggasen 80 | Iseggasen 90

Tansa IP:
Tansa IP d amḍan imettel yiwen uselkim g l'internet, s umata imettel yal tiɣawsiwin n l'informatique g network am l'imprimante, router.. atg.
Tansa IP d amḍan Hexadecimal, meɛna nettaru-t s decimal : FF yuɣal 255, A2 yuɣal 162, 24 yuɣal 36. Llan sin tisiwal : IPv4 d IPv6 :

Lqern wis XXI:
Lqern wis XVIII | Lqern wis XIX | Lqern wis XX | Lqern wis XXI
Iseggasen 2000 | Iseggasen 2010 | Iseggasen 2020 | Iseggasen 2030 | Iseggasen 2040
Iseggasen 2050 | Iseggasen 2060 | Iseggasen 2070 | Iseggasen 2080 | Iseggasen 2090

Claymore:
Claymore d awal yesɛan kra n inumak :

Claymore (ssif):
Claymore d ssif ameqqran, aberbuz n sin ifassen, tella tettuseqdac sɣur Highlanders (Imnaɣen seg l'ecosse). Tban-d g lqern wis XVI u tella tettuseqdac aṭṭas g lqern wis XVI. ṬṬul-is 1,35m.

Claymore (manga):
Claymore (クレイモア, Kureimoa) d manga yura-t , iresm-it Norihiro Yagi. Ar Yunyu 2007, 13 n tmucuha ffɣen g Tajaponit. Yeffeɣ-d daɣen yiwen anime fell-as.
Tamacahutt ines ɣef yiwet n "calymore", nutni d azgen (nnefṣ) bnadem,azgen Yoma. Yoma d awaɣzen yeḥmel ad yečč medden. Claymore ttwaxelqen akken ad nɣen Yoma-nni.

Lqern wis XX:
Lqern wis XVII | Lqern wis XVIII | Lqern wis XIX | Lqern wis XX | Lqern wis XXI 
Iseggasen 1900 | Iseggasen 1910 | Iseggasen 1920 | Iseggasen 1930 | Iseggasen 1940
Iseggasen 1950 | Iseggasen 1960 | Iseggasen 1970 | Iseggasen 1980 | Iseggasen 1990

Lubnan:
Tezga-d tmurt n Lubnan g ugemmud alemmas. Isem-is s teɛrabt لبنان "Lubnān", neɣ ﺍﻠﺠﻤﻬﻮﺮﻴﺔ ﺍﻠﻠﺒﻨﺎﻨﻴﺔ "al-Ǧumhūriyya al-Lubnāniyya" ("Tigduda n Lubnan"). Tamanaɣt ines d Birut.

Kurya:
Tezgad tmurt n Kurya g unzul umalu n umenẓaw n Asya, tarakalt-is tecba tigzirt (tapeninsult takuryit) llant sin tikuryatin, Kurya n Wenẓul tamannaɣt-is Seyul, d Kurya n Ugafa tamannaɣt-is Pyungyang, s deffir imenɣi asemmaḍ tebda leqdic i wakken adaḥyu s gar ayen idyugran i wanact-a qqaren-as, "Kurya ta Dinamikit"
Tutlayt.
Tutlayt n tmurt n Kurya takuryit ttmeslayen syis azal 70 imelyan n ikuryen, neɣ ugar, i zedɣen g tapeninsult takuryit akk° d igzirin i d-yezgan zdat-is, d azal 5 imelyan g yal ddunit, llant tintalyin nniḍen maca marra i kuryen tmisfhamen gar-asen axaṭar temkacbin gar-asen.
takuryit, tejjad bac tinekkit-nsen atyli tiferdist
Agemmay.
Agemmay n tutlayt takuryit isem-is Hangul neɣ Hangeul isulf-it-id g 1446 agellid jong ameqqran

Yidic:
tutlayt n ydic, qarnas daɣen tudayit tajermanit d tutlayt i tmeslayen udayen n tamurt n Lalman, Arjentin, d udayen n timura n turuft n umalu, udayen nni qarnasen Ackinazen

Qsemṭina:
Twasen taγremt n Qsentina s taγremt n tiqenttarin y twaεalqen agezdu 25.
Tarakalt.
Qsenṭina d tamdint n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Ldzayer, tezga-d ɣef yiran n yiwen n wecṛuf d aɛlayan, nnig wasif n Rumel. D nettat ay d tamaneɣt n twilayt n Qsenṭina. Zedɣen-tt 438.000 n yimezdaɣen.
Tadamsa.
Qsenṭina d tamdint tameqrant n tnezzut (ttjaṛa) akked temguri (industrie) yerna tella deg-s yiwet seg tesdawiyin timeqranin akk n Ldzayer. Zik, Qsenṭina d yiwen seg temdinin wuɣur d-ttasen medden ad lemden.
Amezruy n temdint.
Tezga-d taγremt n Qsentina g tama n umalu n tamurt n Dzzayer, yella ism-is Cirta g tawala n inumidien ass-nni, tella Tamanaγt n tanumedt Numidia seddaw ufus n Misipsa llan zedγen gyes imzenza irumanen, yderqiten Yugurten, dacu yejjan Caius aselway n amenkud n Rruman a-t yekcem, semmant Rruman daɣen "Constantina" f isem n Konstantin amezwaru.
Ttfents iεraben sdefir-nsen, umbaεd, iṭṭurken, umbaεd ifransisen yezmirara Clauzel a-t yekcem g aseggwas n 1836, maca ikecmi-tt s deffir-es Vale (Valée) yeqim deg-s Damermont, akwd Lamorsier 
Tesɛa Qsenṭina tura Tasdawit n Qsenṭina, Amafag n Qsenṭina (Rroplan), atg. 

Snitraw:
SNITRA
Ah ya snitra izedγen temẓi-w,
Cnu-yi m' ad ikkes lxiq !
Smekti-d aḍu n udrar
Γef asmi nerra lfen d arfiq,
Γef asmi nettqabal ussan
S ujeǧig akw d ucewwiq,
Nettarra ṣṣerf i wurfan
S ṣṣut-im uḥdiq.
Ah ya snitra izedγen temẓi-w,
Σawen-iyi deg yimeṭṭawen !
Nek ad ten-ruγ d imeṭṭi,
Ma d kem lexyuḍ-im γezzifen.
Ard nsiwel i ubeḥri n udrar,
Ad ten-izuzzer d icewwiqen,
Ad ten-izzi meṛṛa f tuddar
Akken ad asen-slen !
Ay afrux n snitra-w γenni !
Σawen-iyi deg yimeṭṭawen!
Nek ad ten-ruγ d ccnawi,
Keč huzz afriwen !
Cnu ay afrux ! Cnu !
Huzz afriwen-ik deg yigenni!
Serreḥ i ucewwiq d usefru!
Cnu akken ad nemmekti!
Ay afrux n snitra-w γenni!
Σawen-iyi deg yimeṭṭawen!
Tizlit yarir Yidir.

Tizi Wezzu (san Francisco):
TIZI-OUZOU (SAN FRANCISCO)
C’est une maison bleue
Adossée à la colline,
On y vient à pied,
On n’y frappe pas;
Ceux qui vivent là
Ont jeté la clef.
Win izgern i tewwurt
Iqqim iḍwer i uḍebsi,
S lbenna n tmurt
Tasebba n tikti
Unadi tsarut
N waggur d yitri.
Tizi-Ouzou élève des enfants fous de rêve.
Tizi Uzzu, anda teddiḍ ?
Anda-t rbeḥ
Tettmenniḍ i warraw-im ?
D Aseqqif n ṭmana
D aqdim nga-yas leqrar,
Nettẓuru-t af uḍar
Am unebgi am uɛeṭṭar ;
Wid i t-izedγen ḍeggren tisura.
Peuplée de cheveux longs,
De grands lits et de musiques;
Peuplée de lumière et peuplée de fous,
La maison berbère mazal-itt debout.
Tizi-Ouzou se lève
Allant au bout de ses rêves,
Tizi Uzzu anda teddiḍ ?
Anda-t nnif tettmenniḍ i warawim?
Di Tewrirt Musa,
I ilul uqcic d amencuf,
Ayen din idda
Deg ucruf γer ucruf
Ur yufi lehna,
Ur issin lxuf.
Di Tewrirt Musa
Inder urgaz n Tefsut.
Ayen fi icna
D ayen fi immut
isem-is Tamazγa,
D lmut ma nettu-t !
Tizi-Ouzou se lève, dans ses collines s'achève
Le rêve des fous, qui veulent de nous
Que l’on oublie…..
Tizi…Tizi-Ouzou!
Tizlit yarir Yidir.

Adṛaṛ:

Ssendu:
SSENDU !
Ssendu ! Ssendu !
Efk-aγ-d udi d amellal 
Ssendu ! Ssendu !
Akken a neččar abuqqal
Ndu, ndu, ay iγi 
Efked tawaract bb-udi
Akken i tt-nettmenni
Taxsayt i ḥazen ifassen
D kem ay sɛiγ d lbeḍna
Ula ma laẓ ittwassen
Lḥif izzuzen-it ccna
Nuẓa-d γurem a nessendu
Taxsayt-iw teγra i lhu
Iγi-inu ad indu ifru, ad indu ifru
S lfeḍl-ik a baba-inu
A taxsayt meqqar kemmi
Tesliḍ i wul mi icehheq
Ṣṣber yuγal ttannumi
Ẓẓay wawal i lmenṭeq
Nuẓa-d γurem ad nesmerkel
Taxsayt-iw tettebruqul
Ad aγ-d-efk udi mellul, yak udi mellul
Akkenni igebγa wul
A taxsayt, berka tura
La ttwaliγ qrib d azal
Γurem i d-rriγ tuttra
Bγiγ-kem ad terreḍ azal
Ssenduγ s ufus lqis
Udi yufrar isḥerqis
Fkaγ-d aɛber d nnefṣ-is, aɛber d nnefṣ-is
I temγart d warraw-is

Tamacahutt n tsekkurt:
TAMACAHUT
Iwaliwen n Ben Muḥemmed
Tizlit yarir Yidir.

Pourquoi Cette Pluie?:
Tant de pluie tout à coup sur nos fronts,
Sur nos champs, nos maisons:
Un déluge ici, l'orage en cette saison;
Quelle en est la raison ?
Est-ce pour noyer nos parjures
Ou laver nos blessures ?
Est-ce pour des moissons, des terreaux plus fertiles ?
Est-ce pour les détruire ?
Pourquoi cette pluie, pourquoi ?
Est-ce un message, est-ce un cri du ciel ?
J'ai froid mon pays, j'ai froid;
As-tu perdu les rayons de ton soleil ?
Pourquoi cette pluie, pourquoi ?
Est-ce un bienfait, est-ce pour nous punir ?
J'ai froid mon pays, j'ai froid;
Faut-il le fêter ou bien le maudire ?
J'ai cherché dans le livre qui sait
Au creux de ses versets,
J'y ai lu "cherche les réponses à ta question!
Cherche le trait d’union!"
Une mendiante sur mon chemin
"Que fais-tu dans la rue ?"
"Mes fils et mon mari sont partis un matin,
Aucun n'est revenu"
Pourquoi cette pluie, pourquoi
Cette eau, ces nuages qui nous étonnent ?
Elle dit "cette pluie, tu vois!
Ce sont des pleurs pour les yeux des hommes"
"C'est pour vous donner des larmes
Depuis trop longtemps, elles ont séché.
Les hommes n'oublient pas les armes
Quand ils ne savent plus pleurer"
Coule pluie, coule sur nos fronts !
écrit par: Jean-Jacques Goldman .
Chanté par: Idir.

Lili Bonic:
Lili Bonic neɣ (Boniche), acennay adzayri uday mucaɛen aṭas iluled g 1921 g Taqṣebt n Dzayer (Kasba) yemmut ass n 6 meɣres 2008 g Pari g Fransa ycennu aẓewan aɛrab-andalusi yecennu daɣen Ccaɛbi, Rrumba, s taɛrabt tadzayrit d tarumit, ccna ines imeẓẓwi (ḥammlent meden)
yceyɛit babas win yellan argaz uẓewan ula d netta, bac aken a d yeɣar ɣur aselmad Saɛud awahrani Ccix n uẓawen, yekcem daɣen g iɣerbazen n uẓuwen imucaɛen azal Mutribiya d Musiliya
yefkayas anemhal n Rradio n Dzzayer (Radio-Alger) adisider tadwilt n Ḥawzi ass imi yella yesɛa 15 isegwasen gelɛamris 
gar tuɣac ines llan : 
1- ana el warqa el meskina
2- il y a un seul dieu (yiwen rebbi i yellan)
3- Bambino

Ameṛṛuk:
Tamurt en Merruk niɣ Murakuc ( s tifinaɣ : ⵎⵓⵔⴰⴽⵓⵛ, ⵎⵔⵔⵓⴽ, s Taɛrabt: مراكش/المغرب "Maɣreb"), isem-ines unṣib Tageldit en Merruk neɣ Tageldit en Murakuc ( s tifinaɣ: ⵜⴰⴳⵍⴷⵉⵜ ⵏ ⵍⵎⵖⵔⵉⴱ , s Taɛrabt : المملكة المغربية, Al-Mamlakat Al-Maɣribiya) d yiwet ger timura n Tafriqt n Ugafa, tezga-dd deg utaram, tesɛa talast aked Dzayer es amalu, Muriṭanya es anẓul, Agaraw Aṭlasi deg utaram, Ilel Agrakal di ugafa, ameccaq gar-as ed gar Turuft 14,4 Km deg wemḍiq en wedrar en Ṭareq Gibraltar . Tamanaɣt-ines d Eṛṛbaṭ.
Timnaḍin.
Llant deg-s 12 n temnaḍin gar-asen : 

Muḥemmed Buḍyaf:
Muḥemmed Buḍyaf, s taɛrabt محمد بوضياف, ilul ass n 23 yunyu 1919 di temnaḍt n Wled Madi deg Lwilaya n Temsilt. asmi yeḥbes ulmud-is deg useggas n 1942, yekcem γer uxeddim γer srabes n Leγrama di temnaḍt n Jijel. Syen yekcem γer ukabar n waγref Azzayri (PPA) anda yuγal d aγalat n tudsa n lbaḍna (OS) di temnaḍt n Qsenṭina deg useggas n 1947.
Di 1950, icureε, anda i ḥekmen fell-as s lḥebs. 3 n yiseggasen mbeεd (1953) yunag γer tmurt n Fransa, syen yekcem γer ukabar n MTLD. Ur iεeṭṭel ara, ikcem-d γer tmurt n Lezzayer anda yuγal d imḍebber aεlayan n tudsa n C.R.U.A. (Comité Révolutionnaire pour l’Unité et Action), yella daγen ger terbaεt n 22 i yessekren tagrawla n tmurt n Lezzayer ass n umenzu n wember 1954. Deg tuber 1956 yettwaṭṭef netta akked yimeddukal-is gar-asen At Ḥmed d wiyiḍ di tmesrifegt i ten-id-yewwin seg tmurt n Lmerruk γer Tunes. Asmi tefra tegrawla tazzayrit, mass Mohamed Boudiaf islul-d Akabar n Tegrawla tanemlayt (Parti de la Révolution Socialiste).
Deg yunyu 1963 yettwaḥbes s wufus n Ben Bella, εezlen-t γer unẓul n tmurt n Lezzayer azal n 3 n wagguren, syen iruḥ γer tmurt n Lmerruk. Aseggas n 1972, yettruḥ yettuγal ger tmurt n Fransa d tmurt n Lmerruk, iqeddec γef ukabar-is (P.R.S.) am wakken i iqeddec daγen deg yiwet n tesγunt El Djarida, anda yella d imḍebber fell-as. Mbeεd tamettant n uselway Azzayri Hewwari Bumedyen deg useggas n1979, yerra talast i ukabar-is P.R.S, yuγal ixeddem i lfayda-s deg lewzin n Lyajur di temnaḍt n Kénitra di Lmerruk. Ass n 14 yennayer 1992, Mohamed Boudiaf yuγal-d γer tmurt n Lezzayer akken ad yejber iγisi yewten di tmurt, imi lawan-nni yal tazγunt tettεummu di Lezzayer. Imḍebbren n tallit –nni teffeɣ-asen afus, gguman ad d-afen abrid ara yessufɣen ɣer tifrat, imi zzhir yuɣ tuddar d temdinin. Dγa Mohamed Boudiaf yellan yettwanfa mi akken tufrar tagut ɣef tmurt imi tiktiwin-is mgaradent aṭas γef tid n wid yeṭṭfen adabu s yiɣil, yugi leḥkem n leγder, leḥkem n ukabar awḥid, yerra-d i teγri n tmurt-is, yenna dakken talwit d tifrat n tmurt n Lezzayer ad ilint s tugdut. Yewwi-d yid-s amecwar γezzifen, yebda lebni n tmurt γef tidet. 166 n wussan kan iruḥ niqal yerra-d asirem i ugdud azzayri, yerra-d ifadden i yimdanen i ifeclen niqal, yerra-d tayri γer wulawen, yesfeḍ asigna γef tmurt, maca iεdawen n tmurt akked tudert zgan εussen di yal amḍiq di yal lawan. Imi, ass n 29 yunyu 1992 γef 11h15, tamurt n Lezzayer yeγli-yas ujgu alemmas, yeγli yiwen n urgaz yesεan azal, yesrafeg usirem, imi Mohamed Boudiaf nγan-t yemcumen di temdint n Σennaba.

Timimun:
Timimun tezga-d g unẓul n tamurt n Dzayer qarn-as Tmda Azgwar, d tamannaɣt n tmannaṭ n Tagurart i yebdan f kuz (4) tmannatin, g unẓul Carwin deg ugafa Tinerkuk g umalu Ugrut d Timimun

Timegnunin:
Tezga-d taddart n Timegnunin g agezday n Tizi Wezzu assuun n At Dwala, llan gyes azal n 200 imuzdaɣ g aseggas n 1974 tesaxed taddart g mi edwet lahwa.

Azemmur:
Azemmur d aɛeqqa n tzemmurt. 

Tazemmurt:
Tazemmurt, d aseklu n tawsit Ulea n twacult n uleaseae. Yettwalqad deg aẓiyen n unezwu agrakal i ugummu-ines: azemmur i d-yettaken zzit i ḥemmelen aṭas medden acku meqqer wazal-is er Laqbayel merra .
Tazemmurt tettwassen s-ɣur imaṣriyen n zik ugar n uqbel tallit tamasiḥit. Daɣen, d yiwet deg yimghan(lehcawec) i bderen aṭas deg Tibibelt. Seg Taglest, tazemmurt d azamul n temdint n Atena dɣa n taṛebbit-is. Asfulleḥ n tzemmurt teccɣel deg umaḍal ihektaren i tafarest n n iṭunen n izemran.
Tazemurt d aseklu id-ittaken azemmur.
Illa di yal tamurt n yilel agrakal (méditerranéen).
Tţajad atas zit (zit u zemmur).
Qqarend tzmer a tedder azal n 3000 isuggasen.
Tazemmurt di Tmurt n Leqbayel :.
Deg tmurt n Leqbayel, azemmur yesɛa azal ameqqran. Timizar n Yeqbayliyen ččurent d azemmur, i nessxdam ama i wucci ama i wannuz deg leswaq. 
Dγa Tamurt n Yeqbayliyen tettwasen s wazal i fkan imezdaγ-is i uzemmur d lγella-s. Aṭas n twaculin i yebdan ttheggint iman-nsent akken ad ffɣen ɣer lexla ad d-leqḍent azemmur. Aseggas-agi, xas akken lɣella –agi teslek-as i tizzitt n uzemmur i s-yefkan tiyita ilindi, maca ur temniɛ ara deg iɣamacen. Tallit iwedjiben as-tiniḍ d aseɣzef n unebdu, ula d tiqit n lehwa ur d-gli yas asmi d-tekcem. Ayen yeǧan azemmur ad yeqqim kan akken yella deg kra n imekwan, ladɣa deg iẓuṛaṛ anda tizmrin ulac anda ara d-summent tiqit n waman. Lḥebb d ameẓyan am cilmun, taglimt-is tekmec ɣef yiɣes. Atas deg-s ur yeṭṭif ara iman-is sufella n tzemmurt. Yefruri-d ɣer lqaɛa uqbel ma ad yebb. Deg kra n tɣiwanin n Bgayet, imdanen bdan yuɣ lḥal ajmaɛ n lɣella-nsen. Imezdaɣ n taddart Tiban, d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Sidi Ɛic, fɣen ɣer lexla ddeqs aya. Atas deg-sen nnan-d d akken aseggas-agi bdan uqbel lawan alqaḍ n uzemmur. Sebba i ten-yeǧan ad bdun ajmaɛ n lɣella-agi d lḥammu id d-yessefrurin yak azemmur ɣer lqaɛa. “Leqwaɛi n tzemrin yak ssan-t uqbel lawan. Senttif ad d-nejmeɛ aya-gi yellan, wala ma neǧat iḍaɛ”, id d-nnan kra n imezdaɣ i d-nmuger.
Deg kra n tɣiwanin n twilayt n Tizi Wezzu, tizemrin ur sefrahen-t ara. Ifurkawen yettawiten waḍu. Llan-t kra ur d-ǧint ula d aɛeqqa. Dagi, tiwaculin mazal ur ɛnin-t ara ad d-sufɣent ttawilat sexdamen deg tallit-agi. Imextafen, tisennajin lak d lbican mazal-iten nnejmaɛen deg imekwan-nsen. Anda yegget lxir, imdanen fɣen, akken kan iɛedda ugeffur, ad cerwen leqwaɛi n tzemrin-nsen yerna ad ksen tizzuyin d yimɣan nniḍen yegman ddaw neɣ tama n isekla. Ayen ara sen-yessishlen ajmaɛ n lɣella-nsen.
Di tama n Tubiret, imdanen yeffeɣ-iten laɛqel mi walan iɣamacen i ikemlen taɣart i wayen yellan yuɣ lhal yeqqur, yuɣal-iten-id rruḥ deg mi d-sawa, acku tugdi mazal-itt deg wulawen. Ula d nutni ur ttzuxxun ara aseggas-agi s lɣella ara d-awin.
Read more at http://www.depechedekabylie.com/ddk-tamazight/145421-lella-n-uzemmur-deg-tuddar-n-leqbayel.html#YeEr7sFhRY5cIdzO.99
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/10/Olive-tree-fruit-august-0.jpg/220px-Olive-tree-fruit-august-0.jpg

Skikda:
Skikda (ism-is n zik Philippeville) t-tamdint d wilaya n Dzayer.

Bumerdas:
Bumerdas (s taɛrabt: / s tifinaɣ: neɣ / Rocher Noir deg tasehrest taṛumit), d yiwet taɣiwant n tawilayt n Bumerdas, deg tadayṛa n Bumerdas, d nettat id adeg-aɣella, tella ar deg ugmuḍ n Zzayer dɣa ar deg umalu n Tizi Wezzu.
Di tama n Bumerdas, llant aṭas n tuddar anda urɛd ttemslayen s teqbaylit amazun tuddar n At Aεmran, At Xelfun, Tijelabin.
Tiγiwanin n Bumardas.

Brazil:
Brazil d isem n tmurt d-yezgan di tamrikt, tamanaɣt-ines d Brasilia. Zedɣen-t 183.888.941 n medden.

Kuriṭiba:
]
Kuriṭiba ("Curitiba") d tamdint deg wanẓul n Brazil. 
Curitiba tesɛa azal n 1.788.559 n imezdaɣ (leḥṣab n 2007) s tajumma n 434,967 km².

Tayunanit:
Tayunanit t tutlayt n wat n Yunan.

Tajmaɛt:
Tajmaɛt neɣ tajmayt (agraw d aɣ) d anegrew ay teggen (xeddmen) leɛṛac di tmurt n iqbayliyen, iwakken ad mmeslayen af iɣlifen n yemdanen.

Agdud:
Lmaɛna nniden, di timettisent, tesdukkel mačči d ihagaren.
Lmaɛna tis tlata, di tasertit, af iɣerfanen n yiwen weɣlan.

Tawacult:
Tawacult d imawlen akk-d werraw-nsen.

Wamber:
Wamber (neɣ nwamber, nunber, nunember) d ayyur 11 n useggwas. Yella daɣen ayyur 3 n wamwal (lexrif) deg wezgen n ugafa n umaḍal ; ayyur 3 n tefsut deg wezgen n wanẓul.

Tifeffeɣt tamerrukit:

El Moujahid:
El Moujahid d aɣmis adzayri yuran s tefransist. 

Sevilla:
Sevilla tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Huelva:
Huelva tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Granada:
Granada naɣ Ɣernaṭa tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Nedjma:
Nedjma (نجمة) s taɛrabt awal anamak ines "itri" d 'ansexdam n tilifun wis krad (3) g tamurt n Dzayer (operatur n tilifun), zdeffir Mobilis d Djezzy isem aki d yesem n l'marka tamzenzit n'Asawal-amaway n Wataniya Télécome Algérie, anect-a, d'agla n Wataniya Telecome Kuwit, tesɛa azal n 4.000000 (ukuz imelyan) n'imsaben.
Ifarisen n Nedjma.
Illimite.
Asmel n Nedjma (fr)
ZhoO

Yebrir:
Yebrir d aggur 4 n useggwas, ger meɣres d mayyu .Deg was n 20 di yebrir leqbayel ttmektayen tafsut n 80. Qqaren leqbayel : Iṭij n yebrir yessebrak anyir .

Yunyu:
Aggur 6 n useggwas

Ɣuct:
aggur 8 n useggwas

Tuber:
Aggur 10 n useggwas

40:
Uṭṭun yezgan gar 39 d 41.

Paris (Fransa):
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Fransa. Tettwassen s isem n temdint n tafat.

Tumẓabt:
Tumẓabt d tutlayt gar tutlayin timaziɣin i ttmeslayin deg Mẓab af uɣezzif n Iɣzer n Weɣlan (Wad Mẓab).
Sawalen-tt deg iɣerman n Tejnint, At Mličet (Melika), At Bunur neɣ At Wirzu, Taɣardayt, At Yizǧen (At Yijden), Bergan neɣ At Ifraɣ, Tamurt n Tefza (Gerrara), Tajnint
ɣ

Tasiwit:
Tasiwit d tutlayt tamziɣt n imezdaɣ imaziɣen n Isiwan (Siwa) di tmurt n Maṣer.
Ciṭ n Tsiwit.
! Taqbaylit || Tasiwit ||

Dzayer (tamanaɣt):
Dzayer neɣ Zzayer d aɣrem amanaɣ n tegduda n Zzayer, d aɣrem i muqqren g temurt, sawalen-as daɣen imezdaɣ-ines Zzayer tamellalt neɣ El-Bahdja. Tezgad g yiri n yill agrakal, aɣrem n Zzayer tefka isem-is i yal agezday (tawilayt) n Zzayer. Tella gar timiṭropolin timuqranin g umenẓaw n Tafrikt s 2 030 000 imezdaɣ g aseggas n 2002, yetwaḥsab azal n 2.947.446 imezdaɣ g useggas n 2008.
G tamdint n Zzayer kan adnaf azal n 4 250 000 imezdaɣ neɣ azal n 12% n ugdud azzayri. G yal tamurt
tesɛa agezday n Zzayer tillas akk d ugezday n Blida, s unẓul Tipaza, s utaram, Bumerdas s umalu.
Aẓar n isem n Zzayer.
Isem n Alger (Aljé) d issem aɛewwaj arumi n issem "Alguère" s takatalant ; angaru-agi yefɣed g teɛrabt "ğazayer", Jazayer issem is yefka Buluɣin mis n Ziri, win id yexelqen tadinastit tazirit ass-nni mi yesekka tamdint n Zzayer g useggas n 960 f ugaluz n temdint taqdimt i yesɛan isem s terumant Icosium, yefkayas issem n Zzayer At Mezɣenna, caḍen izegzziyen i yefkan anamek n isem-agi i yetwafken sɣur Buluɣin Mis n Ziri. Azzegzi amezwaru yennad akken isem n Zzayer yetwakkes g tigzirin i yellan zdat usagen n temdint n Zzayer s teɛrabt (al-Jaza’ir) الجزائر, s teqbaylit, tigzirin n at mezɣenna, Neɣ awal n “tagzirt” yezmer (akken i ɣilen arakalen inselmen n tallit talemmast) ad yini igger i yellan ger illel d Ṣeḥra igger i yezmer a tilli gyes tameddurt, “tajtagzirt n tmeddurt”. Azzegzi angaru yenna-d belli issem ad yillin fkan-t feljal tajmilt n baba-s n Buluɣin, Ziri mmis n Mennad , ihi, issem n Zzayer ad yilli yusa-d g Dziri, s tmaziɣt, Tiziri(anamek (lmaɛna)-ines tafat n uyyur/uggur), Mezɣenna yezmer daɣen ad tili talɣa tetwaɛerreb n Imezɣen ayen aɣ-d-yefk : “Tiziri n at Imezɣan”. Imuzdaɣ n Zzayer tamanaɣt qqaren Adziri/Tadzirit (dziri/dziriya) fakken ad ssiwlen i imuzdaɣ n tamanaɣt.
Tadamsa.
Timerrit.
Tadult n timerrit g temdint n Dzayer mazal-itt texxuṣ, ɣas tesɛa aṭas ideggen i cebḥanen maca asefrek (gestion) nsen cwiyat, tesɛa (amedya) tiftisin ticebḥanin am taftist (rrif n'ilel) La Perouse g usamar, maca caḍen daɣen tiftisin ur necbiḥ ara am tin n Mazella neɣ n Miramar (Guilloville) anect agi felǧal n Asif n Lḥerrac neɣ Asif Mazafran atg... i tṣubbun ar ilel.
Idles.
Tamdint n Dzayer tesɛedda ussan iberkanen g umezruy ines yetwawet deg-sen idles tesɛa tura tamdint kra n timkurda tameqqrant merra deg-sent d 
Llan daɣen isalayen am 

Marseille:
Marseille (s occitan: "Marselha" ), d tamdint tis snat n Fransa.

Asalay Aɣelnaw n Taẓuri Tatrart d Tazit:
Yelli-d Asalay-agi tibbura-nes i wegdud g waggur n dujember 2007, tella taẓunẓut-ines sɣur Xalida Tumi (Mesɛudi) taneɣlaft n takerza, yezga-d g 25 Abrid Lɛarbi Benmhidi (rue d'Isly) g wasun wis sin n tmanaɣt, yeṭṭef amkan n Galerie de France.
-- 23:38, 26 Yulyu 2008 (UTC)

Lɛarbi U Mhidi:
Iluled Lɛarbi U Mhidi i wumi mechuren ugar s yisem n Lɛarbi Benmhidi g Temlilt aseggas n 1923, yeɣra Leqran umbeɛd yekcem ar uɣerbaz n yirumiyen maca staxrentid sinna, imir nni yruḥ akw d baba-s ar Tbeskert anda yeṭṭef taɣuri ines g uɣerbaz agla n Tiddukla n Imusnawen Inselmen Idzayriyen. 
yekcem g ukabar n agdud adzayri, yella deg tameskant n 08 magu 1945, ihi ṭfent, arrant a lḥebs 10 isegwasen.
Asmi yettwaṭṭef, ḥekmen fellas s lmut u nɣant bla ma iεedda di ccreε, deg useggas n 1957.

Kra imagraden s teqbaylit af Sliman Ɛazem:
a madame encore un verre a3ebbud iw darizirvoir ah yaghled lebhar yekkaw amzoun d ssahra ayen isdefkid atyenkhar n3emed maneskar lama3na ur defhimed ara

Saεid Meqbel:
Said Mekbel ilul deg di Bgayet, imut deg 3 bujember 1994 di Lzzayer.
D aneɣmas deg ɣmis "Le Matin" (Tasebḥit)

Lalman:
Tamurt n Lalman, tezga-d g umenzaw n Turuft (Europa) g tamas tasamart, tekcem g Tadukli n tmura n turuft (UE). Tutlayt tunṣibt ines d Talalmanist.agdud-is yekk-ad seg iğermaneyyen

Berlin:
Tamdint n Berlin d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Lalman.

Libya:
Libya d tamurt d-yezgan di tefriqt ugafa. Tesɛa 1,759,540 ikilumitren². Tettwazdeɣ s wazal n 6 Igendad.
