Tasudut Serbantes:
Tasdut Serbantes neɣ s taspanyulit "Instituto Cervantes" d tasdut neɣ aɣerbaz n'uselmad n tutlayt taspanyulit yellid tibbura ines g useggwas n 1991
-- 13:57, 6 Ɣuct 2008 (UTC)

Miguel de Cervantes:
"Miguel de Cervantes" d amyaru aspenyul, ilul ass n 29 ctember 1547 g Alkala de Henares yemmut ass n 22 ybrir 1616 di Madrid, d’aneggal, amedyaz, d msezgan, yettwassen ɣef lǧal n wungal-is Don Kicuṭ n Manca i yuɣalen mucaɛ di ddunit imi assa yettuneḥsab d ungal amezwaru deg umezruy n talsa i yettwarun s wudem atrar am wid n tura. Ma deg tsekla taspenyulit d yiwen seg imeqqranen.
Asmi yella meẓẓi, Cerventès yesɛedda-d xemsa iseggasen d lḥebs di Lezzayer tamanaɣt n tura, acku yiwwas mi d-yuɣal seg yiwen n ṭṭrad ideg yettekka ɣer tama n tmurt n Ṭṭelyan, ṭṭfen-T yefliseN imselmen netta d wiyaḍ deg yill agrakal, ur s-d-bran armi t-id-tefda yemma-s s kra n twiztin.

Naruto:
Naruto (ナルト) d yiwen umanga shōnen n Masashi Kishimoto, deg win id ifeɣ deg-s yiwen umestbaɛ akfuḍ s yiwen isem. Amestbaɛ agi ittawid tanfust n uninja dilemẓi aken, Naruto Uzumaki, iţnadi ad iţwasen syawk medden s tuɣalin da Hokage, in ibɣan ad yini d anezmar n taddart.
Amanga ifɣed i tikkelt tamenzut deg Japon deg nwember 1999 ɣef tasḍunt Weekly Shōnen Jump n umazrag Shūeisha. Ma s tefransist telad deg 2002 sɣur imazrag Kana, s ugellel n 5 isunad net ufɣa tajaponit. Ufaris Studio Pierrot ed Aniplex,tamekfadhut tafda l 03 n'Tuber 2002, ɣef tiliẓri TV Tokyo mayela deg fransa degḍed ɣer Game One di 2 n yennayer 2006 daɣen Ɣef NT1 di ukčum uɣarbazi 2007.
Amezruy.
Tazwara.
Amezruy n Naruto idarru deg yiwen umaḍal deg-s izri d imal anida, ɣas aken fghented aṭas n tiknolojitin n tura, iningaten d cwiṭ n isamurayen qqimen d nutni id tinezmarin tiserdasin.
Duklen deg tuddar yal yiwet s tazmart-is ghur-sen amzun timiḍi, iningaten skarayen imenɤi tikwal yeldi tikwal « semmed » gar tixarubin deg atas-aya.
Yiwen gar imrigen isexdamen deg taluft agi d aggay n tiza(9) igmusen, qaren-asen ccwaṭen s tjelhumin, ig zemren ad tswa swen s imdanen mba3d yiwet n tafugla taɣersawt iwaken ad s3un tazmert-n-sen. mraw-d-sin(12) uqbel tazwara n tamacahut, yiwen n igmusen agi, imi qaren Kyuubi, itswa tef yerna itswa zzu deg yiwen uqcic aken id-ilul kan isemman Naruto Uzumaki s ufus n Hokage wis ukuz(4) n taddart n Konoha.
Synopsis.
Tamacahut tbeddu deg tilemzi n Naruto, gher mraw-d-sin n isegesen ines. D agujil, deg mad ikker netsan d abessal d ambassi, ixedem akk tiwugha ig zmer iwaken at id-zren medden. Targit-is: adyughal Hokage aken ad st3arfen siyes imezdagh n tadart-is. Laxater, ccittan n ig twa hebsen deg-es isekred aggad d akrah n at-tadart, id, swussan ttun lfarq gar Kyuubi d Naruto. Ghas aken, Naruto itstrini mlih iwaken ad yughal da genin, taseddart tamezwarut deg iningaten. Mba3d atas useyyi, igged ar tagara as d fken amenyir n Konoha akk d assali-nes ar genin. Yughal ini itsekki deg tarba3t deg-s krad iheppaden ninja, d Sakura Haruno d uhric n Sasuke Uchiha. Cwit cwit, mlalen ajounin-n-sen, win at nislemden : wini mu snen akk Kakashi Hatake.
Deg tazwara tsaggadent yarnu karhent at taddart, cwit cwit yerna deg tazmert yerna irebhed lemqadra d lehmala n at taddart s lfedel n unughen ig ugar deg-sen i3dawen imeqranen n Konoha gar-asen atas n at taddart n zik. Cwit cwit, axetet n uhkem n dunnit n yiwen deg-sen ibaned.
Udmawen.
Tazwara n umeruy itekka f ukuz(4) udmawen imenzawiyen : Naruto Uzumaki d amunu, maca daɣen Sakura Haruno, Sasuke Uchiwa d sensei-nsen Kakashi Hatake, llan deg amzun akk aylan imezwura n umanga.
S akinna, fɣend udmawen imaynuten, am Sannin, krad(3) ininjaten yetwasnen ad yuɣalen d iselmaden n krad(3) inelmaden deg usatu amaynu, ayen ad yawin asengara-nsen. Naruto aqlalaḥ ad yeḍfar Jiraya, d aninja amazuf s wul ameqran, aselmad n zik n Hokage wis ukuz(4); Sakura, ig rsen, at dfar aselmed n uninja amsejay Tsunade ; Sasuke affakas ad yughal d immesten n Orochimaru, yetwasnen am usemdan, maca d amenɣiw yetwanudan, yellil tirmitin igdlen yarnu yexsa ad yawi tafekka n Sasuke.
Sya ar zzat n temacahut, udmawen imaynuten fɣend, wid ad yuɣalen d imenzaɣ (Gaara, Rock Lee …), d imdukkal (Shikamaru Nara, Hinata Hyuga …) naɣ ad yuɣalan d icenguten imeqranen, am imaslaḍen n Akatsuki, tuddsa ur nessin n iningaten irewlen izemren atas atas.

8 yebrir:

19 yunyu:

6 meɣres:

Tiwal:
Tiwal d yiwet taddart d-yezgan di tama wunzul n Bgayet, id yussan d tγiwant n At Maεuc. Γef ism-is mgaradent tmuγliwin: wa yeqqar-d akken awal n Tiwal yussa-d seg "At wawal", llan wid d-yeqqaren yekka-d seg awal "tala", imi zik ugtent tliwa deg temnaṭ-a. llan wid d-iqqaṛen belli yekka-d seg awal "yewwula" neγ "iqubel", imi taddart n Tiwal tewwula ar tγiwant n Tmuqra, ansa d-usan imenza n Tiwal, ssemman-as akk-a iw akken ism-a ad yili d inigi γef tayri-nsen d talsa-nsen ar wakal lejdud-nsen. 
Di tegrawla tazzayrit (1954-1962), am tuddar n Tmurt n Leqbayel, Tiwal tefka-d aṭas n yirgazen s wacu ad-tzux. Azal n 106 yimeγrasen iṛuḥen d asfel i timmunent n tmurt n Lezzayer, war ma nsiḍen wid ur nemmut ara. 
Tura, Tiwal tesεa kra n 1200 imezdaγ, dacu kan tugwet deg-sen unagen ar yal tamnaṭ n tmurt n Lezzayer d tmura n umaḍal. 
"Tiγri n Tiwal" d yiwet deg tiddukliwin timettanin tidelsanin timenza n Lezzayer. tlul-d di Tiwal ass n 30 di yunyu 1991. teqqeddec γef idles aqbayli, iwin mi d-tefka mačči s drus ama s umezgun ama s ccna. timettit daγen ur teccuḥ ara deg-s, imi kra yellan d aṣenfar d nettat i t-ittadamen s yiγallen-is. 
Tugwet n at Tiwal ssuturen Tadsimantt i Tmurt n Iqbayliyen.
Kra n At Tiwal yettwasnen: Buqider Sliman, Celiq Lbacir, Akli Qbayli.

11 ctember 2001:

Azwu n Dzayer:
Azwu n Dzayer, neɣ Air Algerie, s taɛrabt الخطوط الجوية الجزائرية, takubbanit n tufga n Dzayer.

Adrar n Yenfusen:
Adrar n Yenfusen , d tama n yedraren ay d-yezgan deg ugafa-utrim (nord-ouest) n Libya. Amur ameqran seg yemsiwlen n tmaziɣt n Libya ddren deg tama-a. Adrar n Yenfusen yezga-d gar snat tgezda (districts) n Libya: tagezdut n Al Jabal al Gharbi akked tgezdut n Nalut. Timdinin timeqranin ay d-yezgan deg tama-a nitenti n Ɣeryan, Yefren, Kabaw, Nalut ed Jadu.
Tanfusit.
Tanfusit mmeslayen si-s imaziɣen i yellan deg wedrar n Infusen.
Adrar n Infusen illa d aglal n Ṭrables,Tmorawin tilli llant di wedrar niḍen: Nalut ,Yefren, Jadu, Kabaw, Temẓin, deg akk seg tmura, niten Ibaḍiyyen d tsawlen s Tmaziɣt,deg-s tmura llant g wedrar wanag ur mmeslayen ara s Tmaziɣt am Zzentan (at Znata), Ryayna, Ɣeryan. Tura mmeslayen s Taɛrabt, nutni d Imalikiyen.
Amezruy.
Amezruy n Yinfusen yeqbur imul,emmak usun Iraben kecmen s wajjed n Islam,maca alemma Tarwa n Xaṭṭab yaxser zdat n Iɛebbasen,Ɛebderraḥman U Restem irwel s Qayrawan d Mẓab d igun Tmura agar Infusen d "Ihewwaren" d "Iznaten",nitet "Tihert",nitet Lasmet n umawanak Arestemi taqqim temiḍi d dubac n iseggwasen, armi tuda d afus n Ilmwaḥḥiden, Infusen qqimen ilelliyen yerna ḥekemen Ɣdames d Fezzan.
Deg-s imul n tarrawin g udrar n Infusen,deg-s arraw af ajjed d yiḍen maca guda harqen naɣ twakren nagh xwanten Mɛemmer Lqeddafi d igetten di naytric akid bac adefsden.

Tizizwit:
Tizizwit, ("apis mellifera carnica") d'abaɛuc y yettaken tamemt, tsdewwir f'ijeǧǧigen bac aken atessuw arḥiqis swayen ara texdem tament.Tizizwith thts3ichi di teghrasth.

Aya Sofya:

Tizumag:

Agraw n Summam:
Agraw n Summam itwasides sɣuer Ɛebban Remḍan d Lɛarbi Ben Mhidi, wid iqublen syes llan Krim Belqasem, Ɛumar Uɛemran, Ssi Mḥemmed (Bugerra), Ssi Ṣadeq, Ɛazzedin, Ssi Lexḍer, Ɛli Xuǧa, Ɛli Mellaḥ, yedra 20 ɣuct 1956 g taddart n Iɣban d Ifri g tɣiwant n Iwzellagen.
Lameɛna llan widak ur qbiln ara s ayen y diruḥ agraw am tama tutrimt n Dzayer, tama n Arris, d unzul, axaṭer tigti n imdebren-ines llan d Leqbayel.

Pervez Mucarraf:
Pervez Mucarraf illul deg wass n . Illa d aselway n tmurt n Pakistan seg 20 di yunyu 2001 ar 18 ɣuct 2008.

Pakistan:
Pakistan: isem unsib Tigduda Tineslemt n Pakistan. D tamurt i d-yezgan deg wenẓul n Asya, ɣures 881640 km2, 1046 qublen illel. Pakistan tesɛa tilisa d Afɣanistan, Ccinwa, Lhend akk d Iran.
Tesɛa azal n 169,300,000n imezdaɣ (deg 2007). 
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Pakistan d Karaci.
Tutlayt tunsibt n tmurt n Pakistan d Urdu. Rnu-yass tutlayin nniden di tamiwin n tmurt : Baluci, Pactu, Punjabi, Sindi, Siraiki d Tfarisit n Dari. Seqdacen daɣen tutalyt taglizit.
Tamurt n Pakistan tḥella-d azarug ines deg 14 ɣuct 1947. Teqqel d tigduda tineslemt deg 23 di meɣres 1956.

Galata:

Mugadur:
Mugadur neɣ Amugdul (s teɛrabt الصويرة "Sswira", s tafranssit : "Essaouira" neɣ "Mogador") 
Tigzirin n Amogadul llant twasenent yakan g lqern VII uqbel Ɛisa sɣur ifiniqiyen, iqerṭaǧiyen d rruman
-- 14:15, 22 Ɣuct 2008 (UTC)

Taqeṣṭenṭinit:
Taqeṣṭenṭinit d isem aqbur n Istambul. Tella zik d tamdint tamaneɣt n Tturk 

Pekin:
Pekin neγ Beijing d tamanaγt n tmurt n Ccinwa.1680125 km².15810000 imezdaγ (31 dujember 2006).

Rembrandt:
Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn, yettwassen s yisem n Rembrandt. Illul di 15 yunyu 1606, immut di 4 tuber 1669.

Homer:
Homerus s tegrigit taqburt. Homer d amedyaz agrigi.Af akken ttaawaden d netta i yuran Iliad d Odyessey.

Uraren ulempiyen:
D aneḍruy anadal agraγlan.Uraren ulempiyen ttilin yal 4 iseggasen.

Ccin:
Tamurt n Ccinwa , tamanaγt ines d Beijing .

Yal yiwen yezmer a tt-ibeddel:

Amik anaru amagrad yelhan ?:
Dagi llan kra n imagraden i nebɣa ad nernu, ma yella kra wayen tebɣid ad ternud neɣ ad tbeddleḍ, tekki fell-as, ticki tsendeḍ ɣef ""Beddel", sekcem aḍris sakin senned ɣef "Beddel asebter"

Gutenberg:

Ccinwa:
Ccinwa d tamurt tameqrant ay d-yezgan deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Asya. Tajumma-nnes 9.640.821 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 1.336.718.015 n yimezdaɣen (Icinwaten). D nettat ay d tamurt yesɛan aṭas akk n yimezdaɣen deg umaḍal.
Aselway: Xi Jinping
Aneɣlaf Amezwaru: Li Keqiang
Tamurt-a d nettat ay d tis kraḍ (3) deg umaḍal seg yidis n wakal (sdeffir Rrus ed Kanada), yerna 40% seg wakal-nnes ɛlay ugar n 2000 n lmitrat. Idraren iɛlayanen akk deg umaḍal (Himalaya) zgan-d ɣef tlisa n Ccinwa akked Lhend ed Nepal. Ccinwa tesɛa daɣen yiwen seg yineẓrufen (ṣṣḥari) imeqranen akk deg umaḍal, aneẓruf n Gubi, am wakken ay tesɛa ugar n 5000 n yisafen. Tamurt-a tesɛa tallit aydeg d-yekkat aṭas ugeffur (d tallit n tmusunt, deg unebdu), maca igefran-a ttgen, tiikkal, ixeṣṣaren d imeqranen.
Ccinwa tesɛa agdud ameqran akk deg umaḍal: ugar n 20% seg yimezdaɣen n umaḍal d Icinwaten. Maca amur ameqran seg yimezdaɣen n Ccinwa ddren deg tama tagmuḍant (tacerqit) n tmurt. Ugar n 61% n Yicinwaten ddren deg ugama (beṛṛa i temdinin). Ihanen d nitni ay d tadersi (miniroté) tameqrant akk deg Ccinwa (ugar n 90% n yimezdaɣen), yerna d tantala-nsen (dialecte) ay ssawalen Yicinwaten akken ad msefhamen gar-asen.
Deg 1992, Ccinwa tekcem tadamsa n wulzuz (économie de marché): ula ma medden ttalasen ad sɛun tiṛmisin (tikebbaniyin) i yiman-nsen, maca anabaḍ mazal yeṭṭef ṛṛay ameqran deg temsal n tdamsa. Ccinwa d nettat ay d tanfarast (productrice) tameqrant akk deg umaḍal deg wayen yerzan imendi (céréales) am ṛṛuz, irden ed wekbal.

Igenni:
asget n wawal igenni d igenwan.

Tamusni:
asget n wawal tamusni d timusniwin.

Ihendiyen:
imezdaɣ n tmurt n Lhend.

Aɛraben:
asget n wawal aɛrab. igduden yettmeslayen taɛrabt tutlayt tayematt d wid yesɛan lasel nsen d aɛrab.

Jjwağ:
Jjwadj neɣ zzwadj negh asali s teqbaylit , d asdukel n sin yemdanen deg yiwen wexxam. Asali yettili ger wergaz d tmettut. Tikwal yiwen wergaz d snatn .do reba 4 not tlawin. aceku elislam Edin n yiqebayeliyen yifekayas legahaq iwaregaz aken iyezewj 4 n tilawin aceku iyesadel ger asent.
Leqbayel seqdacen awal asali seg wemyag suli mehsub zwedj. Amedya : leflani yessuli axxam, mehsub yezwedj, yugh tamettut.
win neɣ tin ara yessalin neqqar-as isli, tislit . asegt islan, tislatin.
Litihal d awal seqdacen icelhiyen, anamek ines zzwadj.

Tarakalt:
Tussna n tasna n ddunit.

Taẓuri:
ayen yanan teẓwer d ccbaḥa d-yesnulfu wemdan.

Timetti:
d agraw n yemdanen yesaan asaɣen wwaygarasen.Yezmer ad ss3un idles iten yesduklen, neɣ awanek.

Taẓarurt:
A sebter deg leqdic ...
Taẓarurt neɣ Trisiti d tanezzarirt n te zelɣatin (particules) iâben

Takrura:
Tussna n wayen yettikin di tanga d wamek tettbeddil.

Iwaḍiyen:
Taɣiwant n tmurt leqbayel. Tezga deg twilayt n Tizi-wezzu.

Bamaku:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Mali. Zedɣentt 1,690,471 (deg 2006). Tezga tama n wasif Nijer.

Portugal:
Tamurt n Portugal tezga di Turuft. Isem ines unsib Tigduda tapurtugalit.
Tamanaɣt ines d Lisbun. 
Tutlayt tunsibt: tapurtugalit. Tutlayt nniḍen: tamirandisit.
Imezdaɣ : 10,584,344 deg 2006.

Taǧahilit:
Tallit qbel lislam ar waaraben.

Tudersent:
Yekka-d seg tudert+tussna.

Führer:
ameqran ilalmaniyen di tallit inaziyen . Hitler yella d fuhrer n Lalman.

Tutrict:
Tutrict d tamurt d-yezgan di Turuft Talemmast, yerna d tamaslaḍt (membre) seg Tdukli Turufit. Tamanaɣt ines d Wien. Tutlayt tunṣibt d Talmanit.

Flaṭun:
'"Platon" (s tegrigit Πλάτων, 428/428-348/347 Qε) yella d afilusuf agrigi. Ilul-ed g teddart n Atena g tmurt n Tmaqdunit (Masedwan). Yella d anelmad n Suqraṭ g takadimit.

Ččad:
Ččad d tamurt i d-yezgan d Tefriqt. Tamanaɣt ines d Nǧamena.

Yaoundé:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Kamirun.

Yusef Uqasi:
D amedyaz aqbayli , illul deg At Jennad.

Tapulunit:
Tutlayt ttmeslayen di tmurt n Pulunya.

Talsasnet:
Talsasnet d ahric n tussna talsant d-yaanna d wefgan, bnadem negh medden ama deg amek mugen negh weqmen, tikli nsen, d yidles nsen.

Asaḍuf:
Asaḍuf (asget: isuḍaf) neɣ lqanun, d ilugan (règles) akked lewṣayat ayɣef msefhamen yemdanen ad ten-qadren ed ad sseddun yes-sen tameddurt-nsen neɣ kra n weḥric n tmeddurt. Asaḍuf d ayen yettwarun yerna llant tsuda (institution) ay yettɛassan yerna ttḍafarent aqader-nnes, am wakken ay ttɛaqabent win ur t-yettqadaren.
Aɣbalu.
Anamek n Asaḍuf

Tiklisent:
Tiklisent d tussna n ihulfan , tikta, tikli n walbaad , n medden negh n ughersiw.

Tameddurt:
Tira n n umezruy n tudert n yiwen wemdan .

Astehzi:
Astehzi
<poem>A lukan nezmir a d nerr
Asethzi mebḥal leslaḥ
Yezmer ad yessenger
Wad yesseqwu leǧraḥ
D laxsara i d-nemger
Timetti tezga tsaḥ 
Yiwen ur iqbel ad t-yesɛu
D lemḍera kkan i ixeddem
Ad nekker akk ad t-nɣunfu
Mi ad nwali i yessedrem
Seg allaɣ nneɣ ad t-nenfu
Lḥir ad nekker ad d-nagem
Astehzi d lɛib meqqren
Yečča acḥal d leqssar
Yenɣa acḥal d imdanen
Ixeddem ula d legher
I yeffren d w i d-iḍehren
Issaweḍ-iten akk s iɣzer
Zdat deffir-k wali
Acḥal i ibedden yeɣli 
Imi ur sgan leḥsan
S kra yellan d asmekti
S ustehzi ay temḥan
</poem>
Taɛazzult-iw s ɣur Aḥsen Maric

Asebter amenzawi aqdim:

Lǧemɛa:
Sem d ass wis 5 n ddurt (imalas), ger amhad (lexmis)d sed (ssebt).Di tmurt Leqbayel tettili di kra n tmiwa tasewwiqt deg wass n lǧemɛa.Amedya di Lǧemɛa n Sariǧ. 
Inselmen ttemlilin d agraw ameqran deg wass n lǧemɛa akken ad ẓẓalen.
Leqbayel seqdacen ismawen n wussan n yimalas i seqdacen s taɛrabt maca Imucaɣ mazal ṭṭfen deg yismawen yellan di tmaziɣt , haten-aya ismawen n wussan n ddurt neɣ n yimalas s tmaziɣt:
Letnayen : arim.
Ttlata: aram .
Larbɛa: ahad.
Lexmis: amhad.
Lǧemɛa: sem.
Ssebt: sed.
Lḥed: ačer.

Dimecq:
Tamanaɣt n Surya.
Tamdint n Ccam.

Aḥsen Maric:
Aḥsen Amaric amedyaz aqbayli, iluled ass n 21 furar 1967 g Tala Tulmut deg tɣiwant n Tizi Raced g Tizi Wezzu anda i dilul Si Mḥend Umḥend d Lɛimec Ɛli.
yura adlis ismis Taɛezzult-iw andi llan 25 isefra :
</div class>
Asmel n Aḥsen Maric

Tasnawalt:
ilugan n tira n tmaziɣt d zrar n yilugan yemseḍfaren - wa deffir-wa-; d ilugan i ilaq ad ten-yissin win yebɣn ad tt-yaru akken iwulem, war tuccḍiwin.
Tarrayt : deg tutlayt, menwala-tt, llan krad n yiswiren n tesleḍt, iswiren n tɣssa.
1. Aswar n temsielt-tasniselt: aswir-a deg tira tumrist yettqabal anagraw n tira (naɣ agemmay ). Tuttra iwulmen... da ihi ; d ta: anwi imesla n tutlayt i wimi ilaq ad nerr azal, deg tira-aya ? swanwi isekkilen ara ten-naru ?
2. Aswir n wawal d unamek: s yimesla n tutlayt, nezmer ad d-neg awalen (d yinumak-nsen)
3. Aswir n tseddast: s wawalen da ɣen i d-skaran medden tifyar; s tefyar ttmeslayen medden tutlayt. 
I. Aswir n ugemmay:
