G. M . 1: isekkilen n ugemmay swayes nettaru tamaziɣt d wid n tlatinit,anagar sin-a Ɣ d Ɛ , i d-yekkan seg tegriget. isekkilen yettawin akafu nnig-sen, nettaru yes-sen izegnaggaɣen imezgiyen n d [j . isekkilen , [p , nettaru yes-sen imesla yezgan deg wawalen imnekcamen n umalu, imesla ur nelli deg unagraw asnislan n tmaziɣt. asekil U, azal-is d win n tuget n tutlayin n umalu (OU deg tefransist).Anadi amassan di tutlayt.

Tusnakt:
Tusnakt d tussna yimḍanen s umata, tettwa sileɣ s tmusniwin timadwanin ("connaissances abstraites") s tallat n izebzan imeẓlan ("raisonnements logiques") ɣef tmiḍranin ("concepts") am yimḍanen ("nombres"), tanezgit ("géométrie"), tiskiwin ("structures") neɣ iseɣwal ("transformation"). Tusnakt tbedd daɣen ɣef taɣult n tegmi ("recherche") iy ssendalen ("developpe") timusniwin, akk d wayen it sselmad.
Aẓar n wawal.
Tusnakt d awal id yussan deg sin wawalen ilelliyen tussna d kti (tussna= "science", ket = "mesurer"; tusnakt= science de mesure (mathématiques), tussna n wektay).
Awal n tusnakt d awal amaynu iss nefka deg tmiḍi agi nneɣ, uqbel Imaziɣen neɣ Leqbayel d wid yesseqdacen tu'snakt d acu s tutlayin nniḍen, ama deg tusnakt ama deg tussniwin nniḍen, am augustin
Amezruy.
Uqbel ad tili tira nezmer ad nin belli amdan (l'homme) yesseqdac yakan tusnakt. Taγawsa tamezwarut id ibegnen tiwezatin n wesiḍen (compétences de calcul) d'iγes n Ishangoig llan 20000 iseggasen uqbel tallit aki nneγ.
tusnakt tzegerd krad (3) imecwaren (étapes) anida tura (amyag aru) tilawt (existence) ines:
1 - taɣerma tagrikit (civilisation grecques)
2 - taɣerma n teneslemt(civilisation islamique)
3 - talalit Turufit ( rennaissance européenne)
4- Timidi (siècle) tis XX (20 s telatinit)
Taɣulin n tusnakt (domaines des mathématiques).
Tusnakt tebḍa ɣef sin(2), krad(3) neɣ uquz (4) yeḥricen imezliyen(différents) i tezga tesseqdac : aljiber(algèbre) d wesebrurez(analyse) neɣ aljiber, asebrurez d tenezgit(géométrie) neɣ daɣen Aljiber, Asebrurez, tanzeggit akk d tadwala (probabilité). Tilissa ger weḥric d wayeḍ ur banent ara akken igerrez, axaṭṭer llan aṭṭas n igemmaḍ ig ssawalen ɣer tewzatin tusnakin(compétences mathématiques) id yussan m yal aḥric. Amaɣil n Wiles(théorème de Wiles) ittwa seɣser deg useggas n 1994, d amedyat anyari(arithmitique) d acu aneggaru-agi issaswal i kra n teɣawsiwin yellan deg iḥricen nniḍen am wesebrurez d tenezgit i wakken ad nbeggen tasenẓayt(démonstration) ines.
Leqdic n tusnakt.
Tigmi deg tusnakt.
Tigmi tusnikt (recherche mathématique) ur d ḥudd ara kan ɣer tsenẓayt n imaɣilen (démonstrations des théorèmes),
Timeslayin tusnikin.
Tusnakt tesseqdac tameslayt ig llan i nettat d tazedgant, uma yella tewwid kra n wawalen am aggay (groupe), tindert (anneau), d acu nbeddel asen anamek nsen i wakken ad begnen i wetta usniken (termes mathématiques), akken daɣen ig lla wassar-nneɣ(notre besoin) i wakken ad nessenfali(exprimer) kra n teɣawsiwin, nesmentil-d (nesnulfay) awalen iɣ iwulmen am ddutugdit (injection), nnigtugdit (surjection) neɣ allustugdit (bejsction), tugett n wawalen usniken rran tusnakt d tagermant (difficile) i wid ur nessin tusnakt.
Tameslayt n tusnakt tesseqdac daɣen Izumal ("symboles").
Assab yellan ger tusnakt d tussniwin nniḍen (les mathématiques et les autres sciences).
Tusnakt tesseqdac assaben usligen d tussniwin nniḍen. Asebrurez n yegtilen (analyse de données) yessawal ɣer tewezzatin n tusnakt.
Merra tussniwin tiquranin, taragit n yegna ines tessawal ɣer wesebrurez usnik iɣ mellen ugar n yegtilen i mgal tajrut. 

Tasengama:
Tasengama d tussna n tanga d umussu ines, daɣen n tallunt d wukud.

Asegmi:
Asegmi d aselmed d welmad n tmusni, tikli, tiherci d tezwer. Telha d usnerni deg wayen yezwer yiwen ama d lherfat negh dayen yesnernin ayen yettasen di lbal.

Urar:
anamek 1: ayen i dehhu yiwen yes.
anamek 2: ccna, ccdeh d zzhu di tmeghra.

Iselman:
asget n wawal aslem. aɣersiw yettidiren deg waman.yesnufus seg yidisan-is macci seg yidmaren.

Belεid At-Σli:
BELΣID MESKIN... TAMEDDURT-IS
Ass n 12 magu 1950, deg wexxam n wid ur nḥellu deg-giwen n sbiṭar di tama tazelmaṭ, yemmuṭ Uqbayli meskin. Tenγa-t tusut. Imḍel d aγrib. Yiwen ur isli. Yiwen ur as-ifriḥ. Yiwen ur iqriḥ.
Anwa-t umexluq-a ? D Belεid « bu tektabin », amaru n tmaziγt. Tiras-s meḍlent ur εad ddirent. Belεid bu tmucuha. Amaru yezwar wiyiḍ. Fell-as i tura C. Lacoste : «... d yiwen si Leqbayel yebḍan γef sin idelsan : idles n teqbaylit d win n tṛumit ». Meεna nekk a d-iniγ Belεid, ul-is γer teqbaylit kan i-gedda. Acku, lemmer i s-ihwa ad yaru s tefransist am netta am-miyiḍ - fiḥel ma nebder-ed ḥedd. Zik zik ilmed tafṛansist imi yemma-s tesseγr-it di yal tama. Maεna γas akken yemma-s tessγer tafransist, arraw-is yakk tesseḥfed-asen taqbaylit. Amazuz maḍi d Belεid ittaru-tt.
Belεid, ilul deg useggass n 1909 deg Aẓru Uqellal (deg At Mangellat). Tameddit n wass qbel lεica iwwet lbaṛud deg wezrug. Daγen tiγratin : « ilul-ed wergaz, irna-d ubeckiḍ » akken qqaren deg wawal. Irna-d γef tlata warrac nniḍen, d snat teḥdayin.Yemma-s, qqaren-as Dehbiyya, nettat akken i d-nenna tesselmad tafṛansist.Teγra,«Tticixett ». acku di lawan-nni illa baba-s (Jeddi-s n Belεid) ixeddem γer Baylek (di lamiri). Tekcem γer uγerbaz n teḥdayin di Taddart Ufella (Larebεa n At Yiraten). Teγra din armi tessaweḍ γer le Brevet. Armi tewweḍ 17 iseggwasen, teffeγ at-tesγer. Zik zik sneflen-tt-id di taddart. Yuγ-it yiwen d argaz l-lεali. Iğğa-t at-texdem, γur-es lεeqliyya t-tatrart tufrar-ed γef lawan deg way deg taqcict tettwarked. Ffγen si tmurt, imi Dehbiyya ur t-id-isaḥ ara at-textir anda ara tesγer. Tugi at-tetruzi. Fkan-as amkan ttagin wid itruzan. Asmi εyan di lγerba, am nettat am at wexxam-is, uγalen-d γer tmurt. Ṭṭfen lqahwa di Micli, Din i ilul Belεid. D wi s setta. Nesmekti-d aḥric-a di tmeddurt n Belεid, i wakken a d-nini tin i t-id-irebban d lall n tmussni, ama s teqbaylit ama s tefṛansist. Belεid ixtar !! S teqbaylit i gettaru.
Akken mazal-it d acawrar, asmi izger γer Fṛansa, yewwi-t dadda-s Mbarek. Iqqim tlata ṛebεa iseggasen armi yessaweḍ γer ukayad(diplôme) amenzu : Aselkiw(certificat), ugin-as a t-isεeddi. Γef xemseṭṭac iseggasen i-gebda lemḥayen. Yuγal-ed γer Aẓru. Zewğen-a akken d ameẓẓyan. Taqcict n taddart. Cwiṭ teqqim twureb. Yuγal tebra. Zik zik i s-εerqent i Belεid meskin. Irwa jjih di Micli, netta d ilmeẓyen nniḍen, wiwumi εerqent dayen : dduminu, tissit seg galluy γer tmeddit, amenḍer di leqhawi ttbernat. Yibbas Iṭṭawel-it armi d Lezzayer. Ahat ad yaf axeddim si leεḍil i s-d ssawalen γer lεesker. Aqadum n tmenğart yaf din iman-is. Cwit kan rran-t d lkabran, amecwar yuγal sserğan. Isseγra, iwehha aṭas : ṣṣifa, ṭṭiεa, taḍsa. Ulac anda ur iggar iman-Iεeğğeb meddenTafṛansist isṭerḍiq-it am aman. [..].
Deg ussan-agi yesεedda di lεesker i bdan neṭṭden-t yakk leεyub : ccemma, ddexxan, ccrab. Ccrab yuγ-as idammen. Sin iberdan i tsseγlin di legṛad. Acku m' ara isew ur yettaṭṭaf ara iles-is. Awal d aεrab wayeḍ d aqbayli. Tettergigi-d tasa-s γef tmurt t-tmeslayt-is.
sγur Σmar MEZDAD

Ɛin n Defla:
Tawilayt d-yezgan di tmurt n Lezzayer.

Lugo:
Lugo tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Abxazya:
Tigduda n Abxazya d tamurt d-yezgan ɣef yiri n Yilel Aberkan.
Abxazya zik tetteki di Suvyat yedduklen. Mi tettwakkes Syvyat yedduklen. Tufa iman-is deg tmurt n Jurjya d acu kan teffeɣ seg-s deg 23 di yulyu 1992 lamaana ulac tamurt yestaarfen s uzarug ines ɣas akken Jurjya ur tettif acemmek deg Abxazya. 
Di 28 ɣuct 2008 , tafidiralit n Rrus d tamurt tamuzwarut yestaarfen s tmurt n Abxazya.

Usitya n Wenẓul:
Tagduda n Usitya n wenẓul, tewwi-d azarug ines seg Jurjya deg 26 ɣuct 2008.
Tamanaɣt : Tshinvali
Tutlayt tunsibt : Tusitit akk d trusit.
Imezdaɣ : 70 000 ( deg 2000)
Temɣer : 3 900 km2.
Isurdiyen : Rubel arusi.
Aselway : Eduard Kokoity.

Larebɛa:
Ahad neɣ larebɛa d ass wis 3 n ddurt (imalas) . Yezga ger ttlata d lexmis.
Kra n tmiwa n tmurt Leqbayel sɛant ssuq nsent ass n larebɛa am : At-Yiraten, At-Wasif armi yuɣal yeddukel ass n tsewwiqt d yisem n temnaṭ.

Lexmis:
Amhad d ass d-yezgan ger ass n larbɛa (ahad) d wass lǧemɛa (sem). d ass wis 4 n ddurt (imalas).

Iεezzuzen:
Iɛezzuzen d yiwet taddart d-yezgan di tmurt n Leqbayel di tɣiwant n Larbɛa n At Yiraten. Abban Remḍan yiwen seg warraw-is.

Tajapunit:
Tutlayt ttmeslayen azal n 130 imelyan deg tmurt n Japun.
Awalen ijapuniyen ttuseman : Yamato-kotoba 大和言葉, meḥsub awalen inaṣliyen. 
Awalen d yellan di Tcenwit akk d tjapunit ttusemman: kango 漢語).
Ma d wid reṭṭlen seg tutlayin nniḍen neɣ ijenṭad qqaren-asen : gairaigo 外来語.
= Agemmay ajapuni =
Agemmay ajapuni yebḍa f kraḍ (3) Katakana, Hirakana akk d Kanji

Sudan:
Tamurt d-yezgan di Tefriqt, tamanaɣt ines d Xerṭum. D nettat i d-tamurt meqqren akk di tefriqt
armi 2011.
Tesɛa 36 230 000 imezdaɣ.
Tutlayt tunṣibt: taɛrabt akkd tenglizt.

Lyon:
Tamdint d-yezgan di tmurt n Fransa

Akeffadu:
Assenger n teẓgi n Ukeffadu
Tawilayt n Bgayet tesεa 122.500 n yiqeṭṭaren n tẓegwa ed yimudaγ, d acu kan, assenger n tẓegwa deg twilayt-a yefka-as axeṣ̣ṣ̣ar i tgemmi-a (patrimoine). Amur ameqran deg ssebbat ara yessengaren tiẓegwa-a d imdanen ay tent-yettgen, u gar-asent agzam n ttjuṛ yeffγen i lqanun ed usserγi n tẓegwa. 
Tiẓgi n Ukeffadu d yiwet seg tẓegwa timeqranin n twilayt n Bgayet. Tuzga-d γef tlisa gar twilayt-a ed tin n Tizi Wezzu, yerna meγγret 5400 n yiqeṭṭaren. D acu kan, medden la igezzmen deg-s ttjuṛ s yicuqar ed tmencaṛin n umutur war ma qudren lqanun, swaγen s tidet tiẓgi-a. 
Deg teẓgi n Ukeffadu, medden la d-gezzmen u la d-nejjṛen tirigliwin, ifassen i tγawsiwin, la d-ttekksen tistirin (stères) n yiferki, am wakk-n la d-ttqeddiren asγar i usseḥmu, i temguri (industrie) neγ i yiqeddicen niḍen, war ma qudren lqanun. Yessefk ad d-nger tamawt belli tiẓgi n Ukeffadu, am tẓegwa n Ayt Ksila ed Sidi Σic, qqnent akk γer tnebḍut (circonscription) n Udekkaṛ. 
Sdaxel n teẓgi n Ukeffadu, ad naf iberdan reglen, tikkwal, γzan-ten, yerna win ara ineṭqen γer wid yettakren asγar, zemren ad as-gen kra ... Yuγ lḥal, iεessasen n teẓgi, tikkwal, ttemlilin-d ed wuguren imeqranen mi ara xeddmen ccγel-nsen. D ay-a ay ten-yejjan ad ddukkulen, tikkwal, ed yifernanen (patriotes) akk-n ad kecmen γer teẓgi-a u ad gen deg-s leqdic-nsen n tεessast. 
”Mi ara neg uggug (barrage) γef snat n tmeddit yerna ifassen-nneγ d ilmawen, iban la netturar s yiγfawen-nneγ”, ay aγ-d-yenna Abdelkrim Ahmed iqeddcen d aγella n umeẓlu (chef de service) n tnebḍut (circonscription) n tẓegwa n Bgayet. D acu kan, ifernanen (patriotes) maci dima ay tteddun ed yiεessasen n tẓegwa. Tikkwal, iεessasen-a ttγimin-asen i yimakaren akk-n ad ten-ṭṭfen. D acu kan, nitni ur sellḥen ara, deg lweqt ay deg imakaren n wesγar sellḥen s yicuqar-nsen, yerna tikkwal, iεessasen ttaṭṭafen-ten mi akk-n ara ilin gezzmen ttjuṛ neγ snuzuyen asγar-nni ay d-gezmen. Isγaren yettusseqdacen i wenjaṛ n trigliwin (pieds-droits) n lebni ttnuzun s 50 n yidinaṛen, maca imakaren-a zemren ad ten-ssenzen alama d 200 n yidinaṛen i yiwen. 
Deg 2004, tanebḍut (circonscription) n tẓegwa n Bgayet tekkes-asen-d i yimakaren 3000 n yifassen n wesγar ara yettusqedcen i yiseγzen (pelles) ed tqubac, 132 n yiqenṭaren n yiferki, ed 800 n yesγaren iγezfanen ay llan tteddun ad ten-ssenzen deg ssuq aberkan. 
Ssuq aberkan yettawey-d sselεa-ines seg ubelluḍ n zzan n Tiniri, n Weẓru n Tgerfa ed yimukan niḍen n teẓgi n Ukeffadu ed tẓegwa niḍen, yerna ula d tiggitin n yimukan-a ur mniεent ara imi la d-ttekksen seg-sent iferki. Imakaren n tẓegwa n tama-a ttnadin aṭas γef yiferki, yerna ttaddamen-d war lqanun, yili tukksa n yiferki tesεa lqanun-ines. 
Iεessasen n teẓgi n Ukeffadu ssawḍen ad d-ṭṭfen kra seg yimakaren n yiferki, yerna iferki-nni ay asen-d-kksen ssenzen-t i Teṛmist taγelnawt (entreprise nationale) n yiferki n Bgayet, ay yeḥwajen tanga-a (matière). Iggi (ttejṛa-nni ay d-yettafken iferki) idel 42000 n yiqeṭṭaren seg wakal n tẓegwa n Bgayet, dγa d netta ay d ṣ̣ṣ̣enf n ttjuṛ yeggten akk deg twilayt-a, d acu kan, ala tis ṛebεa seg yiggi n Bgayet ay nezmer ad t-neḥseb mazal-it deg tegnit yelhan, wanag ay-n d-yeqqimen seg-s akk yettwaγ. 175 n lexḍeyyat ay asen-gan i yimakaren n tẓegwa. Maca ala 42 deg-sent ay yettwaxellṣ̣en. 
Iεessasen n tẓegwa ttxeḍḍin ula d wid izeddγen neγ bennun war ttesriḥ deg teẓgi, yerna deg useggas n 2004, ufan-d 48 n yemdanen ay igan ay-a. Lebni ed tnezduγt deg wakal n tẓegwa d ay-n la d-yettilin ladγa deg tmiwa n Ayt Sliman ed Ssuq n Letniyen, yerna γas ma ttwaṭṭafen wid yettgen ay-a yerna la ttucaṛaεen, yiwen ur ten-yettḥettim ad gen ay-n ay d-yeḥkem fell-asen ccṛeε. Deg tnebḍut (circonscription) nnan-aγ-d : ”Ur nesεi ara ttawil akk-n ay yes ara nerẓ lbenyanat-a”. 
Ssebba niḍen ara yessengaren tiẓegwa nettat d times. Deg 2004, tekker tmes 198 n tikkal deg twilayt n Bgayet, yerna tecca 2030 n yiqeṭṭaren n wakal, gar-asent 500 n yiqeṭṭaren n tẓegwa. Yiwen seg yimukan yeḍruran aṭas d tiẓgi n yiggi n Tewrirt n Yiγil (Adekkaṛ) ed tama n Tici ed Bgayet. 
Maca d acu ara yefrun ugur-a n ussenger n tẓegwa s wegzam yeffγen i lqanun ? Tamehla tamatut (Direction générale) n tẓegwa n Bgayet tga-d yiwen n usenfar (projet) ay tefka i unabaḍ (lḥukuma) u tessuttur deg-s ad rren tiẓgi n Ukeffadu d afrag aγelnaw (parc national). Lemmer ad teqqel teẓgi-a d afrag, wid ay tt-yettεassan zemren ad sεun ugar n ttawilat akk-n ad tt-ḥudden xir, yerna imir-n, iεessasen ad sεun leslaḥ n lqanun, d win ay yes ara ḥaṛben wid yettakren asγar akk-n ”ur yettimγur ara uxeṣ̣ṣ̣ar” yellan yagi. 
Seg tama niḍen, akk-n ad yenqes uqedder n yesγaren i usseḥmu ed ussewwi, iεessasen n teẓgi la ttafken asγar baṭel i wid izedγen sdat teẓgi mi ara t-id-ssuttren. 
Ma d wid yesseqdacen tiẓgi i ttjaṛa, tadbelt (administration) tesnuzu-asen s wazalen ”ismenyafiyen” (préférentiels) ama d asγar, ama d tiγawsiwin niḍen d-yettwakkasen seg teẓgi am weẓru, imγan yettusseqdacen deg udawi ed teqjemyar n wexlenj. Deg 2004, 966 n yesγaren iγezfanen, 461 m3 n weẓru ed waṭas n tγawsiwin niḍen ay d-yettwakksen i yimakaren u tessenz-itent tedbelt. 
Ma d afraq n wesγar baṭel i yimezdaγen n teẓgi n Ukeffadu yebda-d, naqal, deg yiwen kan wemkan, sakk-in qqlen tura akk wid ay d-iqerben γer teẓgi-nni zemren ad ssuttren asγar (seg Meγres 2005 ar ass-a). Ugar n 200 n tjummiwin (surfaces) n wakal ay yettunefken i medden akk-n ad gezzmen seg-sent asγar u ad ttxelliṣ̣ent tadbelt (administration), yerna ttwaqeblen 21 n yisenfaren (projets) ara iεawnen tuddar n tama n teẓgi n Ukeffadu akk-n ad farṣ̣ent seg teẓgi-nni war (bla) ma ḍurren-tt, γef wakk-n ay aγ-d-tenna tnebḍut (circonscription) n tẓegwa. 
Ti akk d tifratin ay d-gan yiduba (autorités) akk-n ad frun ugur-a n wengar n teẓgi n Ukeffadu, d acu kan, γas la yettwagay akk way-a, mazal llan wid la yettkemmilen la ssexṣ̣aren tiẓgi, γas ma yella assexṣ̣er n tgara-a ur as-yefki ara axeṣ̣ṣ̣ar i Ukeffadu akk-n ay as-yettunefk deg wussan-nni ay deg d-llant tedyanin n ccwal deg Tmurt n Leqbayel [2001-2003]. Agzam n yesγaren irennu ladγa deg tegrest (ccetwa), anda yettismiḍ lḥal yerna llant aṭas n tmiwa ay deg mazal la sseqdacen asγar i usseḥmu. Seg tama niḍen, tamafya (mafia) n wesγar mazal teckunṭeḍ, ula d nettat, deg ttjuṛ, yerna tagi ur fessuset ara i uḥaṛeb. 
Seg El Watan n 12 Yebrir 2005 Sγur K. Mejdoub.Tasuqelt imedyazen

Ssebt:
Sed d ass wis 6 n yimalas (ddurt).Yezga ger sem (lğemεa) d ačer (lḥed).
Ass n tsewwiqt yettili di kra n tmiwa n Leqbayel ass n ssebt, amedya: Ssebt Iɛeẓẓugen.
Ass n ssebt d wass n lḥed d ussan n wesgunfu (astaɛfu) di tuget n tmura n ddunit.

Anales:
Afgan Allellan:negh Homo sapiens ,d Ameddur mottawer af ak n imedduren,yella zkemmi 120,000 n iseggasen,igu imasen s azru,d yezeyyen urjan yili yezdegh disen.
Afgan s tmezra tussnant.
Tmezra n Darwind tmezra udjut tili lɛaks n ajjaden ajennanen,nnun Imallan d Afgan d imeddureb akk-nnsen igun s amelli s lxaleit udjut zgemmi igemgendad n iseggasen,d Afgan af awal-nsen yeqreb s ibiddan imennajen am Cambanzi,Bunubu,Ɣurella,dUrang utan,nnun imessanen dis daddi udjun n Afgan d Cambanzi zgemmi 6 n igendad n iseggasen di Ifriqia.
Ded Afgan d Amelli Abyuluji,ɣres guda n tɣawsiwin am imedduren yiḍen am Allel,dMeslan,dIbebbicen,d Ifessen d Iḍaren, terni n Ḥemḍ nawawi,DNAd Mitukundrya d guda n amidyaten yiḍen,dis guda n imessanen tetḥawmen mammu niten daddi n Afgan
Afgan s tmezra tajeddant.
Ajjed yenna Ayrad yegu Afgan s tɣuri,imira yegu dis Iman,saha yesar Afgan s tmezri n Ajjeddan Ajennanen,Islam,Tamsiḥit,Tyudayt,
Di Islam yennu Quran Ayrad yegu Adam s tɣuri,imira iguC s tɣezdist n Adam,d sis-en usuned medden,arrawen ajeddanen nnun Adam d Ḥawwa,llan zeddɣen di Tawertit,alemmi tcun s tameddekt,Ayrad yesuffeɣ-ten sis an tamurt.

Lisbun:
Tamdint n Lisbun d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Purtugal.

Ttlata:
Aram d ass wis 2 n ddurt (imalas), ger arim (letnayen)d ahad (larbɛa).
Leqbayel seqdacen ismawen n wussan n yimalas i seqdacen s taɛrabt maca Imucaɣ mazal ṭṭfen deg yismawen yellan di tmaziɣt , haten-aya ismawen n wussan n ddurt neɣ n yimalas s tmaziɣt:
Tasit : arim.
Tacertit: aram .
Tugzit: ahad.
Asumis: amhad.
Tlegmet: sem.
Asunit: sed.
Tudjit: ačer.

Louvre:
Louvre ("Musée du Louvre") Paris
Open: 1793
60 000 m²
2007: 8 300 000 visit
"Mona Lisa", "The Virgin and Child with St. Anne", "Venus de Milo", "Code of Hammurabi", "Winged Victory of Samothrace"

Lḥedd:
Ačer / Lḥedd
d ass wis 7 n ddurt (imalas), ger sed(ssebt)d warim (letnayen).
Di tmurt leqbayel ass n tsewwiqt yettili di kra n tmiwa deg wass n ačer(lḥed). Dɣ ad yeqqen isem n taddart neɣ n temdint ar wass n tsewwiqt , amedya : Lḥed-Iwaḍiyen. 
Tikwal qqaren kan Lḥed i temdint n Iwaḍiyen.
Ass n ssebt d wass n lḥed d ussan n wesgunfu neɣ astaɛfu di tuget n tmura n ddunit.
Imasiḥiyen ttẓallan di teglizt deg wass lḥed.
Leqbayel seqdacen ismawen n wussan n yimalas i seqdacen s taɛrabt maca Imucaɣ mazal ṭṭfen deg yismawen 
yellan di tmaziɣt , haten-aya ismawen n wussan n ddurt neɣ n yimalas s tmaziɣt :
Letnayen : arim.
Ttlata: aram .
Larbɛa: ahad.
Lexmis: amhad.
Lǧemɛa: sem.
Ssebt: sed.
Lḥed: ačer.

Stephen King:
Stephen Edwin King (illul di ) d amaru Amarikan, amaru isura, amusiqar, amaru imagraden, awadem, amsufagh isura d director.
Yezzenz ugar n 350 imelyan yedlisen yura, King yettwasen atas s leqdic ines yerzan ar ssenf n tugdi, yesbeggin degs- tamusni ines igerzen n umezruy n ssenf agi. Yura daghen tussna uferrigh, amezgun, tullizin, ungalen d isura.Nettaf atas seg wayen yira stephen king rrant d isura negh di tilizri s umata. King yura daghen kra n yedlisen s yisem Richard Bachman d yiwet tullizt s yisem John Swithen. Deg 2003 The National Book Foundation's fkan-as Medal for Distinguished Contribution to American Letters.
Tameddurt.
Temẓi.
Illul Stephen King ass n . Mmis n Donald Edwin d Nellie Ruth Pillsbury King. Asmi yella King d bab n isn iseggasen, yeǧǧa baba-s yemma-t-sen att rebbi i iman-is mmis Stephen d gma-s ameqran David i d-rebban, ttwaḥerṣen aṭas. Dɣa gguǧǧen ar West De Pere, Wisconsin, Fort Wayne, Indiana d Stratford, Connecticut. WhenMi yessaweḍ King 11 iseggasen,uɣalen-d ar Durham, Maine anda teqqim Ruth King ad telhu d imawlan-is alamma wwḍenn ar laɛfu Rebbi. syen txeddem deg sbiṭar imexlal .
Ttɛawaden dakken asmi yella d amecṭuḥ, King yeḥḍer mitewwet tmacint yiwen seg imdukkal-is, tenɣa-t, ɣas akken netta s yiman-is ur yecf'ara . At wexxam nnan-as dakken yeffeɣ ad yurar netta d wemdakkel-is mi yuɣal s axxam yeggugem. armi d mbaɛd i slan s wemxix yeḍran. Kra qqaren aneḍruy-agi i yerran King yettaru aṭas ɣef tugdi d lefqaɛ.
Anda yeɣra.
aḥric-agi d yeḥricen nniḍen ttkemmilen deg wussan i-d iteddun...
Iɣbula.
Additional reading.
"See also Books about Stephen King"

Tawrirt yettwattun:
Tawrirt yettwattun (lan wid ittarun Tawrirt itwattun) d ungal sɣur Mulud Mɛemmri, yura-t aseggas 1952, iffeɣ-d s uzwel n tafransist "La colline oubliée"
Ifɣed degs asaru ameqqran amezwaru s tmaziɣt / taqbaylit aseggas 1996. Amseḍru ines Abderaḥman Bugarmuḥ.
=Asaḍen is=
Wit n tɛssast
Wit n cuji

Apuleius:
Afulay (s tefṛansist Apulée) d amyaru amaziγ ilulen ger issugasen 123-125 di, Madur iwumi qqaren ass a Mdaruc, ur isggug (ur ibɛid) ara ɣef Suq Ahras.
Yiwen ur yezri acu n usseggas i deg imut akeyya, (ahat assegas 170).
= Tameddurt =
Tawacult n Ufulay tella d tamerkantit. ɣas akken Afulay yella d aruman s yedles, yr yettu ara izuran is ifriken almi i d yenna netta d amaziγ.
d acawi
'numid'
= Ayen yura =
ɣas d amaziγ, Apuleius yura s talatinit.
Win it wesenen 

Tabitha King:
Tabitha King (isem mi tlulTabitha Jane Spruce) (tlul 24 meɣres 1949) d tamyarut d tameɣnast tamarikant .
Tabitha King uqbel ad tezweǧ isemis yella d Tabitha Jane-Frances Spruce tlul di Old Town, Maine. Baba-s d Raymond George ma d yemma-s d Sarah Jane White Spruce.
Teɣra di St. Mary’s Grammar di temdint n Old Town, teffeɣ seg-s 1963. Syen tekcem ar John Bapst Memorial High School di Bangor alamma useggas 1967, tewwid lisans ines deg umezruy deg useggas 1971 seg tesdawit University of Maine di Orono.
Tawacult.
Temlal Tabitha aragaz-is, amyaru ameqran Stephen King, di tesnawit deg wemkan anda tella teqqar txeddem di temkarḍit Fogler . Zewǧen di 2 yennayer 1971, ɣand have three children togetherursen tlata dderya: Naomi Rachel, Joseph Hillstrom, d Owen Phillip. Sin agi ineggura uɣalen d imyura daɣen.
tawuri.
King tura atas n ungalen, ffɣen ar imaẓragen Macmillan d New American Library. Tura daɣen adlis nniḍen d-yeffɣen ɣur Dendrite.
arrazen.
Deg wayyur n mayu 1987, King d wergaz-is ttunefk-asen Honorary Doctorates of Humane Letters sɣur University of Maine di Orono.
Deg useggas 1998, fkan-as Annual Constance Carlson Humanities Prize amezwaru i leqdic ines deg weḥric n tallalt n talsa.
ayen tura.
Note: ungalen s uzamul * teḍra teqsiṭ nsen deg temdint tesnulfa Tabitha King, Nodd's Ridge.

Alma:
Alma d akal ay deg llan waman yernu imeɣɣi-d deg-s leḥcic. 
Alma dima d azegzaw.

Aman:
Aman (H2O) d tanga yellan deg wakal. Iwdan, iɣersiwen, d icakan ur zemmeren ad ddren war aman. Aman udfen deg-sen iferdisen n wuksijin (O) d uhidrujin (H). 2 i'belkimen u'hidrujin d 1 ubelkim n uksijin ttefken aneɣ aman. Aman gerrsen ɣer tfesna n 0 °C (273,15 K, 32 °F). Aman zemmren ad ilin d adfel, d agris, d amazzel (liquide), naɣ d iriggwan (water steam) (agaz).
71% n tjumma n wakal d aman. 96,5% n waman n umtiweg-nneɣ (planet) llan deg igarawen ed yilalen, 1,7% n waman llan deg igelmamen ed yisaffen, 1,7% n waman llan deg wagris n Antarktika d Greenland, 0,001% n waman gan iriggʷan deg igenni, g usigna, g ugeffur.
=Aẓar n wawal aman=
Aman d issem imziki n teqbaylit.
Ur isεi ara asuf
= Asimel =
Itergien hemlen ad inin : "Aman Iman"

Asuf:
Asuf aen iditteren awal ar yiwen is.
Singulier(fr), Peculiar(en)
=Amedya=
=Walit daɣen=
Asget

Asget:
Asget aen iditteren awal ar xilla ines.

Ilel Agrakal:
Ilel agrakal tilel i ttilien ar tama ugafa n tnumrt laqbayel.
Usaed ger ger 3 imenẓawen:
Turuft, Tafriqt, d Asya.

Aẓeffun:
Aẓeffun d taɣiwant n ugafa (nord) n Tizi Wezzu, ɣef yiri n yilel. Zedɣen-tt 16.096 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist llan ɣɣaren-as "Port-Gueydon".
Tamaḍlarut.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Llant kter 52 n tudrin : 

Wejdet:
Wejda neɣ Wejdet daɣ Ujdet s tmaziɣt d tamdint i d-yezgan di temnaṭ n Arif di Merruk .

Karl Marx:
Karl Heinrich Marx, illul deg 5 si Magu deg ussegwas 1818 di tmurt n Trier illan di Rheinland tamurt n Lalman yemmut di 14 di Meɣres 1883 di temdint n London. Marx illa d argaz n tsertit u d-amesnagay ameqṛan, d netta id isnulfan ayen i wumi neqqar Tazdukla "le communisme", id yeqaren belli ulac amgarad ger imdanen γas ulamma yella deg ixeddim nsen n yal ass.
Tameddurmant.
Ilul Karl Heinrich Marx di Trier asegwas n 1818. Yella d wis sin ger 8 Tam w-atmaten-is. Vava-s, Heinrich Marx (1782–1838), d-abugaṭu, yefrurid deg yiwet twacult twudayt Ackenaz. Jed-nsen Meier Halevi Marx yella dawday, m-ad mmi-s d warraw n mmi-s uγalen d-imasiḥiyen, ẓẓiẓrgen isem nsen γer Heinrich iwakken ad izmiren ad xedmen, yemma-s n Karl, Henriette Pressburg (20 Yulyu 1788-30 Wamber 1863), d tawdayt n tmura n wadda.

Buǧamal:
Buǧamal d agḍiḍ yesɛan iḍaren d wemɣarḍ ɣezzifen.Yessawaḍ 1.20 m ar 1.40 m di lqed. Inil-ines d axuxi-amellal.

Cinwa:
Tamurt d-yzgan di Asya , tamanaγt ines d Beijing .

Bamyan:
Tezgad Bamyan g Afɣanistan

Ilel n Marmara:
Ilel n Marmara ɖ ilel i yebḍan Sṭambul d yal Tturk f sin imuren, amur yezga g tama n Turuft, amur wayed yezgad g tama n Asya

Aḍebsi aquran:
Aḍebsi aquran t takatut tadkirant. Netta id yussan g usarag n tsfift tadkirant, d ugennag g iseggasen 1970.
Netta yaken ibdu (di 2008) yttili g usarag is takatut flash (en: flash memory).
= Tamselyut =
Hard disk
Disque dur

Tasfift tadkirant:
Tasfift tadkirant ttasfift i ukles tiɣla ametran neɣ umvin s ttawil n "magnétophone".
= Tamselyut =
Bande magnétique
Magnetic tape

Meḥmud Derwic:
Meḥmud Derwic d amedyaz afalesṭini iluled ass n 13 meɣres 1941 g l' Birwa g Falesṭin yemmut g 9 ɣuct 2008 g Huston, Teksas g Yiwunak Yedduklen n Marikan (WDM) yella yessebdes imenɣi n wegdud ines maca yella yal ass yessaram talwit, isem-is mucaɛ gar igduden ciɛa n isem-is teffeɣ tilas n tmurt-is, netta y d aselway n tdukli n imyura ifalesṭiniyen, yessufeɣ ugar n 20 isunad n tmedyazt, 7 idlisen n tasrit, yella daɣen anemhal n tifeffeɣt am aɣmis n "Al Jadid" (Amaynut), "Al-Fajr" (Tafrara) "Al-Karmel".
-- 21:28, 23 Ctember 2008 (UTC)
, 

Simpson:
Tawacult n Simpson neɣ Isimsonen (s tanglizit : "The Simpsons") sulfentid imarikanien aseggas n 1987 sɣur Matt Groening. Tɛadda g telenẓar i tikelt tamenzut ass n 17 duǧember, 1989.

Aɣilas:
Aɣilas d aɣersiw i zeggiren akk iɣersiwen di tazla. Yessawaḍ 120km/Ssaɛa.

Asefru n Ferḥat Mhenni (Tudert):
<poem>Tudert
D ajraḍ sufella n waman, lembaver la teddun.
S lεesker d tirga yeɣman, s idammen d waldun.
Timura irumyen d-yegman d leğnas i yetthuddun.
Ayɣer levni n iɣerman, ma s tinɣin i tt-veddun ?
Assen ur qudren talast, aɣref,
ur qudren kra yeddren,
tutlayt, ddin n usurref, ur qudren ara azref.
Azref ḥemmlen a d-adren, d win swayes ara ssnegren
win yugin ad yekref.
Tudert-nsen s idammen-nneɣ.
D tawant-nsen i d laẓ-nneɣ.
Tilelli-nsen d tikerfi-nneɣ
iɣef tt-ssulin.
Rran-aɣ timedlin.
Am yizan ɣef teflukin, dehmen levḥer s lεum.
Qemmren-tt ad zegren akin, ammer ad yeεyu unezgum???
Ttargun tudert yeffulkin n tlelli d weɣrum.
Reglen ɣef laẓ d telkin d leḥkem vu lehmum.
D i d-yeğğa urumi i ten-yessenfan,
ur ẓrin ara acimi. Γer irumyen i d-ufan
d tilisa ten-iɣunfan.
Menεen si lmut i wumi,
mi d asen-ugin iɣimi, verra n leḥkem n yilfan?
Tudert d tudert ma s tizeṭ-is.
Cci, tazmert d tilelli-s.
Di yal tiɣmert tessaɣ tayri-s
d yiseɣ s-yettilin
si rwaḥ d tuɣalin.
Ayen iεeddan iεedda, yelha ɣef win iceffun.
Σiwdet leqwanen swadda ay imdanen yettḥuffun!
Timura anda nedda, ulawen ad sgunfun.
Imdanen yakk d tarwa n tsedda, ur sserfayen, ur reffun.
Si zik akka, reglen ɣef cwal.
Leḥkem timecki yerka, targit iεerreq-as wawal,
s lmut mi d-tessawal.
Asirem yezga yettekka ɣef tirga n yal tafaska
n lferḥ mi ara d-yettɣawal.
Tudert d tudert ma s tizeṭ-is.
Cci, tazmert d tugdut-is.
Sεut tazmert akken ad tɣeḍlem
leḥkem i ken-yeṛẓan!
Ur ttɣimit d izan, ur ttilit d izan!!!</poem>
yurat ass n 26 dujember 2006
Tudert sɣur Ferḥat Mehenni

A baba inuba:
Tizlit n Yidir
Ttxil-k lli-yi-n tabburt, a baba-inu ba<br>
Ččenčen tizebgatin-im, a yelli Γriba<br>
Ugadeɣ lweḥc n lɣaba, a baba-inu ba<br>
Ugadeɣ ula d nekkini, a yelli Γriba<br> 
<br>
Amɣar yettel deg ubernus<br> 
Di tesga la yeẓẓiẓin<br> 
Mmi-s yettḥebbir i lqut<br> 
Ussan deg uqerrus tezzin<br>
<br>
Tislit deffir uzeṭṭa<br>
Tessalay tijebbadin<br>
Arrac zzin-d i temɣart<br>
A sen-tesɣar tiqdimin<br>
<br>
Adfel yessu-d tibbura<br>
Tuggi kecmen-tt yeḥlulen<br>
Tajmaɛt tettargu tafsut<br>
Aggur d yetran ḥeǧben<br>
<br>
Ma d aqejmur n tasaft<br>
Idegger akin idenyen<br>
Mlalen-d akk at wexxam<br>
I tmacahut ad slen<br>

Taziri:
Taziri:
Tawalt n taziri tetwesqdec itri win ajenna nev win afgan,yttenneä af tamurt di asennaä amalkan, nev ay kawkab, saturn vres 18 n tzirizin tmeäfrin,
Amissu n tziri:.
Yttennä tenniät temda di akku n imlasen,tettmus tziri ak ass drjet d izgen;
Yttigur di asuneä ymalu af burj zudyak 5 n drjat, 
Asket n tinniät tin tziri tetwesket s:
1-tinniät tin itran:dis atennä tziri af tamurt bennesba n itran,ttaqqim 27 n ussan,
2-tinniät tin tamurt dis atennä tziri af tamurt bennesba n tufut,ttaqqim 29 n ussan,d nitet iman takudt tili tettenneä dis tziri af iman nnes,dav yetzer amvray iman udem n tziri.
Aylan n tziri:.
Acku takudt tili attevsa tziri bac atenneä af iman nnes tigu zund takudt tili attevsa tziri bac atenneä af tamurt, tzerrun yudan n tamurt iman udem n tziri,d ul aytveyyer; d amissu n tziri af tamurt tderrez af ilellen d ttig tanzdat d tandeffert,
Isgran n tziri:.
Nyazk d cuhub xbeänt tziri ymul n tikklin; djun dis tiflayin ymul af udem nnes, d guda s nyazek ih ayinas amen, d yeggez af tziri didsen,d emmak tufut tedjetten adfsan an uksijin d hidrujin,d ulin an ajenna.
Twavi n tziri d tufut:.
Ttetwqv tziri ami tused tmurt ajar asafu nev ammaïu s usafu n tufut, amawlu n tamurt ami ttenneä af tufut ayased af tziri;d adezrun yudan n tamurt atnd tifawt n tziri yetwznkeä sis accar, d tfawt n tziri ul atsar vas ami tziri atig temda; d twavi n tufut aysar ami tziri tused ajar tufut d tamurt,d attegga tifawt n tufut af tamurt, d twavi n tufut yetsar d affar n talullya n ayyur,
Tarmt n tziri:.
Tamezwart tili tirm udem win tillest s tziri d Luna2 Asufyiti,tenniä af tziri di 15 cutenber1959 ;d afgan amezwar wili yeggez af tziri d NIL ARMESTRUNG di 20 yulyu1969

Alɣem:
Alɣem neɣ alum; tawtemt nnes d Talɣemt; d ameddur yzeddev di tiniri n Asia d Tafriqt, d dis sen anawen n ileɣmen:
Alvem ytḥpammel di affad d allaç, ynejjem ayedder di tniri teqqur s waman d tefray,alvem ytkeyyef did n utcu n ccuk d iriwalen ;patta tiddist nnes tetkeyyef,d Tuyyi ih nitet alkam n apraz n utcu am tadumt ih, patta amen tetmmaprazen did n tadumt ih,tiïawin n alvem ih tkeyyefnet did n taqqa ih,d iäarn nnes selli vres aäar yewssaê ytsaêd dis bac ayigur af cidi; 
Utcu n Imucaɣ.
Amellal n tlevmin d yezêam yemmul,d yigu utcu yemdan n medden n tniri,
D alvem ynejjem ayedder di ntiri ammani ul dis amen nna utcu,di trvva tmqrant,d vres amezzuv ameckan d yetcurn s içuggen bac ul yetäur cidi n tniri, d tiï dis sen n izirag n lrmuc,
Bac aytegga s tvuvaä d tmerciwin;
Di tneffes nnes atetpazl tadumt an tanezmart,asteççel may yvess alemmi ul vres utcu d amen, d yetwssen tanezmart tili tella di tadumt tmaqqur af tili tella di karbuhaydrat nev jligujen,
Alvem win sen tuwway vres akebbuä n çaw bac atiserva di tezrezt; di iäaren nnes tgezzlen af iäaren n alvem afriqi;iäaren n alvem afriqi zzgerten bac atibaêd af tarvva n cidi,
D alvem ynejjem ayetpammel affad;d nqas n amen di açeïïa n tveããa nnes,d nit ul yfaqqed amen s idammen nnes vas ammaïu,
D ayaweä an 30%;imedduren iyiäen ademmun ami iweä fqad n amen an 20%; Ibççiäen d Imeqraren yihi n alvem mrekkzen ymmul, ansi ynejjem udjun ayig timsi dis ïul, d nit yxtlef af imedduren iyiäen tili tfaqqed amen yili llan di idemmen nnes ami dis tarvva magret,aziv alvem ytves aman ydrus af imedduren ih iyiäen;
Tinwert n alvem ih dara-mmak tigu,d temakmec s jaj,tigu zund mkattef atkettf asmar n amen wili ytteffev did lhwa n zfir,ayffev CO2 d aytkettef asmar n amen,d saha ul attyedj ayffev, d nit ameddur ih udjun wili yteïïef asmar n amen wili yetneffis dis,
Alvem ul ytyidi vas ami tuli tarvva af 42,d tarvva ih tili terni yetfeqqed dis di äyeä, dav Imucav ih teïïãen dur ilevmen nnsen,
Bac adettervan s tarvva ih tili tteffev s Ilevmen nnsen,d di dyes ih aysali tarwa-nnes bac atig zund tarwa n brra,an lemmi atawä an 42,d syah ayntta yettidi bac ayleïïef tarvva n tavããa nnes, ami tarvva tuli af 42.
Yudan ih isin gellun alvem ul vres tveddayin n tidi, an 1956 d emmak ateffev tidi s tvããa ih aybed çaw,bac ul ayebzeg;bac ayweffer amen n ebzag n açaw,
Alɣem ih ynejjem ayessu amen n ilel,acku tçeççal nnes nejjemnet adekkesnt tisent ih tili terni,d alvem ysesu guda n amen an 18 n iletrin ami ayifud,
Yeparrez di ibeççiäen di tamtant ami yevsa aman,idemmen ih amuããun aman d ibeççiäen aduwlen an tiddist ih,dis baktirya atdj Urina acidu amini,nev brutin d amen. 

Amdeɣ:
Amdeɣ:
D ameddur yzzegret af ak imedduren di amudu,nana nnes win tussna d Giraffa camelopardis ; maona nnes alvem yemnaqqeï, d nit d ameddur afriqi ul yella vas di Tafriqt.
D ameddur:.
Yttig 900 kg;d 18 n Iäaren n tzegrti,amdev vres 7 n tekrimin di iri nnes zund tyin tiffit,d sisen Afgan; ul n Amdev d ameqqur ymul,yttig 11kg,
Ynejjem ayäux 16 n igalunen n idemmen di tmennawt, ami ul aynejjem ayäux saha, idemmen ul anejjmen adalin zeng tanzzavt, bac ayaweä an ivef wili yeboad 10 n iäaren,
Warid widaji dis guda n iãemmamen, d islamen yin idemmen bac aybïïa aïïar n idemmen an allel, ami ayig ivef nnes af tamurt, nev asisar tamazzurt tmeqrant; ami taona atessu nev atetc s tamurt, tukrumt nnes d tezzegret ymul dav ttemmar iäarn nnes yin zdat(niten zzgerten af yin deffer) ami ayehwa bac ayessu, 
Ami yttazzel ayesmus iäarn nnes s ljiht udjut di akud udjun;d nitet tettazzel fisao; di tazzla patta ayyes ul ynejjem atyaweä,maca acku turawin nnes d tmeckanin dav ul ynajjem ayazzel ymul;
Utcu nnes.
Amdev ynejjem ayetc 68 kg n tefray di ass udjun; utcu nnes d tefray s zeng n tmeddak n Akasya, ttawäas acku ivef nnes ytoalla , d iles nnes yezzgret an 18 n buãat 
Ntejjem aysired udem nnes s iles nnes s ibexxac;
Asemru d tarwa:
Akud n asemru 14-15 n iyyuren, atur tarwa udjun,d nitet tturu d nitet tbeddu, ayahwa af tamurt ayig ïïul nnes 1.8 m, ammaïu n akud aymmus, d ayzmem s tiffit n yemmi nnes aseggas yemda,defr ammaïu n imlasen ayetc tefray n tmeddak,d amckan yteïïeã did n yemmi nnes ,atpaä s imedduren yiäen zund izammen d ivilasen d iäan ifriqeyyen;
Tussnayin af Amdeɣ:.
Ul ɣres ssut ,maca imessanen ugzen es versen sadu-ssut,
Awtem ayawä di 4 n iseggasen, d tawtemt di 3 n iseggasen
Içri d islay qwan ymul
Ttazzl an 48 km di tmengult
Yttedder 20-25 n iseggasen d yttazä an28 di akfal
vres akud n aïïaã ytgezzel af imedduren yiäen 20 n tmennawin an 2 n tmenglin ak ass

Ben Muhemmed:
Ben Muhammed neɣ "Ben" i yiman-is kan akken sessawalen yad iqeddcen yid-es, d yiwen umedyaz Aqbayli ameqqran. Ilul deg iseggasen n 40 deg temnaṭ n Tmurt iqbayliyen Ufella (idurar n ǧerǧer(la haute kabylie), swaswa deg At Wasif.
Yeddar di ledzayer tamanaɣt kra n tallit, tura yettidir deg Tmurt n Fransa. Ussan-a yeffɣ-ed wawal deg yeɣmisen iqbayliyen d akken d netta ara yilin "d ddiraktur, neɣ d aqqaruy n rradyu n Teqbaylit id yeffen d tamaynut di Paris.
D yiwen wargaz i igan tawuri tameqrant i yedles aqbyli d ɣumaziɣ s umata, imi d netta i yellan deffir kra n tezlatin i yecna ucennay anaẓur ameqqran aqbayli, riɣ ad iniɣ yidir. Dɣa Ben Mo. d netta, amedya, i yuran tizlit-nni ur ẓriɣ ansi d kkiɣ wala sanda leḥḥuɣ ...

Ecser:
Ecser d yiwet n taddart n 3 252 imezdaγ, i d yussan di temnaṭ n Pest, Hungri, s zdat n Budapest
Tizgin.
Ecser (tettwanṭaq Eččer) tesεa daγen isem niḍen asluviki: Ečer, tesdari daγen kra n isluvikiyen.
Taddart-a tezga-d deg unẓul-asamar n Budapest, s zdat n unafag agraγlan n Ferihegy. tiγiwanin i as-d-yezzin d Maglud, Večes, Gyumru akk d Ullu. Abrid ameqran n MO yettawi s zdat n taddart. Taddart tussa-d rrif n rraya n tmacint 120a (Budapest-Szulnuk-Ujszasz).
Amezruy.
lkaγeḍ amenzu i d-yuddren Ecser yettwaru ass n 15 di ğember 1315, maca taddart tella uqbel seg 896, di tisin n iHungriyen. Di yiwet n tmacahut, qqaren-d akken isem n taddart yettunefk s Ugellid ameqran n idrumen ihungriyen Arpad. Ass mi yesteqsa anwa i d isem n temnaṭ-a, anda yeḥbes i wakken ad yesteεfu, imezdaγ n temnaṭ-a ur tessinen ara. Dadγa Arpad yenna: "Sya d assawen, ad tsemmim i temnaṭ-a s yisem n ubeluḍ (s thungrit: cser)".
Taddart temmut s ddaw uzaglu n Ṭurk iεutmaniyen (1526-1686), ass-mi teγli Buda, ur yebεiden ara aṭas fell-as. 
Imezdaγ-is imenza ur d-ussin γer γur-s alammi d 1699. llan 11 iserdasen (iεeskriyen) i yettekkan deg umennuγ n Rakoczi γef timmunent (1703-1711). di tazwara n isseggasen 1700, Bab n taddart, lkumt Antal Grassalkovich, yessezdeγ deg-s isluvakiyen.
Ayen niḍen.
Asbad n taddart i yellan, d yiwet-nni Tmesgida takatulikit taṛumanit, yettwabnan di 1740
Yiwen n cṭeḥ afulkluri yettwasnen aṭas d win n "assuli di Ecser" (Noces à Ecser, Ecseri lakodalmas).
Di imrigen n taddart ad naf tlata n tγewsiwin mucaεen: tamesgida, cṭeḥ afulkluri d ubelluḍ,

Ɛebban Ṛemḍan:
Aban Ramḍan neɣ Ɛebban Ṛemḍan d argaz asarti azwaw, i gelan d amenzawi deg umezruy n tagrawla Tadzayrit D netta i yellan d aqerru n tegrawla, d amsertay ugar n ukabar Tirni n Tleli Aɣelnaw FLN.
Tudert-is.
Ilul Ɛebban Ṛemḍan ass n deg Tmurt n Leqbayel; taddart-is d Iεezzuzen i d-yezgan tama n Laṛebεa n At Yiraten. Baba-s qqaren-as Muḥend. Yemma-s qqaren-as Faṭima, tḥemmel-it aṭas acku yella d anelmad ifazen ger tezyiwin-is. Deg lawan-nni, ulac aṭas n yiɣerbazen imi tamurt n Dzayer tella ddaw temḥarsa n Fransa. Ɛebban Ṛemḍan iṛuḥ ɣer Leblida akken ad ikemmel dinna leqraya-s deg teseddawit, ibbwi-d Lbbak (BAC) n tusnakt deg useggwas n 1941.
Deg tallit-nni i yebda yettfaq s yir tagnit i ttidiren Izzayriyen, ayen i t-yeğğan ad yeḥbes leqraya-s, ad imal ɣer tsertit. Ikcem s Amussu i Unalak n Tlelliyiin Timagdayin (MTLD, "Mouvement Pour le Triomphe des Libertés Démocratiques"). Deg useggwas n 1947, yuɣal d imdebbeṛ deg ukabar-a, yerna yettikki deg tuddsa tuffirt (O.S., "Organisation secrète") i yella tettheggi ttṛad mgal Fransa. Adabu n Fransa ifaq yes-s, dɣa yeṭṭef aṭas n yimeɣnasen n umussu, yeḥkem-asen s lḥebs. Ɛebban Ṛemḍan yettwaṭṭef ula d netta, deg useggwas n 1950. Yennuɣ deg lḥebs almi yuɣal yettuneḥsab d ameḥbus n tsertit, yesaa azref ad iɣer idlisen d yeɣmisen.
Yeffeɣ-ed deg yennayer 1955. Yerra ɣer taddart-is. Syin yeffeɣ s amadaɣ akken ad yeddu d yemdukal-is n tegrawla. Yuɣal iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lezzayer, yeṭṭef amkan n Biṭaṭ i yellan d ameḥbus. Seg meɣres 1955 ar win n 1956, yessaweḍ Ɛebban ad yesdukel akk imussuten d yikabaren izzayriyen yellan niqal ur ttemsefhamen ara, akken ad ttekkin deg ttṛaḍ n uslelli aɣelnaw. Yumen d tadukli i yessawaḍen. D Abban Ṛemḍan i d-iheggan anejmaε n ṣṣumam anda i heggan lsas i tegrawla n Lezzayer.
Mlalen yergazen d tlawin n tegrawla deg Uzellagen, deg Γuct 1956. 20 n wussan, nutni ttmeslayen ɣef liḥala n tmurt d umennuɣ n izzayriyen mgal amnekcam afṛansis. Dinna i d-ffɣent tektiwin sweyes ar a teddu tegrawla akwd tid iɣef ar a ters Lezzayer n uzekka.
Ɛebban Ṛemdan yemmut di laameṛ-is 37 iseggwasen, yettwanɣa di l'Merruk ass n . Ɛebban Ṛemḍan d netta i d bab n tegrawla, d netta i yessawḍen ad yesbed lsas i tegrawla n Lezzayer maca xedεent yemdukal-is akken xedεen merra agdud akw d tmurt n Lezzayer.

Tamerwant:
Tamerwant (s tefrensist : Merouana) di tdayra n Tmarwant nettat taɣiwant yellan tusi-d zedu n usqammu n twilayt n Tbatent, tabɛad fell-as s wis 40 km, tcawit nettat tutlayt tamezwarut n imezdaɣ-nnes, tcawit lmeɛana-nes ilinten n ifunasen yerni ulli, u tamerwant si taqdimin n tdayrin d dzayer w nettat d tamanaɣt n Belezma d lhadira taɣanawt n belezma.

Kanada:
Kanada () d tamurt d-yezgan degugafa n Temrikt, unagraw Atanltik deg usammar ar Ugaraw Amelwi deg usamar ar ugafa deg ugaraw Atlantik. D tamurt tameqqrant akk tis snat deg umaḍal. 
Akal yettusemman assa Kanada zedghent azal n alef iseggasen ihendiwen. Di tagara n lqern wis 15 bdant ibritaniyen d ifransiyen ttsasen akken ad nadin, syen zeghen deg rrif n unagraw atlanti. Fransa tedja qrib ayen thar deg Fransa tamynut i Britanya deffir ttrad n sebaa iseggasen n 1763.deg 1867, 3 temnadin deg temrikt ugafa tabritanit dduklent akken ad weqment tamurt tafidiralit n 4 temnadin. deg 1867, Nova Scotia d New Brunswick dduklent deg tfidiralit n Kanada... .
Tafidiralit n Kanada s 10 temnadin d 3 akalen ines tesaa aberlman ,ixef n ddula d tagellidt Queen Elizabeth II . d tamurt yesaan snat tutlayin timensabin, taglizit d tefransist.Kanada tettekki deg G8, NATO, akk d Commonwealth of Nations, dFrancophonie, d United Nations.
Azar n wawal.
Awal kanada yekka-d seg tutlayt tayirukwayt n St. Lawrence "kanata", anamek nines "taddart" . deg 1535, imezdagh insaliyen n temdint n Kibik n wassa sqedcen awal agi akken as mlen abrid i Jacques Cartier ar taddart n Stadacona. syen Cartier yughal yesseqdac awal "Kanada" akken ad yemsslay ghef taddart nni d temnadt nni irkelli n Donnacona (ameqran n taddart n Stadacona); mi nessawed 1545, idlisen d tikardiwin tiurufiyin bdan ttsemayen i temnadt akk "Kanada".
seg tazwara n lqern wis 17 d asawen,tamanadt n Fransa tamaynutd yegan rrif n wasif n Saint Lawrence d rrif n timedwa timeqranin negh Geat Lakes semman-as "Kanada", tmanadt bdan ibritaniyen ghef sin, Kanada ufella Upper Canada d Kanada n wadda Lower Canada, armi n usdukkel nsen deg temnadt n kanada Province of Canada deg 1841. deffir n weskar n tkunfidiralin n kanada Confederation deg 1867, isem "Kanada" yettwafren ad yili d isem unsib n tmurt.

Kamal Buɛmara:
“...Tamnaḍt n Sidi Ɛic tewwi tazwart deg umennuγ γef tumast tamaziγt...”, aya d Muḥend Besɛud i t-id-yuran deg udlis-is .
Tama-ya n Bgayet d tidet tefka-d aṭas n yimeγnasen, i yennuγen ama γef uslelli n tmurt-nneγ neγ γef tutlayt tamaziγt. Akken i das-isemma Besɛud “une pépinière du berbérisme” 
Seg wid i d-teğğa temnaḍt-a nezmer ad d-nadder deg uḥric n tussna n tmaziγt Kamal Buɛmara.
Aṭas n medden i yesnen argaz-a ama deg tγuri n yidlisen i d-yura neγ deg yisurag i d-yefka neγ ulamma deg rradyu neγ deg tiliẓri n tmaziγt; maca llan wid i yesteqsayen γef umezruy-is; tameddurt-is d umecwar-is ameγnasan γef tumast-nneγ.
Γef wakka ad neɛreḍ amek ara d-nsuk tiṭ γef yiwen i yefkan lğehd n wallaγ-is i tmentelt tuγdimt γef wacu mmuten aṭas.
Kamal Buɛmara, d yiwen seg yizmawen i d-teğğa temnaḍt n Tmeẓrit i d-yezgan deg tama n umalu n Bgayet. Argaz-a ilul mi tezɛef tegrawla n tmurt-nneγ ass n 25 deg γuct aseggas n 1959. Ikcem γer uγerbaz i tikkelt tamezwarut aseggas n 1965. Sin akkin yerra γer uγerbaz alemmas n Sidi Ɛic. 03 n yiseggasen yekcem tasnawit n Debbih Crif i d-yezgan deg Uqbu. Ayen i yefka d lğehd d tγuri ssawḍen-t ad yawi akayad n lbak deg yunyu 1980, tallit ideg teḥma tefsut n Yimaziγen. 
Mi yekcem γer tesdawit, Mass Buɛmara, yeγra deg tsuddut taγelnawt n tfellaḥt (INA) i d-yezgan deg Lḥerrac (Lezzayer), anda i yeqqim ugar n 05 n yiseggasen s wayes i d-yeffeγ s ugerdas (diplôme) Ajenyur deg tussna n tfellaḥt ( Aḥric n tdamsa).
Tayri-s i tmaziγt, tewwi-t ad yeğğ taγult γef wacu i yefka acḥal d aseggas i wakken ad d-yeḍfer abrid n tussna n tmaziγt. Dγa yella deg yimezwura i ixedmen tazrawt n nnig n turagt deg Tesga n Tutlayt d Yidles n Tmaziγt deg tesdawit n Bgayet s wayes i yesɛa lmajister deg tsekla n tmaziγt aseggas n 1995.
Aseggas n 1996 yewwi-d agerdas n tezrawin talqayin (D.E.A.) deg INALCO, deg tmanaγt n Fransa (Lpari).
Imi leɛtab ur t-id-nettader! Akken i das-yenna umedyaz, Buɛmara iwala dakken leqdic i iga deg tezrawt-is n lmajister ur yemmid ara, ihi iḥettem γef yiman-is ad yernu anadi deg tezrawt i iga akken ad d-yessekfel yiwen n umedyaz ameqqran aqbur n Leqbayel seg tattut Si Lbacir Amellaḥ. D tazrawt n Dukṭura iwumi isemma Littératude et société: le cas de Si Lbachir Amellah (1861-1930), un poète chanteur de Petite Kabylie.
Ma nuγal-d s telqey γer tezrawt-a (la thèse), tella-d γef yiwen n umeddaḥ n Tmurt n Leqbayel i iɛacen deg tallit n unekcum arumi. Mass Buɛmara - γas tuget n wakud ideg yexdem leqdic-a yesɛedda-t deg Tmurt n Leqbayel (Bgayet)- aseqdec n usentel-a i wumi i d-yezga i lmendad Ɛebdellah Bunfur, yella-d deg temdint n Lpari aseggas n 2003. Dγa iwakken ad tt-yebnu d tazrawt, aselmad-a yefka seg tudert-is i uḥric-a n unadi ussnan ugar n 10 n yiseggasen. Γas zrin yiseggasen, yeɛteb wallaγ, terza-d lγella. S leqdic-a yesɛan azal meqqer, amassan Kamel Buɛmara yesnerna-d ixulaf i tsekla tamaziγt; am wakken i yeḥrez aḥric deg-s seg tattut, imi tasekla-ya, tella yerna mazal-itt deg timawit, ur tressi ara iman-is deg tira. Am wakken yefka yakan tudert i wawal n Léopard Sédar Senghor “Yal amγar, yal tamγart ara yemmten, d tamkardit i yettruγen!” D ayen ara yeğğen, s udlis-a n Kamel Buɛmara, amedyaz – acennay Si Lbacir Amellaḥ ad d-ibin, γas ulamma , d iseggasen-aya ur yettwbdar ara, ulac win yuran fell-as; ad d-yeffeγ γer tafat, ad γren fell-as medden, ad d-ğğen awal fell-as i warraw-nsen, ad yaγ amur deg tsekla n tmaziγt, s umata. Mi ara nesfeḍ aγebbar γef yiwet n teγmert seg umezruy-nneγ, amassan-a yuklalen leqder s leqdic-is ussnan, d win ara aγ-yilin d tallelt i tmuγli γer yizri, yebnan γef wawal d timawit, ladγa tallit n unekcum arumi i tegzi akken iwata, abrid ansa i d-nɛedda d wamek ara yili usirem i tikli γer sdat.
Deg tesga n tmaziγt; Mass Buɛmara yesγer aṭas n walmuden : tanfalit, tira, tiẓri n tsekla, tasekla n tmaziγt ...atg.
Ma deg twuriwin i yeṭṭef nezmer ad d-nadder:
D ixef n Tesga n Tutlayt n Tmaziγt seg meγres 2000 armi tuber 2001;
D ixef n Tesga n Tutlayt n Tmaziγt seg meγres 2000 armi tuber 2001;
Mass Buɛmara d bab n umru, tira-s teğğa-d ixulaf deg unnar-a n tussna d tsekla. 
Dγa seg wayen yura ad d-nebder:
Yura-d daγ azal n 04 n tezmilin deg D.B.K Hommes et Femmes de Kabylie, iγef i d-yezga Mass Caker Salem d lmendad.
Deg uḥric n tmedyezt:
Zidan Yasin

Taḥbult n yiṭij γur-s takna:
Yiwet n terbaεt n imussnayyuren n tkebbanit n Nasa, deg-sen kra si tmurt n Legliz, wiyaḍ si tmurt n Lustṛali akk d Marikan dman d akken ufan-d ayen yettaken anzi i wenagraw aniṭij [2 deg yiwen wamkan ibeεden fella-γ s tamudi n 90 iseggasen-tafat. Terbaεt-a n imussnawen tufa-d yiwen umtiweg i tezzin γef yiwen yitri m’iqqaren Epsilon Eridani..
D amtiweg n lgaz, yettak anzi γer Yebter maca yugar-it di taẓẓayt s sin imuren, u γur-s aḥbu [5 d imdeweṛ n 6 iseggasen.
Ufan-t-id imussnawen-agi s yiwen n utiliskup i ssarsen di tmurt n Lustṛali, m’akken i ttanin tafat d-yefka yitri mi qqaren HD70642, iγef yeddewiṛ.
Ma yili yitri yesεa imtiweg d amsaεef, wagi s taẓẓeyt-ines ijebbed-d γur-s itri-ya. Annect-a d ayen yesseknayen neγ yessnarnayen tazla di tikli n yitri deg igenwan, annect-a diγen yedda srid d tewsit n tafat d-yettak yitri-ya.
Ar ass-a, ugar n 100 n imtiwgen igan aḥbu γef yitran, d acu, ttγabent m’ara qqerbent γur-s, itett-iten. Maca, itri-ya yecqan imussnawen-agi-nneγ ur d menwala, acku yettak anzi i yiṭij-nneγ (ad d-nesmekti d akken iṭij s timad-is d itri ameqqran). Itri Epsilon Eridani meẓẓi cwiṭ u semmeḍ diγen cwiṭ γef yiṭij, maca iγelbi-t ddeqs deg usemmud, γur-s 850 imelyan d aseggas (iṭij γur-s 4,6 imelyaṛen iseggasen). Itri-ya yesεa agraw n imtewgen i s-d-yezzin : yiwen umtiweg d ameqqran akk d yiwet n tbagust n istiṛuwiden. Dana Backman d imddukal-is imussnayyuren gren tamawt i wegraw-a n imtewgen, ufan-t d akken iga am unagraw-nneγ aniṭij asmi yella annect-n di lεemṛ-is, d tallit m’akken d-bdant talγiwin timenza n tudert deg akal γef i nteddu. Tazrewt n unagraw-a, d ayen ara yallen imussnayyuren ad ẓren u ad gzun amek d-yenerna unagraw-nneγ aniṭij.

Tasenselkimt:
i laɛḍil( en construction)
1 Aẓar n wawal:.
Awal Tasenselkimt yekka-d seg wawalen sn (science)+ aselkim (ordinateur)Ihi Tasenselkimt d tusna n n uselkim s umata.

Adrar n Brokeback:
Adrar n Brokeback (2005) d’asru tamuggit tangalit yehakkud af sin yergazen i mhamalen g l’Marikan n’utaram gar aseggwas n 1963 d 1983, imir nni ulac ɛad tilleli n Homotuzzuft.

RJ-45:
Amaqqan RJ45 d umaqqan (conecteur)i yes teqnen gar ttawilat n uzeṭṭa asenselkim.

Gaza:
bɣiɣ ad awiɣ isallen n gaza ?? 
ssuqel i sebtar nniḍen ( tu n'as qu'à traduire les auttres pages faites en français ou en arabe, écrivez correctement SVP merci)

Anzar:
Anzar yega yan g-isutar llif tbid tudert n kigan d tmettin, mkan af tga tferɣt d mas tid idefren ɣ umerdukku n inkan n tudert tametit, yat g tmukras llif kkitent ad as anfent. Mkan af skrent kigan d insayen mas aqrant i unzar ad ur ifel akal iqqur izwur d i timjiwicin n uzemz.
Tamacahut.
Zik yella yiwen qqarn-as Anzar. D neta d Agellid n ugeffur. Yebɣa ad yaɣ yiwet teqcict : aggur deg genni, nettat di lqaɛa. Udem-is yettak ticci ; talaba-s d leḥrir amseɛlel.
Taqcict-agi mi ara d tekker tecucuf deg yiwen wasif, aman-is d imzarfen. Akken ara d-isub Ugelid-nni ugeffur ar lqaɛa ɣer teqcict-nni, nettat tettagad, dɣa ad yuɣal. 
Almi d yiwen wass yenna yas:
Terra yas teqcict :
Dɣa yekker fellas Ugellid-nni n waman, yebrem taxatemt tettureɣ. Dɣa yeqqel wasif-nni d aɣerɣar ; Agellid iɣab. Taqcict tuɣwas, rruḥ-is d aman : tettru, tettru. Temmeɣ tekkes talaba-nni n leḥrir, teqqim tɛarit. Tessawal ar igenni :
Dɣa cwit kan akka twala ifeṭiwej d ameqqran, yeqqel Ugellid-nni n lehwa. Iger taqcict-nni g iri-is. Asif-nni yeqqel akken yella ; tzegzew ak tmurt.
Dɣa teqqim d akken tisirit. Ticki yemmeɣ uɣerɣar ad nebder mebla leɛdil Anzar. D aymi tettekkes teqcict ɛaryan ad astini teqcict nnii txilek qquyi iwakken ad ggagh agrud skecmiyi abbouchik gher uheccun iw akid ggagh agrud yetemchabi yak
Ansay :.
Mi ara tnezruref tmurt, d aymi neqqar « aɣurar », ad nejmaɛent tlawin timeqqranin, ad meslayent f teswiɛt g ara weqment Anzar.
Ata yebbded lweqt-nni, ad ffɣent tlawin g tmeqqrant alamma tamezyant ; ad rnun igerdan, ad teddun tɣennin :
Zik sseḥwasent taqcict tilemzit yerna tezyen : tin yebbwden tizi n zzwaj. As qqnent lḥenni, ssdaq n lfeṭa, ad as xedment akw ayen xedmen i teslit. 
Tameṭut ara as-icebbḥen i teslit n wenzar d lqibla n tadart : Tameṭut ḥemmlen-tt akw meden, tin zedigen g fɛayl-is. Ur ilaq ara a tettru, zeɛma ur s tefki ara tislit-nni seg ul yesfan i wenzar. As tefk i teqcict-nni aɣenja d aɛari a teṭef deg fus-is. Lqibla ad-tt-tebbib tislit n wenzar.
Neftat, aɣenja deg-fus-is, ad-t-teqqar :
A tent-tettafar deffir tecdibt i d yesran tjeggajet ; yeɛni akw lɣaci-nni i d yeddan deffir. Kra n timi n wexxam f ara d ɛedi tjeggajt-nni yerna adernun ɣurs, ad teddun qqaren :
Ansi kkan lɣaci-yagi asen d fken awren, aksum, acedluḥ neɣ aqedid, lebsel, zzit, lmelḥ… At wexxam ɣeff ara ɛedin asen id deggren aman ɣef uqqerruy, yerna kkatn ad leḥqen tislit-nni (i) i wwin yidsen. 
Mi wwdent tlawin-nni ar ljameɛ neɣ ar ḥedd iɛessasen, ad sersent tislit-nni. Ad kkrent tlawin ad sebbwent ak ayen i d mmetrent f tbbura : d zzit, d lebsel. Ad ččen ak wid d yeddan ar dinna. Mi fukkn učči ad sirdent tlawin ijqedren dinna. Aman-nni i ss i sardent a ten smirent ar targa.
Sinna tusawent lqibla ad-tt-teṭef tislit-nni, as tekkes ɛaryan akkn tt-id-nteğa yemmas. A tels tajemmaɛt ; zeɛma ifukk lwerq, ifukk wayn id ttağa lqaɛa, dɣa teqqel teswiɛt almi terra imdanen ar tjemmaɛt. Ad tezzi teslit-nni sebɛa tikal i jameɛ ; ad teṭef aɣenja-nni g fus-is, aqerruy-nni ad yezwir ar zdat-is am akkn ara tedleb aman, ad teqqar :
Ff ayagi qqarn-as « tislit n wenzar ».
Ihi tilemzit-agi ara d ibeddn akka ar wenzar, mi d fukk tuzzya n ljameɛ neɣ uɛessas (anda tfetn anzar), as tini :
Tɣennint tlawin leɣna-yagi g ljameɛ mi ara tfakk teslit tuzzya n ljamɛ-nni :
Ad kkrent kra teḥdayin yellan af tizi n zzwaj, nutenti d teslit-nni yekksen ɛaryan, ad urarent zerzari s txennact iferki. Ad nejmaɛent g anda tella luda, dinna g ljameɛ neɣ g lemqam. Ad ṭfent iɛewzan, kul yiwet s yiwn uɛkkaz. Ad ṭfent taryalt iferki, ta a t tekks i ta. Ad idum wurar-nni alama tekcem txennact-nni ar uxemmuj i s heggant. Tislit-nni a tfeqqar :
Mi tekcem teryalt-nni iferki ar uxemmuj, as tini :
Ad as inint teḥdayin-nni yuraren akw yids :
Taxennact iferki i s leɛbent zerzari netlent daxl uxemmuj i s ɣzan yakan weqbel urar. Ad uɣalent tlawin-nni merra ar tadart weqbel ad yeɣli itij. Zemreɣ ad iniɣ belli tekkat ad lehwa kra n wussan deffir ufeten n wenzar.
Ma tura kksen meden Tislit-nni n sseḥ axater yugi yiwen n Sid zik-nni : yugi ad tekkes teqcict ɛaryan. Dɣa tcebbiḥen kan i uɣenja tarrant « d tislit n wenzar ».
Asmi tnaɣn At-Qasi, At-Jennad nutni d Turk, i lweqt-nni i sḥermen yemrabden tukksa ɛaryan teslit n wenzar. Akka i d ḥekkun imezwura neɣ. Akken, llant tudar ikemlen akkenni, llant tudar yugaden deɛwessu. Ad tawi lqibla aɣenja ajdid, as tewqem allen, aqemmuc ; as tcebbeḥ s leḥrir yettemserɣan ; as teqqen tafzimt amm akken taqcict-nni n zik. Mi s tcebbeḥ i wɣenja, ur s qqarn ara aɣenja meɛna Tislit n wenzar. D lqibla ara tt-yawin g tebburt ar tayed alamma d ljameɛ neɣ d lemqam. Ad teddu yids tecdibt tlawin igerdan, tiqcicin. Mi bbdent ar dinna ad sebbwent ayn akw i d jemcent f tebbura, ad ten ak wid-nni yeddan ar dinna. Imir ad urarent teqcicin tilemziyin Zerzari i d nebder ya kan. Weqbel ad yeɣli itij ad uɣalen akw lɣaci ar tadart. 
Mi g-fukk ufetten n wenzar, aɣenja at yeḍem bab-is, ad t-yejmeɛ i wfetten n wenzar kan. Ma d taxennact iferki nettlent daxl uḥemmuj i s ɣzan ya kan weqbel urar.

Ikurdiyen:
asget n wawal amadan, afgan neɣ bnadem.Neqqar daɣen medden.

Aǧeǧǧig:
Aǧeǧǧig
Ah a yegma uǧeǧǧig di lefjer
yecreq yitij f ṣṣifas
ayɣar ɣas yiwen wass kan ig dder
cfan akw medden fellas
ur yessin meskin umgar
armi yekcem ɣer iger
igezmit di tnaṣfas
ɣas yemmut mačči yenger
azekka ar ad yekker gmas
teẓram acḥal d aǧeǧǧig yemɣin
twejda yulin
asmi yebbwed uḥemal
nufa ziɣ kra ibedden ittmal
ur nuki mi g wwet lebraq
tersed tafat seg iggeni
yenhez udrar yeterdeq
s zhir ur ɣiban ansi
d aǧeǧǧig iɣab
yaaraq dayyen iruḥ
awi ẓran sani
ah refdent iṣeggaden n tafat
wid izdeɣn akin i wagu
d imnayen ar at umzur yedda ar tuyat
d lebreq seg fus la ileḥḥu
fkant iwaggur bu lmeryat ger itran irrat
garasen ad yedhu
la ireq deg iggeni nwallat
meskin yuggad at nettu
itran uran ismis di tegnawt
ayyen ur izmir ḥed at yemḥu
ma twallam itri iwmi tzad tafat
ẓerted ttiɣd asefru
ma twallam itriw mi tzad tafat
cfut ttiɣd asefru

Tagitart:
tagitart d yiwen wallal n lmusiqa d yenulfan di tmurt n lhend ...

Louis Braille:
Louis Braille illul-ed ass wis 4 yennayer 1809 yemmut ass 6 n yennayer 1852. 
Yesnulfad agemmay n bray i-seqdacen iderɣalen d wid ur nettwalli ara akken ila akken ad ɣren u ad arun yis-s. Bray qqaren s weslaf n iḍuḍan ɣef isekkilen yettwarun s wenqar n lkaɣeḍ. Assa qrib yal tamesalyt tesɛa agemmay ines n bray d acu kan taqbaylit mazal ur tesɛa ara agemmay ines n bray.
Louis Braille teṭṭef-it tiderɣelt mi yella bab n 3 iseggasen. Asmi yessaweḍ 10 iseggasen yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz ageldan n Paris i yiderɣalen d acu kan tagnit deg uɣerbaz-nni ur temgarad ara f ayen yellan anda nniḍen.
Akken ad iɛiwen iman-is d yiderɣalen deg uɣerbaz yeqdec f tɣara akken ad ɣren u ad arun iderɣalen ula d nutni.
deg 1839 Braille yessufɣed adlis yessefham deg-s amek zemren yemdanen ad arun s tira n bray.

Sakhir larbi:
ẓsakhir larbi est un étudient qui abite dans akbou,est son orgine est:ait lahcen illoula oumalou son age:13ans qui aime boucoup matoub lounés et tout la kabyle,sur tot mon village et aime puis la langue tamazight ,je ramné des bone not en tamazight

Awertilani:
Ccix Lfuḍil Awertilani (S tṛumit : Fodil El Ouartilani) yemmut ur iwala asirem-is wa ad yidir di Lezzayer tilellit. Ulac wid i t-id yemmektin, ɣas akken yefka tudert-is i tmurt-is nnig 30 iseggasen, yettwattun almi d 12 meɣres 1987 i t-id-yemmekti udabu-nneɣ, yerra-d tafekka-ines ar tmurt-is ɣer At Wertilan.
Ccix Lfuḍil Awertilani d yiwen seg wid id d-yefkan aṭas i tmurt-is. I lul ass di taddart n Wanu deg At Wartilan (Sṭif), isem-is n tidet Ḥasanin Lfuḍil. Ikker-d di twacult yeɣran, baba-s yella d amasay n temɛemmert, yelmed leqran d wayen yeqqnen ɣur-s deg taddart-is.
Deg useggas 1922, wwin-tt ad isɛeddi lɛesker, irewwel-asen acḥal n tikkal. Din i yeẓra amgared yellan ger imsulta izzayriyen d wid iṛumeyen.
Sya id-yewwi tikti iwakken ad yili ɣef wudem unekcam arumi. Asmi yekfa lɛesker, ikemmel andi akken ad isegmu tamusni-is, yewwi-d tikti tamaynut i yimezdaɣ n At Wertilan. Tikti-ayi teɣza deg wallaɣ, ur yeḥsib yiwen ama d imḍebren irumiyen neɣ lquyad-nnsen. Ineggura ayi ttnadin fell-as, iruḥ iǧǧa tamnaḍt-is yerra ɣer Qsemṭina deg useggas n 1930.
Mi yewweḍ ɣer din yerra ɣer wanda yella Ben Badis akken ad ikemmel i tmussni-s. Din yebda yettufrar-d am zzit ɣef inelmaden akk yettili, syin akkin yuɣal d amasay ɣef inelmaden-nni. Aseggas n 1932, yeqqel d agensas n weɣmis Ccihab akk d ujemuɛ n yedrimen. D wayi id azal i yesɛa ɣer Ben Badis.
D netta id imceggeɛ-is ɣer tmurt n Leqbayel s isem n teddukli n imusnawen inselmen bac ad ilin ɣer tama-s, issexdam tameslayt n imawlan-is (taqbaylit), ilmend-is xilla id-ikecmen ar teddukli-ayi, ɣef aya yuɣal d aselmad (yettɛawan-it).
Di lawan-nni aṭas n imezdaɣ i irewlen si tmurt ar Fransa, tugett deg-sen ttun tamurt d wayen id-icudden ɣur-s.
Ihi Tadukli n imusnawen inselmen twala ilaq ad ceyɛen win izemren ad ixiḍ acerrig yellan, wa aten-d yerr s abrid. Ɣas akken ẓran yuɛer lḥal aṭas ma wḍen aɛdaw s axxam-is am win yewḍen azrem ar lɣar-is. Ccix Ben Badis yeddem, yessers, yuɣal igzem-itt di ṛṛay-is ; yextar Ccix Lfuḍil awertilani. Acku nenna-d yakan ɣef wazal yesɛa ɣur-s, rnu yessen 03 n tutlayin (tamaziɣt, taɛrabt, tafransist) akk d termit i d-yewwi seg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Di tlemmast n useggas 1936, yerza ar Fransa, tazwara yettemlili, ixeddem isaragen i iminigen (s twafra) s wannect-a i yessaweḍ ad issemlil iminigen n din deg tdukliwin. Yesker-d tazwara 06 n tdukliwin. Taɛekkumt ẓẓay-itt, iɣeblan ugten d ayen ur yezmzir at-yexdem iman-is, iɛedda yuzen-as Ben Badis wid ar t-iɛiwnen wa ad yili d netta i d aqerruy-nsen. Asmi yekcem useggas n 1938 ssawḍen ar 19 n tdukliwin s yisem "EL TEHDIB". 15 di Lpari, 03 di Rennes, yiwet di Marseilles. D ayen i as-d-yeglan s wuguren d udabu aṛumi neɣ d waraw n tmurt-is, ur neqbil ara ad yufrar ger-asen am Messali Lḥaǧ (yuggad ɣef umkan-is ger iminigen) i yessawḍen armi yeccetka fell-as ar Ben Badis. Imi Ben Badis yessen-it amek iga, ur ten-yumin ara. D aya i t-yeǧǧan ad yerwel ar tmurt n Maṣer deg useggas n 1939, yerra ɣer "lǧameɛ El Azher" ansi id-yewwi agerdas.
18 di furar 1944, tella-d tlalit deg Maṣer n yiwen umussu i izdin 03 n tmura (Tunes, Merruk, Lezzayer), iswi-ines ad yesken i wegdud n umaḍan n wayen i iḍerrun deg Tefriqt n Ugafa. Ger n wid i t-id-issekren ad naf Ccix Lfuḍil. Amussu-a yura aṭas n tebṛatin i wegraw n tmura taɛrabin, akken daɣen i yuzen tabratt i wegraw n tmura idduklen deg useggas n 1945 akken aten-id yesmekti belli agdud n Tefriqt n Ugafa yettekkan deg ṭṭraḍ amaḍlan wis sin ar tama n Fransa akken ad awin timunent-nsen ur d yelli ara, tqubl-iten s imenɣeyen am wayen yeḍran di 08 mayyu 1945 di tmurt-nneɣ.
Yerza sin iberdan ar tmurt n Yaman (tettidir uguren ger ugellid akk d ugdud-is). Tirza tamezwarut tella-d akken iwata yeẓra agellid-is akk d ixṣimen-is. Agellid Yeḥya yessuter deg-s as-d-iheyyi ahil n unegmi n tmurt-is di yal iḥricen (tasertit, tadamsa…).
Tirza tis snat yewwi yid-s ahil-nni ɣef wacu ara tebnu tmenḍawt n tmurt n Yaman. Ahil-a qeblen-t akk. Agdud yebɣa ad yili ubeddel s lemɣawla ixsimen-is ufan-tt d tagnit ssekren ccewal llan-d imenɣeyyen i yeglan s tmettant n uglellid Yeḥya ass n 17 di furar 1948. Yuɣal mmi-s deg umekan-is ur yeǧǧi ara ixsimen-is wa yenɣa-t wa yegra-t ɣer lhebs, yerra kullec ɣef Ccix Lfuḍil d netta i d sseba n ccwal yeḍran d tmettent n baba-s. Iceyyee akk i tmura taɛrabin ad t-ṭṭfent, tamurt ara yerr ttagin-as ad yeres yeqqim azal n 06 n wayyuren s ufella n lbabur, almi d aseggas n 1948 i t-yeqbel unebbaḍ n Lubnan s lemeiwna n kra yemdukal-is ad yili din s twafra almi tersa taluft n Lyaman. Ɣas akken, yettaru deg yeɣmisen s yismawen n weyyaḍ ɣef temsalt n tmurt-is, lawan-a yufa ugellid-nni mačči d netta i d sebba n wayen yeḍran di tmurt-is iɛedda isumeḥ-as.
S tirza-ines seg tmurt ar tayeḍ, issaweḍ ad ibeddel tamuɣli n tmura taɛrabin d tenselmin ɣef wayen i d-teqqar Fransa (agdud azzayri yeqbel s unekcam aṛumi) yerra-d deg yiwen n weɣmis "amek ihi i llan-tt tegrawliwin seg Amir Ɛebdlqader (1830-1847), At Sidi Ccix ar Bubeɣla, Lalla Faḍma n Sumer ar tegrawla n Ccix Ameqqran d Ccix Aḥeddad (1871)"
Ass n 10 mayyu 1945 yessuter seg tebratt i iceyyeɛ i Wegraw n tmura idduklen, ad nadin ɣef tidett n wayen yeḍran deg Lezzayer deg ineḍruyen n 08 mayyu 1945. Seg useggas n 1950 yessuget leqdic yerza nnig n 40 n tmura : Surya, Ṭṭurk, Swiss, Biljik, Hulland, Legliz… Yuɣal yerra tamuɣli-ines ar tmura n Asya yerza ar Lhend, Sɛudi, Pakistan, Sirilanka, Anduniz… deg useggas n 1952. Yal tamurt ar iɛeddi, ad imlil d imasayen-nsen, tugett n tmura-nni fkantt-d awal akken ad ɛiwnent Lezzayer bac ad tawi timunent.
Tebda tegrawla ass 01-11-1954, tadukli n imusnawen inselmen ur d tefki ara tamuɣli-ines. Ccix Lfuḍil d netta i yellan d aqerru n tdukli-ayi di Maser, iburk-itt ifka-d taɣuri ass n 02-11-1954 i wegdud ad yili yid-s "i yegrawliwen izzayriyen ass-a d tamettant niɣ d tudert". " Iḍ n 1 n wember 1954, llan-d nnig n 30 ineḍruyen di yal tamnaḍt n tmurt, si tilisa n Tunes ar tilisa n Umerruk, ama di temdint n Lezzayer, Bufarik, deg temdint n Iɛẓẓuzgen d Tizi Wezzu akk d tmurt n Leqbayel, si Buɣni, Delles ar Tubiret, si Burǧ Mnayel ar Tcentirt, llan-d daɣen di Qsenṭina, Tibesekert, di Wawras akk d Tbatnet."
Deg useggas n 1956, tella-d temlilit n 4 n tmura timeqranin di Ssewis (Marikan, Rrus, Legliz, Fransa), yura-asen tabratt inna-asen : "ilaq ad tafem tifrat i temsalt n Lezzayer, ad teǧǧem i wegdud ad yextir d wanwa ara yeddu wa ad tefkem timunent i Lezzayer akken itt-id tefka i tmura nniḍen". Mi yella di Lubnan, yerza ar tmurt n Ṭṭurk (tella deg ugraw n Aṭlasi) anda yessaweḍ ad d-yawi tamurt-a ar tama n tegrawla n tmurt-nneɣ wa ad t-id-ɛiwnen ad t-awi timunent. Yella daɣen deffir n usbeddi n "Ɛmer Uɛemran" d agensas n Lezzayer di tmurt-a.
Lawan-a yeṭṭef-it waṭṭan, imejjayen ssutren deg-s ad yeǧǧ niɣ ad isenqes seg leqdic-is, yugi ad iḥbes niɣ ad isenqes. Ɣur-s d tamurt-is i izwaren tizmert-is, almi d 12 di meɣres 1959 yewweḍ ar leɛfu n Rebbi deg tmurt n Turk.
D way i d Ccix Lfuḍil Awertilani yemmut ur iwala asirem-is wa ad yidir di Lezzayer tilellit. Ulac wid i t-id yemmektin, ɣas akken yefka tudert-is i tmurt-is nnig 30 iseggasen, yettwattun almi d 12 meɣres 1987 i t-id-yemmekti udabu-nneɣ, yerra-d tafekka-ines ar tmurt-is ɣer At Wertilan.
Tukkist seg uγmis Aẓar

Jadu:
Jadu d taddart deg Wedrar n Infusen i dren di-s 170.000 yudan (medden).
Dagi i yellan wemkan d alemmas n imaziɣen di Libya
Ffɣen seg-s irgazen meqquret am:
Tmura n Jadu tusa-d g wammas n Adrar n Yenfusen, d ɣur-es amezruy d ameqran si tisi ammas n tasertit n adrad. Di tagrawla n furar kkren imdanen-ines si imezwaren d fkun ixafuren deffir tilelli. Tagrawla di idemnansen, d tusna di iɣef awnen-nsen. Arannes am izmawen di amennuɣ. 
Di-sent n tattawin n waman udjun nnanas ezzerga d tidi nnan-as nanna tala. Tmura n itermisen taqaburt tus-d af iɣef n weẓru ttasunas s allaɣ n ddunit.
Jadu di-s Mezzu, Yujlin, Talat n Umiran, Ucbari, Iṭermisen, Jjmmari, Timezɣura, Wifat, Regrag, At Inedbas, Igennawen, Tamezda.
Medden n Jadu ɣur-sen azemmur aṭas, tteggun si-s udi am tlussi. D dis trfas.
Yella di Jadu tfaska teggun mi d-tettas tafsut, qqaren-as d "Tamɣra n Tilelli".

Joomla:
Joomla d yiwen CMS yesεan tazmert tameqrant i wakken yiwen ad yesnulfu yiwen usmel Web yelhan. Ama d asmel abestuḥ n yiwen umdan ama d asmel ameqran n yiwet tkebbanit.
Ugar isalen deg usmel http://www.joomla.org/

Wordpress:
Wordpress d yiwen CMS yelhan ma tebγiḍ ad tesnulfuḍ yiwen ublug neγ yiwen usmel. Yeshel maḍi i wakken ad yeddu. 
Ugar isalen deg usmel http://wordpress.org/

CMS:
CMS (Content Management Sytem) d yiwen wahil s wayen yiwen yezmer ad yesnulfu yiwen usmel Internet. S wahil-a, yezmer yiwen ad yedbel asmel-is war ilγi (yettusemma yeshel).
Γef umedya, aqeddac n usmel, ma yebγa ad yernu yiwen umagrad ad yeqqen deg wagrudem n tedbelt (s yisem-is d wawal uεeddi), ad yaru amagrad-nni, ad t-iẓer, dγa ma yehwa-as ad t-yekles. Imiren zemren akk medden ad ẓren amagrad-a deg Internet. S CMS nezmer ad nernu taggayin anda ar ad yilin yimagraden, yal yiwen deg teggayt ines. Daγen, imagraden zemren ad sεun tugniwin (tikwal tugna tif inaw γezzifen) neγ iseγwan (γef yimagraden neγ ismal ay icudden).
Gar CMS, yella Joomla, Spip neγ Wordpress γef umedya.

Firefox:
Firefox d yiwen yiminig γef web ay yellan d aseγẓan ilelli. Yetteddu deg Mac OS X, Windows neγ Linux u yeεjeb-asen xilla i medden.
Firefox extension neγ isiγzaf n Firefox d ihallen tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ i Firefox. Yerna llan aṭas n yisiγzaf.
Dγa, yal yiwen yezmer ad ibeddel Firefox ama d udem-is (sγur yiwen usentel) ama d ihallen ay yernun azal (md. tafeggagt n yifecka, imawalen, tanefilt, atg)
D yiwen wallal s way-s yezmer yiwen ad ibeddel tutlayt n Firefox. Ihi, ma nebγa ula d nekni nezmer ad t-id-nerr s teqbaylit!
Ugar isalen deg useγwen https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/

PHP:
phpPHP (PHP Hypertext Preprocessor) d yiwet tmeslayt n usihel n yiskripten, d ahil ilelli (”Open Source” am Linux neɣ Firefox), yelha i usnulfu n yismal Web ismussanen.
Afaylu PHP yesɛa aseɣzif “php”, amedya “afaylu_php.php”. Seddaw-a, d yiwen umedya n uskript php:
<?php
print (’Azul fell-awen’);
Aselkem n uskript-a deg yiwen uqeddac PHP ad yefk deg yimini ɣef Web:
Azul fell-awen
Ismal imezwura ttwarun s HTML (Hypertext Markup Language), d yiwet tmeslayt n usihel s ticraḍ, amedya:
<html>
<head>
<title>Amedya HTML</title>
</head>
<body>
Aql-aɣ deg umagrad ɣef PHP!!!
</body>
</html>
Afaylu HTML ɣur-s aseɣzif “htm” neɣ “html”, amedya “afaylu_html.htm” akk d “afaylu_html.html” kifkif-iten.
Nezmer ad nesdukkel tangalt html d tengalt php deg yiwen ufaylu, isem n ufaylu-a ilaq ad yesɛu aseɣzif “php”, amedya “afaylu_html_php.php”:
<html>
<head>
<title>Amedya HTML akk d PHP</title>
</head>
<body>
<?php
print (’Azul fell-awen’);
Aql-aɣ deg umagrad ɣef PHP!!!
</body>
</html>
Tura, amur ameqqran n yismal tteddun s PHP (akk d Apache d MySQL), am usmel-a akk d yismal merra ay yetteddun s Wordpress.
Ugar isalen deg usmel http://www.php.net

Lamp akk d Wamp:
LAMP akk d WAMP d awalen n tsenselkimt, inumak-nsen d wi:
LAMP: Linux + Apache + MySQL + PHP
WAMP: Windows + Apache + MySQL + PHP
Ihi, LAMP akk d WAMP d tigrummiwin n yiseɣẓanen, iswi-nsent ad ilint d aqeddac n yismal Web. Ticki yella LAMP deg uselkim s Linux neɣ WAMP deg uselkim s Windows, yezmer yiwen ad yesnulfu yiwen usmel Web, ad t-iẓer u ad t-ibeddel akken i as-yehwa uqbel ad yili deg uẓeṭṭa Internet.
Gar-asen yella EasyPHP (http://www.easyphp.org) i Windows, neɣ XAMPP (http://www.apachefriends.org) i Linux akk d Windows.

MySQL:
MySQL d yiwen unagraw n usefrek n taffa n yisefka tamasɣant.
S unagraw-a, nezmer ad nekles isefka n yiwen wahil sdaxel yiwet taffa. Deg taffa n yisefka, llant tifelwa anda ara yilin yisefka. Deg yiwet tfelwit llan yisefka yedduklen, amedya tafelwit “Udem” tezmer ad tesɛu isefka “Isem”, “Azemz n tlalit”, “Tansa”, atg.
Isem Azemz_n_Tlalit Tansa
Afrux 10/02/2008 1 aɣlad Asigna 00001 Igenni
Adeffu 02/06/2008 5 aɣlad Tibḥirt 00002 Akal
SQL (Structured Query Language) d yiwet tmeslayt n usihel s wayes yezmer yiwen ad yesteqsi yiwet taffa n yisefka. Ma nra ad nessin azemz n tlalit n yiwen isem-is Adeffu deg tfelwit Udem, nezmer ad naru s tutlayt SQL:
select Udem.Azemz_n_Tlalit from Udem where Udem.Isem = ‘Adeffu’;
Ad naf:
Azemz_n_Tlalit
02/06/2008
Iwakken ad nernu yiwen wudem deg tfelwit Udem, nezmer ad naru:
Insert into Udem values (’Tafunast’, ‘12/05/2008′, ‘25 aɣlad Adaynin 00005 Taddart’);
Tafelwit Udem teqqel:
Isem Azemz_n_Tlalit Tansa
Afrux 10/02/2008 1 aɣlad Asigna 00001 Igenni
Adeffu 02/06/2008 5 aɣlad Tibḥirt 00002 Akal
Tafunast 12/05/2008 25 aɣlad Adaynin 00005 Taddart
Akka, taffawin n yisefka, neḥwaj-itent iwakken ad nejmaɛ isefka n yiwen wahil neɣ n yiwen usmel Web sdaxel tifelwa. SQL d yiwet tmeslayt i taffawin n yisefka. MySQL d yiwen unagraw anda llant taffawin n yisefka.
Asmel unṣib : www.mysql.com

Apache:
Apache d aqeddac HTTP, d yiwen useγẓan ilelli n Apache Software Foundation. Aqeddac Web neɣ aqeddac HTTP d yiwen wahil iqebblen isutar HTTP sɣur amsaɣ Web (i.e. iminig ɣef Web), dɣa yettafk tiririyin HTTP, s umata d isebtar Web. Gret tamawt, aselkim anda yella wahil aqeddac Web, ula d netta (aselkim-nni) isem-is aqeddac Web!
Asmel unṣib : http://httpd.apache.org/

GIMP:
GIMP (GNU Image Manipulation Program) d afecku n wunuγ. D aseγẓan ilelli. D ahil i wunuγ, taklut, asider n tugniwin, atg. Γur-s aṭas n yisiγzaf.
Yetteddu deg Linux, Windows akk d Mac Os X.
Asmel unsib : http://www.gimp.org/

GCompris:
GCompris d yiwen useγẓan n usegmi ay yesεan aṭas yiqeddicen i warrac ger 2 d 10 yiseggasen.
Iqeddiccen-is tikwal d iwuraren, maca yalas d usegmisnen. Ad d-tafem iqeddicen deg yiḥricen yetteddun :
GCompris yesεa ugar n 100 yiqeddicen u mazal ar sdat. GCompris d aseγẓan ilelli, ihi tzemreḍ ad t-tbeddleḍ s lebγi-k(m) neγ i usnerni-s, neγ ahat ad asen-t-tefkeḍ i warrac n umaḍal merra.
Ugar isalen deg usmel http://gcompris.net

Arminya:
Tigduda n Arminia neɣ Hayastan s tutlayt tarminit d tamurt idurar d-yezgan ger ill aberkan d yill Caspian.Tesɛa tilisa d Iran, Azerbiǧan,Tturk d Jurjya.
Tewwi azarug ines deg 1991é Tamanaɣt ines d Yerevan .

Elizabeth II:
Tagellidt n Tgelda Yedduklen d Irland Ugafa seg 6 di furar 1952 ar assa.Tlul ass n 21 di ibrir 1926.

Kurdistan:
Kurdistan d tamurt war azarug d-yezgan di Asya ger timura n Tturk, Lɛiraq, Iran d wamur amectuḥ n Surya d Arminya.Tesɛa ger 25 d 30 imlyan n imezdaɣ.
Di Lɛiraq, Kurdistan yesɛa timanit deg tmurt tafidiralit.

Tubiret:
Tubiret , (Fr:Bouira)
Tanebḍit tis 10 di tmurt n Dzayer. Tugett imezdaɣ ines d Leqbayel imi tella tettiki ar twilayt n tmurt n leqbayel neɣ tis 3.
Tiɣiwanin.
Llant quset semmus (45) n te ɣiwanin deg Tubiret :

Burǧ Bu Aɛririǧ:
Burǧ Bu Aɛririǧ d tamdint i-d-yezgan di tmurt n Leqbayel. Zedɣen-tt Leqbayel d waɛraben. 

Jijel:
Tamdint n Jijel, d tamanaɣt n Tawilayt n Jijel, Tesɛa azal n 134839 imezdaɣ (2008). Irumiyyen llan qqarn-as "Djdjelli".

Tamsilet:

Buεfif:
Ussan send Amenzu n Tefsut
Buεfif d yiwet seg leεwayed n tmurt n Leqbayel. Buεfif yettemcabi γer tmeγra n « Halloween » n Irumiyen. Ussan ineggura n tegrest, ad tennulfu yiwet n terbaεt n ilemẓiyen tin ara d-itezzin γef yakk taddart, tawwurt s tewwurt, ur tettağğa ula d yiwen n wexxam.
Anwa i yettilin deg Buεfif :
-Amγar (Abuεfif, Ameryus) win yettlusun aqric,
-Tabuεfift (Tameryust) ad iḥezzmen akk iman-is,
-Aberraḥ
-Wid yekkaten tajewwaqt d ubendayer
-Ilemẓiyen nniḍen
Tarbeεt-a mi ara d-taweḍ γer wemnar n wexxam, aberraḥ ad isuγ :
Aberraḥ : Kker ad yeskker Rebbi seεd-ik !
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin !
Aberraḥ : Ad aken-igg Rebbi am tεeqqayt n ččina, suffela tecbeḥ zdaxel terbeḥ !
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin !
Aberraḥ : Ad aken-igg Rebbi am tqermudin, wa ad-yeddal wa !
Aberraḥ : A d-irr Rebbi lγiyyab bxir weεlaxir !
Aberraḥ : Ad aken-yekkes Rebbi seg lḥif !
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin !
Aberraḥ : Ldi tawwurt ad yeskker Rebbi seεd-ik
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin
Aberraḥ : A k-iḥrez Rebbi arraw-ik !
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin
Aberraḥ : Ad iceεceε Rebbi tafat-ik
Ilmeẓyen : Wamin !!!!
Ilmeẓyen (S ccna) :
Wa Ḥmami Wa Lmami
Ma d tamellalt ad tt-nawi
Attan deffir ukufi
Ad s-sserḥen s tjewaqqt d ubendayer, Ameryus d Tmeryust ad ceṭṭḥen, wiyeḍnin ad kkaten afus. Bab n wexxam a d-yeffeγ, a d-yawi yid-s kra (Timellalin, ččina, idrimen, lbaṭaṭa, acedluḥ…). Umbeεd Ameryus ad yeγli γer lqaεa, zeεma yesker. Ur d-yettaki ara alamma fkan-as ayen i d-yefka bab n wexxam ad t-yesriḥ. Sinakkin ad beddlen axxam nniḍen..

At Maεuc:
Taγiwant n At Maεuc tezga-d deg unẓul n Bgayet. tesεa azal n 28 n tudrin, deg-sent: Lettnayen, Agemmun, Iğissen, Tiwal, At Xyar, Tizext...atg.
At Maεuc tettwassen aṭas s tbexsisin-is.

Asenğaq Asluvini:
Asenğaq n tmurt n Sluvinya ilul-d ass n 2 deg meγres. Zik tamurt-a tella s ddaw n tecḍaṭ n Yuγuslavya
Krad (03) initen (couleurs) skanayen-d Initen ipanslavyen
Tehrew n usenğaq d azgen n teγzi-ynes: 1:2.
Ma yella nekkes-as "l'écu"-nni i usenğaq n Sluvinya, ad yuγal yettemcabi γer win n Rruss, γas ma yella mačči kifkif deg teγzi d tehrew.

Brahim:
Brahim (s tɛebrit אברהם "Abraham") d agraz deg tawrat d leqran. Ɣur Wudayen yella Brahim uday amezwaru. D Isḥaq mmi-s.

Isḥaq:

Harun:

Dulkifl:

Muḥemmed:
Muḥemmed (s taɛrabt محمّد - "Muḥammad") s teɣzi ("محمّد إبن عبد الله", Muḥemmed ibn Ɛebdellah), ɣer inselmen, d imcagaɛ aneggaru n rrebi i d-yewwin ddin n Islam. Ilul di Mekka deg useggwas n 570 ass n 12 deg aggur Rabiɛ al awal (tafsut tamenzut) (20 ɣuct). Yemmut i Temdint deg useggwas n 632.
Ɣer wid yettamnen s yiwen rrebi, Muḥemmed yekfa timceggaɛt i d yebdan s Brahim. i tudert-is, yella yeqqar Leqran (awal-is i d-iceggeɛ rrebi s yiles n Ǧebril) i yemdukkal-is (ṣaḥaba). Leqran yettwaru deg asmi yemmut. Muḥemmed yeğğad daɣen Ssunna, dayen yak i d-yenna neɣ i yexdem.

Abbé Pierre:
Abbé Pierre, neɣ Henri Grouès, ilul ass 5 ɣuct 1912 di Lyon yemmut ass 22 yennayer 2007 di Paris

1464:

Jeanne de France:

Nogent-le-Roi:
Nogent-le-Roi taɣiwant tafransist.
