Akud Amsideg Amaɣradi:
s tfransist Temps universel coordonné (UTC, d'anmekni ǧar taglizit CUT "Coordinated universal time" aked tafransist TUC) amḍan amekran n tmura arranṭ d'abuḍ b akud aɣrim agraɣlan.

Stauffenberg:
Stauffenberg yezmer ad yilli :

Muriṭanya:
Muriṭanya d tamurt n utaram n Tefriqt n Ugafa. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Nwaqcuṭ.

Abunsay:
Amezruy n tẓuri.
Nezmer ad nini, timlilit n wemdan d tbunsayt n ugama teḍra-d deg ugama. D tidet, deg tazwara d agama i d-yurwen 
isekla uɣricen neɣ ayen i umi nettini tabunsayt n ugama. Meqqin isekla-a deg wakal n yidurar neɣ ayen umi neqqar amedɣaɣ.
Iger-asen tamawt wemdan, yufa, gemmunt tbunsayin n ugama deg wakal igellil ur neṣliḥ ara i yemɣan nniḍen s umata.
Acku mi ara yemɣi useklu deg yir akal, seg wakken yenḥaf, iɣerrec, yettxaṣṣa ama deg teɣzi ama deg tehri. 
Tlul-d tẓuri n ubunsay deg tmurt n Ccinwa. Snulfan-tt-id ineḍfaren n ddin acinway. D nitni ay yesduklen imɣan d useklu,
ẓẓan-ten deg uḥabus. Rennun i uḥabu-nni tawennaḍt ay deg ttidiren yemɣan d yisekla am yedɣaɣen d waman...atg 
Iswi n waya akk d aslali n twennaḍt meẓẓiyen n ugama deg yexxamen-nsen. Yeḍra-d waya i tikkelt tamezwarut, 
ɣef wakken d nnan inmezrayen, deg tallit n tgelda n Ihaniyen (les Han). D tagelda yellan seg 2o6 qbel Sidna Ɛisa ar 220 seg
d ilul. Ttbut n waya, Ufan yemnuda aẓekka deg 1971 n ugeldun Zhang Huai yemmuten deg 705. D ageldun yedren deg tallit n 
tgelda Tang (618 ar 907). Ufan deg uẓekka-nni yiwet n tfelwit n teklut icebḥen. Teskan-d tfelwit-nni, sin iqeddacen n 
ugellid, wwin-d ger ifassen-nsen iḥabusen n wakal. Deg iḥabusen-nni, llan yemɣan akked tbunsayin. Maca zwaren-ten s uẓu n 
yemɣan deg uḥabus yiferɛunen. Zik, teẓẓun yiferɛunen imɣan ssexdamen i wucci d tesnajya. Snulfan-d aḥabus ahat i wakken 
ad ttawin yid-sen imɣan-nsen mi ara beddlen amḍiq. Azal n 4000 iseggasen aya seg-mi teẓẓun iferɛunen imɣan deg uḥabus. 
Sakin, ɛanden-ten Yegrikiyen, Yibabiluniyen, Yifarsiyen d Yihendiyen. D amedya n ugama, d beqqu n wemdan ad d-yessemɣi 
aseklu akked teẓgi meẓẓiyen deg wexxam-is i d-yesnulfan taẓuri n ubunsay. Deg tallit-nni macci “Abunsay” i seqqaren, qqaren-as 
icinwiyen : Penjing (pénjǐng 盆景). Abunsay d isem d yekkan seg tutlayt Tajapunit. Deg tgelda n Qin (220 - 581) ay d-yennulfa 
wuẓu n yiwen useklu deg uḥabus. Ibeddel yisem n tẓuri, uɣalen ttinin-as Pansai(pénzāi 盆栽).
Tekcem-d tẓuri n ubunsay i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer tmurt n Japun ger lqern wis XI d wis XII. Wwin-tt-id ineḍfaren n Tbudit, 
tedda-d d unekcum n ddin Abudi ɣer tmurt n Japun. Sakin, tekcem ar tmurt n Kurya. Deg tmurt n Japun i tennarna tẓuri n ubunsay.
Fɣen-d deg tallit-nni sin yedlisen imezwura deg umaḍal yefkan ilugan i wesbunsey n tbunsayt, ssufɣen-d kra iɣaniben .
Ɛeddant tsuta n yinaẓuren, ar assa, yal yiwet deg-sent tewwi-d kra. Yal tasuta terna-as i tẓuri n ubunsay cbaḥa, tefres-as 
ayen ay icemten. Tennerna tẓuri n ubunsay, teḍfer akud am tẓuryin nniḍen deg umaḍal amedya n teklut , tasreɣta ...atg
Teffeɣ-d i tikkelt tamezwarut tẓuri n ubunsay seg tmurt-is Japun, Ccin akked Kurya ɣer umaḍal deg useggas 1909. Deg temzikent 
tagraɣlant ay d yeḍran deg tmanaɣt n tmurt n Legliz, Londre, ay bdan ttissinen yemdanen d acu ay d abunsay.
Assa, ggtent tmura yesɛan iɣerbazen yesselmaden taẓuri-a akked tiyaḍ. Sselmaden tiẓuryin n yiǧuǧǧagen , tid n yisekla imudduren (Abunsay), n yimɣan izegzawen (Ikebana) akked yimɣan ikiwanen (Affar).
Afras n yiẓuran.
Afras n yiẓuran yettili-d s umata yal sin neɣ kraḍ iseggasen, neɣ tikwal mi ara nbeddel aḥabus i tbunsayt-nneɣ.
Tamselyut, Iseddagen & Izdayen Iberraniyen.
Adriraw : - Tasɣunt Timmuzɣa, uṭṭun 16, 17, 19 n wesqamu unnig n timmuzɣa (H.C.A)

Drapeau de la Belgique:
slt sa va moi karim a nador

Brussel:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Biljik.
"Brussel" s tahulandit, "Brüssel" s tamlanit, s teɛrabt "بروكسل"

Rubi:
rubi yan lmosalsal n micsic ila giss 115 n'takayt
argiss itamtal 
barbara mori d edoirdu santmrina

Ḥmed Uyeḥya:
Hmed Uyehya illa d aneɣlaf amezwaru n Tmurt n Dzayer.

Muritanya:
Muritani neɣ muritanya

Entrena:
Entrena tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Zaragoza:
Zaragoza tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Logroño:
Logroño tella d taddart tezga-d g umalu anzul n tmurt n Spanya.

Párvusz:
Párvusz (ilul s yisem n Norbert Kiss, 1 Meɣres 1981) d anaẓur amsuneɣ Ahungri.
Tameddurt.
Yeɣra di Budapest d Szeged. S umata taẓuri n Párvusz tebna ɣef lmidad n Cinwa, tikwal yesseqdac taklut n waman, maca iniyen lsas zgan d aberkan d umellal.
Anaẓur Ahungri Endre Szász d unaẓur Alman M. C. Escher ɣur-sen tazrirt (influence) ɣef tẓuri-ines. Di 2004, yufa-d aɣanib-is (style), imi zik yella yettales kan I tifelwa n sin inaẓuren-nni I d-nebder. Di 2005, yunag ɣer Lapland, sinakkin yuɣal-d ɣer Hungri anda I yebda asuneɣ n kra n tugniwin s izamulen n Saami. Tafelwit-is yufraren di tallit-nni d Saami Mona Lisa, I yenzan di Nurvij. Di 2007 sa (sebεa) n tfelwa I d-yesken deg temsikent Tanurvijit di Tromsø.Di 2009 yefren abrid nniḍen di tẓuri, yebda inneǧǧer deg usɣar.

Monica Vitti:
Monica Vitti, s isem-is n ṣṣaḥ Luisa Maria Ceciarelli, taktrist taṭelyanit tlul ass n di Roma.
Tudert.
Monica Vitti tekcem g Konservator n taẓuri tamugit n Roma (Accademia d'arte drammatica Silvio d'Amico) g useggas n 1953, umbaεd-agi tevda lxedma taktrist-inse g uteatro d tiliẓri. 
Asaru amezwaru-ines, "Le dritte", iffeɣ g 1958.
G iseggasen 1960, turar aṭas d-id umseḍru umeqran Michelangelo Antonioni, surtu-as g usaren "L'avventura", "Di eklips", "Iḍ", niɣ "Aneẓruf azeggaɣ".
Texdem tanit d imseḍruwen imuqranen wiyaḍ, am Pier-Paolo Pasolini niɣ Luis Bunuel.

Huang Xianfan:
Huang Xianfan, yella d anmezray n Ccinwa. ilul-d ass 13 nwember n 1899 g Fusui, yemmut ass n 18 janvier 1982 g Guilin, Guangxi. 
Tameddurt.
Deg usseggwas n 1926, Huang ikcem ɣer tesdawit n Pekin(neγ Beijing) di Ccinwa, alamma d 1935. Huang, ilha-d s amezruy(stôria) d trakalt (géographie). Deg usseggwas n 1935, Huang ikcem ɣer tesdawit n Tokyo di Japon, alamma d 1937. Huang, ilha-d s amezruy d tafelsuft. Deg useggas 1941, Huang yuɣal d aselmad n amezruy di tseddawit n Sun Yatsen. Seg useggas n 1943 armi d aseggas n 1953 iǧǧa aselmed di Guilin, yuɣal ar tesdawit n Guangxi. Seg useggas n 1954 armi d aseggas n 1982 iǧǧa aselmed di Guilin, yuɣal ar tesdawit enseignants n Guangxi.

Tidyanin n Tintin d Milu:
Tidyanin n Tintin d Milu d azwel n yiwen umeseḍfer n tesfifin yettwasunɣen (bande dessinées), i d-yesnulfa umsuneɣ abelǧiki Hergé (1907-1983), isem i d-yexdem imi yetti isekkilen imenza n yisem-is n tilawt (R, G) : Georges Remi.
Amseḍfer-a yettussizreg-d i tikkelt tamenzut ass 10 yennayer 1929 deg “Le Petit Vingtième”, isebtaren i yimecṭaḥ n uɣmis abelǧiki “Le Vingtième Siècle”.

Ṭelyan:
</td></tr>
Ṭelyan, neɣ Iṭalya, neɣ Atayař, neɣ Tagduda Taṭelyant, (es taṭelyant: Repubblica italiana) tezga-d di Turuft (Oṛoppa). Iṭalya tekcem di Tadukli en tmura en Turuft (Tamunt Toṛoppant). Tutlayt tasirant (tunṣibt) ines d-Taṭelyant.
Amezruy.
Tmurt en Ṭelyan tella d-tamurt tameqqṛant deg umezruy en omḍal: d-agi i tulli tamdint en Roma.

Tamεadut n yiqbayliyen:
Tamεadut n yiqbayliyen yiwen addud yeẓ aṭas g tmurt Dzayer. Meεna-s tamεadut n yidles uqbayli, d tutlayt taqbaylit, niɣ n tmurt n iqbayliyen amk tella.
Tamεadut n yiqbayliyen tella usegmi unsib n kra n iwanaken izzayriyen areqqal uzarug n Lezzayer. Akter-as yella gar 1965 i 1980, ddaw leḥkem n udiktator Huwari Bumedien. Gar iseggasen-a, tapolitikt tansibt tella ad-sekked Dzayer am tamurt tajakobinit, ulac g-it umkan i tutalyin d ydlisen i xṭan taεrabt d aεraben.
Addud-agi yewwi i tafsut n Imaziɣen g useggas n 1980, d alama tafsut taberkant n 2001.
Areqqal tilluli n ikebbaren islamasiten g tagara n iseggasen 1980, tamεadut n yiqbayliyen tekcem tanit i umusu apolitiki-agi.

Mark Zuckerberg:
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ilul ass n 14 mayu deg Dobbs Ferry (tamnaḍt n Westcher I d-yezgan deg New York), seg yiwet n twacult tuwdayt tamarikanit, imawlan-is i sin yid-sen d imejjayen, gma-s mazal-it deg tseddawit n Harvard. D asenselkam (informaticien), yerna d aɣella n tkebbanit (chef d’entreprise), d netta daɣen i yeṭṭfen amkan ameqqran deg usmel n Internet n uẓeṭṭa imetti n Facebook.
Σla ḥsab n umsizwer n Forbes 2008 n sεayat timeqqranin n umaḍal, sεaya n Mark Zuckerberg tewweḍ ɣer 1,5 imelyaren idularen. 23 iseggasen deg leεmer-is, yewwi azwel (titre) n ilemẓi amerkanti yakk deg umaḍal.
Imi yella d anelmad deg tesdawit n Havard, tusa-yas-d tikti ad d-yesker yiwen uẓeṭṭa imetti I yinelmaden, dɣa yessihel-d (programmer) deg texxamt-is taseddawit talɣa tamenzut n Facebook, i d-yessuffeɣ deg useggas n 2004. Cciεa yewwi-tt imir-nni yakan ɣur inelmaden n tseddawit, dɣa drus kan akka n wakud sseqdacen-t iɣerbazen nniḍen, send (uqbel) ad d-yeffeɣ i medden irkelli. Deg 2007, Facebook yuɣal d asmel wis-7 ɣer wacu i d-rezzun medden s tuget, dɣa takebbanit tessaweḍ ɣer 15 imelyaren idularen. Mark Zuckerberg ɣur-s 20% deg imuren n tkebbanit.
Σla ḥsab n uɣmis n Wall Street, deg mayu 2009, yiwen imsefti arusi yessumer-d (proposer) 200 imelyan idularen I waken ad yessiweḍ ihri (capital) n tkebbanit ɣer 10 imelyaren idularen, dacu kan yecreḍ ad yesεu amkan deg usqamu n tedbelt (conseil d’administration). Maca Mark Zuckerberg yugi, acku netta yenna ur iqebbel ala isumar ara s-d-yernun deg cciεa i uẓeṭṭa-ines imetti. 
Deg umsizwer n yimdanen i yesεan afud deg umaḍal, i texdem tesɣunt Time deg 2008, yewwi amkan wis-52.

Muzee n Orsay:
Die muzee n Orsay (s tafransist: Musée d'Orsay), Yiwen umuzee yella g temdint n Paris, g tmurt n Fransa.
Aseggas n teldit: 1986
Tajumma: 57 400 m²
G useggas 2007: 3 200 000 irzuwen

External links.
www.musee-orsay.fr

Aẓeṭṭa imetti:
Aẓeṭṭa imetti d taffa n yiferdusen imettiyen am yimdanen neɣ tuddsiwin timettiyin, yettwacudden deg uga-nsen s isɣewnen (iseqnen) i d-yesker usmeskel imetti.
Iẓeḍwan imettiyen zemren ad d-ttwixelqen s biεmada ilmend n usimɣer neɣ usnerni n kra n uẓeṭṭa yellan yakan (tawuri, tadukli). Llan daɣen wasnasen n Internet i d-yettakken afus n tallelt i wakken yiwen ad yezmir ad d-yaf imdukal, amesmu amzenzi, tawuri neɣ ayen nniḍen. annect-a d amahil n srabes n umyuqqen n iẓeḍwan.

Taffa:
Anamek s tefransist
Ensemble

Tuddsa:
Anamek s tefransist : Organisation

Asmeksel:
Anamek s tefransist: échange

Tawuri:
Anamek s tefransist: emploi, fonction, travail

Tadukli:
Anamek s tefransist: amitié, union

Asnas:
Anamek s tefransist: application

Tallelt:
Anamek s teqbaylit: lemεiwna
Anamek s tefransist: aide

Amesmu:
Anamek s tefransist: partenaire

Amzenzi:
Anamek s tefransist: commercial

Srabes n umyuqqen n iẓeḍwan:
Anamek s tefransist: réseautage

Confucius:
Confucius (tacinwat:孔子; pinyin: Kǒng zǐ; Wade-Giles: K'ung-tzu) yella d amessinen n Ccinwa. Ilul-d ass 551BC g Qufu, yemmut ass n 479BC, d founder n Confucianism.

Sidi Sliman:
Ttebyita “zerda” n Sidi Sliman
Yal mi ara inessef waggur n ɣuct, tettili-d ttebyita n lemqam n Sidi Sliman, i d-ttheyyin 2 tudrin Lmecta d At Sellam, i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Iɣrem tama Uqbu. Sidi Sliman, akken i d-qqaren, d yiwen lwali gar lawliya i d-yusan si Fas di tmurt n lmerruk ɣer tmurt n leqbayel. Yedder gar lqern w-16.
Di tirza-nneɣ ɣer dinna, yella-yaɣ-d umeslay d wid i d-iheyyan ttebyita. « Zzerda-agi, nxeddem-itt 2 yiberdan deg useggas ; tamezwarut tettili-d di tefsut, tis snat deg unebdu. Tikelt-a, nezla 9 yezgaren d 25 n yiqelwacen, tugget d sadaqa i d-ttusedqen. » i aɣ-d-yenna Dda Leḥlu Benamara, yiwen n yimḍebbar n At Sellam.
Ma yella d iswi-ines, yal yiwen amek i tt-yettwali ; temxallaf tmuɣli gar yimeqqranen d yimeẓẓyanen. Dda Salaḥ, yiwen n umɣar i yekkin deg ugraw n ddεawi n lxir, yettawli-tt d asfillet ɣer wayen yelhan am wakken i aɣ-t-id-yenna deg wawal-is : « d tagnit n usdukel n ccmel, d useḥbiber ɣef leεwayed iwakken ad d-qqimen ad tent-id-afent tsutwin i d-iteddun. ». Ma d Nna Ferruǧa, yiwet n temẓayert, tenna-k : « zik yeɣli-d llaẓ ɣef medden, dɣa ttgen lwaldin-nneɣ tameɣra-agi iwakken ad ččen s tawant, axi tikelt di tudert-nsen, ula d ameksa d umuḍin ttaǧǧan-asen amur-nsen. » Ma yella d ilmeẓyen, tezzi tmuɣli-nsen ɣer tullas kan : « di ttebyita kan i nettwali zzin uffir yeffren deg yixxamen, d tagnit n zzwaǧ, d acu kan ad tmuqleḍ kan s wallen, lehdur d ? interdit alamma yenɣel seksu. » i d-yenna Sliman seg taddart Lmecta.
Leqdic d wamek i d-yettili
Ar ass-a, leqdic deg ttebyita n Sidi Sliman, mazal yettili-d s wallalen d iqburen, d ayen i d-irennun di ccbaḥa-s. Amek ?
Di 2009, ad naf asewwi mazal-it ɣef yisɣaren. Ddurt uqbel ad taweḍ tmeɣra ; d imezdaɣ n tudrin-agi ay yettruḥun i uzdam n yisɣaren. « Times n tqecrin n ubelluḍ trennu-d lbenna i ṭṭεam i ntett di Sidi Sliman », i aɣ-d-tenna Nna Messaεd, yiwet n temḍebbert ɣef tneftalin n seksu. Maca, ayen uɣur tezzi lwelha s waṭas d tifeḍniwin ideg sewwayen lmerqa, ttwaxedment s nneḥḥas. Γef waya, yenna Dda Rabiɛ : « akka i asent-id-cfiɣ, yenna-k baba di ddula n uterki i tent-id-uɣen. »
Ttebyita n Sidi Sliman ur tettεedday ara kan akka mebla ẓẓdiḥ. Ad yifsus yiḍ ɣef yiqeddacen yessewwayen alamma yuli wass, ɣef yimẓuyar yettεawazen yid-sen. Tteksen jjiq s ccḍeḥ, d ucewwiq !

Amunen:
“Amounen” amud n tullisin
“Amounen”, d yiwen n wamud n tullisin i d-yura Mass Ait Slimane Hamid, i d-yeffɣen deg waggur n meɣres yezrin sɣur tizrigin Oasis des artistes di tmurt n Fransa. Deg wamud-agi, Hamid s tira-s yesrezfaɣ seg tullist ɣer tayeḍ ɣer yixef n umdan, akken ad yessentu tayri deg yimdanen merra. Ad naf taqṣit n yilemẓi, iḥeḍren i uɣḍal n lḥerma n yiwet n tlemẓit deg uzal qayli, d ayen ara izerεen deg wul-is rrihban meqqren. Ad nerzu ɣef tmurt n lxali, s sebba n yimezdaɣen-is i yemsengaren gar-asen almi kra yellan din, yuɣal d asafer. Ad teḥyu tmurt-agi s yifaden n tayri akked d imeṭṭi n tmeṭṭut. Syin, ad aɣ-yessemlil d Racid akked Mirḍa yemmiḥmalen s ttawil n lantirnet almi d ass ideg adabu n tmurt yekkes allal-agi. Mass Hamid Ait Slimane, ad aɣ-yawi ɣer yiseggasen yeẓrin, akken ad aɣ-d-yemmeslay ɣef yicennayen igrawliyen am Slimane Azem akked Ahmed Saber ihuzen ixef-is asmi i t-yuɣ lḥal deg temdint n Mestɣanem. “Amounen” d tamacahut n yiwen n llufan i d-yesserwal baba-s akked d yemma-s seg yir tawenza i t-yeggunin di teɣremt n yirabiten i d yettbanen d ljennet uqbel ad tekfel tidet. Deg tullist-nniḍen ad nissin tadyant n yimdanen i iɣunfan tafekka-nsen, almi i tt-ḍeqqren akkin, acku d agdud wer aẓar wer timadit ! “Timursaḍ” d yiwet n tullist i d-yettmeslayen ɣef lxuf zdat tmeṭṭut i d-yewwin tuttra lqayen : « ayen ẓẓur i d-yeɣlin ɣef tullas, amek ara tidir tayri deg liḥala yecban ta ? » Ad yekfu udlis s tlata n teqṣiḍin tiwezzlanin, i d-yemmalen azal n tayri yellan d afud yettawin amdan ɣer yixef-is. Am wakken i d-tenna Massa Clo Valerie yeggan tazwart i udlis-agi : « deg wamud-agi n tullisin yura Mass Ait Slimane Hamid, seg wawal amezwaru almi d uneggaru, ala tayri akked d telqay n tidmi i d-nettmagar, kra yuran d asiwel i leḥmala gar yimdanen merra deg umaḍal. »

Tamedyazt d twaract-is:
“Tamedyazt d twaract-is” d ammud i d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin Aframed, deg useggas 2009, i d-yura Ḥmed Lala.
« Asefru bdiɣ-t d aleqqaq,
llmeɣ-d d arqaq,…,
ttleɣ-t jemɛeɣ-t d inzan. »
Asewzer-a, d tisukkest deg tmedyazt i yura Ḥmed Lala. Ur yuḥwağ yiwen ad isiɣzef awal akken ad yefhem acu yellan daxel-is. Ta i d ṭṭbiɛa n umedyaz. Ur yeḥmil asuget n wawal.
Ḥmed Lala, ilul deg waggur n yulyu, aseggas 1967, d mmi-s n taddart Tiwririn, yezgan deg tɣiwant Ifnayen. Yeqdec aṭas deg tdukliwin. Ayen akk yesla, d wayen akk yeɣra ama s teqbaylit ama s tefransist, yenğer-as-d abrid ɣer usefru.
Ammud “Tamedyazt d twaract-is” yebḍa ɣef tlata yiḥricen. Aḥric amezwaru yeɛna tamedyazt. Ma d wiyaḍ bḍan ɣef yinzan d temseɛraq. Isental iɣef i d-yessefra Ḥmed ggten. Seg beṭṭu yerra ɣer tdukli ; seg tayri ɣer yir tagmatt, … Deg tira yeffi-d tamedyazt s uɣanib d amaynut. Tin yefkan azal meqqer i lɛaddat tiqbayliyin akked ugama s umata (ulli, ṭṭbiɛa, asuki, argul, tirrugza, zzit, …)
Deg uḥric yeɛnan tamedyazt, yefti armi d usebter 54. Ḥmed Lala ileqqem-d awal fessus, yeshel i twaṭṭfa yerna-yas-d kra n useḍs. Yura-d tijmilin akken i d-yerna ɣef ccbaḥa n tayri :
« Teğğa-kem-d s lqedd,
D wallen cbant lhend. » 
Syin yuɣal ɣer lecɣal i d-yezzin. Am wučči, lɛaddat, lqerḥ, lferḥ, … akken i d-yura ɣef leɛtab n lmal. Am tyaziṭ :
« Xas d yennanyer,
Tayaziṭ tbekker
Teẓẓul lefjer. »
Neɣ ɣef yimɣan :
« Asmi yesɛa uqerquc lğar
yeɣli-d deg wayyur n sebɛa.
Azezzu yedda-d d inebgi
D aqeffaf s wafriwen. »
Ḥmed ur yettu ad d-yessefru ɣef tnekriwin d yimenkaren :
Uzzlen yidammen yilemẓi
Yewwi-d la démocratie. (tuber 88) »
Gezmen aseklu s ucaqur
Nnan-d yettarra-d tili. (Matub) »
Γef uḥric yizlan, yes-sen amedyaz yerba-d izlan ɣer yizlan. Yebɣa ad d-yerr lɛaddat n zik, anda medden sefrayen, ttmeslayen s lemɛun :
« Aɛrus d ufekrun ɣef tmezduɣt heddren ;
Lqeḍ azemmur qbel uẓerzur ;
Rray ma yebḍa ɣef sin, ansa i s-d-tekkiḍ mačči syin. »
Ḥmed yezdeɣ deg tzeqqa asnulfu. Γas akken yenna deg yizli : « Yebɣa ad iferfer am lbaz, s wafriwen warẓaẓ ». Netta ixemmem yufeg s lecɣal s wafriwen n lbaz, akken ad d-yefk tiktiwin s tament n tzizwa. Yuzen-d tilufa s tektiwin timaynutin i tɣawsiwin tiqburin neɣ timiranin.
Akken daɣen i d-isellek kra wawalen seg tatut. Wid yebdan ttɣiben acku ur ten-nesseqdac ara aṭas. Gar-asen llan (cetfu/ccah, herwet/zleɛbeḍ, uɛqim/yettwaɣ…)
Deg wammud “tamedyazt d twaract-is”, nwala Ḥmed ur icuḥ ara deg usnulfu. Ayen akk sway iḥulfa, yesnufa-d fell-as. Iṭerreẓ-as-d awal i d-yurwen tamedyazt neɣ inzan.

Takelsertit:
Takelsertit (géopolitique) d tussna ay yeqqaren γef wassaγen gar tmura/akal ed nnfeε ay yellan deg-sen(t) akked tsertit, am wakk-n ay teqqar γef wassaγen gar Yiwunak (Ddulat) ed temsizzelt gar-asen akk-n yal yiwen deg-sen ad yaweḍ γer nnfeε-nnes deg kra n tama n umaḍal.
Azday aberrani: [http://takelsertit.pbworks.com/]

Tunes (tamaneɣt):
Tunes tamaneɣt d tamaneɣt, d temdint tameqrant, n tmurt n Tunes.

Ɛiraq:
Ɛiraq d yiwet n tmurt tella g Asya, tamaneɣt ines Beɣdad.

Anagraw n wammud:
Anagraw n wammud ( tazegzilt (abréviation) N.A) (Fr : système d'exploitation SE ), (s teglizit Operating System OS), d'tagrumma n w'ahilen ig sselḥun acermad (appareil) asenselkim.
A mazray (historique).
deg seggasen n 1940, iselkimen(ordinateurs,computers) ttwasihlen(programmer) s weseqdec n teqfilt (interruptuer à bascule), kra i seggasen mbeɛd sseqdecen tikarḍiwin i nezmer ad nɣer s weselkim.
Iselkimen des iseggasen 1940 ɣer 1960 swan "tafunast d yellis"(ɣlay it), anagir ti rmisin(entreprises) timeqqranin iten yesseqdacen, yerna m yal amseqdac sbededen as akud n leqdic(limiter le temps d'utilisation)
Akf'asihel (multiprogrammation).
akf'asihel d'awal id yussan deg sin w'awalen (akfud=multiplication , asihel = programmation).
Tamselyut.
A nagraw n w'ammud s te Fransist

Ɛmer At Zzay:
Aɛmar At Zay, deg yisem-ines di tzuri Amar Ezzaḥi. Illul ass amenzu n yennayer 1941 di tama n Alam b Udi ( Aṣqif n Ṭmana- Tizi Wezzu). Netta d amedyaz, d acennay n senf n Caɛbi s tutlayt taɛrabt taγerfant. 
Seg mi i yesla i Bujemɛa Lɛenqis deg usegwas n 60, iḥemmel caɛbi. Di 1963 yamlal akw d Ccix Laḥlu uk d Muḥemmed Brahimi (umi qqaren Ccix Qbayli). Irgazen aggi fkan-as afus n talelet (lemɛawna) s leqṣidat, arnan-as lewṣayat γaf amek ig laq ad-ten yeccnu. 
Yiwan ufenan igarzen umi qqaren Qeddur Bactubǧi yattiki di tarbaɛt n uẓawan (orchestre) n Aεmar Ezzahi ituɣzi n 15 isegwasen , yebda axxudim yides deg 1964.
Tasfift-ines tamenzut tafɣed deg usegwas n1968. Tasfift aggi isema-yas "Ya Ǧaḥel leshab (a win yettun laḥbabis) ak d "Ya lɛdra" (a tucbiḥt). Tizlatin timenza deg 45t ines. 
Azawan akw d imeslayen n tesfifin yaggi sγur Maḥbub Bati.
Di 1971 issufɣed tlata n 45t. Deg usegwas n 1976, yesufγed sin n 33t.
Yasɛa tlata n tezlatin di radio, rabɛa di tilizri. Yesɛa daγen yiwet n tkassit (K7) id yefγen di 1982 (Ya Rab leɛbad - A yilu n meden).
Tura yesuli (yeḥbes) di ccna. Urɛad yeskaray kra n temγriwin di twacculin.

Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin:
Muḥend At Lḥusin ilul ger 1830 d 1840 di texliǧt At Ḥmed n taddart n Taqqa, di lɛarc At-Yaḥya. Axerrub At-lḥusin deg-s tlata
yexxamen : At-Belqasem, At-Ɛmara, At-Ɛisa, Ccix wwexxam At-Belqasem.
Baba-s d Muḥend Lɛarbi At-Lḥusin, Yemma-s d Lalla Malḥa Tabuzeḥrirt wwexxam n Sidi Mḥemmed u ɛali si taddart n Buzeḥrir deg At Frawsen.
Yesɛa tlata yessetma-s. Yiwet ladɣa mechuret d Lalla Faḍma ; yugar-iṭ Ccix di laɛmer ; tuɣ Mweqran n At Ɛmara si Ɛadni. 
Tayeḍ d Faṭima, tuɣ ṭaher At-Belqasem. Tayeḍ d Aɛwica, tuɣ argaz n At Ɛmara.
Asmi yella Muḥend d aqcic yella d ameksa, am neṭṭa am-marrac n lweqt-enni. Qqaren; mi yeksa alamma t-tameddit, a-d-yerkebɣef yiwen deg-gezgaren nni ikess.
Tamselyut.
Inna-Yas Ccix Muhend; Mulud Mɛemmri

Aderyis:
Yal mi ara d-taweḍ tefsut,leqbayel si zik-nsen ttmagaren-tt s lferḥ .Ass amezwaru n tefsut neɣ ‘’ amenzu n rbiε ‘’d ass n tmeɣra di akk tamiwin n tmurt.Tuget skaren deg-s imensi ɣef demma,llan daγen wid itteffγen d igrawen γer yigran akken ad ẓren agama zegzawen,yettwareqmen s yijeǧǧigen yefsan.
Tama n At Weɣlis,am nettat am waṭas n yimukan di lǧiha n Summam,imezdaɣ–is ttmagaren tafsut s ucɣal n yimensi iwumi qqaren ADERYIS.Aderyis,d isem n yiwet n teḥcict i d-yettemɣayen di lexla.Imenza ḥekkun-d fell-as dakken deg-s dwa d waṭas n lmenfiεa i tezmert n wemdan.Γef waya,tteggen s yes-s imensi ideg ara ččen akk wat uxxam.Ladɣa yal mi ara d-taweḍ tagara n furar,meḥsub di ddurt akk tamezwarut n wagur n meγres,ad tafeḍ imezdaɣ akken ma llan ttḥerkilen wa deffir n wa akken ad sfuglen ‘’amenzu n rbiε ‘’.Wid izemmren,ttruḥun γer lexla,akken ad awin iẓuran n teḥcict-a i d-yettemɣayen di lbur aked ikeḍran ;llan daɣ wid i yesmenyafen ad tt-id-aɣen di leswaq i d-iqerben,yecban ssuq n Sidi Σic.
Tameddit n wass,tulawin yuɣ–itent lḥal fetlent seksu,heyyant-d leḥwal yecban : lbaṭaṭa,llubya,ibawen aked lḥemmeẓ .Ad sfurent kullec γef tikelt deg useksut yersen ɣef teccuyt irekkmen,daxel-is iẓuran n uderyis aked tmellalin.
Lawan n yimensi,ad d-nnejmaεen akk wat uxxam ɣer terbuyt yeččuren d ameqful ifuren s uderyis.Yal wa ad yaγ deg-s tiremt-is,ad yernu ad yečč ayen i t-id-isaḥen seg tmellalin.
At zik,smenyafen dakken mi ara yečč yiwen imensi-nni,ur ites ara aman.Aya ttwessin fell-as,iwakken aderyis yellan d dwa,ad d-yeǧǧ seḥḥa deg wid akk i yeččan.S wakka ansay ad iεeddi di talwit d lisser aked tezmert.Ttiεad ar umenzu n tefsut ara d-yezzin.

Mhenni n Wizgan:
Mḥenni, di tidett Mḥenni At Waɛmiruc, illul ass n 3 dujember 1938 deg Wizgan. Mhenni yesεeda temẓi-s deg taddart-is At Wizgan, i d-yezgan 65 km ɣef usamer n Tizi Wezzu. Asmi yesεa 8 yiseggasen, yekcem ɣer ulmud amenzu deg uɣerbaz n tlata iwmi sawalen tura At Yexlef.
Aseggas n 1952, yunag ɣer Fransa, tamdint n Marseille akked jeddi-is akken ad ikemmel almud-ines, rnu yelmed lḥirfa n uḥeddad neɣ alsaq n wuzal (soudeur).
Asmi i d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt deg useggas n 54, tendeh tnekra n Lezzayer. Lɛesker n tmurt n Fransa ttnadin ɣef Mhenni yellan iqeddec lawan-nni mgal-nsen. Ur sawḍen ara ad t-id-ṭṭfen, yuɣal ɣer wansa i d-yekka, ɣer temdint n Marseille aseggas n 1955.
Din kan, yekcem deg umenuɣ meqqren ɣer yidis n watmaten-is yellan deg la fédération de France n FLN aseggas n 1957. Ula deg temdint n Marseille ur yemniε ara, ttnadin fell-as iɣallen n laman n tmurt n Fransa, tettunefk fell-as ad yerwel ɣer tmaneɣt n Fransa Lpari, s lekwaɣeḍ ur nseḥḥa ara. Dinna, yekcem ɣer terbaεt tanaẓurt n FLN i iqedcen s tuffra deg leqhawi akked deg yibisṭruten izzayriyen. Gar inaẓuren-agi, ad d-naf Ccix Misum, Ḥnifa, Abcic Belɛid, Akli Yeḥyaten, Yusef Abjawi, atg. Tarbaɛt-a tqeddec aṭas ɣef tegrewla n Lezzayer, ad sakin win yellan yeṭṭes, sfaqen win yellan yeɣfel s ccnawi-nsen d tceqqufin-nsen n umezgun, xas akken tegget fell-asen lεessa d leḥris. Mhenni yesekles sdis (6) n tezlatin i d-yettεeddayen lawan-nni deg radyu n Fransa gar-asent tamaεzuzt n wul-iw, ay aberrani , ay abeḥri.
Asmi i d-yusa ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer deg useggas n 1963 akken ad yesteεfu kra wussan, yemlal d Colonnel Muḥend Ulḥaj i as-yennan : « dagi ara-teqqimḍ i tmurt n Lezzayer nesεa Radyu. » Mhenni yeqbel tiɣimit di tmurt-is. Syen Muḥand Ulḥaj iwessa Muḥemmed Ḥilmi, yenna-as « Γurek aqcic-agi, awi-t yid-k ɣer rradyu. » Deg lawan-nni, Mhenni yesεa 24 yiseggasen kan di leεmer-is. Dinna radyu tessekcem-d inaẓuren ixedmen s waggur, ideg llant trebbaε n uẓawan d trebbaε n umezgun ideg yekki Mhenni. Ticeqqufin n umezgun ttεeddint-d yal ddurt. Taceqquft ideg d-yurrar i tikelt tamezwarut d tin iwumi qqaren “Amezruy n umeɣras”. Aseggas n 1964 , Mhenni iεedda comédien profissionnel s wudem unsib.
Aseggas n 67, yesεa tadwilt iwumi qqaren “Leεyub n ddunit” iḥemmlen aṭas imsefliden deg lawan-nni, rnu ixeddem ticeqqufin n umezgun s ccnawi akked les Sketchs s wazal-nsen. Yelḥa-d amecwar almi d taggara n useggas n 79. Deg umecwar-agi i d-yewwi yegla-d s tlalit n yiwet n tizlit mucaεen aṭas deg yiseggasen n 70 “Zejiga”. Mhenni yeqdec aṭas ɣer yidis n yinaẓuren meqqren gar-asen Muḥemmed Ḥilmi, Saɛid Ḥilmi, Ben Muḥemmed, Muḥemmed Ben Ḥanafi, Acruf Idir, Anissa, Ǧamila, Newwara d wiyaḍ i yesulin deg ccan n radyu n teqbaylit.
Amenuɣ i yuεren d win n yiseggasen 70 ɣef temsalt n tmaziɣt, lawan ideg yeqwa lḥers, tuggdin tezdeɣ ulawen n yimdanen, fuden merra maca ulac anda ara d-swen. Maca Mhenni, Ben Muḥemmed d wiyaḍ rẓan asalu, bran i tuggdin, qublen tagnitt ɣas aken tuεer aṭas, mεawanen taεkemt ẓẓayen almi tuɣal fessuset. Mhenni akked yimdukal-is i d-yeswejden amennuɣ n 80 (tafsut n yimaziɣen). Llan teddun ɣef tesdawiyin akked tesnawiyin, cennun i yinelmaden, senεaten-asen-d ticeqqufin n umezgun, swayes i ten-sakayen ɣef temsalt n tmaziɣt. Tikti agi tekka-d sɣur Mulud Mɛemri, asmi i yenna i Mhenni: « atan arrac-nneɣ ad ten-awin, ɣurwet i d-yegra leslaḥ a Mhenni, ilaq ad sen-tecnum. » Deg yimiren yerna-asen tabɣest, qeddcen nnig tezmert-nsen. Dɣa, din Mhenni yexdem tizlit iwmi yeqqar “tcekreḍ-iyi jeddi-k” akken ad d-yessefhem i tarwa belli sεan lejdud. Tallit-nni, daɣen, tadwilt n “Iɣennayen n uzekka” i d-sewjaden yal ddurt Crif Xeddam d Acruf Idir, texdem ccɣel-is, sakin aṭas n yilmeẓyen. Rnu tasuqqelt n umezgun “tawrirt yettwattun” di radyu.
Aseggas n 1998, Mhenni yeffeɣ-d lantrit. Yeqqim akken almi d asmi i d-tlul tiliẓri n tmaziɣt (amaṭṭaf w-4). Dɣa, yessawel-as-d Sid Ali Nat Qasi akked Muḥemmed Manesri akken ad yurar deg usaru “yak nniɣ-ak!”

Madeleine Allain:
Soeur Madeleine Allain (1915-2002)
S teɣzi n 50 d aseggas, Sœur Madeleine, ur teǧǧi amḍiq deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Adrar yettak-itt i wayeḍ, taddart terna-tt i tayeḍ deg uzaɣar n Sumam. Anda tekka ad d-teǧǧ later, akken daɣen ansa i d-tekka yettaǧǧa-d deg-s later.
Sebɛa n yiseggasen i yezrin segmi i aɣ-teǧǧa, Sœur Maddeleine, tamdakelt-nneɣ talsawit. Tensa ass n 7 ctenber 2002 di sbiṭar deg Lpari. Sœur Madeleine Allain, yelli-s n La Bretagne, tlul ass 08 meɣres aseggas 1915 di Morbihan. Mi tekfa leqraya-s, terza-d deg useggas 1939 ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer. Cwiṭ cwiṭ, tettsennid-d ɣer yidles azzayri, tlemmed ayen tezmer, tesselmad ayen tezmer. Terna kra, tuɣ isem n Sœur de Louis de Vincennes. Ur tessaɣzef ara taswiɛt, tefka amḍiq deg wul-is i yidles amaziɣ, akken daɣen ula d imaziɣen ldin-as-d, gren-as-d iɣallen. Seg useggas 1940 armi d 1970, tezdi, terna tekki ɣer uheyyi n tesɣunt F.D.B. (Fichiers Documentation Berbère) ɣer yidis n Jean-Marie Dallet.
Mi tedder kra tallit gar lxalat n tudrin n Leqbayel, teẓra amek nḥafent, teddem rray ad teldi aɣsur amaziɣ n uselmed i teḥdayin (Centre d’Etudes Berbères Feminins, C.E.B.F). Tebda-tt deg taddart Waɣzzen deg temnaḍt n At Mengellat, umbeɛd taẓ ɣer Tizi Wezzu, akken ɣer taggara ad d-taf amḍiq di Larebɛa Nat Iraten. Sœur Madeleine, seg tid iḥemlen idles. Anagar i tebda tettaɣ aẓar deg tudrin d yidurar n Leqbayel, tebda tlemmed tutlayt taqbaylit. Γer useggas 1949, tesɛedda terbeḥ akayad n tutlayt tamaziɣt, mi zrin 2 yiseggasen, tekka-ten deg Tunes, tuɣal-d tesɛedda terbeḥ aselkin (le Diplôme) n tutlayt tamaziɣt deg la Faculté n Lezzayer tamaneɣt.
Mi d-tuɣal ɣer uxeddim, teslul-d yiwet n terbaɛt ideg kkint lxalat d tifransiyin akked lxalat tiqbayliyin, tid i tessendah ɣer ulqaḍ d tira n yisefra, tamedyazt, timucuha d lɛadat tiqbayliyin. Imar yakan Sœur Madeleine, twala lexsara ara d-tesseggri lɛada timawit ma ur sen-nettwalleh ɣer uḥraz-nsent s tira.
Amagrad amezwaru tura-t ɣef lɛadat n Leqbayel, deg useggas 1947. Nnig n yimagraden i tura deg tesɣunt F.D.B, terna tessufeɣ-d sin n yedlisen ɣef yilugan n tira n tmaziɣt. Akken daɣen i d-tesnulfa, nettat akked Sœur Lucienne Brousse, timsirin i uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt yuɣen isem Tizi Wuccen, i d-yesiẓreg Salem Caker deg useggas 2000.
Γer yiseggasen imezwura n temrawt 1970, terza-d ɣer Bgayet, anda tettkellef s lecɣal n udawi. Hah d aselmed n tiyiti n tsegnatin, hah d aswilleh ɣef waman, … Ulac win ur tt-id-yemyagren ula d tikelt teṭṭef abrid s tazzla, ɣef uḍar, seg temdint armi d uxxam-is deg lḥuma Iḥeddaden. Tuɣal taqbaylit gar teqbayliyin. « Yefka-yas Rebbi lhiba. Ayen tesɛa tebḍa-t d wid i as-yezzin. Mi ara tleḥḥu deg yiberdan n temdint Bgayet, anda tekka qrib 20 yiseggasen, ur tferqeḍ gar-as d teqbaylit. » D tameṭṭut mm sser yekmel.
Sœur Madeleine, seg tid yusmen, seg tid i d-yečča wul-nsent akken ad d-skeflent idles, ur izedder deg tattut. Tcemmer ɣef yiɣallen-is, tebda anadi ɣef yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt.
Seg teḥdayt ɣer tmeṭṭut, seg umɣar ɣer temɣart, tettḥawac-d ayen tezmer d lɛadat d yimeslayen n tmaziɣt, wid i d-tettarra d imagraden neɣ d tiktabin.
Ass 30 meɣres aseggas 1995, ɣef tmeɣra n umulli w-50 n INALCO, tettunefk tazalɣi (medaille) n yiseɣ i Sœur Madeleine, ɣef leqdic akk teqdec ɣef tmaziɣt.
Tekka qrib aseggas deg sbiṭar di Lpari, uqbel ad tt-id-yeɛnan lajel, ad tens ass n 7 ctenber 2002.
Ayen tessarem, tura-t deg tebratt i tura, ass n 27 dujember 1993 : « Riɣ, a win yufan, akken i d-yerna wass, taqbaylit ad tuɣal d alag n tarwa-s, mačči d iberraniyen ara yarun fell-as. »
Ayen akk i d-teseẓreg s teqbaylit :
Kra n lemtul (1946) ;
Aqcic yumnen yella Rebbi di mkul mkan (1946) ;
Tajmaɛt (1946) ;
Tamɛayt n bu yedmim (1948) ;
Zzwaǧ di tmurt n Leqbayel (1960) ;
Aselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt (1960) ;
Adeqqi deg At Smaɛil-Ǧerǧer (1971).
Mohand Ait Ighil

Tira:
Tira yussa-d deg wemyag aru, tella ugar n 5300 iseggasen aya.
tira d anagraw n webeggen n tutlayt.

Tameẓla:
Tameẓla (Tinglizt: logic, Tagrigt: λόγος (logos)) anamek ines: tussna d tigzi talsant.

Planoise:
Planoise d taddart deg wanẓul-agmuḍ n Fransa. 20700 yemdanen zedɣen deg-s (aseggas : 1999).

2009:

Bubaghla saɛid:
boubayla sa3id d cahid ilul di tmurt n laqbayel.

Ǧanet:
Ǧanet d amda d tamdint tagejdant n unẓul n tmurt n Dzayer di twilayt n Ilizi, tezga‑d ɣef 2300km ɣer Dzayer tamanaɣt di tlmmast n saḥra ur nebẹɛid ɣef tllisa n Libya.
Amda-agi zedɣan‑t itargiyen n Kel Aǧǧer. 
Ǧanet d tamanaɣt n Tasili, ɣur‑s aγref s uẓi 15 000 imezdaɣ.

Tuksitant:
Tuksitant. Iles n ok, taranit.
Agafataram n Katalunya, Anẓul n Fransa, Agafataram d unz'ul n It'alya, Munaku.
D uns'ib ak iles nned'ni: Agafataram n Katalunya.
D uns'ib: Agafataram d unẓul n It'alya.
Ur zza-yes sqaren-ca: Anẓul n Fransa.
Tuksitant tebda tett'ef ixef-nnes deg uwettay alemmas n wadday. Tedwel d iles n lidara d tussna deg Uksitanya. Qqimen-anegh-d id'risen uran s iles-a zi lqern 11, 12, d 13, iwwed' ad yili d amesnawi d ameqran n tmesna. Maca, zi lqer 13 tsawentt, di marra awettay alemmas, Fransa tebda th'ewwas marra tamurt, tafransist tebda tghellab di tmesna d tesnilsit.
Twaggent tzemmar h'uma ad h'yan iles, ktar ak tlalil wiss sin taseklant n ummussu uksitan n lqern 20, id-as-yucan ccan i yiles, igg-as amkan di temyawad't, tamezyida d tuffgha taz'rigant. Âawed, isâan iles a ghar-es tili tan'dat-nnes tasmagnut, immersen x wawalen umi qqaren iles n Oc , maca iselh'en i marra ilsan uksittanen.
Iles agaskun n Tafrawt n Aran, id-yusin di Katalunya qqaren-as taranit. Aẓayer n Katalunya iqqim iticc-as ccan ar 1990, wami tedwel d tunṣibt ak tkattalantt d tkasttiyant.
Si zik (di 1882) ira ssexdamen deg-es aryaghed uksittan iâedlen, s uyenni, tettwah'sab tudes ar tuksittant, tugha ila bdan ssexdament di temezyida (di 1884). Id'a, taranit ssexdament di lidara, d tghuri, ghar-es cway n umkan di imassen n temyawad't. tettarin zzay-es tasekla. Abeddel alsawan imsaren di Uksittanya tafransist ur ilqif Tafrawt n Aran, mani ig iqqim iles iddar, ghar-es inni ix-as iddafaâen. Waxxa amya, taranit âad ur tejhid att'as. Aghelleb n tkasttiyantt d tkattalantt issexdamen di temezyida, isnen iwdan ad ssiwlen, issumumi-tt zdat n tumanin am unetleâ d umsaray.

Tugna:
signifie en berbère: Tableau
synonyme : tawgiṭ

Tanzeggit:
Tanzeggit d aḥric ameqran ger yeḥricen n tusnakt, d win ig zerwen (etudie) tiwellatin neɣ Udemawen (figures) deg tallunin (espaces) s myal aseggiw (dimension), deg seggiw krad(3) nezmar ad nemmeslay ɣef te nzeggit tuklidit (géométrie euclidienne).
Ass-a ur nezmir ad'd nebeggen tilisa yellan ger tenzeggit akk d wesebrurez(analyse) neɣ d w'aljiber (algèbre), acku ur nezmir ad nemmeslay ɣef tenzeggit taljibrit (géométrie algébrique) ma yella ur'd neddim ara kra din kra da.
Iḥricen imeqranen n tenzeggit.
Tanzeggit tebḍa ɣef aṭas yeḥricen ar ad'd bedreɣ deg ḍris aki, s war tasuḍna (sans l'ordre):
Amezruy n tenzeggit.
Tanzeggit d aḥric

Asebrurez:
A sebrurez d'a mur a meqran ger i muren n tusnakt 

Aljiber:
Aljiber neɣ Aljiber d amur ger imuren n tusnakt ig zerwen s tugett tiskiwin tiljibriyin (structures algébriques), am tefekka deg Aljiber (corps en algèbre).
Aẓar n wawal.
D awal id yussan deg tutlayt n taɛrabt el-ǧabr(الجبر), 
Amezruy.
Deg teglest (à l'antiquité).
Aljiber yettwa seqdec yakan deg akud n iferɛunen, snen ad'd affen tifrat i temesmatt (équation) s yiwet neɣ snat n tefesniwin.
Amaḍal n waɛraben akk d yenselmen.
Aljiber yekk'd deg taɛrabt al-ǧabr, yuqal "algebra" s telatinit, anamek is yezzi ugar ɣer Asdakkel(la reunion) n iceqqfan, neɣ tuqqna (la connexion). Akken daɣen ig wwi inumak(sens) nniḍen deg tutlayin nniḍen.
D'awal ig llan ger wawalen imezwura i sqedcen s tutlayt taɛrabt, adlis id yessufeɣ Xuwarzmi isemma-y-as al-ǧabr wa el mouqabalah, izrew dges aṭṭas n tenzeggit , i wumi ass agi leqdic ines nessemlal it ugar ɣer tenzeggit taljibrit.
Yiwet tikkelt Leonard de Pise i win mi qqaren Fibonacci yerza ɣer tefriqt n ugafa, ira(aimer) amek ttarun izwilen deg tama agi n wemaḍal, deg imir yesseqdac izwilen akini, yerna yewwiten id ɣer Turuft.

Nonglard:
Taghiwant n tmurt n Fransa. n leεibad issezdghen.
Tarakalt.
Taghhiwant thussad tama Sillingy, Poisy, Lovagny, Vaulx.
Thebεed ghef Annecy 10 kms.

Ti ɣiwanin n Bgayet:
Deg temnaḍt n Bgayet llant 52 d taɣiwant

Ti ɣiwanin n Tizi Wezzu:

Suq Ufella:
Suq Ufella s terumit (FR:Souk-ufella), d taɣiwant id yussant deg temnaṭṭ n Leqbayel, deg tewilayet n Bgayet, deg lɛerc n At Weɣlis.
Tajumma(superficie) n teɣiwant n Suq Ufella tesakkal'd azal n 13 820 m², anida llan 10 600 d amezduɣ.
Suq Ufella d taɣiwant n mraw(10) tudrin .
Tarakalt.
Suq ufella tezga-d deg tlemmast n lɛerc n At Weɣlis

Tawrirt n Buɛli:
Tawrirt n Buɛli tira tarumit (Fr:Taourirt n Bouali) neɣ Tawrirt n Suq Ufella, tesɛa azal n wagim (1 000) d amezduɣ. Ass-aki tezga-d d tis uqus (4) deg teɣiwant, id yezgan deg usamer n lɛerc n At Weɣlis.
Aẓar n wawal.
Tawrirt n Buɛli neɣ Taourirt n Bouali.
Tawrirt yusa-d deg wemkan arakal n taddart (situation géographique du village) s tefransist (Coline).
Buɛli neɣ Bouali Muqel Amezruy n Taddart.
Irdumed n taddart (les activités du village).
Ger Irmuden i leḥḥun deg taddart, ad naff deg sen" Tidukla tadelsant tanaddalt n Tawrirt n Buɛli Suq Ufella" ("FR: association culturelle et sportive Taourirt n Bouali Souk-Oufella"), Tidukla-aki tefka-d tamuɣli-ines tamezwarut deg iseggasen 90, d'acu tebbi-d yides aṭas n yegna ittyerran temdel tabburt-is zik.
Deg akud ɣer wayeḍ tidukla tɛaweded talalait ger 2005 akk d 2006, s terbaɛt nniḍen id iqesden ad tesselḥun akken iwata lḥal. Ass aki tidukla aki tqeddec deg aṭas yeḥricen gar-asen :
Amezruy.
Taddart n tewrirt tettusemma ger tudrin timecṭaḥ n lɛerc n At Weɣlis, Asmi id tekcem Fransa, Tawrirt tesɛa azal n warim(20) ye xxamen , tebeddu deg tama ufella s "Nnig ixxamen"(ass-a d'amkan anda ttaǧǧan wat taddart tikeryas-nsen) ɣer "Amessaḍ" (ass-a yuɣal d talemmast n taddart) deg tama n wadda. Daɣen deg "Tebburt n Weḥfir" seg tama d tayeffust ɣer "wezrug" deg tama taẓelmaṭt.
Zik taddart tezzid akk s tebbura, aberrani ur yezmir ad tyezger deg tlemmast anagir ma yella yusa-d ɣer taddart neɣ d inebgi.
Buɛli, izmer ad yili d amdan a menzu id yussan ɣer taddart, nezmer ad nini belli d amdan amenzu neɣ d amdan amenzu yetwasnen deg taddart acku ar ass-a tella yiwet tala ddaw wexxam n M"uḥend Akli Umusa" rrif bbin n "tburrebt" ass-a yuɣal d ayla n "Lewnis At Wejɛud", itin mi semman Tala n Buɛli.
Tarakalt.
Tawrirt tesɛa tilisa d waṭṭas n tudrin, tama ufella ad naf taddart Iɛeyyaḍen (Ayaten), tama ta yeffust ad naf Tilwaqaḍi (Tiliouacadi) ...
Iderman.
At Wejɛud (At Wejaoud).
At Wejɛud d adrum ameqran n taddart yesɛa azal n carit (30) ye xxamen, adrum-aki yebḍa ɣef krad (3) nneqmat (nom de famille) deg tira Tafransist gar-asen Adjed, Djaouani akk d Djaou.
ass-aki tawacult Adjed d nutni id yegran aṭṭas deg we drum acku tawacult Djaou udren akk ɣer ma d Djaouani akk d Adjed aṭṭas daɣen ig udren ɣer , dacu aṭṭas ig qqimen deg taddart.
At Ḥemmic (fr:At Hemmiche).
At Ḥemmic d adrum wis sin meqren deg taddart yesɛa azal n warim (20) yexxamen, adrum aki yebḍa ɣef sin nneqmat deg tira Tafransist garasen ad naf Hamadi akk d Hamlaoui, adrum n At Musa (mouzaoui) d'adrum ig zedwen ɣur-sen, ass aki at ḥemmic akk d wat musa uɣalen d yiwen wedrum.
At Belɛid (fr:At Belaaid).
At Belɛid d adrum ig sɛan azal n mraw semmus (15) yexxamen, daɣen yebḍa ɣef krad nneqmat grasen ad naf Belazouz, Aouchiche akk d Belbahi. At Weḥmaduc d'a drum i win mi ssawalen sebḥi, izdew ɣer wedrum n at belɛid, ass aki i uqqus (4) d yiwen wedrum.
At Musa (At Moussa).
Adrum n At Musa d win ittawin isem n mouzaoui, deg taddart llan azal n mraw (10) yexxamen
At Ḥemd uqasi (fr:At Hemd oukaci).
Adrum n At Ḥemd uqasi d'adrum yettawin nnekwa neɣ immer n Kesri akk d Kisri, amgarad-aki ger sin ismawen yusa-d deg leɣlaḍ deg tira
At Weɛmiruc (fr:At Weamirouche).
Ariouate d immer n wedrum n At Weɛmiruc 
At Umenṣur (fr:At Oumensour).
Messar d Menadi d imeriwen id yesbadun adrum n at Umenṣur, akken id nufa deg temucuha n taddart, qqaren-d belli d nutni i d imenza ig zedɣen taddart uma ɣas ass aki ger iderman ibesṭaḥ n taddart.
At Tewwati (fr:At touazi).
Touazi d immer n wedrum n at Ttewwati, ass-a deg taddart drus yid-sen ,zik d adrum meqqren deg taddart, acku udren (ṣubben) akk ɣer teferka nsen nnig w'Assif n Sumam , xelqen'd taddart nnig n Tqriett i tin m i nsemma At Twati. 
At Sidi Ḥmed (fr:At Sidi Ahmed).
Ayoub
At Weḥmaduc (fr:At Wehmadouche).
Sebhi

Awrir:
Awrir (FR:Aourir) d'taddart deg Asqif n Ṭmana

Tutlayt:
Tutlayt neɣ tameslayt

Baǧu:
Baǧu (FR: Badjou) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Suq Ufella

Berquq:

Iɛebdunen:
Iɛebdunen (FR: Iabdounen) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Suq Ufella
Iderman.
Schlüsseldienst Koblenz

Iɛeyyaḍen:
Iɛeyyaḍen (FR: Ayaten) d taddart deg tɣiwant n Suq Ufella
Iderman.
At tmerɛit.
adrum aki yesɛa krad (3) y'imriwen: "Tamart, Tamedjari, Tamedrari"
at Ḥemma.
a drum aki yesɛa sin y'imriwen: "Hamza, Hamzaoui"
At Rabaḥ.
Adrum aki yesɛa yiwen y'imer: "Raaf"
At Sɛada.
adrum yesɛa yiwen y'imer: "Sadou"
Iɛellucen.
adrum aki yesɛa seddis (6) y'imriwen: "Allam, Allab, Alkama, Allad, Zyankhudja, Chaibi"

Taqeryet:

Tasga:
Tasga (FR: Tasga) d taddart deg Suq Ufella

Tilwaqaḍi:
Tilwaqaḍi (FR: Tiliouacadi) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Suq Ufella

Zunṭar:
Zunṭar (FR: Zountar) d taddart deg Suq Ufella, tezga-d zdat taddart n Taqeryet g twilayt n Bgayet
Tarakalt.
wef

At Weɣlis:
At Weɣlis (FR : Ait Weghlis ) d lɛerc i d-yekkan tama n wedrar n wekfadu 
Azar n w'awal.
Amezruy n lɛerc n at Weɣlis ibedd ɣef kard(3) n tmucuha, llant snat sɛant yiwen n uẓeɣzen ameẓli deg umezruy (raisonnement logique en histoire), yiwet teqqen ɣer Ulysse, tayeḍ teqqen ɣer we kyis, qqaren-d belli s ya i d-yussa n wawal n weɣlis.
Timucuha aki nesebrurz it-ent deg ḥric n umezruy.
A mezruy.
Ta macahutt n Ukyis.
At Weɣlis twasnen s tḥerci-nsen deg teqbaylit "kles" anamek ines "cfu, ḥdeqq"" ("enregistrer s trumit)

At Wemɛuc:
At Wemɛuc (s tmaziɣt : ; s taɛrabt : ) d taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel, tezga deg tawilayt n Bgayet. 
Taɣiwant agi, tezga ar aḍar n udrar Actug. Armud agejdan n tamnaṭ agi, d tafellaḥt (iɣelmiyen, imaɣaḍen dɣa kra n izegrawen). Yerna, tettwassen aṭas s tbexsisin is akkw d zzit uzemmur.
Tudrin.
Isemawen idiganen, d igmamen.
Menɣir Truna, adeg-aɣella ines, taɣiwant n At Wemɛuc tessuddes s tidiganin agi : Bwikni, Tizeɣt, Agemmun, At Waɛmar, Tawrirt, Tiwal, Iɣil Watu, Iɣelden, Ǧebla Kelaɛ, Akur, Tagnit Iɣil, Bubrek, Iɛmaren, Ibudraɛn, Ibaɛzizen, Mzita, Laɛzib U Aɛlwac, Iǧedaren, Amegrud, Awrir, Tiksarin, Taɛzibt, Tala Tinzar, Laɛzib Sidi Sadeq, Iɣzer Ubelluṭ d At Buǧellah.
Tafellaḥt.
Tamnaṭ tettwassen i taɣara n tbexsisin ikkawen n At Wemɛuc. Ilaq yiwen attekki, di 1986, ar timzikkent n Cherbourg iwakken tabexsist n tamnaṭ nni at rmes asteɛṛef n imuzzag dɣa terbeḥed arraz amezzwaru deg umsazwar n timzikkent.. Amssifeḍ Tamzali issifeḍ afaris agi alama d taggara n iseggwasen sḍiset n tmerwin (60), deg 14 timura n Turuft. Tajumma n aqrib 1000ha yeḥeṛṛ ala i usfulleḥ asnudran n tabexsist ikkawen, ammad amseggas yeskazal ar 9000 iqenṭaṛen

Adekkar:
Adekkar d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt 13.495 n yimezdaɣen.

Akfadu (taɣiwant):

Aqbu:
Aqbu
Aqbu d taɣiwant deg twilayt n Bgayet, d tamdint tisnat deg wayen ɛnan imzdaɣ akw d lqima-ines deg tamnat-ines. 
Tarakalt.
Aqvu tezga-d deg azaɣar n Summam ufella, deg tamurt n leqvayel. tilisas ḥudent-ed seg ugafa taɣiwant n Iwzellagen, seg umalu s Asif n Summam, it idi ḥazen ɣef taɣiwant n Umalu, seg wenẓul s Asif Aɛebbas, it idi ḥazen ɣef At Rzin, seg anẓul-amalu s taɣiwant n Tazmalt, seg ugafa-amalu s tiɣiwanin n Iɣrem ed Icellaḍen.

At Rzin:
At Rzin

Di tɣiwant n Wat Rzin ad naf Ginduz, Tiɣlt Umeggal, Bucekfa, Wiẓran, Genzet, Tawrirt Uɛebla, Awrir Jdida, Tizi Uɛelwan, Handis, At Sliman , Icuqar, Iwegranen, Iccu, Tizi Tegrart.

Ta ɣiwant n At Smaîl:
At Smaɛil

Aweqqas:
Aweqqas d yiwet taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel i-d yezgan ar 15 km seg weɣrem n Bgayet, tesɛa azal n 15,989 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 

Iqsilen:
Iqsilen d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n twilayt n Bgayet, tezga-d ɣef yiri n yilel, deg Tmurt n Leqbayel, teqqen ɣer tdayṛa n Udekkar. Zedɣen-tt 4.586 n yimezdaɣen.

Buḥemza:
Buḥemza d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt 10.846 n yimezdaɣen.

At Bujlil:
Buǧelil

Buxlifa:
Buxlifa (Fr : Bukhlifa)

Cemmini:
Cemmini ( Fr: Chemini). Taɣiwant n Cemmini tezga-d deg lɛerc n At Weɣlis

Icellaḍen:
Cellaṭa (Fr: Chelata )

Iderginen:
Dergina neɣ Iderginen ( Fr: Derguina) d taɣiwant di tmurt n Leqbayel. Tela tamudi n 14.146 imezdaɣ deg useggas n 2008. 

Draɛ Lqayed:
Draɛ Lgayed d yiwet tɣiwany i yegber tawilayt n Bgayet, d taɣiwant i tebɛen ɣer usun n Xerraṭa, tezga-d deg unẓul- asammar n ugezdu n Bgayet, tamnaḍt-a d taqenṭart gar snat n twilayin : Bgayet akked Sṭif, tebɛed ɣef tlemmast n ugezdu n Bgayet s wazal n 70 km, d tamenaḍt i yellan wessiεet tajumma-ines ad taweḍ ɣer 120,16 km2.
Tarakalt.
 Seg tama n ugafa tesɛa tilisa akked tɣiwant n Xerraṭa
 Seg tama n unẓul ad naf taɣiwant n Σin Rwa.
 Seg tama n usammar ad naf taɣiwant n Wed lbared akked Tizi n Beccar.
 Seg tama n umalu tesɛa tilisa akked temnaḍt n Mawklan anked Beni
Qbila.
Tadimugrafit.
Taɣiwant n Draɛ Lgayed tegber aṭas n yimezdaɣ ɛla ḥsab n tddadant ixedmen deg useggas n 2014 amḍan-nsen yeweḍ ɣer 29779 n yimezdaɣ, amḍan n yimdanen i yesɛan deg leɛmer-nsen ddaw n 6 yiseggasen yeweḍ ɣer 2362 n yimezdaɣ, wid yesɛan deg leɛmer-nsen
Yerna, gar 16 ɣer 59 n yiseggasen yeweḍ ɣer 20639 n yimdanen, ma d wid yesɛan seg 60 n yiseggasen d asawen ad naf azal n 1786 n yimdanen.
Tudrin.
Taɣiwant n Draɛ Lgayed tegber aṭas n tudrin yemxalafen; ad nebder gar-asent: taddart n Sidi Buğri, taddart n At Nṣer, ad naf daɣen taddart n Snadla, tella dɣen taddart n Leḥrayec, Dradra,At Faḍel, Buzugla, Berzax (adeg-aɣella), Taqliɛat, Ajjiwen, Azaɣar, At Saɛda, Deba, At Belqasem, Drawat,

Tawrirt n Yiɣil:
Tawrirt n Yiɣil ( Fr: Taourirt Ighil), d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n twilayt n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt 7.083 n yimezdaɣen.

Tazmalt:
Tazmalt ( Fr: Tazmalt)
Tazmalt (s tifinaɣ "ⵜⴰⵣⵎⴰⵍⵜ"; s taɛrabt ; ) d tamdint d tɣiwant di Twilayt n Bgayet tezga-d ɣef 80 km wenẓul-amalu n tmanaɣt (Bgayet).
A mezruy.
Zik yella yisem n Tazmalt d "Tazerraǧt".
Tudrin.
Di tɣiwant n Tezmalt ad naff Tineswin ivehlal, Iḍriqen, Ruḍa, Ḥiruc, Ixerban, Lvir leqṣar, Mzerzur, Iciqer, Tazrivt, Ivejuten Ufella (taghzut- Ukil), At lyutna (taghzut- Uyehya), Allaɣen, Laɛzib Sidi Ɛli, Timetḍit, Tasergant, Bubalwi, Tigwnatin, At Sidi Ɛmer, Tavɛalt, At Muḥend Weɛli. 
Ma yella d tid yezgan di temdint: Taddart Ufella, Taddart g-wadda, La cité, Merlot (1,2 ak d 3),Tiwririn ,"4 chemins", Ssaɛa, Lfilaǧ, Axxam Yerɣan.

Tiban:
Ḍiban neɣ Tiban ( Fr: Tibane)

Ticci:
Tici ( Fr: Tichy) d taɣiwant n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt 14.350 n yimezdaɣen.

Tifra:
Tifra ( "Fr: Tifra") d taɣiwant n twilayt n Bgayet, zedɣen-tt 8.547 n yimezdaɣen.
Asideg.
Tifra tezga-d g wammas n twilayt n Bgayet deg ul n Tmurt Leqbayel.

Timeẓrit (Bgayet):
Timeẓrit ( Fr: Timezrit)
A mezruy.
Timezrit/ At Yemmel tezga-d deg Asif Asemmam(Soummam). Tilisa: Sidi Ayad seg Umalu, Ifnayen-Ilmaten seg Ugafa, Semaun(Iznagen) akk d w At Jellil seg Usammar, Imessisen seg Unzul.

Tizi n Berber:

Xerraṭṭa:
Xerraṭṭa ( Fr: Kherrata)

Aɣrib (taɣiwant):
Aɣṛib, s tifinaɣ , d taddart n Tmurt Taqbaylit, adeg-aɣella n tɣiwant s isem amsari deg tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu, tella ar deg ugafa-agmuḍ n Tizi Uzzu, ar deg unẓul-amalu n Aẓeffun dɣa ar deg ugafa-amalu n Iɛeẓẓugen.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant tella deg ugafa-agmuḍ n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu. 
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Aɣṛib tesɛa 21 tudrin :
Amezruy.
Deg tasehrest taṛumit, Taddart n Iɣriben tedda deg taɣiwant tamasayt n Sabaw-Aɛlayan ayɣef Iɛeẓẓugen id adeg-aɣella.

Amecras:

Aqbil:
Aqbil neɣ At Weqbil d taɣiwant deg twilayt n Tizi Wezzu deg tdayra n ]Uṣqif n Ṭmana. Deg 2008, tesɛa azal n 8898 imezdaɣen. 

Ibudraren:

Ti ɣiwanin n Tubiret:
Tiɣiwanin n Tubiret
ass-a tawilayt n Tubiret tesɛa quset-semmus (45) n taɣiwant. 

Aqerru (taɣiwant):

At Bu Yusef:
At Bu Yusef, s tifinaɣ , d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Isem n tɣiwant d win n yiwen lεeṛc n Tmurt Taqbaylit.
Tamaḍlarut.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n At Bu Yusef tesɛa 9 tudrin :
Tatupunymit.
Anamek n isem-is : « imadaren n Yusef ».
Tadamsa.
Taddart n Werǧa tesfulleḥ ttjuṛ n igumma (tineqlin, tireḍlimin, tifiras, tigusimin, tifeṛṛanin) d tidal timeẓliyin ɣas ma anezwu yeqseḥ deg tagrest.

At Bumahdi:

At Buɛadu:
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n At Buɛadu tella deg unẓul n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.

At Cafaɛ:
At Cafaɛ d taɣiwant n Tizi Wezzu, zedɣen-tt 3.865 n yimezdaɣen.

At Ɛisa Mimun:

At Ɛisi:

At Maḥmud:
At Maḥmud ( Fr: Ait Mahmoud) d yiwet n Tγiwant n tmurt n leqvayel di temdint n Tizi Wezzu, i yellan 20 km anẓul-ugmuḍ n Tizi Wezzu, aγella-amḍiq iness d tadart n Tagemmunt Azzuz.

At Tudert:

At Smaɛil:

Taɣiwant n At Smaɛil tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.

At Umalu:

At Xellili:

At Yeḥya Musa:
At Yeḥya Musa (isem-is aqdim Wed Ksari) d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg unẓul-amalu n Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar deg unẓul-agmuḍ n Zzayer.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n At Yeḥya Musa tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi-Uzzu.

At Yeǧǧer:
At Yeǧǧaṛ, D taɣiwant id yezgan di tama n wekfadu, deg-wusammar n Tizi Wezzu, tamurt n leqbayel, aɛlayet azal n 1000 n lmitrat.
Tamaḍlarut.

ourrad damamou

Amalu:
Amalu d taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel, tezga deg tawilayt n Bgayet, deg Iɣzer n Summam. Taɣiwant tḥesseb 8 602 imezdaɣen deg uddun n 2008.
Asideg (timella).
17 tudrin : 
Amezruy n isem.
Isem Amalu yusad seg uẓar amaziɣ ML, anamek ines : « abeṛdi ur yesɛan ara aṭas iṭij », « abeṛdi n tili anda adfel yetqqim ugar n ibeṛdiyen nniḍen »

Ta ɣiwant n Ɛin Lḥemmam:
Ɛin Lḥemmam (Fr: Ain El Hammam ) , Michelet asmi i tella Fransa
A mezruy.
Ɛin Lḥemmam d isem i yefka udabu n Lezzayer i temdint n Micli seg mi teffe Fransa. Weqbel 1962 Amdiq agi isem-is Michelet neg Micli (micyi). Fransa tebna tamdint agi aseggas n 1881. Zik d ssuq n ttlata At Mengellat. Yezga-d deg wakal n At sidi Ssid

Buɣni:
Buɣni, (Boghni s tṛumit, s tifinaɣ ), d taɣiwant n tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu, di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar azal n deg unẓul-amalu n Tizi Uzzu, ar deg umalu n Iwaḍiyen dɣa ar deg ugmuḍ n Draɛ Lmizan.
Amezruy.
Tihawt taṭerkit
1515-1830
Agadir aqbur aṭerki. Ar 6 km n tiẓgi n Tineglin.
Isem azwaran :Burǧ-Buɣni
Tihawt taṛumit
1830 - 1962 
Taddart tamecṭuḥt n Tamurt Taqbaylit yettwaẓẓun deg waḍar n Ǧerǧer, taɣiwant tamasayt n Draɛ Lmizan tettweleq deg useggwas 1876 deg ugezdu n Zzayer asun n Palestru.
Tuɣaled d taɣiwant n alaɣmu acuṛan, attili tettweqqen deg useggwas 1958 ar ugezdu amaynu n Tizi Uzzu
Tarakalt.
Taɣiwant n Buɣni tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu. Tettweyezzi aka :
Tudrin.
Tasureft n tamdint n Buɣni, taɣiwant tesɛa, deg usnulfu ines deg useggwas 1984, 26 timdinin nniḍen :
Tadamsa.
Taɣiwant tesɛa ɣef akal-is taneɣraft n imra d ifarisen iɣurbizen, tineɣrafin n tissitin war iɣisem, taneɣraft n chewing-gum, daɣen tineɣrafin n igargucen, n ccikula, n ticulliḍin, n timedwazin, n ifarisen ukawacu...
Tesɛa daɣen taklinit aqsas-ucelleḥ agetugrinin yettwaldin tiggura-s deg waggur n mayyu 2011. D yiwet tamṣuka tudmist d timettit ugaren tiyaḍ deg tɣiwant.
Tigemmi.
Agadir aqbur aɛetmani yella deg ugafa n tɣiwant. Yella ar 500 imitriyen n asawen dɣa yettwubna deg tazwara n sɣur Lqaḍi aṭerki n Taqbaylit n Wadda, Aɛli Xuǧa, d yiwen agadir ameqran ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen yebnan iɛetmaniyen di Tmurt Taqbaylit.

Buǧima:

Buzeggen:

Draɛ Ben Xedda:
Draɛ Ben Xedda (Mirabeau deg tallit tahrest taṛumit), d taɣiwant taqbaylit n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu, di Tamurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg umalu n Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar aqrib deg ugmuḍ n Zzayer. 
Tarakalt.
Azerzay d tamanarut.
Ansakal n taɣiwant yetwezzi deg ugafa s Asif n Sabaw dɣa yetwezger sɣur Asif bwagdur deg tama-s tamalut.
Asideg.
Taɣiwant n Draɛ Ben Xedda tella deg umalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n tɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Draɛ Ben Xedda tesɛa 13 tudrin :
Amezruy.
Mirabeau d alemmas n tasehrest, lbenyan ines yettweɣtes ass n 24 fuṛaṛ 1884 sɣur anabaḍ amatu n Lezzayer.
Amarud n 31 014 700 francs yettwefk i usenfar agi.

Azaɣar (Tizi Uzzu):
Azaɣar (neɣ Ɛin Zawiya), d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg unẓul-amalu n Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar deg unẓul-agmuḍ n Zzayer.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Uzaɣar tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Uzaɣar tesɛa 29 tudrin :
Amezruy.
Deg useggwas 1889, imi tella tasehrest taṛumit, semman-as i taɣiwant Pirette dɣa tella deg ugezdu n Zzayer.
Tadamsa.
Taɣiwant tesɛa ɣef akal-is taneɣraft n imra akkw d imagraden iɣurbizen, taneɣraft n tigazuzin, taneɣraft n chewing-gum, daɣen aṭas iferdisen n aɣraf n ifexxaren dɣa tissirt n zzit d irden.
Uggug imeswi, yettwabnun deg iseggwasen 1980 deg unẓul n tɣiwant, yesniref taneflit n tafellaḥt.

Friḥa:

Frikat:
Frikat d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg unẓul-amalu n Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar deg unẓul-agmuḍ n Zzayer.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Frikat tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Frikat tesɛa 24 tudrin :

isem-agi n yiflisen llan wi d yeqqaren dagla-nsen llan da¥en wiyadh. qqran-d (iflisen = les pirates )

Taɣiwant Imsuḥal tenulfa-d deg useggas n 1984 (decret 5 fevrier 1984). Zik tetteki ɣer Lɛarc At Yettura.

Imkiren:
Imkiren d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg ugafa n Tizi Ɣennif dɣa ar deg unẓul-amalu n Tizi Uzzu.
Tamaḍlarut.

Taɣiwant n Imkiren tella deg unẓul-alaky n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Imkiren tesɛa 42 tudrin :

Sidi Neɛman:
Sidi Neɛman d taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel, tezga deg twilayt n Tizi Uzzu. 
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Sidi Neɛman tezga deg ugafa-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin.
Taɣiwant n Sidi Neɛman tesɛa 19 tudrin :
Amezruy.
Sidi Neɛman d taɣiwant tamectuḥt n tamnaṭ n Tizi Uzzu. Tezga deg iɣzer n wasif n Sabaw. Amrawa, iɣzer agi yečuṛ d umezruy seg ṭrad "punik" (iṛumanen mgal Kartaj). Amrawa n wadda (tamnaṭ n Sidi Neɛman, Draɛ Ben Xedda, Tadmayt, Buxalfa) d tamnaṭ i ttwaḍlemen s tizririn n tagelda n Kuku, Iɛetmaniyen, Iṛumiyen akkw d izba imeẓwiyen mgal taslekt n iṛumiyen.

Suq n Letniyen (Tizi Uzzu):

Tadmayt:
Tadmayt (isem-is nni aqdim aṛumi "Camp-du-Maréchal") d taɣiwant n tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu, di Tamurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg umalu n Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar deg ugmuḍ n Zzayer.
Tarakalt.
Asideg.
Taɣiwant n Tadmayt tella deg umalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin.
Llant 21 n tuddar di tɣiwant n Tadmayt :
Tatupunymit.
"Tadmayt" s tmaziɣt anamek ines d tidikelt (neɣ tawsit n wufus), lamaɛna yesɛa anamek nniḍen : "tazdayt-takeḍwant", yuɣ lḥal adeg-aɣella n tɣiwant d azaɣar i zemren ad yili yegelgel (ingayen deg iseggwasen 1970 ar 80) anda yetɛeddi Asif n Sabaw. Daɣen Tadmayt tettwezzi s idurar, ayen yettak as timeẓri agi am tawsit n wufus.

Tigzirt:
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Ma yella nezzi-d ɣer tama n yilel, ad naf tamurt n Tigzirt : yiwet n temnaḍt yettwassnen aṭas, ama ɣef ccbaḥa-s ama ɣef umezruy-is neɣ af tmetti-ines.     Tigzirt tezga-d ɣef yijifar n yilel agrakal ; deg ugafa n tmurt n Tizi-Uzu ; limer ad tt-twaliḍ seg usawen ad twaliḍ d akken ters ɣef yiwet n lewḍa i izeynen s waṭas, ur tezmireḍ ara ad tt-teḥyuḍ s tmuɣli.
Taḥuski n Tigzirt weḥd-s ulac ayen i tt-yecban ; mi ara tt-tkecmeḍ ad ak-id mmagren yisekla d leḥcic yessan di tlemmast n ubrid, tiḥuna zzint-as-d si yal tamiwin, yal yiwet d acu i tesnuzuy, mi ara telḥuḍ cwiṭ ɣer zdat ad d-tt-mmagareḍ lɣaci d igrawen yal yiwen seg ansa id-yusa, mi ara tkemmleḍ ɣer zdat, ad tebḍuḍ ad tettwaliḍ ilel iṭilli-d si lebɛid, ad ttḥireḍ melmi ara tawḍeḍ ; tura abrid wezzil, ur d-yugri ara aṭas, syin mi ara tarnuḍ cwiya ad tafeḍ yiwet n tkessart ɣer tama taẓelmaḍt, dɣa ad tebḍuḍ ad tettsubuḍ alama iban-d rrmel adehbi ad as-tiniḍ d aɛeqquc awraɣ yettberriq deg yitij ; aman-nni n yilel d imidadiyen am yigenni, ur tettafeḍ ccbaḥa am tin ; lecḍuḍ-nni n yilel ttawin ttarran, mi ara d-wwet lmuja ɣer berra ulac ṣṣifa n yiẓra ur d-ssufuɣ ara. Mi ara taẓeḍ ɣer rrif n yilel, ad twaliḍ icarfan daxel-is, ttbanen-d ttneggizen-d deg-sen wid yebɣan ad uraren.
Acḥal yeswa win ara d-yasen ɣer da, ad iẓur tamurt-is zziɣ tamurt-nneɣ ur telli tin ittyifen. 
écris par Djimi/Alicia lycée lalla fatma n'soumer tizi ouzou

Timizart:

Tirmitin:

Tizi Ɣennif:
Tizi Ɣennif d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Tizi Ɣennif tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Ademkal.
Asawen ttawil n tɣiwant n Tizi Ɣennif yella ar .
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Deg ufraq udbil n 1984, taɣiwant n Tizi Ɣennif tesɛa 37 tudrin :
Tatupunymit.
Isem n Tizi Ɣennif yusad seg "Tizi d aɣennif" anamek ines d « Tizi n tarennawt » .

Tizi n Tlata:
Tizi n Tlata d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Wezzu, zedɣen-tt 15.891 n yimezdaɣen.
Tira d timselɣa.
²

Tizi Raced:
Tizi Raced

Ta ɣiwant n Tizi Wezzu:
Tizi Wezzu ( Fr: Tizi Ouzou)
Aẓar n wawal.
Tizi Wezzu d awal id yussan deg tejeǧǧigt azezzu, anda ass-agi llant kra n tuddar is yessawalen Tizi Uzezzu, d acu tugett n imezdaɣ tmurt n leqbayel ssawalen as Tizi Wezzu. Ass-a deg lkaɣeḍ nettarutt Tizi Wezzu s teqbaylit , Tizi ouzou s tefransist.
Tarakalt.
Tizi Wezzu tezga azal n 30 km ɣef yiri n yilel agrakal (lebher) akk-d wazal n 92 km seg weɣrem (tamdint) n Bgayet, 88 km si Ledzayer; ɣef tlisa-s ad nef seg usammer Tubirett (80 km), ɣef wegmuḍ Bgayet, Bumerdes ɣef utaram.
S Tjumma n azal n 102,36 km2 taɣiwant n Tizi Wezzu tella yiwet seg tiɣiwanin i meqqren deg tmurt n yezwawen. 
Ahric ameqqran n waman ttassen seg idurar n Djerdjer uqbel n ucercer-nsen ɣef wasif n Sbaɛu; llan deg-s watas n tifrawin am Uggug n Taqsebt (160 imelyaren n m3).
Tizi Wezzu tesɛa azal n 135 088 n imezdaɣ (leḥṣab n 2008) s tajumma n 2958 km²; ɣef wagi tella yiwet n temnatt yesɛan azal meqqren deg Dzayer Talemmast d Tmurt Leqbayel s umata.
Tamdint n Tizi Wezzu d tamdint n temnatt i tella s ugar 100 000 n imezdaɣ i ɣures (tesɛa).
Igmamen (Lḥumet).
Ad naf aṭas n yegmamen di Tizi Wezzu, maca llan kra deg-sen i yettwasnen s aṭas. 

At Wagnun:

At Wasif:

Zekri:

Agwni:
Agwni (FR:Agueni) d'taddart deg Cemmini

At Cemmini:
At Cemmini (FR:Ait Chemini) d'taddart deg Cemmini

At Sula:
At Sula (FR:Ait Soula) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

At Twati:
At Twati (FR:Azib Touazi) d taddart deg tɣiwant n Cemmini
Amezruy.
amek i necfa nanaɣ-d, belli ussan-d deg wedrar n ǧerǧer, win zik i yellan semmeḍ yerna ulac aṭṭas n wakal n tfellaḥt, ihi, unagen-d deg ǧerǧer, ger wexxam-nsen amezwaru deg . ar tura mazal deg twacult n at Twati widak i yeqqimen dinna, ur d-unagen ara deg 1940's ar 1960's. ar assa yiwen deg twacult izga i truḥ ɣer imawlan (), i ttzur-iten.

At Wraɣ (FR:Ait Ouragh) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

At Ẓadi (FR:Ait Zadi) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Lejnan (FR:Djenane) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Luḍa (Cemmini):
Luḍa (FR:Louta) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Semɛun (Cemmini):
Semɛun (FR:Semaoun) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Sidi Lḥaǧ Ḥsin:
Sidi Lḥaǧ Ḥsin (FR:Sidi-Hadj-Hasseïn) d taddart deg Cemmini
Tarakalt.
Taddart n Sidi Lḥaǧ Ḥsin tezga-d deg lɛerc n At Weɣlis af 800 imitren n uɛelay deg usammer n yidurar n Wekfadu ar wegmuḍ seg yidurar n Zzan Iɛeddi fell-as Iɣzer Ameqran i yuḍa g wasif n Summam. Ɣur-es tilisa akwed twilayt n Tizi Wezzu.

Sidi Yeḥya:
Sidi yeḥya (FR:Sidi Yahya) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Taɣrast (Cemmini):
Taɣrast (FR:Taghrast) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Taqerrabt (Cemmini):
Taqerrabt (FR:Takorabt) d taddart deg teɣiwant n Cemmini

Taxlijt:
Taxlijt (FR:Takhlidjt) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Tiɣilt (FR:Tighilt) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Tiḥuna (FR:Tihouna) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Tijunan:
Tijunan (FR:Tidjounane) d taddart deg tɣiwant n Cemmini

Tisirra:
Tisirra (FR:Tissira) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n Cemmini

Amagrad amaynut:
Tafejrit tamezwarut : 
D ass amenzu di ddunit. 
Si lebḥer yeffeɣ-d lḥut, 
Yufa-d iṭij iqubel-it.
Kulci ɣur-es d amaynut, 
Ileḥq-d gma-s yettwali-t.
Iberrez ɣef gma-s yeɣli,
Yečča-t uqbel ad isuɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
Imuqel lεebd iman-is,
Yeswehm-it way-en iwala
Yesteqsay deg wallaɣ-is, 
Sanga i-gteddu, ansi d-yekka.
Akken a tt-yefru d ṛṛay-is, 
Akken ad iqabel azekka.
Yerfed allen-is s igenni, 
Yenna-yas yes-k ara lḥuɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
Tekker-d tmurt ɣer tayeḍ, 
Tenna-yas : “ad imɣureɣ,
« Akal-im ar d iyi t teğğeḍ, 
« Ma ulac yid-em ad nnaɣeɣ.
« I yiman-im ur tezmireḍ, 
« Si lsas ara kem huddeɣ ».
Akal-im ilaq-iyi, 
Ssneɣ amek ara t-bnuɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
La ttnadin ɣef tsarut,
Tawwurt werεad i tt ufin.
Ceɣlen-d ma ad telhu tefsut,
Nutni deg wegris ɣellin.
Wa yenna : ttḥebbiṛen i lqut,
Wa yenna : mebεid i ttwalin. 
Uɣalen kul wa amek yettwali, 
Gar-asen lefhama tluɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
Baba-s akken i d-yelli imi-s, 
Mmi-s yuzzel ad yaɣ awal.
Iḥebs-it-id ccix-is, 
Yenna-yas : « Aha! uɣal.
Ini-as i baba-k unḥis 
Mači akk-a ay teddunt temsal.
Ma ad iyi tceggεeḍ ciweṛ-iyi :
Ma ad agiɣ neɣ ad bɣuɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
Ferqen lerẓaq watmaten, 
Kul yiwen yelha wayla-s.
Yekker-d umeqqran deg-sen, 
Ɣer umecṭuḥ d ulemmas.
S lεemṛ-iw ugareɣ-ken,
Lεemṛ-iw yesεa ssuma-s.
Ugareɣ-ken di tmussni, 
A ken agareɣ d acu a sεuɣ.
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i d-yebda umennuɣ. 
Asmi ara texlu ddunit :
Kullec ad yenger di lqaεa,
Ur d-tettili tfejrit, 
Ssuq n tudert yefra,
S kra i-gellan, ulac-it,
Amzun di leεmeṛ ur d-yelli(a).
Aneggaru ma a yeɣli, 
A d-yini : wi ɣef a rfuɣ? 
Ur ẓriɣ ara acimi !
Lamaεni ass-nni i ad yekfu umennuɣ.

Ahil:
Ahil (Fr: Programme informatique) (En: Computer program) yettwaru s tutlayt tasenselkimt

Ilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Temdint n Bgayet:
Tarbaεt n ilemẓiyen n Bgayet (neɣ JSM Bejaïa) d tarbaεt n Bgayet di dabex n uḍar, tetturar di tseddart tis-snat n Lezzayer n dabex n uḍar. D tarbaɛt tamgensast n iɣiz n Sumam. Terbeḥ deg useggas 2008 tabuqalt n Lezzayer (teɣleb Tlemsan). 

Agni Mzayen:

Tifrit n At Lḥaǧ:

Iderma.
Iderma Imrabḍen.
"Sidi Mḥand Waɛli Lḥaǧ" yuɣ-d Ɛica Tazreruqt n At Weɣlis Asamer, yesɛa tlata warraw-is :

Tigurin:

Abidjan:
Tamdint n Abidjan d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Côte d'Ivoire.
Tamdint tamuqrant n tmurt. Di gsugass 2008 lan dgess 5,068,858 imdanen.

asmel n Abidjan

Akfadu (adrar):
Adrar n wekfadu d adrar i d-yussan deg kemmel n wedrar n ǧerǧer,alamma d Bgayet, yekka-d tama n wesammer n Asif n Sumam.

Grenoble:

Asif Aεebbas:
Asif Aεebbas d yiwen wasif i yeɣziffen seg Wasif Amariɣ ed yidurar icawiyen n Tiṭ Ulman ar Bgayet, af tewɣzi n 195 km. Yeṭṭef isem n Summam armi ad yemlal Asif Buselam deg Weqbu armi iḍegger di tama n Bgayet (Imezzayen).

Anda tezga-d.
