Yusef Ɛabdi:
Yusef Ɛabdi d yiwen sen inadallen n tmurt n Usṭralya. 
Ilul deg was n 7 dujamber 1977 deg Iεeẓẓugen di Tmurt N Leqvayel.
Tamezzugt-is d 3000 lmitrat.
Deg useggas n 2012, ad ittekki deg Uraren ulempiyen di London di tmurt n Legliz. 

Usṭralya:
</td></tr>
</table>
D yiwet si Tmura n umaḍal.
Tamaneɣt-is d Canberra. Zedɣentt azal n 22 Imelyunen n imdanen 

Tamanaɣt:
Tamanaɣt d tiɣremt (tamdint) anda yetteg udabu tadbelt n tmurt.
iẓuran n wawal.
S tlatinit, tamanaɣt qaren-as "caput", anamek-is: aqerru.

Rekku n uɣesmar:
Rekku n uɣesmar d aṭṭan ig ttaɣen iɣes umi neqqar Aɣesmar si tama n ufella d tin bwadda. Tifidiwin d rekku n yiɣes ttasend seg seqsef (lexṣas) n idammen di tama uɣesmar. Lehlak agi at narnu ɣer tagayt n rekku n yeɣsan id ittasen seg lexṣas idammen. 
Llant aṭas n talɣiwin n rekku n yiɣes uɣesmar ig ttugelmen di 160 isegwasen iɛeddan.
Amezruy.
Talɣa yettwasnen si zik, d tin id ismentes ttawil n "phosphore acebḥan", tettwassen ɣur Legyiz s yisem n "Phossy jaw" tettwabgen-ed di timidi tis "XIX" d tazwara n tis "XX" sɣur ixeddamen n zalamiṭ s ufus. Assagi s umennuɣ anmali ad naf d akken aseqdec n "phosphore acebḥan" yettwasenfel (yettwabeddel) s "uzegwaɣ" iwakken ad sseḥbibren ɣef ixeddamen marra.
Ttawil n Radium daɣen yella d sebba n waṭṭan n Rekku uɣesmar yufat-id i tikelt tamezwarut Dr H.S. Martland asegwas 1924 Radium jaw (Aɣusmar n radium), imi tixeddamin n tarmisin yesseqdacen taklut n radium cetkant ɣef uqraḥ n tuɣmas d uɣesmar, ak-d lǧarḥ deg uksum n tuɣmas, kra isegwasen akkin at id eḍfer Tigẓelt ẓẓayen n yiɣes (Ostéosarcome).
Isegwasen agi ineggura, aṭṭan agi yarna ɣur imdanen isseqdacen s waṭas ttawil n "bisphosphonates" iwakken ad dawin aṭṭan n uxenzir.
Imdanen yuḍnen Rekku n uɣesmar zemren ad sɛun rekku deg adif n yeɣsan nsen ig llan ttwaxenqen imi xuṣṣen

Azawax:
Azawax d aqejjun yettidiren di tama n tefriqt ugafa, yekkad y isem Azawax seg awal Azewwax (Tamaziɣt): win yettzuxun acku ṣenf agi n iqejjan d win iḥemlen ad isken iman-is. yettidir deg unẓul n tefriqt ugafa, ɣur itargiyen di tama n Mali, Nijer, Burkina faṣu ..., ssawalen-as deɣen Sellugi Atargi.
Amezruy.
Yella di temnaṭ n Saḥel "anẓul tefriqt ugafa" si zik, ibaned di Tuṛuft deg segwasen n 1970. Asegwas 1981, amqun agraγlan n teγri n iqejjan (FCI) tga azal i y Iri Azawax.
Di tdra, Aqejjun agi yella yettwaxdem iw gmer, arured ines iwulem iw ḍfer n waniren d yefrax. Cvaḥa ines teǧǧat daγen ad yili d aywal n tamunt.
Isem "Azawax" yekkad seg tmaziγt "azuwax" yellan di teqbaylit.
Asekkil.
Fsus yarna d amegraw, d aywal izemren ad y aazel iman-is, abaada γef ibaṛṛaniyen. ur yettqellib ara γef usilef. D addfut yarna d apelfaf, ilaq-as usaγad aṣebri

Amafag n Lien Khuong:
Tikubaniyin n tufga.
Tikubaniyin i tsawin-tserran ar unafag n Lien Khuong:
Tamehla.
</div class>

Titanik:
RMS Tiṭanik d yiwen n lbabuṛ Abriṭani (agyizi)n White Star Line, yebna s tmenna n Joseph Bruce Ismay asegwas 1907 sγur Thomas Andrews ig xedmen γer Harland & Wolff. Lebni n lbabuṛ tebda asegwas 1909 di temdint n Belfast, tekfa asegwas 1912.
D netta id lbabuṛ ameqṛan yettwabnan di ddunit merra, yettekka γer classe Olympik aked sin seg sister-ships, Olympik d Briṭanik.
Di tufγa yines tamezwarut, tiṭanik, yewwet yiwen weẓru n wegris ass n 14 Yebrir 1912 γef 23 h 40, yeγreq azekkayen 15 Yebrir 2 h 20 di Terre-Neuve.

Thanh Hoa:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Thanh Hoa, Vietnam. Tettwassen s isem n temdint n tafat.

Polandball:
Polandball (Pulandball) anamek: ddavex apuluni, yettwasnen daɣen s yisem n countryball, d-agbur id yessukkus umseqdac internet meme id yekkan seg /int/ board n German imageboard Krautchan.net agraw n tugniwin di tmurt talmanit, tagara n-usegwas 2009. meme agi yettbaned deg aṭas n taffiwin n-isefka. Aɣanib n tesfift tunuɣt yezmer asensemmi Pollandball (ɣas akken ulac tapulunit deg unuɣen imrayen)
Amezruy.
Polandball yebwid aẓar-is di ɣuct 2009 "cyberwar": ṭrad iẓeḍwan ger imseqdacen n internet ipuluniyen d wid umaḍan marra deg asmel drawball.com, asmelweb ig fkan ahlis abeckil yeǧǧan imseqdacen ad unuɣen ayen isen yehwan, tikti tusad anda ad sleqdeḍ asenǧaq n tmurt Tapulunit ɣer ddavex, ayen yeǧǧan agimen n-ipuluniyen ad arzun γer internet iwakken ad ṭfen unuγ s yini acebḥan, s-ufella-s azegwaγ, yura deg-s POLSKA di tlemmast.
Krautchan.net d "imageboard" tafelwit tugniwin s tmeslayt talmanit anida /INT/ board (tafelwit) rezzun-d γuṛes wid yettmeslayen s tegyizit. Tazwara n Polandball meme d-ayla n Falco, yiwen wegyizi n /INT/, id yesnulfan di Ctamber 2009 meme isseqdacen MS Paint s tγara n tsartit i troll Wojak, yiwen upuluni di tfelwit (board) nni yettekka s yiwet n tegyizit ixewḍen, sin akkin irusiyen sunγen Polandball s wunuγen imrayen.
Iswi.
Iswi n Pollandball, d asegnes n tmurt tapulunit d umezruy ines, assaγen ines d tmura nniḍen. Meme agi yebwid taγerfant seg-mi id γli Ṛṛupyan tmurt tapulunit anda yemmut uselway n tigduda Lech Kaczyński, tamurt tapulunit tettwaru s-uzegwaγ yef ucebḥan, d-asenǧaq tmurt s-uzyag, di tagara n unuγ amray tamurt tettru.
Kra n wunuγen Polland ball iswi nsen d-akken tamurt n arruss tezmer ad tali s-igenni m-ad Tapulunt ur tezmir ara, yiwen s unuγen imrayen Pollandball yettwasnen yemmaled d-akken amaḍal ad tyewwet yiwen weẓru ameqṛan. Timura yark izemren iyiman nsent ad rewlent s-igenni ad ttezzin γef umaḍal (akal), di tagara n unuγ amray Tapulunt teqqimed deg akal tettru.
Kra n ddavex tmura nniḍen (countryball).
Pollandball yezmer daγen ad yili n tmura nniḍen umaḍan, γas akken isem nsent yeqqim d Pollandball, naγ country ball s-unamek n ddavex tmura, aṭas n tmura i wum-id snulfan Pollandball nsent Marikan, Serbya,Kaṭlunya,Singapur ... d wiyaḍ, amakken tzemrem ad twalim di tugna yagi, ula d Tamazγa tesεa Pollandball ines.

Meryl Streep:
Mary Louise Streep, tlull ass n di Summit awanak n New Jesey, d tasnegbart tamarikanit. Γer waṭas n medden, d Meryl id tasnebgart tameqṛant di tallit tafrart, yella-d yisem-is azal n 17 n tikal deg arazen "Oscars" zdat Katharine Hepburn, tebwi araz agi 3 kṛaḍ n tikal, isegwasen n 1980,1983 d 2012.
Deg asarug, deg umezgun d tiliẓri turar aṭas n temliltin, am di "Kramer and Kramer" asegwas n 1979 anda turar d tameṭṭut tamezwarut n Dustin Hoffman, asaru itt yeǧǧan ad tawi "Oscar" n temlilt wis sin iten-t yifen. Timliltin ines nniḍen igarzen d tid n Out of Africa, anda tella d tamyarut Karen Blixen γer tama n Robert Redford d "Sophie's Choice" (sγuṛ ungal n William Styron) anda turar tameṭṭut ijaṛben imḍiqen n lmut di ṭṛad n umaḍal tisnat, ayen itt yeǧǧan tikelt-a ad tawi Oscar n tesnegbart usegwas 1983.
Deg usaru "A Cry in the Dark" n Fred Cepisi tebwi araz di cannes/fṛansa asegwas n 1989. Turar d tameṭṭut n wexxam ig γlin di tayri γef yiwen umseknaw deg usaru "The Bridges of Madison County" γer tama n Clint Eastwood asegwas 1995, daγen deg usaru "The Hours" γer tama n Nicole Kidman d Julianne Moore, isegwasen agi ineggura turar deg "The Devil Wears Prada" aked "Mamma Mia" !. Asegwas n 2012 tebwi araz n "Oscar" tesnebgart usegwas i tikelt tis kṛaḍ γef usaru "La Dame de fer" anda turar taneγlaft tamezwarut n Lengliz Margaret Taččer

Marilyn Monroe:
Marilyn Monroe, s yisem-is unṣib Norma Jeane Mortenson naγ Norma Jeane Baker amaken yella di Nekwa-s, d tasnebgart d tacennayt tamarikanit, ilulen ass n umenzu n yunyu 1926 deg Los Angels awanak n Kalifornia, yemmuten ass n 5 γuct asegwas n 1962 di temdint-a.
Tella di tazwara tqeddec am teknart, seg-mi ittiwala Howard Hughes is yefkan tagnitt ad tezmel agatu aked 20th Centrury Fox asegwas 1947. Di tezwara n-isegwasen 50 tuγal d-itri n Hollywood/Hulywuud, isura it urar yesεan tarennawet tameqṛant d wid n "Gentlemen Prefer Blondes", "The Seven Year Itch" d "Some Like It Hot" itt yeǧǧan ad tawi arazn Golden Globe n tesnabgart usegwas n 1960.
Γas akken tettwasen nezzah, maca tudert-is tuqel d-abrir, m-ad amecwaṛ ines yeǧǧatt yal ass ur tesgiwen. Ar assa amentel nel mutt ines mazal fella-s awal: tenγa iman-is s-isufar naγ d-amenγi aserti.
Asegwas n 1999 "American Film Institute" arran-tt d tasnebgart tameqṛant tis sed (6) tamarikanit n yal tallit deg ubellez "AFI's 100 Years ... 100 stars" AFI's 100 isegwasen ... 100 yitran.

Richard Dean Anderson:
Richard Dean Anderson Ricaṛ Din Anderṣun d-asnebgar amarikani, ilull ass n 23 Yennayer asegwas 1950 di Minneapolis, awanak n Minnesota. Yettwassen aladγa γef wurar ines deg imazraren n tiliẓri MacGyver (1985-1994) d win n Stargate SG-1 (Tabwurt s-itran) ger (1997-2007).

Phan Thiet:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Phan Thiet, Vietnam. Tettwassen s isem n temdint n tafat.

Buon Ma Thuot:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Buon Ma Thuot, Vietnam. Tettwassen s isem n temdint n tafat.

Albert Einstein:
"Albert Einstein" d-ussnan asengam amezray yellan di tazwara d-almani, sinna mebla tamurt (1896), d-aswisit (1901), sinna di tagara yarna-d taγlent tamarikanit (1940). Ilul ass n di temdint n Ulm, Wutemberg, yemmut ass n di Prinston, New Jersey.
Issufɤed tiẓritis af timasseɤt takreft di 1905 akw tiẓritis af timasseɤt tumat di 1915.

Hande Yener:
Hande Yener isem-is unṣib d Makbule Hande Özyener (tlul ass di Istambul) tacennayt n pop.

Carl Friedrich Gauss:
Carl Friedrich Gauss naγ Kaγl Fxeidxic Gawss s teqbaylit; yettwanṭaq , ilul ass n 30 Yebrir asegwas n 1777 di Brunswick, yemmut ass n 23 di Fuṛaṛ usegwas n 1855 di Guttingen. Yella d-amusnak ameqṛan, d-amesnallum u d-amussnagamaw. Yesεa tasmedna tameqṛant, yebwid tummutin yesεan azal s waṭas di tusniwin agi id nebder (nuder) qqaren-as "Ageldun n tusnakt", d yiwen seg imusnaken imeqṛanen n yal akud.
Taγara n leqdic ines d tin yesεan azal meqṛen ger aziten-ines, seg usegwas 1856, agellid n Hanovre yexdem iderimen s tugna n Gauss γef udem nsent, yura fellas "Mathematicorum Principi : Ageldun n tusnakt" s tlatinit. Gauss yessufγed ala ammur amecṭuḥ n leqdic ines, alarmi d-asegwas n 1898 nada i y-ufan yark ayen yura s-umata, ayagi yeǧǧ-at ad yarnu w-azal-is di tussna.
Imuhal ussnanen.
C. G. Fleckeisen, Helmstadii (Helmstedt), 1799 ; aḍris deg internet : HU Berlin, Gauß: Werke. Band 3, p. 3–30, [http://books.google.com/books?id=OuYGAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA3, [http://books.google.com/books?id=guYGAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA3]
F. Perthes und I. H. Besser, Hamburgi (Hamburg) 1809 ; aḍris alatini γef GDZ, p. 1–261.
tasuqilt. par Edmond Dubois, éd. Arthus Bertrand, 1864 ; reprint, Jacques Gabay, 2008, ; aḍris deg internet : Gallica

Baruch Spinoza:
"Baruch Spinoza", yettwassen daγen s yisem n "Bento de Espinosa" naγ "Benedictus de Spinoza", ilul ass n di Amsterdam, yemmut ass n di Den Haag. Yella d-amesnagay n Tmurt n Wadda uγur tasnezgimt tesεa tazrirt s wazal-is γef w-aziten n tillit dgi yedder d waṭas n wid it idiḍefṛen.

Tazalγi Copley:
Tazalγi Copley d yiwen w-araz deg taγult n tussna. D tazzlγi yesεan azal ameqṛan sγuṛ Royal Society (Londres), d nettat id taqbuṛt ark, tellas i tikelt tamenzut asegwas n 1731.
Tazalγi y agi tennulfad seg-mi i yefka Mass Godfrey Copley i Royal Society 100 £ asegwas n 1709, Mass Copley d yiwen umaṛkanti yesεan tamurt di Doncaster deg unẓul n Yorkshire, yuγal y ufren d-amaslad n tmetti y agi asegwas n 1691.
D yiwet ger mraw n tzalγiwin it ttak Royal Society, kra y uγal semmet. Tazalγi Copley ttaken-tt di tsengama, d Tussna n tudert.

Translate arabic:
Tḍefreḍ azday ɣer usebter mazal ur yettwaxleq ara. Akken ad txelqeḍ asebter-nni, aru deg tenkult i tella deg ukessar (ẓer asebter n tallat akken ad tessneḍ kter). Ma tɣelṭeḍ, wekki kan ɣef tqeffalt "Back/Précédent" n browser/explorateur inek.
Aɣtal: Ur tkecmiḍ ara. Tansa IP inek ad tettusmekti deg umezruy n usebter-agi.

Ben Tre:
Tamanaɣt n tmurt n Ben Tre, Vietnam. Tettwassen s isem n temdint n tafat.

Mulay Muḥend (Muḥend n Ɛabdel Krim Lxeṭṭabi):
Muḥmed n Âabd Krim Lxeṭṭabi niɣ Mulay Muḥend d-anzbay amaziɣ d amɣrabi si temnaṭ n Arif . d aselway n tgduda n arif gar useggwas 1921 d 1926. imnaɣ akwd Spenyul d Fransa. g-inas assaɣ n izem n Arrif g-int d agledun imjahden yugi ad yili d agellid n arif . Mamek yugi ad yilli d lxalif n inselmen.
Tallit ed temẓi-s.
Ilul g iɣrem n Ajdir deg useggwas n 1882. Yelmed af ufus n baba-s ikemmel tiɣri-s g uɣerbaz n ṣfarin d craṭin di Fas. Yuɣal-d ɣer Fas d-akabar seg baba-s isulṭan Ɛebdelaḥfiḍ iwsisfiw n umenɣi akwd Bu Teɣyult ( bu ḥmara)
Asbddi n tgduda n arif.
Isbedd Mulay Muḥend deg wass n 18 Ctember 1921. Tagduda taεṣrit s Dustur D lbrlaman. Asmi ggin Imezdaɣ n Arrif tagrawla mgal Spenyul.Tamaneɣt-is Ajdir Tadrimt nns Rifan Tafugla Tanamurt ass n 18 Ctamber . Di tira s Taεṛabt semman-as « Jumhuria Errifiya », ma Irifiyen ddmen awal nni n Spenyul, rran-t d assaɣ ( isem) Amaziɣ: « Ribublik n Arif ». 
Ur illa imir nni wawal n « ribublik » di Tmaziɣt Tarifit, awalnni nessen ass-a : tgduda n arif .
Awal-nni s timmad-si ifra tamsalt tameqrant. Ur tella d tagelda i –id-ilulen seg idurar n Arrif. Abrid ibṛez, yenjeṛ yesuffeɣ: tegduda n Arrif i-d-ilulen seg iẓuran n tmurt, si teqbilin akken llant. Adabu i-d ilulen yusa-d si teqbilin n tmurt, seg iɣerman akked tzeɣwa n tmurt n Arrif.
Asinf Nns.
Deg useggwas 1926 ar 1947 yenfa Muḥend Abdelkrim ɣer tegzirt n La Réunion, azal n 9000 km akkin deg ilel n Lhend. 
Isuter acḥal n tikkal ḥuma. ad iffeɣ si tmurt-nni.
Tamtant nns.
Imut Mulay Muḥend di Taqahirt (Maṣer) deg wass n 6 Yebrir 1963. Yemḍel di temeqrebt n Ccuhada dinna. 

Genzat:
Genzat tella d yiwet taɣiwant i tezga-d deg ugafa n ugezdu n Sṭif. Imezdaɣ-ines d Iqbayliyen, nemgal tiɣiwanin am Bugɛa, mazal-iten ittmeslayen gar-asen s teqbyalit kan ar ass-ayi. 

Tazazat:
Tazazat d isem ay ssexdamen i snat n tutlayin yettemcabin mliḥ, ttmeslayen-tent wazal n 3 n yimelyunen n yemdanen di tama-nni n Asya umi qqaren Tturk.

Hindi Zahṛa:
Hindi Zahṛa d yiwet n tcennayt Tamaziɣt tameqṛant, tlul asegwas n 1979 di Xuribga Tamurt n Meṛṛuk, tettidir di Fṛansa seg usegwas 1993, tcennu s tutlayt Taglizit d Tmaziɣt/Tacelḥit.
Tameddurt.
Asegwas n 2010 tessufγed Hindi Zahṛa aḍebsi y ines amenzu "Handmade" itt yeǧǧan ad tawi araz Constantin 12 Nunber 2010, .
Ass n tza di Fuṛaṛ usegwas 2011 tebwi ayen umi qqaren "Victoires de la musique" Aḍebsi id yufraren di Cna Umaḍal "Handmade".

Amawal:
Amawal d adlis anida llan awalen n tutlayt neɣ taɣult n urmud, awalen ttmizwaren-d akken i-d-mmizwaren isekkilen ugemmay, yal yiwen yid-s tabadut, asegzi d unamek ines.
llan aṭas imawalen di yal amḍiq n tussna, dɣa ad naf ula s teqbaylit neɣ s tmaziɣt s-umata, aṭas n imawalen i-d-yufraren, gar-asen:
"AMAWAL" sγuṛ "Mulud Mɛemmeri" 
"AMAWAL N TSENSELKIMT" (Tafṛansist - Taglizit - Tamaziɣt) sɣuṛ "Samiya Sɛad-Buzefran" 
"ISSIN", AMAWAL n teqbaylit s teqbaylit sɣur "Kamal Buɛemara" 
"Iɣsan s teqbaylit" sɣur "Mohamed Zakaria BENRAMDANE"
"Amawal Lexique Des Sciences de La Terre" sɣur "Yidir ḤMED ZAYED"

Tinariwen:
Tinariwen (s t-targit naγ tamaceq : « ⵜⵏⵔⵓⵏ » d-asget n: Tenere) d yiwet n tarbaεt icennayen id yusan seg tmurt n Tessalit di Azawad deg Adrar n Ifuγas .
Ccna nsen, "assuf", tebwid cbaha γer blues, d rock d ccna itargiyen tamensayt. D tin i wumi neqqaṛ tura "blues tuareg", axaṭar am "blues" ccna yagi yekka-d seg "assuf" d aṭṭan yuγen imaziγen n kel tamaceq deg akal nsen.
Llan sin iqaṛṛay deg tarbaεt agi, yiwen Ibrahim ag Alhabib « Abraybone » wayeḍ d Alhousseini ag Abdoulahi « Abdallah », maca ilaq an wali tinariwen am akken d tawacult tameqṛant, d tiddukla tadelsant.
Llan daγen aṭas inaẓuren id yettasen γer tarbaεt n tinariwen, am Mohamed ag Itlal i wumi qqaren «Ajapuni».
Tameddurmant.
Tluled tarbaεt agi asegwas n 1982, deg yiwet n tfaska id yellan di temdint n lzzayer, sγur Ibrahim ag Alhabib, Alhassan ag Touhami d-Intayaden, "Taγreft Tinariwen", wigi llan d-icennayen, maca daγen d-igrawliyen yennuγen γef uzref n-ugdud atargi amaziγnsen isegwasen nni 1990, s ccna nsen, arran-d asirem i watmaten nsen kel tamaceq.
di tzwara, kṛad agi n yemdukal llan tturaren s snitra tasfeldant, sinna mmugren-d inaẓuren n "voix du Hoggar" is yefkan i Ibrahim snitra y ines elektrik tamezwarut. Di temdint n Tamenṛaset, gan kra tfaskiwin yidsen Kṛad n tilawin, sinna di tmurt n Libya mmugren-d Mohamed ag Itlal, «Ajapuni» di lawan nni id bda tagrawla nni isegwasen n 1990.

Tamikrest:
Tamikrest (s-t Targit naγ Tamaceq s teqbaylit: "tikarrist", s tfṛansist: "noeud, coalition") d yiwet n tarbaεt n Ccna tafriqt, pop d rock utrim, cennun s tutlayt Tamacaqt. Win yettarun tizlitin n tarbaεt d Usman Ag Musa (aqarru n tarbaεt)
Ccna n tarbaεt yesseqdac aṭas n snitrat d wallalen nniḍen.
Tameddurmant.
Imasladen n tarbaεt Tamikrest sεan 20 isegwasen ass m-id tennulfa tarbaεt asegwas n 2006, kren-d di tama n Kidal Aẓawad, akken id kren deg uγarbaz n "Les enfants de l´Adra" mi llan d-igardan. Aγarbaz id sizref tdukliwin turufin di Tinẓawaṭin (tamdint tamecṭuḥt deg Tenere) anida lemden aẓawan. Di temẓi nsen, ddren tallit nni n tegrawla itargiyen isegwasen n 1990, aṭas ig uγalen d-igujilen acku ssutren timanit n weγref atargi
Mi llan d-imeẓyanen, tturaren tizlatin Kel Tamaceq s-umata, naγ tidak n tarbaεt Tinariwen yessexlaḍen seg-imiren Ccna amensay d win utrim (abeṛṛani).
Assa, nezmer ad naf di Cna n Tamikrest ugar n tezrirt s-γuṛ icennayen imeqṛanen am: Jimi Hendrix, Bob Marley, Pink Floyd et Mark Knopfler; ayen i-ten yeǧǧan ad maggren tarbaεt Usṭralu-tamarikanit Dirtmusic di tfaska n Ccna atargi di tenere asegwas n 2008, di tγiwant n Essakan, azal n 70 Agimkat seg Ṭumbuktu, ayagi yark yeǧǧa Tamikrest ad uraren deg takalast t-isnat n Dirtmusic asegwas n 2010 id skelsen di Bamako, ussan ni id teffaγ takalast n-sen "Adaγ" id yefres Kris Ekman.

Lla Lgida Tamuqrant:
Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant, isem-is aḥeqqani : Hini Merbouha
Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant, d yiwet n tcennayt tamuqrant n Teqbaylit, seg tmezwura yerẓan asalu ar ccna ar tama n Lla Yamina, Lla Wenissa, Lla Zina Tawertilanit. 
Tlul deg temnaṭ n udrar n Gergur, deg Sṭif deg 1912. Isem ines n tidett d Merbuḥa Ḥini. Tedder aṭas n lweqt deg Lezzayer Tamanaγt.
Ger tuγac-ines yettwassnen aṭas, daγen yettwaskelsen deg Umaṭṭaf n teqabylit (radio Berthozène, ELAK). 
Teccna tikelt ak tamezwarut deg umezruy n ccna n leqbayel ak d wergaz. Tγenna akw d Ccix Nuṛdin tizlitt mucaɛen umi qqaren : Serḥγa-s i bu laɛyun.
Tella seg tullawin temenza yeccnan deg rradyu aladγa deg nnuba n lxalat ar tama n Cabḥa, Lla Yamina, Lla Zina, Crifa, Ǧamila, Wrida, 
Tizlitt.
Iwaccu id cceyɛed γuri, a ṛbaɛ ajdid axuxi,
Asgi sliγ ad assed, aqli theyiγ lhenni,
Amek ara jjaγ tarumit, s zzin-is tseḥriyi,
Iwaccu id cceyɛad γuri, a ṛbaɛ ajdid ayawa, 
Asgi sliγ ad assed, aqli theyiγ lfeṭṭa, 
Amek ara jjaγ tarumit, agwad rebbi, 
Yarna tewwi-yi lhawa, 
Iwaccu id cceyɛed γuri a ṛbaɛ ajdid aɛbbas, 
Asgi sliγ ad assed, aqli theyiγ ameqyas, 
Ulamek jjaγ tarumit, tsehriyi d ṣṣifa-s, 
Seḥriyi s drafas, 
Iwaccu id cceyɛed γuri a ṛbaɛ ajdid lemdaḥbi, 
Asgi sliγ ad assed, aqli theyiγ abidi, 
Amek ara jjaγ tarumit, tenak ur yettaja waḥdi, 
Ay agetum n remman, 
N remman,
Ṛuḥ a lwali di laman, 
Di laman,
Uffiγ snat n teqcicit, 
Grent iγallen i deffa, 
Deg ssifa am tin am tin,
Mxallafent deg lebsa, 
Ay agetum n rreman,
Ṛṛuḥ a lwali di laman,
Uffiγ snat n teqcicin, 
Grent iγallen i tebburt, 
G ssifa am tin am tin, 
Mxallafent deg qendurt, 
Lɛeslama-k a xxuya, 
A lbaz id rebba tsekkurt, 

Novak Đoković:
Novak Đoković d-amyurar n waddal n Tennis tmurt Serbi, ilul ass n di temdint n Belgrad.
Yevda yetturar d tervaɛt tameqṛant asegwas n 2003, iḥarz amḍiq amenzu n ubellez n ATP azal n 90 imalas yemseḍfaren. 
Iḥrez ar assa 45 izwilen, garasen 10 imeqṛanen (7 n Grand Chelems d 3 teqvuct n Masters) d 19 n Masters 1000. Đoković yeḥrez azwel n Melbourne di Ustralya isegwasen (2008, 2011, 2012, 2013), win n Wimbledon di tmurt n Lengliz (2011, 2014), win n Flushing Meadows di Timura Yedduklen n Marikan (2011).
Tameddurt.
Ilul Novak Đoković ass n di temdint n Belgrade, yemma-s, Dijana , m-ad baba-s, Srdjan. 
Tura Novak yettidir di Monte Carlo, tama n Monaco, netta d tmeṭṭut-is Jelena.
Di temẓi-s Novak Đoković yella yetturar daɣen ddavax uḍar, yella yeẓweṛ s waṭas, maca d-addal n Tennis ig fren mi yella di Tam (8) isegwasen di lɛemṛ-is, ɣas akken mazal-it yeṭṭafaṛ ar assa u yḥemmel aṭas tarvaɛt n ddavax uḍar n FK Crvena Zvezda.
Amecwaṛ.
Amazray n unaddal.
Novak Đoković iḥrez ar assa 45 azwilen deg ufrari d 1 (yiwen) kan deg uslig irgazen. Yebwi azwel ines amenzu asegwas n 2006, di dduṛt n Amersfort (indoor). Seg imirenni yebwi 7 n t dduṛtin n Grand Slam. Yarna taqbuct n "Masters Cup" (2008, 2012, 2013) d wazal n 19 azwilen n "Masters 1000".

Facebook:
Facebook d yiwen uzeṭṭa n tmetti deg anternet yettaǧǧan yal amdan yesεan amiḍan ad yesnulfu amaγnu n useqdac, deg-s ad iceggaε tilγa izemren ad walin w-id is yehwan, akken yextaṛ. yezmer ad iceggaε tilγa ama d: (tugniwin, iḍrisen, imarrazen, atg.) ad isnulfu isebtaren, igrawen iwakken ad yeǧǧ wiyaḍ ad issinen tisuddutin, tiṛmisin, d wayen yark fayeg yettnaḍaḥ. Deg isebtaren, d igrawen ayen yark ig bḍa umseqdac ad twalin imseqdacen wiyaḍ maci am ma yili s umaγnu y ines.

Tagduda n arif:
Awal iffeɣ akkin i tlisa n Arif, akkin i Taferka, yuɣa timura n Uôupa akked wagmuv ineslem. Tanekra nni n war isem, di kra waguren tbeddel udem. Deg Ajdir, di tazwara n Fuṛaṛ 1923 , tuɣal d « Re publica del Rif » 129 , Tagduda n Arif. Di tira s taεṛabt semman-as « Jumhuria Errifiya », ma d Irifiyen ddmen awal nni n Sbanya, rran-t d isem Amaziɣ : « Ri bublik n Arif ». Ur illa imir nni wawal n « ribublik » di Tmaziɣ t Tarifit, awal nni nessen ass-a : Tagduda n Arif . Awal nni s timmad-si ifra tamsalt tameqrant. Ur tella d tagelda i – id-ilulen seg idurar n Arif. Abrid ibôez, yenjeô yesuffeɣ : tagduda n Arif i-d-ilulen seg iéuran n tmurt, si teqbilin akken llant. Adabu i-dilulen
yusa-d si teqbilin n tmurt, seg i$erman akked tzeɣwa n tmurt Tarifit. Iéuran-is n tmurt, ixfawen-is n tmurt. Tajmaât n tnekra tga tigejda i yuɣ en aéaô. Aqerru-s d Muêend Abdelkrim, ur illa d agellid, ur illa d Mulay i d-yusan si Mekka, ur illa d nbi i diffɣ en seg icuqar n wedrar n Arif. Muêend Abdelkrim n AT Xeîîab,
n
At Yusef U Aâli, d yiwen seg watmaten nsen. Tigejda n Ri publik nni fkant-d udem n webrid uɣ en Irifiyen . Tajmaât n

Timeẓra n wemyag:
Timeẓra n wemyag.
Amyag deg tmaziɣt ifetti kan i lmend n wudmawen [2 d tmeẓra . Nezmer ad nefren snat n tmeẓra tigejdanin : yiwet d tummidt, temmal tigawt ifuken, yemmden. Tayeḍ, d timeẓra ur tummidt i yemmalen tigawt urɛad ifuken, a-tt-an ala tḍerru, maca mazal ur temmid ara.
Tigawt-a tezmer ad teḍru deg yizri, imir-a neɣ deg yimal. S wawalen imerna n wakud i nezmer ad nẓer melmi i teḍra neɣ ara teḍru tigawt.
Tamawalt

Msila:
Msila neɣ Tamsilt s teqabylit taqburt, tella d temdint di tmurt n wammas n Dzayer. Tela (Tesɛa) ugar n 156 647 imezdaɣen di 2008.

Tipaza:
Tipaza neɣ Bazar s Hcenwit, tella d tamdint di tmurt n Dzayer, tamudi 50 km ar utaram n Dzayer tamaneɣt. Tela (Tesɛa) ugar n 25.000 imezdaɣen deg useggas n 2008. Tamnaṭ-ines d tawalmaziɣt maca imezdaɣen n temdint bedden ttmeslayen s tmazɣit acku n iberraniyen i yellan di temdint, usan-d si temnaḍin tiɛarbin s wawal.

Belεid At-Aεli:
Belεid At-Aεli, neγ Izarar Belaid s yisem-is aweryan (unṣib), ilul ass n di taddart n Uzru Uqellal di tγiwant n Micli (Tala Lḥemmam) di Lεarc At-Mangellat. Yerna-d γaf 3 warrac niḍen d 2 teḥdayin. D netta i d amaẓuẓ gar-asen. Yemmut di sbiṭar n wid yettmettaten di Mεesker deg aggur n maggu 1950, s waṭṭan n barkilus. Deg usemmud-is 41 issegasen. Yiwen ur yesli, ladγa imarawen-is. Yiwen ur as-yefṛiḥ , yiwen ur as-yeqriḥ. Ula d aẓekka, ur ẓrin anda yenḍel.
Tameddurmant.
Belεid At-Aεli d yiwen gar imyura imezwura i yuran iḍrisen s teqbaylit deffir Si Σmer-U-Sεid Bulifa d Belqasem Ben Sedira. Ugar n 608 isebtaren i yura s tutlayt n yemma-s (kra seg ittafttaren-is yeγba later-nsen). Adlis-is « Les cahiers de Belaid ou la Kabylie d’antan) neγ "Tizmamin Belεid" yeffγ-ed deg ussegas n 1963 di Larbεa n At-Yiraten, sγur tiẓrigin n Fichier de Documentation Berbère (F.D.B). D tiẓrigin yeṭṭef J. M. Dallet d J. L. Degezelle. 
Yemma-s, Nna Dehbiya At-Ṣaleḥ, d lall n tmussni, tella d taselmadt n tṛumit. Teγra deg uγarbaz n Taddart Ufella di Larebεa n At-Yiraten (deg uγerbaz-a ladγa i telmed Faḍma At-Manṣur-Iεemṛucen). Akken tegguma ad tetruzi, ur tt-id-iṣaḥ ara ad textir anda ar a tesselmed. Γas akken d tafransist i tesselmad, Nna Dehbiya
tesslemd-asen i warraw-is akk taqbaylit. Belεid, yessen ad yaru maḍi. 
Belεid ilul-ed i tira. Ul-is yeččur d tirga d usirem γas akken tmarzit ddunit. D idlisen i d lεamr-is. Massa Lacoste-Dujardin tenna-d deg awal-is d akken Belεid d yiwen uqbayli imi γar tmal γar sin idelsan : idles aqbayli d win tṛumit. Limmer i s-yehwa ad yaru s tefransist akken xedmen wiyaḍ am Lmulud At-Mεamer, Lmulud At-Caεban (Feraεun) akked twacult Iεemṛucen, amkan-is gar-asen yiwen ur as-t-ittekkes. Maca, ul-is akken is-d-yerra umyaru Σmer Mezdad γar teqbaylit kan i imal : γas akken yesṭṭarḍiq tafransist, s teqbaylit i yextar ad yaru.
Isefra.
"Les Cahiers de Belaid ou la Kabylie d'antan", J.M.Dellet & J.L.Degezelle
Tamesluyt.
"Les Cahiers de Belaid ou la Kabylie d'antan", J.M.Dellet & J.L.Degezelle, neγ « Tizmamin n Belεid », Tiẓrigin n F.D.B, Larebεa n At-Yiraten, 1963.
http://fr.scribd.com/doc/21745461/Les-Cahiers-de-Belaid-ou-la-Kabylie-d-antan-par-Belaid-Ait-Ali

Icc:
Tarakalt.
Aɣrem n yicc d aɣrem (tamdint) ameẓyan. Illa di tmurt n Merruk. 
Ittwatta (ittwattu) gar idurar. Imezdaɣ-nnes d Imaziɣen. Si tella tudert illa Yicc.
Icc di tutlayt Tamaziɣt.
Ism “icc” d ism amaziɣ : icc = iccew niɣ aqellu ; asget : accawen. S tefransist, qqarn-as “la corne”. Qqarn-as imezdaɣ-ines Icc danis (acku) illa dis iǧǧen (yiwen) n udrar umi qqaren adrar n Yicc ; netta irwes ikk Icc. Imezdaɣ n tmurt-a qqarn-asen At Yicc niɣ Iyyicay/Ayyicey, Tiyyicay/Tayyiceyt.
Icc n tefriqt n ugafa.
Icc illa ukk usammar n Merruk, idis n drar wim qqaren Aṭlas n Ṣṣeḥra. Ittas-d gar idurar : Adrar n Yicc, Adrar n Unadur... aneggaru (anekkaru) n udrar n Iɛemmuren ɣer ugafa n Ifeyyey (Figig) ar 60 km.
Tudert i Yicc.
At Yicc d iwdan ixeddmen tamurt - urtan nigh iyyr’anat - ; tezz’an al cerrzen (kerrzen). Itnin (nutni) d ikerrazen. tamurt-nsen tesɛa aṭas n waman imiẓiden. Iwdan-nnes teddren s wurtan d wulli nnsen niɣ s tuffeɣt ar Fransa. D’ari, tuɣ ssaɣen al ezznuzen akd Tiṭ Tawraɣt, Tyiwt, Megrar n Ujenna, Megrar n Wadday, Busemɣun, Ifeyyey, Mẓab... Ass-u (ass-a), iqqen ubrid gar yicc d iɣerman nniḍen. Si 1976, tamurt n Yicc tedwel-dd (tuɣal-d) d tameẓyant. Aṭas n tezdayin n At Yicc llant di tlisa n uwanek azzayri ; aɣrem d kra n wurtan qqimen i tlisa n uwanek n Merruk. Ittwanked (ittwacerreg) gar uwanek n Merruk d uwanek n Dzayer.
Imezdaɣ n Yicc.
Imezdaɣ n Yicc d Imaziɣen, ssawalen tamaziɣt am tin n Ifeyyey, Busemɣun, Tyiwt... Awal-nsen ir’wes i tutlayt n At Mẓab d At Warglen. Itnin d imellalen n wudem am Imaziɣen nniḍen. Iqqim i Yicc day (ɣas) 20 n twaculin. Tin nniḍen ffɣent ar (al) Fransa niɣ r tmura nniḍen g Tmazɣa. Di Fransa, At Yicc zedɣen di Paris.
Irgazen xeddmen (tqeddcen) tamurt : cerrzen al essaken. Tisednan (tilawin) ettɣimant i tidrin (ixxamen). Ttzeṭṭant tijellabeyyin, ibernas, iselhamen, ticḍifin, al ttemḥewtent (xeddment i lkuzinet). 
Imeẓẓyanen, qqaren i likun (lakul) tamezwart. Wi xsen ad iɣer ujar iteffeɣ l tmura nniḍen.
Aɣrem n Yicc.
Aɣrem n Yicc isku akk am iɣermawen imaziɣen. Tidrin (axxamen) ennes skent s wuṭṭub d ucal (wakal). Zzat niɣ asammar n Yicc llan “iserdasen” n Dzayer (100 m), deffer, inn n Merruk (100 m). Yicc iɛalem “ettrisinti”, aman n tessi (aman ittwaswan), tamezgida, lakul tamezwart d tiddart n tejmaɛt. Issukkur i ameqran n tejmaɛt ; qqarn-as “lemqeddem”. 
Lakul-nsen teɛlem krad (tlata) n tzeɣwin “les classes”. Aɣrem en Yicc illa idis n yiɣzer jar idurar.
Tiddart (axxam) i Yicc d tameqqrant. Tesku am tenn n Ifeyyey : ṣaray “patio” ukk ammas, tizeɣwin ikk di-sen d id sswari zzat-sent...
Amezruy n Yicc.
Sukk mezwar n tudert illa Yicc. Ul (ur) illi wi ssnen amezwar n umezruy n tmurt-u. Tira s tmaziɣt, tuɣizin “les gravures” d tker’karin “les tumulus” ččurent idurar n Yicc. F umezwar n umezruy n Yicc ul nessin cra (kra). Aṭas n iseggasen, usen-d irumanen d’eânen, z’wan. Usen-dd waâr’aben qqimen. Itur’kiyen ul iwid’en tamurt en Yicc. Irumiyen iwḍen-tt ɣer iseggasen n 1860 niɣ qbel. D itnin (nutni) aykk ibdan tamurt n Yicc.
Yicc irwa tamara d waɛraben wim qqaren iɛemmuren. Tuɣ ettkeccd’en-t al-d-as ttacren timira “les récoltes” d wulli-nnes n iwdan ay d-asen nɣan waɛraben.
D Ifeyyey ay tuɣ iterra ttar’ n Yicc iẓran aṭas n tɣuyyit niɣ ett’rad ed waɛraben.
Yicc ass-a.
Ass-u (ass-a), Yicc illa ittwaz’eyyer jar iwunak n Merruk d Dzayer. Urtan-nnes d ibriden jar-as d iɣerman enniḍen, yisi-ten uwanak n Dzayer. Tidrin d cra n wurtan n Yicc, qqimen i Merruk. Nekd’en tudert en Yicc. Arra-nnes xsen ad ffɣen ul (ur) ufin manec (amek/mamec). Ittwatta Yicc, ttwattan iwdan-nnes jar timsi n Merruk d ten n Dzayer. Ayeça (azekka) a’ dd taley tfuyt n Yicc.
Aɣrem n Yicc.
Icc d aɣrem (tamdint) ameẓyan. Illa g tmurt n Merruk. 
Ittwatta (ittwattu) ger (jar) idurar. Imezdaɣ-is d Imaziɣen. Si tella tudert illa Yicc.
Idis n wedrar umi qqaren Aṭlas n Ṣșaḥra. Ittas-d gar idurar : Adrar n Yicc, Adrar n Unadur... aneggaru (anekkaru) n udrar n Iɛemmuren ɣer (‘l) ugafa n Ifeyyey (Figig) ar 60 km.
Icc s tutlayt Tamaziɣt.
Isem “icc” d isem amaziɣ : icc = iccew niɣ aqellu, deg usget semman-as : accawen. Qqarn-as imezdagh-nnes Icc acku illa dis yiwen (iğǧen) n udrar umi qqaren Adrar n Yicc ; netta irwes ikk Icc. Imezdaɣen n tmurt-agi (tmurt-u) qqarn-asen At Yicc naɣ Iyyicay/Ayyicey, Tiyyicay/Tayyiceyt.
Tudert di Yicc.
At Yicc d iwdan ixeddmen tamurt - urtan niɣ iyyr’anat ; tezzan al cerrzen (kerrzen). Itnin (nutni) d ikerrazen. tamurt ensen teâlem (tesɛa) aṭas n waman imiẓiden. Iwdan-nnes teddren s wurtan d wulli nnsen niɣ s tuffeɣt al Fransa. D’ari, tuɣ ssaɣen al ezznuzen agd Tiṭ Tawraɣt, Tyiwt, Megrar n Ujenna, Megrar n Wadday, Busemɣun, Ifeyyey, Mẓab... Ass-a, iqqen ubrid gar Yicc d iɣerman nniḍen. Si 1976, tamurt n yicc tedwel-dd (tughal-d) d tamez’yant. Att’as en tezdayin n At Yicc ellant i tlisa n uwanek azzayri ; aghrem d kra n wurtan qqimen i tlisa n uwanek n Merruk. Ittwacerreg gar uwanek n Merruk d uwanek n Dzayer.
Imezdaɣ n Yicc
Imezdaɣ n Yicc d Imaziɣen, ssawalen tamazight am tenn n Ifeyyey, Busemɣun, Tyiwt... Awal-nsen ir’wes i tutlayt n At Mẓab d At Warglen. Itnin d imellalen n wudem am Imazighen ennid’en. Iqqim i Yicc day (ghas) 20 n twaculin (elfamilat). Tinn nnid’en effghent ‘l Fr’ansa nigh ‘l tmura nnid’en i Tmazgha. I Fr’ansa, At Yicc zedghen i Paris.
Irgazen xeddmen (tqeddcen) tamurt : cerrzen al essaken. Tisednan (tilawin, timgharin) ettghimant i tidrin (axxamen). Ttzett’ant tijellabeyyin, iber’nas, iselhamen, ticd’ifin... al ttemh’ewtent (xeddment i lkuzinet). 
Imezz’yanen, qqaren i likun (lakul) tamezwart. Wi xsen ad igher ujar’ iteffegh ‘l tmura nnid’en.
Aɣrem n Yicc.
Aɣrem n Yicc isku akk am iɣermawen imaziɣen. Tidrin (axxamen) ennes skent s wutt’ub d ucal (wakal). Zzat niɣ asammar n Yicc llan “iserdasen” n Dzayer (100 m), deffir, inn n Merruk (100 m). Yicc iɛalem “ettrisinti”, aman n tessi (aman ittwaswan), tamezgida, lakul niɣ likun tamezwart d tiddart n tejmaɛt. Issukkur i ameqqran en tejmaɛt ; qqarn-as “lemqeddem”. 
Likun-nsen teɛlem krad (tlata) n tẓeɣwin “les classes”. Aɣrem n Yicc illa idis n yiɣzer (n wasif) gar (jar) idurar.
Tiddart (axxam) i Yicc d tameqqrant. Tesku (tebna)am tin n Ifeyyey : ṣaray (aṣarag) “patio” ukk ammas, tiẓeɣwin ikk disan did esswari zzat-sent.
Amezruy n Yicc.
Sukk mezwar n tudert illa Yicc. Ul (ur) illi wi ssnen amezwar n umezruy n tmurt-u. Tira s tmazight, tuɣizin “les gravures” d tkerkarin “les tumulus” ččurent idurar n Yicc. F umezwar n umezruy n Yicc ul nessin cra (kra). Aṭas n iseggasen, usen-d irumanen d’eɛnen, z’wan. Usen-d waɛraben qqimen. Iṭurkiyen ul iwiḍen tamurt en Yicc. Irumyen iwḍen-tt ɣer iseggasen en 1860 naɣ qbel. D itnin (nutni) aykk ibd’an tamurt n Yicc.
Yicc ir’wa tamara d waɛraben wim (umi) qqaren iɛemmuren. Tuɣ ettkeccd’en-t al-d-as ttacren timir’a “les récoltes” d wulli ennes n iwdan ay d-asen enghen waâr’aben.
D Ifeyyey ay tuɣ iterra ttar’ n Yicc iz’ren aṭas n tghuyyit niɣ etṭrad ed waɛraben.
Yicc ass-a (ass-u).
Ass-u (ass-a), Yicc illa ittwaz’eyyer gar iwunak n Merruk d Dzayer. Urtan-ines d ibriden gar-as d iɣerman nniḍen, yisi-ten uwanak n Dzayer. Tidrin d kra (cra) n wurtan n Yicc, qqimen i Merruk. Nekd’en tudert en Yicc. Arra-nnes xsen ad ffɣen ul (ur) ufin manec (amek/mamek). Ittwatta Yicc, ttwattan iwdan-nnes gar (jar) timsi n Merruk d tin n Dzayer. Ayečča (azekka) a’ dd taley tfuyt n Yicc.

Montreal:
Montreal (isem unṣib s tefrensist Montréal, s Teglizt Montreal) d tamdint tameqqrant ugar n timdinin tiyaḍ n temnaṭ n Kebek (Kanada), tamdint tis snat n umaḍal afrensisawal, d tamdint tis snat deg imezdaɣ d texxutert n tmurt n Kanada deffir Toronto. Taɣzut aɣreman n Montreal tela (tesɛa) ass-a ugarn 3,6 imelyan n imezdaɣ. Tezga-d deg tegizrt n Montreal ar ugersif n wasif n Saint-Laurent d wasif n Wuṭṭawen (Rivière des Outaouais), di 246 km ar unẓul-ugmuḍ si temdint n Kebek, tamaneɣt n temnaṭ n Kebek, ar 202 km seg Uṭṭawa, tamaneɣt n tmurt n Kanada.

Nnil:
Asif n Nnil d asif i ɣezzifen akk di Tafriqt. Tuɣzi-s d ugar n 6,500 km. Aɣbalu-nes yezga-d seg ugelmin n Victoria di tmurt n Uganda. Ideggeṛ iman-is di Maṣer deg yilel Agrakal. 

At Yaεla:
At Yaεla d yiwet taqbilt taqbaylit, tezga-d ar unẓul-ugmuḍ di tmurt n leqbayel deg tillas n yigezda n Bgayet, Sṭif d Burǧ Bu Aɛririǧ. 

Ifniqen:
Ifniqen d yiwen weγref agles ... agdud n Finiqya

Kenya:
Kenya ( /ˈkɛnjə/ or /ˈkiːnjə/), isem unṣib d Tagduda n Kenya, d yiwen n tmurt di tefriqt tanegmuḍt. Akwd agaraw Ahendi di wenẓul-ugmuḍ, ɣur-es tilas d Tenzanya di wenẓul, Uganda deg utaram, Sudan n Wenẓul ugafa-utaram-nes, d Itiyyopia deg ugafa d Ṣumal g ugafa-ugmuḍ. Kenya ɣur-s tasna n 580,000 km2, ugar n 43 imelyan imzdaɣ.Semmen tamurt-a f Udrar n Kenya. Tamaneɣt-is d aɣrem n Nairobi.

Isad Ṛebṛab:
Isad Ṛebṛab s tṛumit Issad Rebrab, s tfinaγ ⵉⵙⴰⴷ ⵕⴻⴱⵕⴰⴱ, d aṛmas aqbayli, d anemhal PDG n ugraw amguran Cevital; yiwet si termisin timeqṛanin di tefriqt isseqdacen azal n 12 000 imdanen (ixeddamen).
Tameddurt.
Ilul Isad Ṛebṛab ass n di tgemmunt azzuz , At Dwala deg tmurt n leqbayel ...

Faḍma At Manṣur:
Faḍma At Manṣur neɣ Faḍma At Manṣur Ɛamruc, Faḍma At Menṣur Σemṛuc yal tamnaḍt taqbaylit akken id tessenṭaq d tameṭṭut taqbaylit tamenzut i yuran adlis s tfṛansist iwumi tsemma tamacahutt n tudert-iw "Histoire de ma vie" deg useggas 1946 di Ṛades i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 1968, aseggas mbeεd tamettant-is. 
Tazwert n udlis-agi yura-tt Vincent Monteil akked Kateb Yasin.
D adlis ideg d-teḥka tudert-is, tin n yemma-s d tin n warraw-is, tudert-is seg wasmi tella di Tizi Hibel armi d asmi tedda d tislit ɣer Yiɣil Ɛli d yinig-is ɣer Rades di Tunes d yinig-is wis sin ɣer Bretagne (Breṭany]] di tmurt n Fṛansa. Faḍma d tayemmat n sin n yemyura, inaẓuren imeqqranen i d-yeğğan isem-nsen deg tsekla tafransist d yedles amaziɣ, Jean Lmuhub Σemṛuc d Marie Louiz Ṭawes Σemṛuc.
Tameddurt.
Faḍma At Mensur tlul deg useggas 1883 di Tizi Hibel, d taɣtest n wagul tga yemma-s mi qqaren Σayni acku tesεa-tt-id mbaεd mi teğğel s wacḥal yiseggasen mebla nnaε n zzwağ. Di taddart-is, tenḥaf aṭas, timetti n yimiren ur tt-tqal ara sawalen-as taqcict n lεaṛ, ɣef waya wwint-tt temrabḍin Iṛumyen yellan xedment di sbiṭar n Micli sekrent-tt-id, seɣrent-tt, dɣa mi temmed, tewweḍ 16 yiseggasen, fkant-as amḍiq gar-asent, txeddem dinna ula d nettat di sbiṭar, di lawan-nni dɣa i tt-yessen Belqasem At Σemruc i d wi tezweğ deg useggas 1899.
Mbeεd zzwağ-is, Faḍma tban-as-d tudert-nniḍen, tufa win i d wi tecrek lferḥ-is d lqerḥ-is. Belqasem yella-yas d ayen akk tt-ixuṣṣen di tudert-is, yefka-yas tayri, leḥnana, tagmat, yerra-yas-d taflest d laman deg yiman-is. Tedder kra yiseggasen gar yiεeggalen n twacult n urgaz-is syen unagen ɣer Tunes. Dinna, dɣa i tesεedda tugget n yiseggasen n tudert-is, tessekcem arraw-is ɣer uɣerbaz, tefka-yasen ayen akk ilaqen akken ad ilin gar wid ifazen, ufraren-d s tegzi-nsen, s tmusni-nsen kesben, ḥellan-d imeḍqan εlayen.
Faḍma d Belqasem, d ddin amasiḥi i ḍefren. Γef waya ad naf yal yiwen deg tarwa-nsen fkan-as sin n yismawen, yiwen d isem amasiḥi, wayeḍ d isem amaziɣ acku Faḍma ɣas tebεed ɣef wakal n lejdud-is maca teṭṭef deg yiẓuran-is, s wakka arraw-is ẓṛan ansi d-frurin. Dinna di Tunes, tezga tettcewwiq izlan n teqbaylit, tettawi-d timucuha n tgemmi n lejdud-is i dderya-s, tessaweḍ tefka-yasen idles-is, idles tuwret ula d nettat ɣef yemma-s. Faḍma iḥuza-tt aṭas yinig, ɣef waya tenna : "zgiɣ sarameɣ, yiwen n wass ad iliɣ di tmurt-iw, di tlemmast n taddart-iw, gar lejdud-iw, d wid d wi ttmeslayeɣ s yiwet n tutlayt, wid d wi zdiɣ yiwet n tmuɣli, yiwen n yiman neɣ rruḥ n tlelli, n tdukli d tmunent, d rruḥ n Yugurten". Deg wakken tfud, neɣ tḥemmel taqbaylit-is, tessaweḍ armi tettali ɣer sufella n tɣurfett akken ad tessemḥas i yemsebriden yettεeddayen zdat uxxam-is i d-yezgan deg ubrid ameqqran imi ara ttmeslayen s tcelḥit imi d tantala n tutlayt tmaziɣt yettcabin aṭas ɣer tantala taqbaylit.
Faḍma d adrar n ssber acku zyada ɣef lḥif i tt-iḥuzan di temẓi-is, rnu lɣerba i tt-yesbeεden ɣef wakal-is, terna-d tmettant yettawin arraw-is yiwen yiwen, d urgaz-is Belqasem, tewwet ssiεqa di tudert-is imi tezwer akk tawacult-is, d ussan irẓaganen i tessegra ala Ṭawes i s-d-yegran, tin i d wi tezdi lqerḥ-is.
Faḍma ur tunif ara i yir tudert tesεedda d wussan i tedder di tmurt n Leqbayel ad ten-tɣum tatut. Ayen i d-teğğa d agerruj, ɣur-s aẓar n tmedyazt d tẓuri. Ass-a, teqqim-d d azamul n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit timinigt s tesreṭ tamasiḥit yefkan i warra-is ttrebga izaden, i ten-id-yessufɣen d aggagen n yal ukud di yal amkan.
Temmut Faḍma di Sbiṭar n la Bretagne di tmurt n Fransa deg useggas 1967.

Strassburg:
Strasbourg (susru ), ' (susru ) s Talsassit et ' s talmanit, d aɣrem yezga-d deg ugmuḍ n Franṣa af iri azelmaḍ n wasif n Rhein. D tamaneɣt n temnaḍt Elsass d département n Bas-Rhin. Strassburg d asutel n Aseqqamu n Turuft seg 1949, du Amni Urufi si 1992 d Tasenbert Turufit n Izerfan n Wemdan di Leqṣer n Inzerfan n Wemdan si 1998, semmen-as tamaneɣt turufit. 
S imezdaɣ-ines, Strassburg d aɣrem amezwaru n Franṣa Tanegmuḍt d tis sat s ugdud-ines. </ref>Site du recensement de l’INSEE, izwilen di 8 maɣres 2006.</ref>.

Sus:
Tasga n Sus tella yiwet gar timndaḍin n tamurt n Umṛṛuk, tella af utaram. D yiwet lli aṭas ittuyssan s tmallayt d tasbbabt d tayerza. Iɣerman-ines imeqqranen llan Agadir, Tarudant, Warzazat, Tiznit, Tazaggurt, Ifni, Tinɣir. 
Lεamalat-ines Agadir Id-Aw-Tanan, Inezggan-Ayt Mellul,Actuken, Ayt Baha, tili tsggayad f 70,880 km². Yili ugar n 3,113,653 n imezdaɣ.
D-tamnaṭ anda qwan aṭṭas aṭṭas Yimaziγen, tuggar timnaḍin nniḍen n Tefriqt Ugafa. Imezdaγ-is ttemslayen "Tacelḥit". 
Tamnaṭ aggi tettwasen daγen s inazuren-is, s yiwen n ssenf n ccna d ccdaḥ umi qqaren Aḥwac. Aḥwac aggi, d ccdaḥ, d ccna, n Yimaziγen n Sus, anda ccenun, cceṭḥen s tarbaɛt. Yella Uḥwac anda argaz d-tmeṭṭut ttekin deg-s. Llant tuddar anda yella Uḥac n yergazen d uḥwac n tefraxin (tullawin). 
Tamnaṭ aggi tettwassen daγen s yiwet n teǧra umi sawalen " Argan". S wargan skarayen "zzit", skarayen deqs n tγawsiwin nniḍen i weccbub, i weglim, i lmakla, i sseḥa.

At Yeznasen:
At Iznassen llan yiwen n teqbilin i yellan deg tama tanegmuḍant n Merruk tama n tilas n Dzayer di tama n Wejda. Xas At Iznassen laṣel-nsen d Amaziɣ, tigti deg-sen ur ittmeslayen ara tamaziɣt ass-a acuk mazal (ursul) llan imdanen i yimelsayen-itt mliḥ imir-a. 
=Usunen (lɛerc)=
At Xaled.
At Xaled di tama n Weḥfir ar Fezwan. Di tmurt n At Xaled, At Mrin bnan leqṣer d ameẓyan, bnan yiwet (tict) "teqṣebt" ɣef ayed ad nezmer ad neẓra igulaz-is acku medden nfan-itt am yella akka. 
Iderman
At Menquc.
Iderman
At Urimmec.
Iderman 

Imeɣrawen:
Imeɣrawen d Imaziɣen i yekkan-d seg temwaya n Iznaten (Zénètes s tefransist). 
Iẓuran.
Imeɣrawen kkan-d si wefrak n Medɣas/Madɣis (Imedɣasen), d atmaten n At Yefren d Irnayen acku ɣef wayen U Xeldun, Imeɣrawen d Ifren d Irnayen d atmaten n Meɣra (Ameɣra/Ameɣraw).

Zemmuri:
Zemmuri naɣ Azemmur, d tamdint tamecṭuḥt di tewilayt n Bumerdas di tmurt n Dzayer af iri n Yillel Agrakal.

Taza (Merruk):
Taza (s Tifinaɣ : ⵜⴰⵣⴰ) d yiwet n temdint tamerrukant. Tezga-d deg wanẓul n temnaṭ n Arif.

Amsterdam:
Amsterdam d iɣrem (tamdint) tameqqrant, d tamaneɣt n Timura n Wadda. Iɣrem i zedɣen deg-s ugar n 850.000 n imezdaɣ.

Ḥusni Mubarak:

Tijelabin:
Tijelabin d tamdint n Dzayer i yezgan-d ar tama utaram n n Leqbayel di ugezdu n Bumerdas gar Tizi n At Ɛica d Budwaw ar 45 km n Dzayer tamaneɣt d 55km si Tizi Wezzu ar ugmuḍ. Tezga-d ar 4km n temdint n Bumerdas. 
Ass-a, tigti n At Tijelabin ttmeslayen s teɛrabt gar-asen, kra n tuddar tineṣliyin kan i yettmeslayen s teqbaylit deg tɣiwant-nni. 

Lla Yamina:
Lla Yamina, tacennayt ger tmezwura n teqbaylit. Isem-is n tidett s teqbaylit At Waɛrab Farruǧa, tulled deg temnaṭ n Yiγil Aεli di tama n wadda n tmurt Leqbayel (Basse Kabylie) deg usegwas 1905, temmut deg Yennayer 2008. 
Agwad n Lla Yamina ar radyu.
Lla Yamina tekccem ar ccna asmi id wwed ar Lezzayer deg usegwas n 1924. Imiren di laɛmar-is urɛad ɛcrin. 
Anekccum-is a Radyu n teqbaylit yellad s lemɛawna n snat tullawin. Yiwet deg sent qqaren-as Lla Tassaɛdit ( nettat d-tarumit, isem-is aḥeqani d Madame Lafages). Tissnat d Lla Wenissa, umi qqaren Qdim Ḥlima n tmurt n Umalu (Akruma n wassa). 
Ccna n Lla Wenissa d Lla Yamina akw Lla Zina, yezzi kkan s icewwiqen. Ulac allalen imiren, ala tuγac-nsent. Uyrna radyu n teqbaylit n yimiren ur tesawad-ara ar tmurt n leqbayel hacca ar tmurt n lγurba kkan ig iteffaγ ṣṣut-nsent.
Lla Yamina nettat tigjdit n ccna n teqbaylit, ger dit yerzan asalu ar ccna n tulawin di lweqt-nni anda ccna yella amzun d lɛar. 
Lla Yamina, Lla Wenissa akd Lla Zina, skerented tarbaɛt umi qqaren " Tarbaɛt n Lla Wenissa" deg segwasen nni n 30. 
Sakkin arnanted γursent Lla Cṛifa, Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant, Cabḥa, Jamila, sekrented nnuba umi qqaren " Urar Lxalat" yuγlen d "Nnuba Lxalat".
Lla Yamina tedda di ccna alami d asmi Imdebren n Radyu (Amaṭṭaf wis ssin) bgsend ad sngren urar n lxalat f lemwaǧi n radyu. Dγa Lla Yamina teffaγ si radyu deg segwasen n tesɛin. 
Tizlatin n Lla Yamina.
- Tafzimt-iw lfeṭṭa
- Aɛyiγ Mulaγ
- Berkayi deg zwaǧ ur nesliḥ
- A tarwa aɛzizen felli
- Ṭṭir lhawa
- Ay Asaru
- Ccaḥ ccah a ṛṛay-iw
- Ccurafa
Tamedyazt n Lla Yamina.
1) 
Amer llan igad yeccfan, 
D lfaḥmin yeγran, 
Nettḥibi lward nettezut, 
Nneqbed tiregwa w aman, 
Ar leǧnan iyi rran(t), 
Yefraḥ wergaz d-tameṭṭut, 
Mid negra deg laxxar n zman, 
Neḥdar mi-tt kksan, 
Σudna-s bab-is yemmut, 
Ma nruḥ nugad, 
Ma neqqim rebbi akka ig rad.
2)
Ccaḥ ccaḥ a ṛṛay-iw
D kecc ig bγan,
Mi teddid d win ik yehwan, 
Teǧǧid imawlan

Lla Zina:
Tacennayt Taqbaylit, iẓuran-is n At Wartilan. 
Tussad ar rradyu s ufus (lemɛawna ) n Lla Yamina akw d Lla Wenissa. 
Lla Zina, nettat n At Wartilan. Teccna deqs n lweqt deg Urar n Lxalat, Nnuba n Lxalat. Tecna daγen kra n tezlatin yettwaskelsen deg ḍebsiyen amzun : Aḥlilu, yella rebbi ad-as neḥku, Tislit tuggmed si tala.
Tizlatin-is.
- Aḥ aḥlilu yella rebbi ad-as neḥku
- Tiziwa
- Ṛṛuḥ
- Tislit tuggmed si tala
- Llah llah a sselah 
- Ssut cbuh, tiziri truh 

Ǧamila:
Ǧamila, tacennayt taqbaylit, ger yiwet irreṣṣan lsas i ccna unti n teqbaylit. 
Tameddurt-is.
Isem-is n tidett d Ǧuḥar Baccen, tlulled deg ussan imenza n tefsut n usegwas n 1930 (2 maggu 1930), deg temnaṭ n At Buhini ( tama n Iɛẓẓugen). Tawaccult-is d yiwet n twaccult muccaɛen, yellan si zik di Lzzayer tamanaγt. 
Ǧamila tezweǧ γur-es 12 n isegwasen kkan ar mmis n mmis n Ureski Lbaccir, argaz yenuγen, yemmuten f tilelli. Ddren akken yiwen lweqt di Buzriɛa di Lzzayer, unagen sakkin kra n lweqt ar Fransa. Cwit kkan, Lla Ǧamila tuγaled ar tmurt, tfureq nettat d urgaz-is. 
Abrid-is di ccna n teqbaylit.
Lla Ǧamila tewwded ar radyu asmi tella deg tama n Berthozène (La Grande poste d'Alger). D yiwet n tmettut umi qqaren Lla Cabḥa, yellan tettmediḥ imiren, i-tt-id yewwin ad twali amek ccenunt imiren. 
Liqal, Lla Ǧamila, tugguma ad-tekcem ar Radyu, si lxuf b awal n medden d laḥya n yimiren.
Tettɛawaded belli assen amezwaru igi id wwet ar Radyu, tuffa dinna: Lla Yamina tettawwid yiwen ucewwiq anda s teqqar: "Ay ul-iw nhed nhed, newwed ar tebburt nbed, ma d yemma aɛzizen ulaḥed, mad tagmatt llaḥ lḥed) , Lla Zina, Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant, Meǧdul Aḥmed, Qurici Zeṛṛuq, Sidaḥ, Ḥaǧ Racid. 
Yella daγen Ccix Nurdin, is yennan i Lla Ǧamila: "A taqcict, awi-yaγed icewwiq". Dγa tewwid winna " A dicini, tewwid-iyid arriyi". 
Texdem dva nnuba n ccna akw d Ccix Nurdin, d netta ig yellan d bab n uzawan ( chef d'orchestre) imiren. 
Teccna daγen deg Nnuba Lxalat i-teṭṭef Lla Tassaɛdit, ar tama n Lla Yamina, Lla Zina, Lla Cṛifa, Mimi Nabti, Tawes Nabti, Nwarra Nabti, Ǧamila Ḥassan (Massa Bugarmuḥ), Xedduǧ, Wṛida. 
Abrid-is deg wayyen nniḍen.
Lla Ǧamila tekki deg waṭṭas n tedwilin, gar-asent "Les femmes au foyer", ar tama n Lla Tassaɛdit ( Madame Laffage). Tettekki daγen deg yiwwet n tedwilt "Enfatine" ar tama n Σabdel Maǧid Benasar. 
Tetteki daγen deg sura s taɛrabt taγerfant (Le Colonel Si Belaid, Rameaux de Feu, Les Hors la loi, Leila, le Vent des Aurès), d-taqbaylit (Tawrirt Yettwattun).

Aɛli Caɛbani:
Aɛli Caɛbani, s tefṛansist Ali Chabani ; d yiwen ucennay n tmurt n Leqbayel, tamaṭ n Mɛatqa, Taɣiwant n Suq Letnin, id yezga azal n 20 ikilumitṛen ɣaf Tizi Wezzu, ilul ass n 2 yunyu 1977.
=Tameddurt n Aɛli Caɛbani=
=Isefra n tezlatin n Aɛli Caɛbani=
Ma muqleɣ.
=Tamselyut=

Tawerga:
Tawerga d yiwet n tiɣiwanin n Tamurt Leqbayel, tezga-d ar ugmuḍ uggug n ugezdu n Bumerdas.
Tarakalt.
Tawerga tella gar uzaɣar n Sabaw d yidurar. 
Llant kra n tuddar deg tɣiwant : Bni Ɛeṭṭar, Lǧemɛa, Bouhbachou, Budciha, Tingrin, Lkudiyya, Mazzer, Leɣdayer, Wad Hlal. Imezdaɣ ttmeslayen aṭas s teɛrabt gar-asen (d zdi muḥ).
Amezruy.
Deg uyyur n yennayer 1985, Tawerga tuɣal taɣiwant. Tella zik d taddart kan di tɣiwant n Leɛzib N Ccix (umi qqaren Baɣliya ass-a) deg utaram.
Tadamsa.
At Tawerga ggan aṭas n tekessawt di tɣiwant, zzit uzemmur dinna tela (tesɛa) aṭas n wazal, tella tafellaḥt deg idurar. 

Taɣzut:
D-taddart id yezgan di tγiwant n At Yellilten. 
Taddart aggi tezgad ddaw taddart n Tfilkut. Ifaqi-tt wassif nettat d At Yettura ( Buɛidel), akw d Ilulyen Umalu ( Agussim). 
Di taddart-aggi llant aṭṭas n twacculin gar asent llant : At Aεmar, At Ali U Musa, At Taḥar, At Ben Σisa, At Salaḥ, At Uqasi, Icaεllalen, At Buεzza, At Ali. 
Taddart anda tettili timecret, anda yettili usensi n Sidi Ḥend Uεbedellah, anda tettili temerγa anda ccenun inazuren imeqqranen n Teqbaylit am Zedek Mulud, Ali Ferḥati, Ali Mezyan
Izlan n lḥenni, id ttawin di Taγzut n At Yellilten.
1) 
Tasekkurt id yeccrurden deg udrar truḥ, 
Tebɛan-tt-id isegaden, id yeglan s lfuṛuḥ, 
Taggi ad-tt arnuγ i yesyi, ay izem amectuḥ, 
Tasekkurt id yeccrurden deg udrar tulwa (?), 
Tebɛan-tt-id isegaden, id yeglan s leḥnna, 
Taggi ad-tt arnuγ i yesyi, a mmis n Tsedda, 
Tasekkurt id yeccurden deg udrar tculla, 
Tebɛan-tt-id iseggaden, id yglan s lḥarma, 
Taggi ad-tt arnuγ i yesyi, ay izem lḥara,
Msemellaḥ ad nebdu ccekran, iγuraf n ttmar, 
D-acu id imenna wuy-iw d rebbi ad yeḥdar, 
Taggi as-tarnuγ i yesyi (flan nnaγ flan), a lbaz acmamar, 
Msemellaḥ ad nedbu ccekran, iγuraf n lǧǧuz, 
D-acu id imenna wuy-iw d rebbi amaɛzuz, 
Taggi as-tarnuγ i yesyi, a lbaz amekyus,
2) 
Acḥal ayyagi deg Malu Idurar, 
Ihelel waggur, tiziri tezwar, 
A win umi ferḥaγ yassed γar wurar, 
Acḥal ayagi deg Malu Leswar, 
Ihellel waggur, tiziri d lefnar, 
A win mu ferḥaγ yassed s amedhar, 
Acḥal ayagi deg Malu Tili,
Ihelel waggur, tiziri tuli, 
A win mu ferḥaγ yassed yarriyid, 
Acḥal ayagi, deg Malu Iγezzer, 
Ihelel waggur, tiziri tɛeǧǧar,
A win mi ferḥaγ, yassed ad yeḥdar,
3) 
Tasusmi ay At wurar ma yekkat wegris, 
Uyama yekkat wugris, tikyi nnaγ s yeqis, 
Fellawen ig ccbaḥ wurar ay At Ttaryis, 
Keccini ay Isli, a mmis p-g-b Ukyis, 
Tasusmi ay At Wurar ma yekkat wedfey, 
Uyama yekkat wudfey, tikyi nnaγ s yaɛqey, 
Fellawen ig yeccbaḥ wurar, ay At Yemkaḥey, 
Keccini ay isli (...?)
Tasusmi ay At Wurar ma tekkat yeḥwa, 
Uyama tekkat yeḥwa, tikli nnaγ s lyanna
Fellawen ig ccbaḥ wurar ay At Lhaṛa, 
Keccini ay isli a mmis n tsedda,

Lla Ḥnifa:
Lla Ḥnifa, isem-ines aḥeqani Iγil Larbɛa Zubida. Semman-as ar Ḥnifa, weltma-s n Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant, iy ccnan cwit deg isegwassen n rebɛin.
Tameddurt-is.
Tluled deg tama n Yiγil Mhenni ( Aẓeffun) deg usegwas n 1924. Tawacult-is truḥ ar Lzzayer am waṭṭas n twacculin tiqbayliyen n yimiren iwakken ad affen aγrum d uxedim.
Asmi yebda traḍ urumi d uliman (2WW), tawaccult Iγil Larbɛa tuγaled ar Tmurt n Leqbayel. Zubida mid uγal ar tmurt n leqbayel
Deg usegwas n 1957, lla Ḥnifa tunag ar Fransa am waṭṭas n Inaẓuren di lawan nni. Mid tewwed ar Paris, tebda tamεccit waεen macci drus, tamεccit n waccu id yefka wass yeccat yid. 
Deg usegwas n 1957, lla Ḥnifa temllal d Kamal Ḥemadi, yettnadin γaf ṣṣut n tmeṭṭut ara yeccnun yides taγect "Yidem yidem". Dγa yuffa Ḥnifa. 
Asmi yekfa traḍ n timunent, tuγaled Lla Ḥnifa ar wakal n tmurt. Teccna cwit di Lezzayer, tetteki deg tmeγriwin, teccna di "Nnuba Lxalat". 
Deg usegwas n 1973, lla Ḥnifa tuγal tuγalin taneggarut ar Fransa, anda temmut deg usegwas n 81. 
Abrid-is di ccna.
Abrid-is di ccna yebda deg temzi-s asmi tella di taddart. Ulac tameγra anda ur tettγni ara, anda ur teɛmir-ara urar. 
Asmi id uγal ar Lzzayer deg usegwas n 1951, temllal ak d Lla Yamina, d nettat i-tt yewwin alami d radyu, anda tetteki di tedwilt " Urar lxalat" ar tama n Lla Zina, Lla Cṛifa, Lla Yamina, Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant. 
Imiren daγen i tebda ccna akw d l'orchestre n Ccix Nurdin, ukud teccna kra n tezlatin am tinna " Lḥeǧla Ilili". 
Tizlatin-is.
- A gma texdaɛdiyi
- Siwla-s i Wrida
- A zhar-iw anda tenzid
- A rebbi farreǧ
- Ayen ɛcra snin
- Ay aqcic sers tabalizt
- Ay amitru
- d ṛṛay-iw
- A sidi Aberḥeman
- Aytma lfiraq yuɛar
- Lukkan macci d keccini
- Aḥya Mali
- Debber tura
- Iffuk Laman
- Tawerdett
- Ccaḥ deg ṛṛay-iw amccum
- Yestma
- Ay Afrux
- A yelli a yelli
- A Talimantt
- Wuffan zḥar-is d saɛa
- A zhar-iw a bu tsuqas
- Aḥku-yid
- Agma aḥmam
- Ay Adrar
- A tibratin
- Akka macci akka
Tizlit.
Alala, alala, 
Tura d nnuba n lxalat, 
Alala, alala, 
Tura d urar n lxalat, 
Ay abrid n Sidi Σic, 
Yelha i rrekba ukamyun, 
A taqareεtt n ṛṛiḥa, 
Id yeddan daxel n uqelmum, 
Saḥit a bab n tmeγra, 
Iweqmen urar i wedrum, 
Ay abrid n Sidi Σic, 
Yelha i rrekba u taxi, 
A taqereεtt n ṛṛiḥa, 
Id yeddan daxel Ibidi, 
Saḥit a bab n tmeγra, 
Iweqmen urar i lγacci, 
Ay abrid iεzzugen, 
Yelha i rrekba iεudiwen, 
Ay abrid iεzzugen, 
Yelha i rrekba iεudiwen, 
Ssahit a bab n tmeγra, 
Tameγra s ideballen,

Lǧida Tamectuḥt:
Lǧida Tamectuḥt, isem-is aḥeqanni d Lǧida Aεrab. Tllul deg usegwas n 1948.
Nettat d yelli-s n gma-s n Lla Yamina, tacennayt tameqrant n teqbaylit. 
Tacennayt taqbaylit. Tebda ccna deg useggas n 52 deg tedwilt n warrac umi qqaren "l'émission Enfantine", d lla Taseɛdit (madame Lafarge) i yellan ɣef uqerru n tedwilt-agi deg umeṭṭaf aqbayli.
Tizlatin n Lǧida Tamectuḥt.
- A taxatemt
- Walaγ tassekurt ( tecna-tt ula d nettat)
- A wi ufan ṛṛay n ṛṛay-is
- Mi muqleγ
- Tiqcicin n Leqbayel

Urar Lxalat:
Urar lxalat, daggi ad nebder snat n lemɛani. 
Urar lxalat deg taddart.
D ccna id-ttawint tulawin, tullas, lxalat deg tmeγriwin, deg sensiyen, di mlal mara yilli lfarḥ deg uxxam, nnaγ deg twacculin. 
Zik d myla taddart, mara yilli lfarḥ, tullawin ad duklen s amakan iwulmen am wenar, afrag, anda ara sekrent urar.
Tin yesnen ad tewwed abendayer, ad tedem abendayer, tullas nniḍen ad ccenunt, ad selwliwent. 
Tizlatin n wurar n lxalat.
- Mreḥba s imawlan-iw, assa yaɛmar wexxam-iw ( tizlitt i teccna Nwaṛṛa)
- A lxur yewwan, fkiyi-d aman ad swaγ, am taɛyun ssuy-i-d ttnudumaγ, 
- Wallaγ tasekkurt sufella n tzemmurt, argaz-is iṛṛuh ibedel tamurt
- Yuklal udar-im ad yeqqen axelxal, yerna f zzin-im a lward amellal
- Laɛyun tiberkanin
- Assa d lfarḥ-iw
- D nnuba-k fraḥ (ifer ibawen, yeggman d asawen, xeluntt ɛcra yeḥya-tt-id yiwen, d nnuba-k fraḥ)
- Tamγra g izem aγiles, yulli wass (Tizlitt n Kassia)
- Tezga ṣṣifam gar wallen-iw, d lbaḥr n leḥub-im γarqaγ (Tizlitt n Taleb Rabaḥ)
- Awi-yid amendil-iw, ad ruḥaγ ar laḥlil-iw, ur ttagwad ard uγalaγ, serḥiyi ad ruḥaγ (Drifa)
- A lwaldin aneft-iyi (Ait Menguellet)
- Eṭṭes eṭṭes mazal lḥal (Ait Menguellet)
- Keccini ṛṛuḥ (Ait Menguellet)
- Snat n tullas (Ait Menguellet)
- Ccdeḥ-im ig yexfifen, γiwel, γiwel, saɛa ard uγaled seg At Yiraten
- Aḥ yeǧǧa yemma-s, yettu i tɛetteb fella-s (Akli Yahyaten)
- Temγrat yewwded lfarḥ-im, xas kkes anezgum tura, neǧmaεend warraw-im atnan wwdend am yiran (Farid Ferragui)
Urar n lxalat nnaγ nnuba n lxalat.
Tadwilt yebdan deg rradyu n teqbaylit deg segwasen imenza f tlallit n rradyu. 
Udem n tedwilt aggi am wurar n taddart, ad nejmaɛnt lxalat, ad awwint abendayer, ccenccina, tikwal tettili derbuqa, ad bdun ccna. 
Tadwilt aggi tebda seg mi teldi rradyu, tettwaḥbes deg usegwas n 90 asmi id yussa yiwen umdebar ikerḥen taqbaylit. Asmi tella tadwilt aggi, tacennayt id yenulfan, ilzem-as ad ɛiddi di tedwilt aggi, anda imsefliden takkend ṛṛay-nsen, anda daγen ḥefdenṭ ccna, icewwiqen, aẓawan. 
Am Nwaṛṛa, am Ǧamila, am Cṛifa, llant γaf uqarruy n tedwilt aggi id yettɛadin di radyu tis snat, kull as ddurt. 
Gar lxalat i ccnan deg urar n lxalat: 
- Wṛida
- Lla Lǧida Tamuqrant
- Lla Ḥnifa 
- Lla Cṛifa
- Lla Yamina
- Lla Zina
- Lla Cabḥa
- Rabiɛa
- Lla Ɛica
- Lla Wardya
- Nwaṛṛa
- Lila
- Dalila
- Saliḥa Mezager
- Anisa Mezager

At Aεmar:
D-isem n twaccult, yellan deg deqs n tuddar deg tmurt Leqbayel ( ama tamurt b adda, ama tamurt n ufella).

Yassin Amaɛuc:
Yassin Amaɛuc d amarir aqbayli n ddabex. Illul deg wass n 26 yunyu 1979 di Amizur (Bgayet). Yurar tura am umenṭag i weklub n USO Amizur, am uṭṭun 11 (mraw-d-yiwen). Iket 171 cm deg lqedd d 67 kg deg teẓeyt.

Acewwiq:
Acewwiq, d yiwen n ssenf n uẓawan n Yeqbayliyen. 
Acewwiq yezmar ad yili s taγect n umḍan, nnaγ s tjewwaqt.

Faḍma Zuhra:
Fatma Zuhra, tacennayt tabqyalit, ig lullen deg Lzzayer (Lebyar) deg usegwas 1906. Temmut asmi tewwed 94 isegwasen di laɛmer-is.
Tedder cwiṭ n lweqt deg yinig di Franca nettat d urgaz-is. Dγa, deg yinig i tebda ccna deg leqhawi n Yeqbayliyen di Lpari. 
Deg yinig temllal daγen d inaẓuren iqbayliyen am Baḥya Faraḥ, Da Sliman Σazem, Ccix Aɛraγ Buyzgaren. 
Ger tezlatin teccna Faṭma Zuhra, llant : 
- Ay axelxal aǧdid
- Annaγ a Muḥend a mmi
- Ad nili labas
- May rad uɛessad
Teccnan nettat akw d Sliman Σazem tizlitt nni umi yeqqar " Nek akw d kem, kem akw d nek". Nezmar daγen ad as nsell deg tezlit-nni n Ccix Aεrab Buyzgaren umi yeqqar " Anfas, anfas". 
Asmi id uγal Faṭma Zuhra ar tmurt n Lzzayer, tettiki deqs n lweqt deg "Nnuba n lxalat" n rradyu tis snat, anda teccnu akw d Lla Cṛifa, tiyyad daγen. Tekkemel deg nnuba n lxalat, alami d asemi i tekfa tedwilt aggi.

Lla Cabḥa:
Lla Cabḥa, d yiwet n tcennayin tiqbayliyen ger timenza id yussan ar rradyu s teqbaylit, uqbel ad tili radyu tis snat. D nettat id yewwin Lla Ǧamila alami d radyu. 
Lla Cabḥa tella tcennu deg radyu ELAK, d radyu Berthozène. 
Yiwet seg tezaltin ines, teqqar-as : "Ay ucbiḥ useḍsu".

Wṛida:
Tacennayt taqbaylit, yebdan deg segwasen n 50. 
Wṛida, d yelli-s n Lla Yamina. Isem-is n tidett Wṛida Ixerfelliwen (Xerfellah s taɛrabt). 
Wṛifa teccna deqs n tezlatin, yettwasenen aṭṭas aṭṭas, umi ɛawden waṭṭas n inaẓuren n tura. 
Taγect-ines telha nezah nezah, dγa asmi teḥbes ccna, yeγlid leḥzen af ccna n teqbaylit. Da Crif Xeddam yezga yettemeslayed γaf ssut n Wṛida. 
Tizlatin n Wṛida.
- Recdaγak a ṭṭir
- Ay aɛziz ṛiḥ di laman (akw d Farid Aεli)
- Lwali
- Aγrib ur nesɛi Lwali
- A ṭṭir amelγan
- Lward yeffsan
- Ay aɛziz teǧǧit-iyi (akw d Awezzelag)
- Leḥna
- Wallaγ tasekkurt
- Wuffan ṛṛay n ṛṛay-ik (Deux versions différentes) 
- Sin Isefsafen
- Ay ul iǧerḥen
- Ala ssbar d ulaqrar
- Ad hubben laryaḥ
- Ketbaγ tabratt s ukaryun
- Ṭṭir amelḥan
- Lbabur
- Rruplan yuffeg iɛella
- Aγrib am assa ad yass
- Γenni Γenni
- Tamusni
- Iǧaḥ dayen
- Sbaḥ zik i tafrara
- Barka Barka ( akw d Muḥemed Ḥilmi)
- Ad-t muled (akw d Muḥemed Ḥilmi)
- Kkiγ
Teccna ukud waṭṭas inaẓuren iqbayliyen, gar-asen : Muḥemed Ḥilmi, Ahsen Mezani, Farid Aεli.

Ɛemmal:
Ɛemmal d tɣiwant n ugezdu n Bumerdas, ar 50 km n Tizi Wezzu d Ledzayer (tamaneɣt) d Tubiret deg utaram n Tmurt n Leqbayel. D taɣiwant i yexdimen aṭas tafellaḥt. 
Imezdaɣ-ines d leqbayel n tidet, tɣiwant d tagellilt s aṭas acku adabu n Ledzayer ur yebɣa ara taneflit n temnaṭ-agi. Ulac tiɣbula i wakken tettkker ar ufella tadamsa ḥaca tafellaḥt. 
Deg useggas n 2008 Ammal ɣur-es tamudi n 8 505 imezdaɣ. 
Tudrin.
Kra n tudrin n tɣiwant taqbaylit n Ammal. 

At Ɛemran:
At Ɛemran d taɣiwant n Ledzayer deg ugezdu n Bumerdas (seg useggas n 1985) di Tmurt N Leqbayel. Ar 1975 tezga-d deg ugezdu n Tizi Wezzu armi Bumedyen yerra-tt deg ugezdu n Tubiret, di lweqt n Cadli tuɣal-d deg ugezdu n Bumerdas, tasertit ay d sseba. 
At Ɛemran zgan-d ar 60 km si Tizi Wezzu, Tubiret d temdint n Ledzayer. Imzedaɣ n tɣiwant akk deg-sen i yettmeslayen Taqbaylit slid Idebbaɣen. 

Ɛellawa Zeṛṛuqi:
Ɛellawa Zeṛṛuqi (ilul-d 5 yulyu 1915-yemmut 17 wamber 1968) d acennay aqbayli mechuren n timiḍi . 
Tuddert-is.
ilul-d deg 5 Yulylu 1915 (05 Juillet 1915) di taddart Ukerma id izgan di tɣiwant umalu laɛrec n at ɛidel, baba-s Sɣir zeṛṛuqi id yussan si taddart Izeṛṛuqen (Leflay) di laɛrec n At Weɣlis, ar taddart ukerma akken ad iccix fella-sen, yemma-s ɛezzug weṛdiya (yelli-s n Ukerma).
Zik imawlan tgamin ad gren arraw nsen ar iɣerbazen ifransisen qaren makken tɛawalen ad sefḍen isem azayri akk d ineslem
baba-s n ɛellawa ur ixulef ara f wiyaḍ, netta daɣen yugi ad igger mmi-s ar dina ,i-gger-it ar timɛemert umalu (zzaweya n aḥmed u yaḥya umalu) akken ad ilmed leqran akk d tutlayt taɛrabt. 
Cwiṭ kan akka yemut γaγa-s yegra-d Ɛellawa d agujil netta akk d gma-s Malek d yemma-s ig refden asawad ,t-rebba- d arraw- is di lḥif d lmaḥna ,
Ɛellawa yeweḍ tura 15 iseggasen di lɛemer is netta lxedma n tfelaḥt ur s tehwi ara , it ḥibi cnna, akk d tgitart is dayma deg uḍan unebdu itruḥu ar yiwen n weẓru di ṭerf n taddart akken ad icnnu akk ad ikes f ul is netta d yimdukal-is a d win i-seman azru n lejnun id yezgan gar taddart Ukerma akk d taddart n Tizi Weqdem (Amalu)
Sina iruḥ ar tamdint n Weqbu ,sin akkin ar Bgayet akken ad inadi aɣrum-is , dina ig xdem d aḥefaf g yiwet n tezniqt iqqaren "Azniq Faṭima" dina daɣen ig sɛa ccix Sadeq Abǧawi lqahwa , Ɛellawa illa ma ad it ḥefif i yemdanen ad icennu , asmi is -d -sla sadeq abeǧawi iɛejb as sut is ḥlawen ihi ifka -y-as afud igerzen akken ad ikcem ar ubrid a n cnna. 
Seg imi ɛellawa icennu di tmeɣriwen di bgayet, g ǧiǧel, deg uqbu icnna ulla deg Umalu (di tameɣra n wemdakil-is)
Cwiṭ kan iɣli-d llaẓ f tmurt, lqaɛa ur d tak ara, lxedma ulac , medden akk luẓen, gma-s n ɛellawa t-nfat fransa ar kayan , netta ilaq ad yawi aɣrum i yemma-s, ihi iruḥ netta akk d wemdakul-is ar Fransa anida ig xdem di lmina g Marseille ,lxemda n lmina teɛteb t-semsax Ɛellwa innumen it beday ar iman-is yarna ur innumen ara leɛab amuqran, ur yewwi ara iwanect-a dina ig ǧǧa lxedma nni iruḥ ar Paris,ixdem dinna d aḥefaf , neɣ di leqhawi. Sina iruḥ ar Lyon anda ig xdem barman , dina issen yiwet n trumit it iɛawnen aṭas,
deg useggas n 1951 Ɛellawa yuɣal-d ar tmurt akken ad ixṭeb yelli-s xali-s newara illan tecbaḥ teɣra yarna d yelli-s umerkanti , acu kan baba-s n taḥbibt-is yugit acku netta d acennay cnna di lweq nni d lɛib amuqran, yarna Ɛellawa iznez akk taferka is-d iǧǧa baba-s ,ihi ar at twacult is ur isɛi ara ṛṛay.
Ɛellawa ur iqdiɛ ara layas yuɣal ixeteb -d newara acḥal d abrid , akken baba-s n tina yeguma ad iḥnin fella-s iruḥ ar lqayed ben aɛli crif , icetka y-as dina id iceyeɛ ar bab as n Newwara inna-yas as tefkeḍ yelli-k mulac ak nfuɣ ar kayan. Ɛellawa yuɣ Newwara , cwiṭ kan sɛan-d mitsen amezwaru 
sina akkin iwwi tawacult is ar Fransa , dina itwala Newwara tarumit-nni , ur t-qbil ara s liḥala-nni ur s yehwi ara at freq argaz is akk d tayeḍ ,tuɣal-d ar tmurt tegguma at uɣal ar Fransa , Ɛellawa yuɣal ar Fransa akk d mmi-s , ma d Newwara -sɛa-d yelli-s di tmurt argaz-is ur ihdir ara 
newara truḥ ar trad n lezdayer temmut d tameɣrast. 
Ɛellawa netta daɣen it ikki di trad dina di Fransa , iznez akk ayen yesɛa akken aten imud i yemjuhad.
Deg 17 wember 1968(17 novembre 1968) yemmut yemṭel di tmeqbert n Thiais di Fransa.
Abrid n cnna.
Ɣas akken ɛellawa illa iḥemmel cnna ,yrna icennu di tmeɣriwin akk d leqhawi maca ur -d yessufeɣ ara aḍebṣ ines amezwaru armi d 1948 dina id icenna snat n tezlatin yiwet s teqbaylit "telifon ṣoni ṣoni" anida id yeḥka taḥkayt is wezilin akk di lxedma n lmina, ti snat s taɛrabt "laḥbab lyum" 
sina issufeɣ d acḥal tasfift
icnna deg seggas n 1964 di teleγision maca ulac later is ass-a 
-tizlatin is akk d netta i-ten --id ittarun d netta diɣ isen-t id ixedmen aẓawan nsent
-di tizlatin is iḥeku-d ayen akk isɛeda di tudert-is , tigujelt-is, lɣerba s, tayri-s, lfiraq akk d tmeṭṭut-is, tamurt is, ...
-di tuder is akk icnna alla yiwen n duo netta akk d bahiya faraḥ di tizlit yugi ad yuɣal 
-ixdem aṭas akk d ɛemrawi missum 
-imlal acḥal d acennay d t-cennayin: Akli Yeḥyaten, Kamal Ḥamadi, kedouǧa...

Ddabex uḍar:
ilaq ad yili asefray iwakken ad isefru timlilit
Ddabex uḍar s tfinaγ ⴷⴷⴰⴱⴻⵅ ⵓⴹⴰⵔ naγ Football (futbol), Soccer di Marikan ugafa d yiwen waddal tturaren-t snat trebbuεa n 11 imyuraren deg annar. Iswi n yal tarbaεt, d asekcem n ddabex imdewweṛ γer ucebbak n temḥaddit nniḍen kter is u mebla aseqdec n ifassen.
Ittwasengel sγur legliz (igliziyen) di tagara n timiḍi tis XIX. Asegwas n 1904, ddabex uḍar yuγal yesεa "Amqun agraγlan" FIFA, asegwas n 2006, llan azal n 264 imelyunen n yemyurar n ddabex uḍar deg umḍal, yarna yella d-addal amezwaru deg aṭas n tmura. Di kra imenẓawen am tafriqt, turuft d tamrikt unẓul ddabex uḍar iγmer addalen nniḍen acku urar-is d ushil, ur yesseqdac ara aṭas n ttawilat.
Llan-t snat n tewsatin n tirmitin di tfada: tidak n iswuten d tidak n trebbuεa tiγelnawin. Taqbuct n ddunit d tirmit tagraγlant yesεan azal ameqṛan nezzah. Tettilid yal 4 isegwasen seg 1930.
Amezruy.
Uraren n ddabex s uḍar llant si zman aqbur (Taglest). D uraren kan illan maci d-addal. Igrigiyen llan snen aṭas n wuraren n ddabex uḍar: "aporrhaxis d phéninde" di "Athènes" d "épiscyre" di "Sparte". Γer Iṛumyen daγen kifkif, llan tturaren "pila paganica, pila trigonalis, follis d harpastum". Icinwaten daγen tturaren ssenf n ddabex uḍar i wumi qqaren "Kuju". Iḍrisen icinwaten imezwura iḥekkun γef urar agi llan-d di timiḍi tis kraḍ uqbel sidna Σisa. Di tagara n timiḍi tis XV, Kalčiu Florentin yellad di Ṭelyan, d netta 

Izlan:
Izli ( izlan ma llan aṭas), d yiwent n ssenf deg tzuri taqbaylit ( tamaziγt s umata). 
Awal aggi sexdament i ccnawi id ttawwint tullawin deg tmeγriwin ilmend n lḥenni. 
Deg kra n tamawin n Tmurt n Leqbayel, izlan sawalen-asen Asbuγar, Tibuγarin.
Izlan n At Yellilten.
Ad selliγ f nnbi, 
Yissek ay nbedu,
Accṛif Muḥemmed, 
Yeγran lḥemdu, 
Ayyagi d lfarḥ, 
S rebbi ad-as neccfu,
Ad selliγ f nnbi, 
Netta ig zdin lsas, 
Sidna Muḥammed, 
Iccbeḥen lahdur fella-s, 
Kemmlaγ deg lfarḥ, 
Ay Agellid Aεsas,
Arriγed tiregwa, la siridaγ lḥara, 
Ad kksaγ laḥzen, yellan deg wacḥal ayya, 
Taǧmilt i rebbi, taǧnant tegred tara, 
Arriγed tiregwa, la siridaγ iseqfan, 
Ad ksaγ leḥzen, yellan deg wacḥal n zzman, 
Taǧmit i rebbi, leǧnan yewwted s iẓuran,
Arriyed tiregwa, la siridaγ imnaren,
Ad ksaγ laḥzen, yellan deg yexxamen, 
Taǧmilt i rebbi, leǧnan yegred ixfawen, 
Arriγed tiregwa, la siriday ixxamen,
Ad ksaγ leḥzen, yellan deg ulawen, 
Taǧmilt i rebbi, taǧnant tegred afriwen

Izlan n Igerssafen.
Ḥeǧbaγed yḥenni, cced-is warɛad yeffsi, 
Zziγed i lhara, Gi yella sbaɛa uremyi, 
Keccini ay isli, tisas n yizem aweḥci, 
Ḥeǧbayed lḥenni, qbey ad bezgen waman, 
Zziγed i yhara, gi yella sbɛa yḥemam, 
Keccini ay isyi, tisas n yizem amezyan, 
Ad selliγ f nnbi, ad yers lḥenni, 
Bwint ymuyuk, di tmura yhenni, 
Ad yeqqen yesyi, ay izem aweḥci, 
Ad selliγ f nnbi, ad yers ymetred, 
Bwint ymuyuk deg wanda yebɛed, 
Ad yeqqen weqcic ay azrar n dheb, 
Keccini a baba-s, d-tiγmart γef i-d yarna lsas, 
Ay itri imcaɛcaɛ, id yullin tagara n wass, 
Adrum igi tellid, ur yettgwad lweswas,
Keccini a baba-s ay aγanim uẓetta, 
Ay aǧgu n dheb, yegren iǧga lfeṭṭa, 
Adrum gi tellid, ur yettgawad mi(k) yesɛa, 
Awi-d afus-ik, awi-d aḍad ayeffus,

keccini ay isyi, tisas n yizem amekyus, 
Awi-d afus-ik, awid aḍad aziymad,

Keccini ay isli, tisas n yizem amezyan
