Ccnawi:
D yiwen n ssenf deg tẓuri taqbaylit. 
Zik qqaren "ad ccnuγ" flan nneγ flan, d lmaɛna-s ad awwiγ imeslayen qqariḥen ( ad ɛayraγ ) ṣṣifa, lqed, lesɛaya, tirrugza n wihin nneγ wihin. 
Tura ameslway aggi ibeddel lemaɛna, yuγal d asgwet ( pluriel) n umeslay ccna (chanson).

Amaɛzzbar:
D yiwen n ssenf n tzuri n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit. 
Amɛazzbar yettili deg tlemmast n wurar n lxalat, anda ad kkrent snat n trebaɛ n lxalat. 
Yiwet n tarbaɛt ad tili ttin n "temγarin", tinna nniden ad tili ttin n "telmezyin", dγa ad bdun ccna. Tarbaɛt-nni n temγarin ad kkatent s umeslay deg telemzyin. Tarbaɛt-nni n telmezyin ad kkatent deg temγarin. 
Anect-a aggi yakw yella s uneccraḥ d uzmumeg.

Asbuγar:
D yiwen daγen n ssenf n ccna unti ( n tullawin) deg tmurt n Yeqbayliyen. 
Deg kra n tamiwin, ssawalen-as "tibuγarin". D tullawin id yettawin tibuγarin mara tili temγra, lextana ilmend n tuqqna n lḥenni. 
Di mkul taddart deg Tmurt n Yeqbayliyen, di mkul tawaccult, llant tbuγarin iwulmen i twaccult-nni uγur yella lfarḥ, uγur tella tmeγra.

Tifilkut:
Tifilkut
D-taddart id yezgan deg temnaṭ n At Yellilten.
D yiwwet n taddart muqqren aṭas. 
Sawalna-s zik Taddart m sebεa iderma.
Deg taddart aggi yemmdel yiwen wergaz yettwasnen aṭas deg Umezruy n Yeqbayliyen " Si Ḥend Welqadi", yellan seg twaccult n At Welqadi, yettfen tagelda n Kuku.
D yiwet n taddart anda llan aṭas n inazuren, gar-asen kra seg tarbaɛt n Abranis (Karim, Belɛid). D-taddart id yefkan daγen yiwen wergaz yettwasen aṭas deg umezgun, waggi d Bubker Imaxxuxen.
Kra n twacculin n taddart n Tfilkut.
- At Si Abdelqader
- At Muḥend
- At Lḥaǧ Muḥend
- At Sidnas
- At Abdella
- At Maẓi
- Imaxxuxen
- At Uqasi
- At Aεli
- At Yemuyud

Tiẓiṭ:
D yiwet seg tuddar n At Yellilten, id yezgan deg udrar.

Buεidel:
D yiwet n taddart id yezgan deg lεarc n At Yettura. Ar tama tayeffust d-taddart n Yexdaccen. Ar tama-s ufella, taddart n Mniɛ. Ar tama-s n wadda, d assif yekkan gar-as akw Taγzut n At Yellilten.

Ixdaccen:
D yiwet n taddart n lεarc n At Yettura. Taddart-aggi tettwasen s leccyax-is, s yimrabden-is.

Zzubga:
D yiwet seg tuddar n At Yellilten. 
Taddart-aggi tettwassen s yergazen-is (les cadres) yellan s waṭas deg Lzzayer, Waḥran. Tettwasen daγen s tezdegt-ines, s nniḍam-is. Deg taddart-aggi tella tuddkli, twizi.
Skren aṭas isenfaren (projets) ilmendad n yelmezyen akw d imezdaγ n taddar-aggi. Deg taddart aggi ilmeẓyen lemden allallen n uẓawan (instruments de musique). 

At Aεziz:
D yiwet n taddart n lεarc n Yellulen Umalu. Ar tama-s tayeffust tella taddart n Mzeggen. Ar tama-s tazelmaṭ d adrar n Ǧerǧer. 
D yiwet n taddart anda imdanen-ines xeddem aṭas tafelaḥt.

Iẓnagen:
Iẓnagen llan di zik yiwet n tdukkli n teqbilin timaziɣin akwd Iznaten d Imeṣmuden. Ar ass-agi aṭas n teqbilin d yimḍiqen d twaculin semman iman-nsen s yisem-nni.
Aẓar n wawal.
Iẓnagen, «At Aẓnag», Aẓnag mmi-s n Abernus (Branis/Ibernas), d mmi-s n Maziɣ, lejdud n akk yimaziɣen. Amuzilg n yisem Iẓnagen yekka-d seg waɛraben n zik i wumi ur yezmiran ara ad susren imesilwen imaziɣen am Yag (G) ur yellan ara s teɛrabt. 
Ad nufa daɣen imuzligen-agi : Ifnayen, Znaga, Zenaga, Sanaga, Senaja, Senhadji, Sanhdja, Sanhadja, Çanhaja, Sinhâja.
Amezruy.
Iẓnagen llan wehḥric n Nnumidiya n zik, zedɣen-tt si zik. Iẓnagen llan imir-nni ddren akk deg uxxamen di Tmazɣa akwd Yezwawen, Ijnaten, Imeṣmuden d Yektamen. 
Iẓnagen kkan-d seg unẓul-utraman n Uneẓruf, maca sakin d-yusin iɛraben, tiqbilin regglent ar ugafa ar Weṭlas Alemmas ar Aṭlas n Uneẓruf d Tmurt Leqbayel.
Isem n wasif Sinigal yekka-d seg yiẓnagen, s ufus n Tburtigizt Sanaga.
Gar teqbilin n yeẓnagen ad nufa :

Tixencelt:
Tixencelt neɣ Xencla, d tɣiwant n tmurt n yicawiyen d tamaneɣt n twilayt n Txencelt. Tezga-d deg temnaṭ n Wawras deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Ledzayer, ar 1122 lmitrat deg tfellayt af yillel. Llan deg useggas n 2008 ugar n 108 580 imezdaɣ di tɣiwant-nni. 
Tarakalt.
Tixencelt tezga-d deg ugafa n twilayt n Txencelt, ar 470km seg Ldzayer d 100km seg Tbatent ar wegmuḍ. 
Bnan aɣrem-a deg ukessar n iɣallen imezwura n udrar n Wawras, ar utaram a d-nufa yiwet teqacuct i wumi qqaren Ixf n Sidi Ɣris. Deg wegmud illa yeɣzer n Baɣay.

Tawrirt Aεli Wnasser:
D yiwet n taddart id yezgan deg lεarc n At Yettura. Ar tama-s tayyefust llan Imezwaγ, At Manṣur, Buεidel.
Kra n twacculin n Tewrirt Aεli Wenasser.
- At Sεid
- Illemassen

Aɛumar:
Aɛumar d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tubiret i-d yezgan ar ugugas utraman (confin) n Tmurt n Leqbayel af wakalen n yinezliwen xas ttweɛraben aṭas imezdaɣ deg-sen d sruḥen tamaziɣt am tmiwa am Delles neɣ Lexḍareyya. 
Tarakalt.
Aɛumar tezga-d ar 95 km seg Ledzayer Tamanaɣt, deg ubrid aneɣlaw wis semmus (RN 5) i d-yettawin ar Qsenṭina. Amkan agejdi n tɣiwant illa gar RN5 d RN25 (abrid i-d ittawi si Tacentirt ar Tizi Wezzu) ar wekan i wumi imezdaɣ qqaren-as "Bracema" (Aɛumar-Tamersiwet)
Aɛumar di 1998 tela azal n 20 532 imezdaɣ, tigti deg-sen reggwen taremɣa (terrorisme) deg tuddar d ixliǧen deg useggasen n 1990. 
Tuddar.
D axliǧ agejdi n tɣiwant, bnan-it tama n tmersiwet (gare)

Asif n Sabaw:
Asif n Sabaw d asif agejdi n tmurt n Igawawen deg ugezdu n Tizi Wezzu ar Delles anda wasif itteḍegger iman-is deg Ilel Agrakal. Sabaw yefka-d isem-ines ar uzaɣar i-d yezger wasif, azaɣar-nni anda tella waṭas n tfllaḥt seg Tirẓaẓin ar Tadellest. 
Tarakalt.
Sabaw d amkan adeg aman n Ǧerǧer d Wekfadu ittemlillen. Akk n isfaen ar ufella d yiɣezran ḍeggren deg wasif n Sabaw akwd Wasif n Messuya di tama n Iferḥunen. 
Isafen Imecṭuḥen n wemdun n Sabaw.
Isafen id yeḍgren deg Sabaw : 

Ǧerba:
Ǧerba d tagzirt, di tama n Gabes azɣar deg teftist n Tunes. 
Aglam.
Ǧerba ɣur-es anezwi alegɣan adeg nufa akal d acebḥan. "Tamaneɣt"-ines d Ḥumt Suq anda zedɣen ugar n 65 000 n yemdanen. Tella aṭas n tamerrit deg tagzirt-a, acku tiftisin d yiṭij n tegzirt d tiɣerfranin s aṭas i yemerrayen seg akk n Turuft i d-yusan (Fransa, Alman, Ṭelyan). Yerna surrten usaru amzewaru n saga n Star Wars di Ǧerba (S tmaziɣt : Ṭrad n Yetran) deg useggas n 1977. 
Di tagara, nezmer ad negra tamawt belli deg tegzirt n Ǧerba llan ineselmen n ɛibadiya akwd kra n wudayen dinna. 

Seattle:
Seattle d tamdint n Awanek n Washington deg ugafa-utraman n Yiwunak Yeddukklen,tezga-d gar Puget Sound d Ugelmim Washington, ar 165km seg talast gar Iwunak Yedduklen d Kanada. 
Seattle d yiwet temdint tigejdiyin af yiri n Agaraw Amelwi. Diɣ asagen ameqqran f tnezzutt gar Asya d Tamrikt. 
Llan 630 320 imezdaɣen deg temdint-agi, semman-as ɣef wayen yiwen uɣella asrew Seattle. Qqaren-as daɣen Jet City acku d Boeing ara tettwasen Seattle akwd tiẓegwa-s tizegzawin. 

Agemmay Amaziɣ Alatin:
Agemmay Amaziɣ Alatin yefsa ɣef ugemmay Alatini. I umaziɣ n ugafa (Merruk d Lezzayer d Libya], agemmay Amaziɣ Alatin isseqdac 23 isekkilen Ilaṭiniye imɣulen d 11 isekkilen nniḍen n ugemmay Alatin.
Agemmay agi d agmud n uzdal n agemmay Alatin i tirawt n tileqmant timaziɣint am Taqbaylit d Tarifit, seg iseggwasen 1840. I εedda s aṭas isseɣwelen, uqbel ad yaweḍ ar lqem amiran.
Iqbayliyen semman-as Tamεemmerit, tajmilt i Mulud Mɛemmri, amesnilsi i t-yersan "deg udɣaɣ" aseggwas n 1973.
Agemmay Amaziɣ Alatin isseqdec abaεda i tirawt n amzun akk tileqmant n tutlayt Tamaziɣt. Yezmer daɣen ad yeseqdic i tutlayin n Merruk (tid i seqdacen Tifinaɣ).
NB: Zik nesseqdec "ṛ", "ț", "ʐ", maca mači tura (Kamal Naït-Zerrad, Tajerrumt Tatrart n Teqbaylit).
Isekkilen imɣulen.
Tira: I ubeqqeḍ n isekkilen s Tifinaɣ, zdem afaylu agi : ircam.ma, dɣa ḥrez it ddaw "C:\windows\fonts" (beddel "C" s usekkil n uẓar ma Windows ur yeserkeb ara deg uḍebsi C).
Nniḍen.
(*) Agraw Imaziɣen

Zichyújfalu:
Zichyújfalu d yiwet n taddart n 941 imezdaγ, i d yussan di temnaṭ n Fejér, Hungri, s zdat n Székesfehérvár.
Tizgin.
tiγiwanin i as-d-yezzin d Seregélyes, Szabadegyháza, Gárdony akk d Pusztaszabolcs. Taddart tussa-d rrif n rraya n tmacint 44 (Székesfehérvár–Pusztaszabolcs).
Amezruy.
lkaγeḍ amenzu i d-yuddren Zichyújfalu yettwaru ass n 1239.

Puella Magi Madoka Magica:
Puella Magi Madoka Magica (魔法少女まどか☆マギカ, "Mahō Shōjo Madoka Magika?", Magical Girl Madoka Magica) (2011) d yiwen u manga shôjo/magical girl (unuɣ yettembiwilen n Japun) ig yura Gen Urobuchi.
Agzul
Deg temdint n Mitakihara, yiwet teqcict n 12 iseggwasen akk d-temdakwelt-is Sayaka Miki mugrent yiwen u mexluq (isem-is Kyubey) i sent idisumren yiwen ugatu akken ad uɣal-ent ttiqcicin teseḥḥirin (Magical Girl), i wakken ad nnaɣ-ent tiseḥḥarin n diri, acku d nutenti id yeskaray-ent deεwessu deg umḍal. Yiwen w-ass, tusa-d yiwet n teqcict tamaynut ɣer uɣeṛbaz andi teqqar Madoka. Taqcict agi ur-tebɣa-ara at'teǧ attuɣal taqcict taseḥḥart. Ass id γtes Madoka atteqbel agatu n Kyubey, tfaq-ed belli tudert n teqcict taseḥḥart ur-tushil-ara...

Kawabata Yasunari:
Yasunari Kawabata (川端 康成, "Kawabata Yasunari"?) ilul ass 14 yunyu 1899 di Osaka, yemmut ass 16 brir 1972, d amyaru n Japun. Yewwi arraz Nobel n tasekla di 1968.
Tameddurt.
14 yunyu 1899, deg tallit n Meiji, id ilul Kawabata Yasunari, war ccek, d yiwen umyaru ameqṛan n tasekla tajapunit. Ilul di Osaka aseggwas n 1899, yeggujel segmi ig yella d amecṭuḥ. Ilul d amarir, tadawsa-ines teqqim ur-teǧhid-ara akkw tamgeṛt-is. Yerna, yeɣra taɣuri ɛlayen , imir-nni yewwi anefḍis seg tesdawit n Tokyo (1924).
Deg 1924, yessufeγ tasγunt "Bungei Jidai" akk d umddakwel-is Yokomitsu Riichi. Dges, yura yiwen ungal "Izu no odoriko" (taceṭṭaḥt n Izu). Deg 1935, yura "Yukiguni" (Tamurt n wedfel), adlis-is ig musan aṭas.
Deg 1968, yewwi arraz n Nobel n tasekla, swin ig yuγal musan deg utaram. Yemmut deg 1972. 
Ayen yura.
Izu no Odoriko - 1926
Asakusa Kurenaidan - 1930
Yukiguni - 1935-1937-1947
Meijin - 1951-1954
Senbazuru - 1949-1952
Yama no Oto - 1949-1954
Mizuumi - 1954
Nemuru Bijo - 1961
Koto - 1962
Utsukushisa to Kanashimi to 1964
Kataude - 1964

Yaman:
Yamen naɣ Tagduda n Yamen (Taɛrabt : Al-Jumhuriyah al-Yamaniyah, ﺍﻟﺠﻤﻬﻮﺭﯾّﺔ اليمنية), d tamurt taɛrabt i d-yezgan af yixf deg wenẓul-ataram n Taɛraba (Arabie), tamanaɣt-is d Ṣenɛa. Ɣur-es tiftisin akwd Ugaraw Ahendi d Yilel Azeggaɣ. 
Yamen yebḍa tilisa-nes d Tagelda Tasaɛudit deg ugafa d Ɛuman g wegmuḍ, tesɛa tajumma taɣrudt n 527 970 km². 
Zikenni, Yamen yettwassen ddaw isem n Taɛraba Tumart (Arabie Heureuse), Yamen n wass-a yillul-d deg useggwas n 1990 sakkin tadukli n Tegduda Tagdudant d Taɣerfant n Yamen (Yamen n Wenẓul) d Tegduda Taɛrabt n Yamen (Yamen n Ugafa).

Maison Ikkoku:
Maison Ikkoku (めぞん一刻 "Mezon Ikkoku?") d yiwen u manga n Rumiko Takahashi. Yeffγ-ed di Japun s takwebbanit n Shôgakukan seg 1980 γer 1987.
Agzul
Yusaku Godai, yiwen unelmad ig xseṛen yak tikelt timzizlin akken ad yekcem γer tasdawit, yeγtes yiwen w-ass ad yeǧǧ tamezduγt andi ig yettili netta ak d kṛaḍ yimedanen (Ichinose-san, Akemi Roppongi, d Yotsuya-san). Acku kṛaḍ agi ur-tettaǧǧan-ara ad iγer.
Dacu kan, ass-nni, tusad tamasayt tamaynut n tmezduγt nni n Yusaku. Yiwet n taǧǧalt n 30 iseggwasen i mi semman Kyoko Otonashi.
Yusaku tehwa-yas aṭas Kyoko. Yerna, yesεa yiwen amenzay ameynut, Shun Mitaka, yiwen uselmad n tennis. Yecbaḥ yernu d ameṛkanti.
Tamellayt tanafrayt agi att-nzeg sa n iseggwasen. Aniwa ara yawin ul n Kyoko...

Si Maḥmud Wazza:
Si Maḥmud Wazza d yiwen unaẓur ameqqran n tẓuri taqbaylit. D yiwet seg tgeǧda n uẓawan Aqbayli. 
Tameddurt-is.
Si Maḥmud Wazza illul deg tama n Yeγbuliyen deg At Wartiran, deg usegwas n 1924.
Deg usegwas n 1938 iṛṛuḥed ar Lzzayer tamanaγt f uḍar. Yeṭṭef lexdma deg Ben Σaknun. Di la Qasba n Lzzayer yemlal d inaẓuren am Ḥmed Meǧǧdul, Mulud Lbaḥri, Ḥaǧ Racid, Ḥaǧ Zerruq. 
Deg useggwas n 1944 alami 1955 yella di Fransa.
Abrid-is di tẓuri.
Yeccna deg Umaṭṭaf n teqbaylit deg usegwas n 1940 s lemɛawna n Ccix Nurdin. 
Yeccna kra n tezlatin am : Aguǧil, Jet-iyi ad γenniγ (1958), Lɛiq Tamuqrant, d waṭṭas n tezlatin n ddin (Ameddaḥ) akw d Lla Cṛifa, Lla Yamina, Lla Zina, Ccix Nurdin. Yesɛa nnig 100 n tuγac. Imeslayen n tuγac-is n Ccix Nurdin akw d Aεmar Uḥadda. 
Deg 1955 yesɛedda timzizelt (le concours), irrebaḥ-i-tt. Dγa yekccem ar Rradyu n Teqbaylit. Di rradyu yekkat taǧewaqt, lefḥel, lγida i marra inaẓuren n Rradyu n Teqbaylit.
Yettiki di tedwilt "La Muḥamadya" deg fus n Ccix Lɛenqa akw d Aεmar U Yaεqub, Muḥ Akli (n At Wartilan), Aεmar Ujelwaḥ. Deg tedwilt aggi n "La Muḥamadya" ulac tullawin yettikin deg-s. Nutenti sɛant tadwilt n ccna n ddin waḥden-sent. 
Yexxdem akw d Ccix Leḥsnawi deg Fransa (deg usegwas n 1944), Akli Yahyaten, Daḥman Lḥarraci, Cṛif Xeddam, Ṭaleb Rabaḥ, Maεṭub Lwennas, Lla Cṛifa, Lla Yamina, Lla Zina. Yessen daγen wiyyad am Zerruqi Σellawa.

Aεmar Uḥadda:
Aεmar Uḥadda d yiwen unaẓur ameqqran aqbayli. D yiwen gar imezwura n Rradyu n Teqbaylit.
D acennay, yexxdem taγen amezgun n ṭaḍsa s Teqbaylit.
Tameddurt-is.
Anwa-t ? Illul deg usegwas n 1921 di tezniqt n Laḥna (rue des martyrs ) deg Lzzayer tamanaγt. Izuran-is deg At Wartilan. 
Deg 1937 yezweǧ. Ɣures 15 n igurdan. 
Yella ixeddem deg "le port" n Lzzayer.
Abrid-is di tẓuri.
Deg usegwas n 1942 yettiki d adrabki deg tarbaɛt n Meẓyan Buseksu. Yurar akw d Waεrab, Muḥuc. 
Asmi yuden Ccix Buseksu dγa yeṭfi-tt Aεmar Uḥadda. 
Deg usegwas n 1945-1946 iṛṛuḥ ar tedwilt n Ccix Nurdin iwakken ad yeccnu s teqbaylit. 
Deg usegwas n 1948 iṛṛuḥ ar Fransa anda yeccna.
Yexxdem akw d Ccix Nurdin, Amrawi Misum, Ccix Aεrab Awzelag, Yusef Abǧawi
Yexxdem ama tuγac ama d amezgun s teqbaylit ( Taccequft umi isemma taqbaylit deg usegwas n 1981). Yesker daγen "les sketchs" : Yefraḥ yezweǧ, Aεmar di ssuq (1985), Aεmar di la cite, Aεmar di Remḍdan.
Tizlatin-is.
Da Aεmar Uḥadda yesɛa azal n 30 n tezlatin deg rradyu n teqbaylit s teqbaylit. 
Gar-asent llant: 
- A baba sεu laεqel
- Ulac wi εzizen felli
- Amayaf
- Attay yewwded lexrif
- Asmi yella d afelaḥ
- Ṭṭef kkan imi-k
- Isem n yemma

Dunkerque:
Dunkerque ("Duinkerken" s tahulandit) d tamdint deg ugafa n Fransa (Hauts-de-France). Tesεa imezdaγ.

Créteil:
Créteil (asusru [kʁe.tɛj]) d aɣrem (tamdint) afrensis n agezdu n Val-de-Marne, deg temnaṭ Île-de-France. Yella azal n imezdaɣen i zdiɣen tamdint-a deg useggas n 2009, gar-asen kra n Leqbayel. 
Ar ṭrad n umadal wis sin Créteil tella d taɣremt tagamant, maca teẓra seg 1955 Créteil aṭas n teẓɣwin n ugmam n Mont-Mesly d wemasdag Charles-Gustave Stoskopf. Créteil tuɣal-d tamaneɣt n ugezdu n Val-de-Marne s yiwen tenaṭ (décret) n 1965. Seg wasmi bnan aṭas n yizudaɣen : Hôpital Henri Mondor, Préfecture, Hôtel de Ville, Palais de justice.
Igmamen.
Illa tmerwin igmamen deg tɣiwant n Créteil. 

George Orwell:
Eric Arthur Blair (d isem-ines s tidet) d amyaru Ingliz, ilul-d deg 25 yunyu 1903, immut g 21 yennayer 1950.
Yiwen seg yedlisen-ines yettwasenen aṭas macci cwit, d winna umi yeqqar : 1984. 

Minsk:
Minsk, (Tarusit : "Мінск") d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Byelorusi. Zedɣen deg-s 1,9 imelyan imezdaɣen.

Igzennayen:
Igezennayen neɣ d yiwet n tqebilt di yeffus (wenẓul-utaram) n Arif.
Imdanen-ines qqaren-asen Igezennayen, nutni ssawalen (meslayen) s tutlayt Tamaziɣt.
Tuddar imeqqranen di tmurt n igezennayen d : Icaweyyen (Aknul),Ajdir, Tizi Wesli, Bured,Ineḥnaḥen, Tala Tazeggwaɣt. 
Igezennayen mutyen (ɣriben) aṭas ɣer Turuft d timdinin n Merruk am Taza, Fas , Ameknas , Rbaṭ ... Taza d tamdint deg illan aṭas n Igezennayen.
Igzennay tella deg wammas n "userdas n tlelli" neɣ "Armée de libération" s trumit. Irumiyen semman tamawin n Aknul, Tizi Wesli , Bured" s "Akraḍan n Tmeṭṭant" niɣ s tefransist " triangle de la mort ".

Blaise Pascal:
Blaise Pascal ilul deg g Clairmont (Clermont-Ferrand n wass-a) deg Fransa, immut deg g Paris. Yella d afelsuf, amsnulfu, d amaru afrensis.

Alma Waklan:
Alma Waklan (Tafrensist : Maoklane) d taɣiwant n tama ugafa n ugezdu n Sṭif deg temnaṭ Taqbaylit. Tezga-d ar 70km si Sṭif, deg ugafa llan Idurar N Ibaburen, deg wenẓul Ḥammam Gergur (Aɛrabwalen). 
Kra n turdin mazal-iten i ttmeslayen s teqbaylit kan, gar-asen ad nufi : It Yeḥya, Zrur, Tizi N Brahem. 
Ɣef wayen amiḍan n 2008, zdiɣen ugar n 15 715 imezdaɣ g tɣiwant-a. 

Lla Cṛifa:
Lla Cṛifa, ism-is n tideţ Wardya Bucemlal, tluled d It Ḥalla, taƔiwanţ n Ilmayen (di Burǧ Bu Ɛririǧ) aseggwas n 1926. Țacennayt taqbaylit yellan seg tmezwura yesulin ccan i w-cewwiq d'uḥiḥa. Tecna f ddel, tecna f l'girra, tecna f yargazen d l'xalat, tecna f Rabbi d lawliyat.
Tameddurt-is.
Akken id ţεawad neţţat s yimad-is, asmi tella tamctuḥt, t-kes tiγeṭṭen g tmizar n xwali-s. Acewwiq-is musnaw di taddart ulamma imiren, di tmurt n leqbayel, d lɛib i teqcict ad tecnnu.
Anda tesla i yenzizen u bendayer, a ţaɣiţ tawla a-ţaɛnu afrag anda yella wurar iwakken a-ţecnu d l'xalat nniden.
Asmi tesawwed 18 isegwasen di laɛmer-is, teǧǧa tamurt-is, teṭṭef abrid-is ar Lžžayer. Dγa, deg tmaccint i-tt yewwin ar Ležžayer, tewwid acewwiq anda is teqqar " Bqa ɛla xir ay Aqbu, tura ifuk zhu".
Kra n lweqt kan mi d sawwed ar Ležžayer, tameṭṭut n xali-s Lla Yamina n Yiγil Aεli, tewwi-tt ar Radyu anda tebda dγa abrid is di ccna. Tufa di Radyu Lla Zina Tawertilanit, Lla Wnissa Taxerfelliwt. Cwit kkan terna-d Lla Lǧida Tamuqwranţ, Ǧamila, Ḥnifa.
T-ţεawad-ed di lweqt-nni yella kan "srid" (en direct) ulac asekles.
Tizlatin n Lla Cṛifa.
Lla Cṛifa tettɛawaded belli teccna ugar n 800 tezlatin. Assa, tid id yegwran ţid yellan di Radyu akw ţid teskles iw znuz.
1) Tizlatin n Ddin
2) Tizlatin n Trad
3) Tizlatin n lfarḥ
4) Tizlatin nniden 

At Tizi:
At Tizi d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Sṭif di tmurt n Ledzayer. 
Tarakalt.
Taɣiwant n At Tizi tezga-d ar tama n ugezdu n Bgayet, ar 24 km si Buɛendas d 12 km seg Yilel Agrakal. Tamnaṭ-a d tamedrart di tama n Weqqas. 
Tudrin.
Ad nufi gar tudrin n temnaṭ : 

Ahaggar:
Idurar n Ahaggar,neɣ s Tmaceq Idurar Uhaggar, d idurar n utaram n Uneẓruf Ameqqran (Ṣṣeḥra) g wenẓul n tmurt n Ledzayer. 
Isem.
Imucaɣ neɣ Imajeɣen (Imaziɣen n Uhaggar) qqaren idurar-nni "Idurar Uhaggar", d isem i d-yekka seg wawal Ahaggar (asget : Ihaggaren) i wumi qqaren Ihaggaren (Inublen/Ccerfa) gar Imucaɣ n temnaṭ-a.
Tarakalt.
Tamnaṭ tamedrart n Uhaggar ɣur-es tajumma azal n 540 000 km2, ugar tin n Fransa. 
Taqacuct n yidurar-a tella d Tahat, deg 3004 lmitrat af yilel. 

Ḍrifa:
Ḍrifa d yiwet seg tcennayin tiqbayliyen n isegwasen n sebɛin-tmanyin. 
Tella deg tarbaɛt (chorale) n Si Belḥanafi am Ǧegiga, Malḥa, Cabḥa. Tullas-agi ccnant aṭas n tuγac akwd Twat Murad, Dalil Σumar, Sayǧi Belεid. 
Teccna deq-s n tezlatin id as yura Si Belḥanafi. 
Tella daγen deg tarbaɛt n umezgun n rradyu n teqbaylit anda turar deq-s n tceqqufin ar tama n Anisa, Nwarra, Ǧamila, Salima, Acruf Yidir, Buɛraba, Cabḥa.

Drifa:
Isem-is aḥqani d Zahra Ǧuder.
D yiwet n tcennayin tiqbayliyen n isegwas n sebɛin-tmanyin. 
Abrid-is di ccna.
Tetteki deg nnuba umi qqaren "Icennayen uzekka", id yettqedim imiren Si Belḥanafi. 
Tella deg tarbaɛt (chorale) n Si Belḥanafi am Ǧegiga, Malḥa, Cabḥa. Tullas aggi ccnant aṭas n tuγac akw d Twat Murad, Dalil Σumar, Sayǧi Belεid, 
Teccna deq-s n tezlatin id as yurra Si Belḥanafi d Taleb Rabaḥ.
Tizlatin-is.
- Awi-yid amendil-iw
- Awid afus-im qqarbed (Si Belḥanafi)
- Beddaγ malaγ (Taleb Rabaḥ)
Abrid-is deg umezgun n teqbaylit.
Tella daγen deg tarbaɛt n umezgun n rradyu n teqbaylit anda turar deq-s n tceqqufin ar tama n Anisa, Nwarra, Ǧamila, Salima, Acruf Yidir, Buɛraba, Cabḥa.
Ger tceqqufin igi tettiki, llant : 
- Tamuγli
- Asensu n barra n temdint

Sid Aεli n At Qasi:
D yiwen n unaẓur aqbayli, yeccnan, yettekin deg waṭas n tceqqufin umezgun n teqbaylit. 
D yiwen daγen n unaγmas n rradyu n Teqbaylit.
Yebda deg tazwara n usegwas n sebɛin deg nnuba n imectuḥen n Maǧid Bali. Iɛdda sakkin ar nnuba n "Les Amateurs" - Iḥfaḍen n Wecruf Yidir. 
Iɛedda ar tesgilt n Cṛif Xeddam deg usegwas n 1969. 
Yeḥbes asegwas f lǧal n lehlak-is, umbɛed yuγaled ar umaṭṭaf n teqbaylit anda yeskles adebsi-ines amezwaru. 
Tizlitt-is tamezwarut "Acḥal iγezzifed a yid" deg usegwas n 1972. 
Tizlatin-is.
- Lḥenni
- Ssuded ay aḍu
- Ma ttruγ
- A lukan
Ticeqqufin anda yetteki.
- Lakul (ar tama n Baḥbuḥ Ḥamid, Buɛraba, Cabḥa, Salima, Ḍrifa, Mḥenni, Anisa, Debbac). Tettwaskels deg usegwas n 1986. 
- Asensu n barra n temdint (ar tama n Ḍrifa, Salima)
-Tamuγli ( taceqquft yura Si Belḥanafi, ar tama n Nwarra, Ḍrifa, Acruf Yidir, Anisa, Salima, Mḥenni, Buεraba, Debbac Rabaḥ)

Twat Murad:
D yiwen n ucennay aqbayli n usegwas n 70. 
Yeskles idebsiyen-is ar Maḥbubati.
Iɛedda-d ar tilizri ( Télé) deg usegwas n 1979-1980, deg yiwet n tedwilt f Lγazi.
Abrid-is di ccna.
Iɛedda ar tedwilt n "Iḥefaḍen" sγur Belqassem akw d Mḥenni At Waɛmiruc (Amroun).
Iɛeddad deg "La Salle Atlas", akw d Wakli Yeḥyaten, deg usegwas n 1973. 
Yexxdem daγen yiwet n tmeγra deg "Ḥusin Day", anda teccna daγen Massa Buccafa, asmi tebda ccna kkan.
Tizlatin-is.
- Lemḥibba n temziw (ixedmi-tt akw d Cṛif Nadir, Ǧamel Cir ar derbuqa) deg usegwas n 1971. 
- Inna-s ( Akw d Cabḥa)
- Nek d kem, ferqnaγ ( Akw d Cabḥa)
- Urriγ tabratt i tin ḥemlaγ

Zira:
D yiwet n tneγmast deg Umaṭṭaf wis sin (Amaṭṭaf Aqbayli) di Lzzayer. D yiwet daγen yettarun deg Uγmis "La depeche de Kabylie" s teqbaylit abrid i durt.

Tamelyant:
Tamelyant (Tarumit d Teɛrabt: Miliana), d taɣiwant n wegmuḍ n ugezdu (wilaya) n Ɛin n Ddefla. Tela (tesɛa) azal n 39.662 n yimezdaɣen deg useggwas n 2008.

Muṛad Zimu:
Muṛad Zimu d acennay aqbayli ilulen deg taddart Acallam (taγiwant Ifiγa, Iεeẓẓugen, Tizi Wezzu) ass n . Yeγṛa deg uγerbaz Iεeẓẓugen alarmi id yebwi turagt n "BAC" asegwas n 1989, sinna yelmed Timettisent di tseddawit n Ldzayer. M-id yebwi turagt, yekcem γer s agezdir n tutlayt d idles Amaziγ n tseddawit Mulud At Mammar di Tizi Wezzu asegwas n 1995 iwakken ad iheggi agerdas n Majisteṛ.

Michel Platini:
Michel Platini (illul-d g 21 yunyu n 1955, di Joeuf, Mosel, Fransa) yella d amarir afrensis n ddabex n uḍar si 1972 ar 1987. 

Takkunt:
Aglim u qqaru, am uglim nniḍan, yettekes ayen iqedmen, yeggared amaynut deg umkan-ines nebla m nettfiqi.
Takkunt d cwiṭ nwuglim (id yezgan ɣar tama n barra nwuglim u qqeru) id-yeksan lama3na damuqran aṭas, naɣ dahrawan aṭas, naɣ id-yeksan s aṭas ɣar ayen iwulmen.

Amin Maɛluf:
D yiwen n umyaru n tmurt n Lubnan, yettarun s trumit.
Temeddurt-is.
Illul deg usegwas n 1949 deg temdint n Birut deg tmurt n Liban. Macca temzi-s isɛedda-tt deg Tmurt n Maṣar. Baba-s d yiwet umeγnas (journaliste) yettwasnen aṭas aṭas.
Yekkcem ar Tkadimit n Tsekla Tarumit deg usegwas n 2011.
Tira-s.
Ger yedlisen-is, llan : 

Timri Musa:
D yiwet n taddart deg tama n At Ksila.
Imezdaγ-is ǧǧan taddart aggi deg usegwas n 1954. Imezdaγ-is llan tura deg Lzzayer s waṭas. Tarwa-nsen tettemeslay ala s taɛrabt. Kra kkan seg-sen i mazal snen taqbaylit.

Bonsai:
A bonsai (seg tajaponit 盆栽, bonsai, asuddim seg tacinwat 盆栽, pénzāi, « aẓẓu, at lethud s yemghi deg taqbuct »), yella deg wensay n cinwa, d tejra s yezra , ma deg wensay n japun, d tejra deg taqbuct. Tejra naɣ imɣi yagi tarrant tetɣima kan d tamectuht s wefras, daɣen teqnen-as icegawen-is. tebeddil-as taqbuct iwaken as farsen izuran-is yefren akk d tid yellan sufel n wakal (nebari), iwaken atsarren am tejra deg umadaɣ.

Ḥaman Abḍella:
Ḥaman Abḍella d Amaru Aqbayli ilulen deg useggas n 1936 di taddart n At Dawed deg Iɛeṭṭafen, lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu. 
Tameddurt-is.
Temẓi-s.
Ilul-d deg useggas n 1936 di taddart n At Dawed deg iɛeṭṭafen. D agujil n ubabat ɣer 9 iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is. Yetturebba-d , am netta am atmaten-is, di twacult n Ddada-s deg Ihran (Wehran). Taɣuri-s yebda-tt deg uɣerbaz n Tmesgida deg At Aaqil. Abḍella amecṭuḥ, yella d uẓwiṛ, d uḥric, ilemmed s lemɣawla. Ger yiḍ d wass yufa-d iman-is di Lmadrasa El falaḥ di temdint-agi n Ihran (Wehran), ikemmel deg-s taɣuri. Abḍla yuki ɣef yiman-is, yefti wallaɣ-is ɣef tnekkit-is (identité) ɣef ayen meṛṛa icudden ɣer tutlayt-is. Di temdint-agi n Wehran iḥus belli yella kra it-yessemgaraden netta d wid is-d-izzin, ama di tutlayt neɣ di kra n leɛwayed. Lxilaf-agi iḥus-as am timmist di lǧetta, labaɛda ass-nni deg is-yugi Ccix-is deg uγerbaz ad yemmeslay s teqbaylit “Tutlayt n lkuffar” (Luɣat El kuffar), rnu ɣer waya yewwet-it acḥal n tikelt ɣef teqbaylit yessexdem daxel n uγerbaz-agi. Tadyant-agi teqqim-as i Abḍella Ḥaman d cama deg wallaɣ-is.
Ussan n tegrawla.
Ass mi meqqar, yefhem ddunit ugar, yessen d acu d azref, d acu d tidett, yessen daɣen iberdan yettawin ɣer tmusni, yuɣal d win yeffuden tafat. Di tallit-nni yettwali atmaten-is nḥafen, agdud s lekmal-is yenneεtab, yettwafareṣ sɣur ucengu afransis, dɣa yuɣal yefratt di rray-is akken ad yali s adrar, akken ad iḥareb aṛumi. Kra n isegwasen akken iserdasen n Fransa ḥebsent deg wedrar n Sidi Ali Benyub di tama n umalu n tmurt. Ḥekmen fell-as s 20 isegwasen n lḥebs. Isegwasen imezwura yesεeddaten-id di lḥebs n Sidi Belaabas, syen akkin uɣalen wwin-t ɣer lḥebs n Lambèze, ("Timḍelt n nnig tmurt" akken is-isemma Muḥand Uharun). Dɣa di lḥebs-agi id-yerra Dda Abḍella "Tira" ger wallen-is. Xas akken yessen taεrabt, yessen tafransist, maca netta yefren tira s teqbaylit. Yura aṭṭas n isefra, yura aṭṭas n wungalen, yessuql-d aṭṭas n yedlisen ɣer teqbaylit am : "Ṛubaεiyat" n Omar Xayyam. Abḍella Ḥaman yeḥka-d ɣef ass mi yella di lḥebs yenna : "Yiwet n tikelt, seg waken iyi-fukent tewriqin, ifuk-iyi daɣen wemru, dmeɣ-d tacekkart n Ssima, ferqeɣ-tt, xaḍeɣ-tt am ukayit, rniɣ dmeɣ-d abruy n lbarud (tirgin), uriɣ yis isefra-w…(…)Aṭṭas iyi-sarɣen isardasen n Fransa seg wayen uriɣ."
Segmi tefra tegrawla.
Akken tefra tegrawla, di 1962, Abḍella Haman yeffeɣ-d si lḥebs. Yemlal d Dda Lmulud At Maamar, yemmeslay yides ɣef teqbaylit, ɣef uguren id-tt-magaren iqbayliyen di Lezzayer. Abḍella Ḥaman yesteqsa Dda lmulud ɣef ssebba it-yeǧǧan ad yaru idlisen-is ḥaca s tefransist, acuɣer ur ten-yuri ara qebbel s teqbaylit? Dda Lmulud yerra-y-as-d, yennaya-s belli yuraten akken ad ten-fehmen merra leǧnas. Abḍella Ḥaman s wurrif d imeṭṭi, yeḥka-y-as tadyant yeḍran yides di Wehran, amek it-ttlaqaben ɣef teqbaylit-is, amek is-ugin ad yemmeslay s tutlayt-is, yenna-y-as daɣen belli ilaq yal amusnaw aqbayli ad yaru s teqbaylit-is, mači ḥaca s tefransist kan neɣ s taεrabt. Lmulud Maamri iεuhed seg wass-nni Abḍella Ḥaman dakken tira-s ad d-tili ḥaca s teqbaylit, ma d ayen iεnan tira s tefransist ad d-tili ḥaca i lmend n teqbaylit.
Assa.
Ass-agi Dda Abḍella yettidir di Wehran, yesɛa 76 iseggasen di tudert-is. Ayen merra yura yefka-t i Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa (H.C.A) akken ad t-id-sizergen. Dda Abḍella d ameɣnas di tili, d win ur yettzuxxun s wayen yefka i tmaziɣt, d win yefkan melba ceḥḥa i tutlayt, i tsekla akwed yidles amaziɣ.

Σumar Xeyyam:
Σumar Xeyyam d amyaru, amusnaw afarsi, ilul ass n 18 Mayyu aseggas 1048 di Nicapur di tmurt n Fars, ass-a Iran, yemmut ass n 4 Dujember aseggas 1131. Yura tamedyazt-is s tfarsit, ma d tizrawin tussnawanin d inaydinyen nniḍen yura-ten s taεrabt.

Tanebḍit n Dzayer Tamaneɣt:
Tanebḍit n Dzayer Tamaneɣt d agezdu i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tmurt n Dzayer, gar uzaɣar n Mettijet ed Yilel Agrakal. D nettat ay d tanebḍit tamecṭuḥt akk seg yidis n wakal, maca deg twilayt-a ay d-tezga temdint n Dzayer, tamaneɣt n tmurt yerna d tamdint tadzayrit tameqrant akk). Tajumma n twilayt n Dzayer 1.190 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 2.882.897 n yimezdaɣen.
Tiɣiwanin.
Llant 57 tiɣiwanin deg ugzdu-a, gar-asen a nufi 

Azwaw Kebbus:
Azwaw Kebbus (ilul deg 20 Yebrir 1952), d amarir adzayri n tkurt n uḍar. Yurar deg teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel (deg 1972-1973).

Aεmer Imac:
Aεmer Imac "ⴰⵎⴰⵔ ⵉⵎⴰⵛ" s teqbaylit, "Imache Amar" s telaṭinit, d argaz n tesertit Aqbayli, ilul ass n 7 Yulyu 1895 deg taddart n At Meṣbaḥ Tamurt n Iqbayliyen deg teγiwant n At Dwala, yemmut ass n 7 Fuṛaṛ deg useggas 1960.
Tameddurt-is.
Temẓi-s deg At Dwala.
Deg yiwet n taddart, isem-is At-Mesbaḥ n teγiwant n At-Dwala, ass 07 n yulyu n useggas n 1895, yeluled yiwen n ltufan semman-as Aεmer Imac. Tawacult-is d tin i ixeddmen tafellaḥt seg zik, am tewaculin meṛṛa n temurt n Leqbayel.
Aεmer, yekcem γer uγerbaz, asmi yesεa ṭam (8) iseggasen g leεmeṛ-is, aγerbaz id-yusan deg taddart n Tegemmunt Ukerruc. Yeffγed seg-s deg useggas 1908. D yiwen i yezemren, sin iseggasen kan mi id-yeffeγ yebda leqdic deg useggas 1910, armi qrib ad yawweḍ ṭrad agraγlan amezwaru n 1914, yekker yunag γer Fransa.
Deg Fṛansa.
Yufad dinna axddim, deg yiwet n teḥanut. Aεmer yessen axeddim-is akken iwata. Ur yelli ara d aγrib yeqimen deg yiwen wemkan, γas ulama ixuṣ din kra n ttawilat, yessen ad iγer, am wakken daγen yessen ad yaru akken iwata tafransist. Armi d aseggas n 1926 i d-yufa amekan i t-iεejben. Sutren-as ad tessalin d aqerru n yixeddamen.
Γas ulama deg wuṭṭun wis εecra n weγmis El Umma n waggur n yebrir 1933, i d-iban i tikkelt tamezwarut yisem n Aεmer Imac d amyaru aγella1. Aεmer yettaru si zik, maca s yisem nniḍen. Yeqqim deg weγmis El Umma armi d aseggas 1937, d aγmis i s-yerran azal, i s-yefkan udem ama di tmurt ama di berra.
Ṭam (8) n yiseggasen n lxedma, armi d aseggas 1933, anida d-yufrar deg wegraw n 28 mayu 1933 d amaray amatu n Yetri n Ugafa n Tferka. D aγelnazri γef Lezzayer Tazzayrit, di tmurt n yeεdawen, i lmend n umennuγ-is s tuffra, yettwattef γer lḥebs ass n 5 deg unbir 1934, yerna ixelleṣ 200 frank n lexṭiyya. Mi i iεedda di ccreε ttren-t, tirririt-is : « nefraḥ aṭas aṭas, mi d-tewweḍ tegnit am tagi, i tikkelt tamezwarut, i tikkelt tamezwarut, 101 iseggasen ayagi, ad d-nssuγ lmeḥna-nneγ zdat n teγdemt tafransist, ad teslem awal-nneγ s yimeγnasen n ugafa n tfarka ». Seddis (6) n wagguren i yeqqim, yeffeγ-d deg waggur n mayu 1935.
Ur yuγal ara γer wemkan-is n lxedma, sebba γef umennuγ aserti, yelha-d d Yetri ENA. D bab n tidet, yessawaḍ awal-is. Degmi i d-yufrar deg useggas 1935 γer tama n uselway n Yetri ENA Meṣṣali Lḥağ. Ma d aselaway amezwaru, seg useggas 1924 ar 1926, isem-is Ğeffal Muḥamed i d-ilullen deg useggas n 1885 di taddart At Ḥag n tγiwant Irğen.
Seg asmi i iruḥ, Messali γer umdakkel-is Cekkib Arslan γer Genève, deg waggur n wunbir 1935 ar yunyu 1936, d Imac, Yaḥyawi, Nwira d Rağef i iheddren s yisem ukabar n Yetri, armi d-yuγal Meṣṣali di tallit n Tirni Taγerfant1. yessaweḍ lḥal sin imddukkal-a, i tikkelt tamezwarut, ur msefhamen ara, anwa i d abrid ara awin deg unebdu 1936, ay-a sebba-ines d tamuγli ukabar γef tkebaniyin n lεesker agraγlan2, anida Aεmer Imac yugi ad yili γer tama n leḥkem n Tirni taγerfant n Spanyul, acku aneggaru-ya yugi ad yeqbel timunent i wid yellan seddaw n laεnaya-ines, ladγa tamnaḍt n Rrif. Tugin-agi n uttekki n Yetri ENA ur yelli wemsefhem d Ukabar Azduklan Aṛumi (PCF) di tallit n Tirni taγerfant.
Imac ur yessusum ara, yezga yeqqar-d ayen i t-iceγben, di lweqt anida tamuγli n Ukabar Azdukklan Aṛumi γef Blum Violet ur telhi ara. Deg tirririt n Aεmer Imac i wid yellan deg-s, yenna : "ṭṭfen amkan n yir rraṣa, ay imdukkal n yeεdawen". Ma d tamuγli-ines γef Blum yenna : "ur yelli d ayen yelhan, d akellex kan fell-aγ"
Seg tallit-nni, amennuγ ger Aεmer Imac d Messali yettnerni. Mi d-yehder wegraw n Yetri n Ugafa n Tfarka, i d-yeḍran ass n 27 di yebrir 1936, di temdint n Grande aux Belles, zdat n 500 n yimeγnasen, Aεmer yerfed awal, yesmekta-d deg-s amezruy n ukabar n Yetri, yenna : "d nek i yellan s deffir n tlalit n Yetri ENA" , seg tama nniḍen yenna, amek Messali ur yettwaṭṭef ara γer lḥebs deg useggas 1935 , d acu i d sebba ? Mi yesla ttεeggiḍen kra n yimeγnasen s uselway Messali, yerra-yasen : "tiddukla ilaq ad teddu d wahil-ines mačči ddaw n ufus n yiwen wergaz".
Гas akken yeḍra yid-s wannect-nni, Aεmer yeqqim, yettkemmil amennuγ deg ukabar n Yetri, d imenγi mgal ukabar n Tirni Taγerfant, acku d akabar-agi i d-yeglan s uselyen n Yetri n Ugafa n Tferka. Deg awal-is, d amaray amatu yenna : "d akabar n Tirni Taγerfant i d sebba n uselyen n ukabar-nneγ". Amgirred ger Aεmer d Messali irennu ula di lweqt n lḥeṛs mgal Fransa, messali yesuffeγ-d yiwet n tikti γef tlalit n Umnir 1Azzayri. Si tama tayeḍ, Imac yessuter timunent i tmurt n Lezzayer. Гas ulama yella ger-asen wugur aserti, sawḍen ad mlilen, Aεmer yesεa kan deffir-s imeγnasen d Lqbayel, ma d Messali yesεa ula d netta wid n temnaḍt-is. Di temlilit-agi Aεmer yerfed awal, yefka-d amedya n tmurt n Leqbayel yellan si zik, tessen amek tetteddu s tlalit n useqamu agdudan, d amgdul, ula d fransa neγ timura nniḍen mazal ur ssinent walen-agi. Ugur aserti yellan si zik, maca iban-d aya-a kan, ger imeγnasen, amek ara tili Lezzayer γer zdat, d taεrabt d tineslemt neγ d tin n yedles d tutlayt n tmaziγt.
Ussan n ṭrad agraγlan wissin.
Mi yebda ṭṭrad agraγlan wis-sin, yal yiwen yesmuqul d acu ad d-yawi, d acu ad d-yaker neγ ad d-terbaḥ, ma d Aεmer ur d-yelhi d yiman-is, d win yettzidin di leqdic. Taggara n useggas 1938, yeḍra-d di Fransa wegraw aγelnaw2 i d-yettwaheggan s tiktiwin n Imac d wemdakkel-is Yaḥyawi. Deg temlilit-agi, Imac, yewwet-d deg Fransa d tmura nniḍen i tt-yettεawanen, tid yettwalin timura n Tefriqt Ugafa i nnfeε-nsent kan, yenna : « Ifriqiyen, yessaweḍ lḥal fell-asen, ad walin nnfeε-nsen di tmurt-nsen, ilaq ad ḍefren abrid n umennuγ i wakken ad ḥarben γef tmura-nsen ». Mi d-yella uselyen n Ukabar n Uγref Azzayri (PPA), Aεmer yettwaṭṭef γer lḥebs, acku yella zik d amaray amatu n Yetri, ay-a yella-d deg useggas n 1940, yemlal dinna d yemdukkal-is n ukabar n weγref, acku yugi ad yeqbel timlilit d leḥkem Vichy.
Axeddim aneggaru n Aεmer Imac yella-d deg useggas 1942. Iruh γer Lalman, ulac win yeẓran d acu n sebba, yuγal-d γer Fransa ur yettu tasertit. Ṭtrad wis sin mačči d ayen yelhan i d-yewwi ama i netta ama i Tmurt-is.
Tuγalin γer Lezzayer d tegrawla n Tuber 54.
Aggur n yennayer n useggas 1947, ikcem-d γer Lezzayer, ikemmel axeddim di Lezzayer Tamanaγt. Deg waggur n fuṛar, yura tabrat n lefraq i yemdukkal-is yettidiren di Fransa. Yessefhem-d sebba n tuγalin-is γer tmurt d temsalt yellan gar-as d Messali. D ayen yelhan i yexdem, yenna-d daγen deg-s: « Ma tella tγawsa, ilaq imenγi fell-as, d wa i d abrid i weγref akken ad yaweḍ γer lebγi-s. D aya i d awen-ḍelbeγ ! Ur yelli d acu ad aγ-yebḍun. Ur ilaq ad tewwetem deg wayen yelhan, talla tγawsa ur ilaq weγref ad tt-yeğğ, ad tettwabeddel neγ ad tettwaker,… »
Aεmer Imac, yessuter talalit n Ukabar n Tdukli Tazzayrit1 (PUA). Iswi-s nniḍen, yebγa ad yessizdeg tineslemt, yerna ad tt-id-yekkes seg yir ifassen.
Ma d ikabaren, Aγref Azzayri d Umussu MTLD, iγaḍ-iten lḥal γaf wayen d-yenna Aεmer. Messali iεedda-d di tudrin n tmurt n Leqbayel, yeqqar : « Aεmer mačči d ayen yelhan iwumi d-yessawel ». Tiktiwin n Aεmer Imac ttzidint, ttkemmilent, uγent amkan deg ukabar n MTLD, kecment deg wallaγen n yimeγnasen seg useggas n 1949 ar 1951 akk d 1954 ar 1955. Ayen akk yexdem Aεmer d iseggasen, d wayen yeḍran yid-s deg umussu-ines, ur yessawed ara γer lebγi-s akken yebγa, yuγal yekcem γer ukabar UDMA n Ferḥat Σebbas.
Deg useggas 1950, i d-yuγal γer taddart-is At-Meṣbaḥ, seg wasmi tebda tegrawla tazzayrit, aṭas i d-yettasen γer-s, seg yemdukkal-is neγ d imjuhad i wakken ad awin kra n tiktiwin d tmuγli-ines γef tallit-agi, d usuter n tesγunin d yeḍrisen γef umennuγ ad awin.
Ussan-is ineggura.
Aεmer Imac yemmut ass n 17 fuṛar 1960, di taddart-is, At-Meṣbaḥ, taγiwant n At-Dwala. Dda Aεmer ilul-d d agrawliw, yedda s tiktiwin-is, yefka tudert-is i umennuγ γef Lazzayer Tazzayrit, ayen nebγu nini-t-id fell-as, ur nessawad ad d-neḥku ayen yexdem d iseggasen. Awal-is aneggaru i d-yenna di tebrat-is : « tanemmirt i kunwi, a ken-ctiqeγ, kemmelt deg webrid n tegmat. Myeḥmalet akken iwata am tarwa n yiwet n twacult. Tanemmirt i kunwi ssarameγ-awen tudert, ur yelli ad yid-wen yedru ad tεicem deg tmurt-nneγ Lezzayer…»
Idlisen-is.
Yura Aεmer Imac iḍrisen :
Idlisen yuran fella-s.
Idlisen γaf Aεmer Mezdad :

Ayt Ḥewwa:
At Ḥewwa, d yiwet n temnaṭ n deg Cclef anda ar assa ttemslayen s Tmaziγt ( Aqabylit).
Tezgad ar 170 n ikilumitren ar umalu n Lzzayer Tamanaγt, 95 ar ugafa n Cclef.

Damus:
Damus d yiwet n temdint id yezgan deg temnaṭ n Tipaza. Tamedint n Damus tezgad γef 70 ikilumtren ar umalu n Tipaza. Deg 2008, ɣur-es azal n 17,111 imezdaɣen. Zik di lawan n Irumyen, sawalen-as "Dupleix". Imezdaɣen-is llan seg teqbilin n At Ziwi, d Izatimen ed At Milak. 
Asideg.
Damus tezga-d ar ugafa-utrim n twilayt n Tipaza, ɣef 50 km ar utrim n weɣrem n Cercal ed ɣef 55 km ar wegmuḍ (ccerq) si Tnes.

Aɛmar n At Ḥemmuda:
Aɛmar n At Ḥemmuda, d yiwen n urgaz, n umeγras n tlelli, n timunent n tmurt n Lzzayer.
Illul deg usegwas n 1923 deg tama n Tasaft Ugemmun. Yettwanγa deg usegwas n 1956 axaṭer d yiwen n umeγras n Tizzayrit.
Deg segwasen n 40, yetteki deg yiwet n tarbaɛt yekkaten γef Lzzayer Tazzayrit, anda ilaq ad yilli wemkan i Tmaziγt (ladγa Taqabylit).
Tameddurt-is.
Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda aẓar-is n taddart n Tasaft Ugemmun deg tama n Ibudraren, deg tlemmast n wedrar n Ǧerger. Yettili-yas i "colonel" Aɛmiruc (Amiruc n At Ḥemmuda). 
Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda yella yeqqar deg uγerbaz "Ecole Normale" di Buzriɛa deg Lzzayer. Yeγra daγen deg tama n Bufarik, Tamelyant akwd Benɛknun. 
Di Benɛkun yetteki deg tarbaɛt umi qqaren "Tarbaɛt n inelmaden n Tesdawit n Benɛkun" ar tama n Ḥusin At Ḥmed, Saɛid Cciban, Ɛumar Usediq, Muḥend At Ɛemran, Benay Waɛli.
Asmi yexsar akayad-ines n le bac, yekkcem dγa ar ukabar n PPA anda yennuγ γef Lzzayer Tazzayrit si tazwara n usegwas n 1942. 
Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda d yiwen n umeγnas n tarbaɛt n "l'OS", tarbaɛt n umenuγ tufirt, yettusema γef uqarruy n tarbaɛt-aggi deg tama n tmurt n Yeqbayliyen (kabylie). 
Deg usegwas n 1948, Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda yettusema am umerccaḥ (candidat) deg tama n Useqqif n Tmana (Micli). 
Cwit n lweqt, ifaq i tektiwen n ukabar n ugdud azzayri (PPA), dγa yeɛed ad yesekcem timuzγa deg ukabar aggi akw di tektiwin n ukabar aggi. S waya ik yella gar wid i yeskren ayen umi seman "la Crise berbériste" deg usegwas n 1949. Cwit n lweqt kkan, Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda yettfaṭef ger ifassen n Franca, anda yekcem γer lḥebs di Blida.
Asmi yella deg lḥebs di Blida, akabar n Ugdud Aγerfan n Lzzayer (PPA), yessufγit di lufaq. 
Deg usegwas n 1950, Fransa tsereḥas, yeffeγ-ed si lḥebs. Asmi id yefaγ si lḥebs, yuγal ixeddem di Lzzayer ar tama n Mbarek n At Mangellat akw d Baccir Bumaɛza. 
Asmi i yekker trad n 1954, yettwateḥem am "wemdakul n tektiwin n Messali Ḥaǧ" (yuggin di lawan-nni traḍ d umenuy γef timunent n tmurt n Lzzayer s leslaḥ). 
Dγa yettwanγa deg usegwas n 1956 γer f ufus n kra n yemjuḥad (ALN) deg tama n At Waɛban (Aqbil ).

Adrum:
Adrum asegt: "Iderman", d agraw n twaculin yedduklen garasent s wassaγ n tegmatt (n tmusni) maci alamma yella garasent wassaγ n idammen.
Agraw n iderman yecrek wakal, mi ara dduklen d Taddart, akka igant tuddar n tmurt n leqbayel
ẓer daγen
Axaṛṛub
Tawacult

Axaṛṛub:
Axaṛṛub asegt: "Ixerban", d agraw n twaculin yedduklen s wassaγ n idammen.
Agraw n ixerban mi ara dduklen s wassaγ n tmusni (tegmatt) ad suffγen Adrum
Ẓer daγen 
Adrum
Tawacult

Bennay Waɛli:
Bennay Waɛli d yiwen n umeγnas n timunent n tmurt n Lzzayer. Illul deg tazwara n isegwasen n ɛcrin, yemmut deg usegwas n 1957. 
D yiwen n umeγnas daγen n timuzγa, n Lzzayer anda ilaq ad yilli umkan i Tmaziγt. 
Tameddurt-is.
Bennay Waɛli illul deg taddart n Lǧemɛa n Sarriǧ deg lɛarc n At Frawsen. Asmi yella d amectuḥ, Bennay Waɛli yeffeγ deg taddart. Iṛṛuḥ ar temnaṭ n Lzzayer am waṭṭas n Yeqbayliyen di tallit-nni. 
Yekcem ar Ukabar n Wegdud Azzayri (PPA) deg tezwara n isegwasen n rebɛin. Yuttusema-d d aqarru n ukabar-aggi deg tama n Ǧerǧer. 
Yettiki daγen deg tarbaɛt yettwasenen s yisem n "Groupe d'étudiant de Ben Aknun", ar tama n Lḥusin At Aḥmed, Ɛumar Usediq, Aɛmar At Ḥemmuda, Mbarek n At Mangellat. Tarbaɛt-aggi ad ttuγal ad ttenaγ γef umkan n Tmaziγt deg Lzzayer. D Bennay Waɛli ara yillin γef uqarruy n tarbaɛt-aggi.
Ɣef wanec-ta Bennay Waɛli yettwanγa deg usegwas n 1957 deg taddart-is.

Mbarek At Mengellat:
Mbarek n At Mengellat d yiwen ilemẓi yettekkin deg ukabar n Ugdud Azzayri deg iseggwasen n rebɛin. Yetteki daγen deg tarbaɛt yettnaγen γef umkan n tmaziγt deg Lzzayer.

Agatha Christie:
Agatha Christie neɣ s yisem-is ameqqran Agatha Mary Clarissa Mille, telul deg , temmut g . Nettat d tamarut s Tenglizt.

Herbert George Wells:
Herbert George Wells d amaru ingliz, illul-d deg 21 ctanmbir 1866, immut g 13 ɣuct 1946.
Idlisen-nnes.
Floor Games 

Sadeq Abǧawi:
Deg yisem-is n tidett, Sadeq Buyaḥya. D yiwen unazur, acennay, ig lulen deg tama n Bgayet di 1907. Yemmut ass n . 
Izuran-is.
Baba-s n taddart n Kuku deg temnaṭ n At Yeḥya (Tamurt Ufella). Sadeq Abǧawi yennum yettruḥ γef taddart-aggi nsen seg wasmi yella d amectuḥ. Tawacult-is, netta, ur qdiɛen-ara akw taddart-nsen ansi id kkan. 
Abrid-is di ccna.
Sadeq Abǧawi zik ig yebda ccna, laγda ccna tandalusit (Andalou). Mucaɛ aṭas di ṣṣenf aggi n ccna. 
Deg usegwas n 1933 alami d 1938, yella γer uqarruy n tarbaɛt n ccna Tandalusit umi semman " Lmussilya". Dγa deg ubrid-is di ccna yaggi tandlust, irruḥ alami di Tala Yemsan (Tlemsen) anda yelmed kra n nnubat, anda id yerna tamusni. 
Yettwasen daγen s tezlatin yura s teqbaylit i waṭṭas n icennayen n tallit-nni. 
Asmi telli "rradyu" n Bgayet deg usegwas n 1946, Ccix Sadeq Abǧawi yuγal d bab n uẓawan (chef d'orchestre), yesɛdayed daγen tidwilin di rradyu yaggi. 
Deg tedwilin-is i bdan deqs n icennayen id yufraren tallit-nni amzun Abdelwaḥab Abǧawi, Yusef Abǧawi, Ameqqran Agawa, Ccix Lmuḥub, Lγazzi.
Kra n tezlatin yurra.
- Cwingum cwingum ( d-tizlitt yurra asmi id wwḍen imarikaniyen ar Bgayt di lawan-nni n Traḍ Agreγlan wis ssin). 
- A bu waɛmam d uqendur (d tizlitt yeccna Ccix Abdelwaḥab Abǧawi).
- Lbabur (d yiwen n tezlitt yurra akw d Ccix Abdelwaḥab Abǧawi. Imeslayen-is, lḥen-is, llan zik deg temdint n Bgayet. D yiwen n ccna n tullawin n temdint-agi).
Sources.
Hommes et femmes de Kabylie, tome 1, sous la direction du professeur Salem Chaker, Edisud.

Muḥemmed Idir n At Σemṛan:
D yiwen ugrawliw azzayri, aqbayli, illulen deg taddart n Taqidunt deg tama n At Wasif. 
Yettiki di tarbaɛt umi qqaren "Inelmaden n tsenawit n Ben Σkun", tarbaɛt ig ɛarden ad sekccem Timuzγa (Taqbaylit) deg ummenuγ γef tlelli d timunet n tmurt n Lzzayer. 
D yiwen i yerẓan asalu n ccna γef tmaziγt. D netta i yurran ccan yuγalen d azamul n Imaziγen marra, umi isemma "Kker a mmi-s Umaziγ".
Yurra tizlatin nniden γef umennuγ, tilleli, timuzγa. 
D yiwen seg yergazen id yewwin aṭas n imeslayen sγur tantaliwin n tmaziγt yemxxalafen. Yewwid imeslayen n "Tilleli", "Amaziγ". 
Yidir At Σemran yettwaḥbes seg 1956 alami d 1958. 
Yidir n At Σmran yella daγen γef uqarru n Usqamu Unnig n Timuzγa (HCA) deg 1994 alami di 2004. 
Tizlatin-is.
- Kker a mmi-s umaziγ
- γuri yiwen n umddakel (1947) : d yiwet n teǧmilt i yerra i Laymec Aεli
- Tigerγlanit, d yiwet n l'adapation n "l'Internationale socialiste".

Arezqi U Lbacir:
D yiwen n urgaz yettnaγen γef tlelli "Bandit d'honneur", deg tama n Ukfadu, Tamgut, Iɛkkuren.
Arezqi U Lbacir, illul deg usegwas n 1859 deg tama n Buḥini. 
Baba-s qqaren-as Bacir Aεli N At Aεli, mad yemma-s qqaren-as Tasaεdit Taǧibat. 

At Welqadi:
D yiwet n twaccult, yeṭṭfen tamnaṭ n Ǧerǧer ger lqar wiss seṭṭac, yeγlin asmi id wwḍen irrumyen ar Lzzayer.

Belεid n At Aεli (Izarar Belaid):
D amyarru s teqbaylit ger imezwura. 
Tameddurt-is.
Illul deg usegwas n 1909 deg tama n Tubiret deg yiwet n taddart anda yemma-s tella tesγaray.
Asmi yella d amectuḥ, yemma-s, taselmadt teselmeda-s tameslayt tarumit. Teslemda-s daγen taqbaylit yettemeslay akw twaccult-is. 
Deg usegwas n 1915, Belεid n At Aεli yesɛa 6 n isegwasen di laεmer-is, irruḥ ar taddart n Uẓru Uqellal deg Ǧerǧer anda yekccem ar uγerbaz. Imi yesen aṭas tarumit, yufrared ger warrac niḍen.

Tamaziɣt n Arrif:
Tamaziγt n Rrif akken ssawalen imezdaγ n temnaṭ n Arrif di Merruk, d yiwet n tantala Tamaziγt n ugafa - asammer n Tmurt n Lmarruk.
Tamaziγt n Arrif neγ Tarifit neγ Tarifect sawalen-tt azal n 3 ar 4 imelyan n medden deg Merruk ugafa (Nnaḍur, Lḥusima, Temsaman, Serwan, Tamrrict, Azenγenγan), deg tmurt n Fransa, Hulland, Spanya, tamurt Uliman.. 
Tarifit d tetteki deg tarbaɛt umi seman "Taznatit" ar tama n tantala Tacawit, Tacenwit, Tanfusit.

Uran Pamuk (Orhan Pamuk):
Isem-ines n tidett Ferit Uran Pamuk, d yiwen umyarru Attarki. illul deg ass n 7 deg wayyur n yunyu deg usegwas n 1952 deg temdint n Stanbul. 
Idlisen-ines ṭṭfen taqacuct n yedlisen deqs n lweqt. Nzan azal n 12 imelyan n yedlisen-is, ubayen, mucaɛ aṭas aṭas. S wayya yuγal d Amyarru atareki yettwasnen aṭas deg umaḍal.
Idlisen-is ttwastarǧment (twasuqlend) ar ugar n 60 n tutlayin, gar-asent tarumit, talimant, tanglizit, tatelyanit, taspenyulit...
Amyarru yaggi yerbaḥ tlata n warrazen, gar-asent win n France Culture (1995), win n uγmis n New York Times deg usegwas n 2004, win n Medicis deg usegwas n 2005. 
Yella daγen yeselmad deg tsedawit n Culumbia "Littérature comparée". 
Deg usegwas n 2006, yerbaḥ araz n "prix de la littérature", d amyarru aterki amezwaru ig rrebḥen arras aggi.
Tameddurt-is.
Amyarru Uran Pamuk illul di Stanbul deg usegwas n 1952, deg yiwet n twaccult yesɛan adrim, yettekan, yesnen tarumit.
Asmi yewwed ar Tsedawit, yeγra "architecture" macca cwit n lweqt kkan yeǧǧa leqraya-yaggi, yuγal yetbaɛa leqraya iwakken ad yuγal d anγmas (jouranliste). Asmi yesuli leqraya-s, yennum yettγima deg uxxam-is ass marra, mebla ma yeffeγ. Dγa yebda isurifen imenza deg tirra n yedlisen.
Idlisen-is.
- Isem-iw azzegwaγ (Mon nom est rouge)
- Tameddurt tamaynut ( la vie nouvelle )
- Axxam n tsusmi ( la maison du silence)
- Adlis aberkan ( le livre noir)
- Lbarǧ acebḥan (le château blanc)
S tmeslayt n tarkit: 
- Cevdet Bey ve Oğulları, roman, İstanbul, Can Yayınları, 1982
- Sessiz Ev, roman, İstanbul, Can Yayınları, 1983
- Beyaz Kale, roman, roman, İstanbul, Can Yayınları, 1985
- Kara Kitap, roman, İstanbul, Can Yayınları, 1990
- Gizli Yüz, scénario, İstanbul, Can Yayınları, 1992
- Yeni Hayat, roman, İstanbul, İletişim Yayınları, 1995
- Benim Adım Kırmızı, roman, İstanbul, İletişim Yayınları, 1998
- Öteki Renkler, yazılarından ve söyleşilerinden seçmeler, 1999
- Kar, roman, İstanbul, İletişim Yayınları, 2002
- Istanbul: Hatıralar ve Şehir, essai, İstanbul, Yapı Kredi Yayınları (YKY), 2003
- Masumiyet Müzesi, roman, İstanbul, İletişim Yayınları, 2008

Basel:
Basel s tmeslayt n Tlimant, "Basliya" s teṭelyanit.
D-tamedint tis tlata n tmurt n Teswist. D-tamanaγt n Ukantun n Basel-Aɣrem. Tesɛa azal n 169,692 n imezdaɣen deg useggwas n 2011.
Tezgad deg tama n ugafa-asammer n tmurt n Teswist anda asif n Rrun yettali ar ugafa. Tezgad daγen ar 70 n ikilumtren ar ugafa n temdint n Bern, ar 75 ikilumitren ar ugafa-usammer n temdint n Zurik, ar 27 n ikilumitren ar wadda n temdint n Muluz.

Ameqqran Agawa:
Amuqran Agawa d yiwen n uccanay n ccna adiyani (Ameddaḥ), yettwasen aṭas aṭas deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Tameddurt-is.
Isem-is n tidett Waɛli Muḥend Amuqran. Illul deg taddart n At Aṭṭeli deg tama n At Yiraten deg usegwas n 1926. Yemmut deg usegwas n 2009. 
Yebda abrid-is di ccna deg temdint n Bgayet, dγa di Rradyu n Bgayet yeldin deg usegwas n 1946 i yebda icennun.
Tizlatin-is.
- Llaḥ llaḥ ideflawen, ṣṣelaḥ Igawawen
- Larbɛa n At Yiraten
- Ig aɛzrir yissem-ik a llaḥ
- Ay ul-iw utub
- Arsul llaḥ
- Akka id zzman
- A nnbi nnaγ
- Ilaq ad necfu
- Ilaq ad nfekkar

Adam Smith:
Adam Smith ( - ) d afelsuf dɣa adamsan abriṭani n Tufawin. Yeqqim deg umezruy am baba-s n tussna tudmist tatrart, ayɣef amahil agejdan, "Tabaɣurt n iɣlanen", d yiwen n iḍrisen imesbedden n ulellamẓri udmis. Aselmad n tafelsuft tazerfant di tasdawit n Glasgow, yefka-d mraw iseggwasen n tameddurt-is i uḍris agi yehregen idemsanen imeqranen uḍfiren, widak Karl Marx yetsemmi « ikelsaken » dɣa ad ersen imenzayen imeqranen n alellamẓri udmis.
Aṭas n medden ssnen Adam Smith asmi yura yiwen udlis g useggwas n 1776 umi qqaren Wealth of Nations (Ayla n Iɣlanen); d bab n weḍru n tikta n talellamt (libéralisme). 

Lwalid Mimun:
Lwalid Mimun d acennay Arifi, ilul g Ayt Sidel di tama n Nnaḍuṛ g useggwas n 1959. 
Tameddurt.
Iɣra deg Fas. Netta tuɣa illa am maṛṛa iwdan n taddart-is : d ameksa (aniči s Terifit), ibda itirar tamja (taqsebt).
Ittcnu ɣef amek teddren, tkkaren imaziɣen d irrifiyen g tmurt-nsen d lbaṭel. Itεawed tamara n yinni ihajren tamurt-nsen iẓwan ɣer Turuft, yin iwyen tiṛumiyin am g tizlit dwel a mmi inu. Itwasen g Arrif am weni iyifen maṛṛa icennayen n Arrif. D netta g igin ansi tamedyazt n Arrif ttwassen g akk umaḍal, timura n Tmazɣa am Dzayer. Adisk-nes amezwaru ism-is Ajjaj, ifuɣ g iseggasen 1980, g Merruk aql-it itwegdul (leḥkam ur t-teǧǧi ad imzenz).
Idisken.
Ajjaj (1980)
Ametluε (1986)
Tayyut (Taggut) (1997)
Izlan-ines.
Tizlit umi qarn ""Neccin Ssa"
ah neccin ssa ! ah neccin ssa
lalla tammurt a nneɣ, nssudum akal nnem
ad nssu cjjur nnem s tidi nnɣ
ad nkerz timura, ad nbeḥḥar tibeḥḥar
ad cem nṣun, ad cem nḥḍa, s min ɣarneɣ d tizemmar
Ad neḍreq i yedbarn, deg ujenna nnem d azegza
wenni i cem icarhen, min yestahedj ad t iẓaṛ
Abrid a waxxa yeẓẓu, yeẓẓu s rḥarrac
ad neggur, ad neggur ar ɣar ad naf tinnewac
yurat & iɣenjit Lwalid Mimun
Tizlit umi qarn ""Bu Yidunan""
bu yidunan, bu yidunan, la babak, la yemmak
bu yidunan, bu yidunan, la umak, la ultmak
tɣemyed di tzegurt, xf ak adfel d wunẓaṛ
tcarhed tudert, ul nnek iƐammer
Ṭṭram di tmurt, lmunkar yemɣar
Tisendect tḥart xf ak am ufiɣar
Bu yidunan a bu yidunan, ameṭṭa nnk d nwac
ɣa ad teksed iɣebnan, Ṭṭram ad ibarc
ad tnewwar cejjart, ad yesrewrew wedrar
ɣa ad tḍuw tedbart, zi leqfez ad tugut
yura-t & iɣenj-it Lwalid Mimun
Tizlit umi qqaren ""Idurar n Arrif""
Idurar n Arrif i dihan ibedden
Idurar n ssif i dihan isedden
Iḍennaṭ tuɣa din ca n yiwdan qedden
Maca ass a aqqa din ca imeḍran hedmen
Imeḍran n tmaddiwin di tqicciwin ɣemyen
Maca aqqa ɣemyen din, xf ca n targazt cehden
Targazt n εabdekrim, targazt n irifiyen
xzart ɣer idurar in, xzart a imezzianen!
ass a yeqqim din ratar n wairaden
ratar n εabdekrim d ratar n yimjahden
yura-t & iɣenj-it Lwalid Mimun

Washington:
Washington, D.C d tamanaɣt n Yiwunak Yedduklen. Isem-ines ameqqran d Washington, District of Columbia. 
Deg Washington yella Axxam Amellal, izdeɣ deg-s aselway n Yiwunak Yedduklen.
Tamdint i qqaren-as Washington ansi aselway amezwaru n Yiwunal Yedduklen, George Washington.
<br>
</br>

Bujumbura:
Bujumbura d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Burundi. Zedɣen-tt 235.440 n yimezdaɣen. D nettat ay d tamdint tameqrant akk deg Burundi.
Tezga-d deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n ugelmim afriqi n Tanganyika. Deg Bujumbura ay d-yezga usagen (lmerṣa) ameqran n Burundi, yerna seg usagen-a ay tessuffuɣ tmurt-a ɣer beṛṛa lɣella-nnes n lqahwa, leqḍen, igelman akked uhallun (étain).

At Temlict:
D yiwet seg xemsa n temdinin (ar tama n At Yezǧen, At Taǧnint, At Bunur, Bergan, Zegrara) tiqburin n At Waγlan (Mzab).
Assa, isem-ines yettubedel, yettwasṭaɛreb ar Melika.

At Tuzin:
D yiwet n teqbilt tamaziγt n ugafa n Umerruk, id yezgan deg tama n Arrif. 
Isem-is assa yettwasṭaɛreb, qqaren-as Bni Tuẓin.
Anda-tt.
Taqbilt n At Tuẓin, yuggar adrar azaγar. Izuγar-is ruḥen alami d lqrub n temdinin am Kssita, Midar. 
Amezruy-is.
Deg lawan n traḍ n 1921- 1926, At Tuẓin am waṭas n teqbilin tirifiyen, nnuγent mgal Ispanyuliyen akw d irrumyen.
Tameslayt n teqbilt aggi.
Imezdaγ n teqbaylit aggi ar assa ttemeslayen Tamaziγt n Arrif (tarifit).

At Ccud:
At Ccud (Taɛrabt : Ben Choud) d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Bumerdas, gar Delles d Laɛzib n Ccix. 
Ass-a zedɣen-tt ugar n 10.000 imezdaɣ deg tɣiwant-nni. Akk deg-sen d aɛrabsawalen. 

Sidi Dawed:
Sidi Dawed d taɣiwant deg ugezdu n Bumerdas, deg tmurt n Leqbayel. 
Ɣur-es 16 900 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 
Amezruy.
Zik irumiyen qqaren-as Issers-Djedian deg 1870, sakkin Bois-Sacré, dɣa qqaren-as Abbo seg 1925 ar 1962. 

Budwaw:
Budwaw d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Bumerdas, tezga-d ar 35 km si Dzayer Tamanaɣt deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) d 11 km si Bumerdas ar utaram. Qqaran-as di lawan n Fransa daɣen "Alma"
Ɣur-s deg 2008 azal n 71 238 imezdaɣ. 

Dwiret:
Dwiret (دويرات) d taddart tamaziɣt deg wenẓul n Tunes. Tezga-d deg temnaṭ n Taṭṭawin ar 20 km. 
Tutlayt Tamaziɣt di Dwiret.
Tantala n Dwiret tella yiwet n waṭas imukan adeg mazal-iten ttmeslayen s tmaziɣt deg wenẓul n Tunes akwd Ǧerba d Tmezret d Cninni. Aṭas n At Dwiret geǧǧen ar Tunes tamaneɣt i wakken ad xedmen dinna. 

Tamaziɣt n Ǧerba:
Tamaziɣt n Ǧerba neɣ Tajerbit (Tajerbit : Tamaziɣt neɣ ddwi jjerbi) d tantala tamaziɣt i ttmeslayen deg Ǧerba
Tameslayt Taǧerbit tettwameslay dγa deg kra n tuddar n tegzirt-aggi (tama n wadda akw tama talemast n tegzirt-aggi am Iqellalen). Deg tuddar n ufella n tegzirt-aggi, ulac aṭas n medden yesnen taǧerbit.

Ṭahir:
Ṭahir d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Ǧiǧel, ar 18 km si temdint n Ǧiǧel. Ɣur-es 77367 imezdaɣ. 
Deg wakal n tɣiwant illa Amafag Ferḥat Ɛebbas. 

Lɛewwana:
Lɛewwana (Tafṛensist: "El Aouana", Taɛrabt : "العوانة"), d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n Ǧiǧel di tama n Zyama Lmenṣuriya g Tmurt Leqbayel. 
Zedɣen-tt 12.384 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as Cavallo.

Leɛzib n Zeɛmum:
Leɛzib n Zeɛmum (s tefṛensist: Laazib Zamoum; Naciria), d taɣiwant n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Bumerdas, zedɣen-tt 21.272 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist llan ɣɣaren-as "Haussonvillers". Tagi d akal n tmurt n Yiflisen Umellil di tmurt n Leqbayel. 

Ssi Mesṭafa:
Ssi Mesṭafa (s tefṛensist: Si Mustapha, isem n tidett : Taqiḍunt), d taɣiwant n Bumerdas, zedɣen-tt 9.015 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist llan ɣɣaren-as Félix Faure.

Taqerbuzt:
Taqerbuzt d taddart n Tmurt Leqbayel iqqenen ar tɣiwant n Uɣbalu deg tawilayt n Tubiret. Taddart agi tezga ar ugmuḍ n tawilayt, d-talast s Bgayet (deg ugmuḍ) d Tizi Uzzu (deg ugafa).
Tamaḍlarut.
Taqerbuzt d adeg-aɣella n tɣiwant n Uɣbalu, tḥesseb aqrib 14000 imezdaɣen. 
Zzin-as deg ugafa d-ugmuḍ idurar n Ǧerǧer dɣa deg unẓul Iɣzer n Summam.
Taddart n Taqerbuzt teɛelleq ar aqrib 900 imitriyen deg usawen.

Ṣur Lɣezlan:
Ṣur Lɣezlan d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n ugezdu n Tubiret, zedɣen-tt 42.179 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as Aumale.

Bab Lwad:
Bab Lwad (s tefṛensist: "Bab el Oued"; anamek s tmaziɣt: "Tabburt n Wasif"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Ldzayer (tezga-d deg temdint n Ldzayer), zedɣen-tt 87.557 n yimezdaɣen.

Cengiṭ:
Cengiṭ (Taɛrabt : "شنقيط") d taɣiwant n wammas-utaram n Muriyanya i tezga-d deg wegni uneẓfran n Wedrar. 

Taẓnagt:
Taẓnagt (isem aneṣli : Taḍḍungiyya) d tantala tamaziɣt i ttmeslayen deg wenẓul-utaram n Muritanya. Zik akk tmurt tmeslay tamaziɣt uqbel imeɣi akwd Aɛraben n Banu Dlim deg ṭrad n Car Buba deg 1644. 
Imsiwelan n Teẓnagt.
Ass-agi ttmeslayen ɣir 1.900 imanen s Teẓnagt. 
Tantaliwin di Teẓnagt.
Deg Kamal n At Ẓerrad (2004: 15) an muqqel i yellan aṭas gar tentaliwin n Teẓnagt . Deg umedya ad naf :

Tasendit:
Tasendit (qqaren-as Tamaziɣt kan), d tantala i ttmeslayen zik deg wenẓul n tmurt n Tunes, ladɣa deg taddart n Sened armi issegwassen 1970/1980. Zik ttmesalyen daɣen tamaziɣt di Bu-Amram, Sakkat, Tmagurt ed Lɛeyyaca (Djebel Orbata) ula di Um el Aleg d Zannuc (Djebel Majourah). 
Aḍris s Tsendit.
Tizezert d wuccen
"Tikelt yeffud iğen izerzer.
Yugser isess g tanut yexsa a yali wer yezmer-c
Yezra-t uccen ɣal-ennej yumm-as:
"Ay uma, cek d abehlul tugsert g tanut u tessinet-c maka talit!""
"Tarewla n Bni Hilal ar Tunes"

Zhengzhu:
Zhengzhu d aɣrem ameqqran n tmurt n Ccinwa.

Musa Ag Amastan:
Musa Ag Amastan (S tfinaɣ ⵎⵓⵙⴰ ⴰⴳ ⴰⵎⵙⵜⴰⵏ) ilul deg useggas n 1867 s aseggas amaziɣ 2817, immut deg 23 Dujanbir 1920 s aseggas amaziɣ 10 Dujanbir 2870. D yiwen n wergaz amaziɣ Amanukal n teqbilt n Kel Ɣela n Uhaggar seg 1905 ar 1920.

Si Belḥanafi:
Muḥemmed Belḥanafi d yiwen umedyaz ameqqran n teqbaylit, d bab n wawal, n usefru.
Tameddurt-is.
Si Belḥanafi, netta isem-ines n tidett d Muḥemmed n At Taḥar. 
Ilul di 1927 deg tama n At Wasif, deg taddart n At Sidi Ɛetman, deg yiwet n twaccult n yemrabden. 
Di lawan -nni n traḍ n Lzzayer, yella deg tama n Tihert (Tiaret) anda yella γef uqarruy n tarbaɛt n tsertit n le FLN di tama-yagini.
Abrid-is di tzuri.
Yexxdem aṭas n tedwilin daγen deg rradyu n teqbaylit, rradyu tis snat " tibḥirt iǧeǧǧigen", "rrif lkanun", " tuksa n lxiq". 
Yexdem aṭas n tezlatin i waṭas n Icennayen akw tcennayin tiqbayliyen am Nwaṛa, Cabḥa, Malḥa, Ḍrifa, Wardya.
Tizlatin-is.
- Yestma ssbar nennum ( teccna-tt Wardya)
- Assa d tiwizi ( teccna-tt Cabḥa)
- Waḥeq Axelxal (yeccna-tt Σtmani)
- Ay ixef-iw ( teccna-tt Malḥa)
- Ifeggagen uẓeṭṭa (Tarbaɛt n Tullas, Malḥa)
- Awi-d afus-im qarbed ( teccna-tt Ḍrifa)
- Nekk d amǧaḥed amectuḥ (yeccna-tt Mulud Ḥabib)

Budapest:
Budapest d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Hungari si 1867. Zedɣen deg-s 1 712 210 imezdaɣ.

August Wilhelm Schlegel:
August Wilhelm Schlegel ilul degg 8 ctambir 1767, immut deg 12 maggu n 1845. D afelsuf almani.

Fas:
Fas (Tifinaɣ: ⴼⴰⵙ) d yiwet n temdint n Merruk, deg-s 1 040 563 n yemdanen zedɣen-tt.

Gabriele D'Annunzio:
Gabriele D'Annunzio ilul deg , immut deg . D amaru iṭalyani.

Pink Floyd:
Pink Floyd d icennayen ingliziyen n rock. Zenzen ugar si 200 imelayn n yidisken.

Thomas Hobbes:
Thomas Hobbes ilul g , immut g . D afeslsuf ingliz.

Ɛli Belḥaǧ:
Ɛli Belḥaǧ (ilul deg 1956 deg temdint n Tunes), d argaz n tsertit "adzayri", yettekka akked Ɛebbassi Madani deg ussebded n Terni Tislamit n Ussukkes (FIS). 
Temẓi-s d laṣel-is.
Imawlan n Belḥaǧ rewlen seg Dzayer ɣer Tunes, "yerna laṣel-nsen seg Muriṭanya". Belḥaǧ yezdeɣ deg Tqubbet (deg temdint n Ldzayer). 
Takcemt deg tsertit.
Deg yiseggasen n 1980, yella yeqren ɣer Mustafa Buyali, yerna d aya ay t-yessawḍen ad yettwaṭṭef ɣer lḥebs i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 1984. 
Deg 1989, yessebded-d akked Ɛebbassi Madani akabar isenneslem (islamiste) n Terni Tislamit n Ussukkes (FIS), yerna yella yeqqar-d lxeḍbat deg yiwet n tmesgida deg Bab Lwad. 
Tirni Tislamit n Ussukkes af Uqecuc-is.
Deg 1991, iger-d tiɣri i lɣaci akken ad d-snekren imenɣi imselleḥ mgal udabu, am wakken ay yettekka akked Ɛebbassi Madani deg ussenker n ccwal deg tmurt. D aya ay yejjan anabaḍ (lḥukuma) adzayri ad ten-yeḥbes deg sin, yerna akabar-nsen yettwafsex deg tezwara n 1992. 
Sakkin ṭrad.
Deg 2006, Ɛebdelaɛziz Buṭfliqa yeɛfa fell-as yerna yebra-as-d seg lḥebs. Llan aṭas n medden ay t-yettwalin d yiwen seg wid ay yezzuɣren tamurt ɣer tallit-nni taberkant n yimenɣi imselleḥ ay d-yellan gar udabu ed tegrawin timsellḥin ay d-yefrurxen seg Terni Tislamit n Ussukkes. Seg wasmi ay d-yeffeɣ seg lḥebs, Ɛli Belḥaǧ yettwaṭṭef yerna yettwaḥbes acḥal d tikkelt ɣef wawal-nnes ayyes ay iɛerreḍ ad d-yessenker ccwal tikkelt nniḍen.

Tibeskert:
Tibeskert d tamdint n tmurt n Dzayer,i tezga-d deg wegmuḍ n Yegnan Iɛlayanen, deg wenẓul n tama n Wewras, ɣur-es 205 608 imezdaɣ deg useggas n 2008. Tajumma n tɣiwant-ines d 127,55 km2. 

Mila:
Mila d aɣrem n ugafa-agmuḍan n tmurt n Dzayer. Tajumma n tɣiwant-agi d 129,89 km2. Zedɣen deg temdint-agi 69 052 imezdaɣen deg 2008. 
D tamanaɣt n ugzedu n Mila. 
Amezruy.
Deg tmiḍi wis 19 (lqern) mazal gar imezdaɣen imaziɣen wid ttmeslayen ula d ttseqcen tutlayt tamaziɣt deg temnaṭ-a (Zwaɣa neɣ "Izewwaɣen" d tama n Ferǧiwa neɣ "Iferǧiwen"). 
Mila, tella deg zzma agwans n tamwaya n Yekutamen acku imezdaɣ n temnaṭ akk gar-asen d Imaziɣen deg laṣel-nsen ulac waɛraben di tmiwa-nni. 

Wad Ssemmar (taɣiwant):
Wad Ssemmar d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Dzayer, deg usun n Lḥerrac. Deg 2008 ɣur-es azal n 32.062 imezdaɣen. 
Anda i d-tezga.
Taɣiwant n Wad Ssemmar tezga-d ar 15 km ar tama tegmuḍant n wammas n Dzayer Tamanaɣt.

Asaka n Qsenṭina:
Asaka n Qsenṭina (Tafrensist : Gué de Constantine, Taɛrabt : جسر قسنطينة) d taɣiwant n Ugezdu n Dzayer Tamanaɣt ar 10 km n wenẓul n Dzayer Tamanaɣt. 
Deg useggwas n 2008 ɣur-es azal n 133.247 imezdaɣen. 

Ccraga:
Ccraga d taɣiwant n Ugezdu n Dzayer Tamanaɣt ar 10 km ar utaram n wammas n Dzayer Tamanaɣt. Ɣur-es deg useggwas n 2008 80.824 imezdaɣen. 

Paul Verlaine:
Paul Verlaine ilul deg deg Metz (Fransa), immut deg Paris di . D amedyaz afransis ameqqran.

Muḥemmed Cikri:
Muḥemmed Cikri (s Taɛrabt: "محمد شكري" , s Tefransist: "Mohamed Choukri") d amyaru d Amaziɣ yura ungalen s Taɛrabt. Muḥemmed Cikri ilul di 15 yulyu 1935 di At Ciker, di temnaḍt n Nnaḍur, di Arrif. Immut di 15 wamber 2003.
Deg wakud n laẓ di Arrif, tawacult-nnes terwel ɣer Tanja. Baba-s aql-it d askayri iccat tarwa-nnes d temeṭṭut-is.
Muḥemmed Cikri umi iẓṛa manaya irwel si taddart-ines, ibda ikkal itnus di zzenqet anda i yexs ad yečč, anda itettar neɣ izenz taḥcict.
Armi itwaṭṭef deg usekraf (leḥbes) umi aql-it ɣur-s 20 iseggwassen, isselmed-as yiwen umeḥbus tira n Taɛrabt.
Yura aṭas n idlisen gar-asen Aɣrum Ḥafi. Adlis-nni itwasuɣel ɣer 40 n tutlayin. Aɣrum Ḥafi itwagdel deg Umeṛṛuk deg wakud n Ḥasan wiss 2.
Di 15 Wamber 2003, immut Muḥemmed Cikri di usganfu n userdas di Rbaṭ.

Alessandro Manzoni:
Alessandro Manzoni ilul g , yemmut g . D amaru aṭelyani.

Tinɣir:
Tinɣir (s Tifinaɣ ⵜⵉⵏⵉⵖⵉⵔ) d aɣrem n tama agmuḍan n Merruk deg uzaɣar n Tudɣa ar tuffɣa n Weṭlas Afellay af udem n Wedrar n Saɣru. D tamaneɣt n Tasga n Tiɣir si useggwas n 2009. Deg 2004 akk iɣerman d wemdan n tɣiwant-agi ɣur-sen azal n 86.500 imezdaɣen. 
=Tinɣir d Tmaziɣt=
Akk imezdaɣen llan d imaziɣen, ttmeslayen akk gar-asen s Tacelḥit neɣ s Tmaziɣt n Weṭlas. Deg temnaṭ, llant ttzdiɣent tiqbilin timaziɣin am Ayt Ɛeṭṭa ar tama n wenẓul, Ayt Merɣad deg wegmuḍ, Ayt Ḥdidu deg ugafa et Ayt Yafelman

Ifuɣa (Tawsit):
Ifuɣa (asget : Afaɣi) d tawsit (taqbilt) tahewwart (ccarif) n Yimucaɣ n Imrabṭen (Inselmen) s laṣel U-Jana (Ijnaten). 
Kel Ifuɣa llan deg Mali (Aẓawad) deg temnaṭ n Kidal ula deg Wedrar n Ifuɣa. Tigti deg-sen llan d imeksawen d iserdasen. 

Adrar n Cenwa:
Adrar n Cenwa d aqecuc s lqedd n 905 imitren af yillel. Yezga-d deg ugezdu n Tipaza di Ledzayer. D azamul n yicenwiyen d leqbayel i werɛad ttmeslayen s Heqbaylit neɣ s Hcenwit. 

Ǧan Karbunnyi (Jean Carbonnier):
D yiwen umusnaw n Fransa, d yiwen ger iselmaden imuqranen n uẓref (droit) deg tmurt n Fransa, laγda deg wayyen yeɛnan aẓref n ger medden (droit des obligations).
Tameddurt-is.
Illul deg temdint n Liburn deg tmurt n Fransa deg usegwas n 1908. Yemmut deg usegwas di 2003 deg Paris. 
Yeγra aẓref (leḥeq) deg Tsedawit n Bordeaux deg tmurt n Fransa.Asmi yessuli leqraya-s, yesɛedda akayad n "Agrégatation" n uẓref, yerbaḥ dγa yekcem ar Tsedawit n Pwatyi (Poitiers) anda yuγal d aselmad. 

Charles Baudelaire:
Charles Baudelaire neγ Carl Budler, d yiwen n umedyaz amuqran n tmurt n Fransa.
Illul di Pari deg usegwas n 1821. Yemmut daγen di Pari deg usegwas n 1867.
Adlis-is yettwasnen aṭas macci cwit d "Fleurs du mal" neγ "Tigeǧǧigen n diri", id yessufaγ deg usegwas n 1857.

Pablo Neruda:
Pablo Neruda ( Pablu Niruda s teqbaylit)
D yiwen n umedyaz, amyarru, argaz aserti n tmurt n Cili (Chile). Illul deg usegwas 1904 deg temdint n Parral (Tamnaṭ n Linyares). Yemmut deg usegwas n 1973 deg temdint n Santyago (Santiago). 

Mufdi Zakariya:
Mufdi Zakariya d yiwen n umedyaz Azzayri. Kra qqaren belli illul deg useggas n 1908, kra nniḍden qqaren illul deg tama n At Yezgen deg temnaṭ n At Weɣlan (Mẓab). 
Yemmut deg useggas n 1977 deg temdint n Tunes (Tunis). 
D netta i yuran "Qassaman", nnacid n tmurt n Lzzayer asmi yella deg lḥebs.

Saɛid Sifaw Maḥruk:
D wiyen n umedyaz, amyarru Amaziγ n tmurt n Libya. D azamul n timuzγa deg tmurt n Libya.
Saεid Sifaw Lmeḥrug illul deg aɣṛem n Jadu deg Udrar n Infussen (Adrar Nefussa), deg usegwas 2896 (1946). 
Yemmut deg yiwen n sbitar g uɣṛem n Tunes deg usegwas n 2944 (1994). 
Tira-s.
Saεid Sifaw yura d adlis s yisem n Adlis aberkan, yewit diḍes mass Sifaw akken a tifesser g uɣṛem n Rbaṭ g tmurt Lmarruk, dacu taneggarut ayi tugi-yes.

Malḥa:
Malḥa d yiwet n tcennayt taqbaylit n isegwasen n sebɛin. 
Tetteki deg tarbaɛt n Tullas ar tama n Cabḥa, Malika Dumran, tullas nniḍen.
Deqs n tezlatin-is, yurra-tent Si Belḥanafi.

Salem Caker:
Salem Caker ilul deg 1950 deg Yiɛezzuzen, di tɣiwant n Larebɛa n At Yiraten, Tizi Wezzu d amesnilsi (linguiste) adzayri yerna d aselmad n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit deg Paris d Aix-en Provence. 
Caker iqeddec deg Usudu Aɣelnaw n Yilsawen ed Tɣermiwin Tugmiḍin (INALCO) n Paris seg useggas n 1989, deg wemkan n André Basset ed Lionel Galand.
Tameddurt Tasdawant.
Deg 1973, yuwey-d aduktuṛa deg Tesnilst Tamatut. Sakkin, seg 1973 d 1981, yeqdec d aselmad deg tesdawit n temdint n Lezzayer. Deg 1978, yuwey-d aduktuṛa nniḍen deg Tsekla d Tussniwin Talsanin. Gar 1981 e 1989, yeqdec d aselmad deg temdint n Aix-en-Provence (deg tesdawit n Provence akked Wammas Aɣelnaw n Unadi Ussnan ). 
Sakkin, deg 1990, yessbed-d Ammas n Unadi Amaziɣ "André Basset" deg tesdawit n INALCO. Ma deg 2008, yebda iqeddec deg Usudu n Unadi ɣef Yimaḍalen Aɛṛab ed Yineslem n Aix-Provence. Salem Caker yura-d aṭas n yedlisen ed tezrawin (études) ɣef tesnilsit (linguistique) tamaziɣt. Daɣen, d netta ay d-yelhan s Tsedkalt Tamaziɣt (Encyclopédie Berbère) ay d-itteffɣen deg Fransa.

Ḥasin:
Ḥasin (s tefṛensist: Hacine), d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Mɛesker, zedɣen-tt 9.176 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as Dublineau.

Ulxu:
Ulxu d taddart n tɣiwant n Uẓeffun (deg ugafa n Tizi Wezzu). Deg taddart-a ay ilul umaru adzayri Ṭaher Ǧaɛut.

Danya yellis u Sasi:
Tettwasen am "Danya Ben Sasi", d yiwen n tlemẓit, tacennayt tamaziγt n Libya. 
Gar tezlatin-is :

Ayda:
Ayda d yiwet n tceqquft n l'opéra i yurra yiwen n utelyani umi qqaren Verdi.
Abrid amezwaru anda id ɛedda deg temdint n Lqahira deg tmurt n Maṣer deg usegwas n 1871.
Taceqquft aggi tettemeslayed γef yiwet n tallit uqbel talalit n sidna εissa. 
Deg tgelda n Maṣer, yella yiwen ugellid (isem-is : ) yesɛan yelli-s (umi qqaren: Amneris). Yelli-s aggi teɛceq deg yiwen n usardas n Baba-s. Aserdas aggi (isem-ines : Γadames), netta, iḥemel yiwen n teqcict (isem-is : Ayda). Ayda nettat d taklit n yelli-s n ugellid n Maṣer. Dγa yelli-s n ugellid n Maser (Amenris), tettasem deg tayri yellan ger Ayda akw d Γadames. 
Yiwen wass akken, yekker traḍ ger tmurt n Maṣer akw d tmurt n Tyupia (Ethiopie). Γadames yella γef uqarruy n iṣerdasen n ugellid n Maṣer (général). Irruḥ dγa ad yennaγ. 
Γadames irrebaḥ traḍ. Yuγaled dγa. Mid yewwed, medden akw ferḥen yiss ula d agellit n Maṣer. Iwakken ad yesnemir (remercier) yeffka-yas yelli-s ad-t yaγ. 
Macca Γadames akw d Ayda ur friḥen ara.

Karmen (Carmen):
Karmen d yiwet n tceqquft (opéra) i yurra Ǧurǧ Bizi (Georges Bizet). Yeks-i-t-id deg yiwen n udlis n Alfred Mirimi (Merimet). Taceqquft aggi tɛdda-d tikelt tamezwarut deg usegwas n 1875 deg Paris.

Ɛuman:
Ɛuman d tamurt n Asya, tezga-d deg wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n Tzunegzirt Taɛrabt (Péninsule Arabique). 
Tajumma-nnes 309.550 km2 (yikilumtren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 2.845.000 n yimezdaɣen (Iɛumaniyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Masqaṭ.

Abu Ḍabi:
Abu Ḍabi d tamaneɣt n Limarat Taɛrabin Yeddukklen. Tezga-d deg ugafa (nord) n tmurt, ɣef yiri n Ubagu Afarsi. Zedɣen-tt 896.751 n yimezdaɣen.

Dawḥa:
Dawḥa d tamaneɣt n Qaṭar. Tezga-d deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 998.651 n yimezdaɣen.

Qaṭar:
]]
Qaṭar d tamurt n Asya, tezga-d deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Tzunegzirt Taɛṛabt, deg Ubagu Afarsi (Golfe Persique). Tajumma-nnes 11.437 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 1.696.563 n yimezdaɣen (Iqaṭariyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Dawḥa.
Lamir-ines d Ḥammad Bin Xalifa. 

Birut:
Birut (Taɛrabt : بيروت "Bayrūt" Talatint: Berytus, Taramit: Birot בירות, Tafransist Beyrouth) d tamaneɣt n Lubnan. Tezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n tmurt, ɣef yiri n Yilel Agrakal. Zedɣen-tt 750.000 n yimezdaɣen (1.900.000 s tmiwa ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Teggargrent:
Teggargrent (neɣ Twargrit, Taggengusit), d tantala tamaziɣt i yettmeslayen deg wemdan n Warglen (Wargren) d Ingusa deg Ledzayer. 
Deg useggas n 1987, ɣur-es kan 10,000 imsiwlen. 
Llan kra n tmeẓlawin gar tantalawin n Warglen (Taggargrent) d tin n Ingusa (Taggengusit). Daɣen gar At Warglen llan kra n tmeẓlawin timecṭuḥin gar iderman n At Brahim, At Sisin d At Waggin.
Imsiwelen si Warglen ẓran Tamaziɣt n Ingusa, Timasin d Tumẓabt kif-kif itent, i wumi qqaren Twargrit dɣa ɣef wayen Jean Delheure (1987:355), "at Wargren fehemen d aweḥdi tawsint, "At Warglen fhimen At Tmasin mliḥ".

Vermont:
Vermont d yiwen seg Yiwunak Yeddukklen, yezga-d deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tmurt, ɣef tlisa n Kanada, teqreb tamnaṭ n Kebek d werɣem n Montreal. 
Tajumma-nnes 24.923 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-t 625.741 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Montpelier.

Kebek:
Kebek (Tafrensist : "Québec", Tanglizt : Quebec) d tamnaḍt n wegmuḍ n Kanada.
Tajumma-nnes 1.667.441 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen), zedɣen-tt 8 080 550 n yimezdaɣen (Ikebeken) deg 2012. 
Aneɣlaf amezwaru : Philippe Couillard (PLQ)
Tarakalt.
Kebek yezga-d gar temnaḍin n Wakal Amaynut ed Labrador akwd Brunswick Amaynut d Ontario, dɣa ɣur-es tilisa akwd Iwunak Yedduklen d yiwunak n New York, New Hampshire ed Maine. 
Tutlayin deg Kebek.
Amur ameqqran seg yimezdaɣen n temnaḍt-a ssawalen s tefṛensist (79 %) maca llan 7,9 % n wenglizwalen (Anglophones). Tutlayt tunṣibt tella d Tafrensist deg temnaṭ-agi. 

Toronto:
Toronto d tamdint n Kanada, tezga-d deg wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n tmurt . 
D nettat ay d tamdint tagejdant n temnaḍt n Ontario. Zedɣen-tt 2.503.281 n yimezdaɣen.

New York:
New York d nettat ay d tamdint tameqqrant akk deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen. Tezga-d deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tmurt, ɣef Ugaraw Aṭlasi. Zedɣen-tt 8.336.697 n yimezdaɣen (19.006.798 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as). Tamdint-a tezga-d deg uwanak n New York.
Isunen n weɣrem n New York.
Llan semmus (5) n yisunen deg New York, s tenglizt qqaren-as "Boroughs". 

Octave Mirbeau:
Octave Mirbeau ilul ass n 16 di furar 1848 deg Trévières (Fransa), immut deg Paris g 16 di furar 1917. D amaru afransis.
Octave Mirbeau d aneɣmas d umyaru afransis igan aggag meqquren. Aneggal, yaru aṭas n idlisen amm : "L'Abbé Jules" (1888), "Le Jardin des supplices"(1899) d "Le Journal d'une femme de chambre" (1900). Yaru awed tisiway n umezgun ẓund "Les affaires sont les affaires" ityassnen s waṭas.
Afernan n tẓuri, ikka iga ameddakkel d Claude Monet d Auguste Rodin. Isten awed Alfred Dreyfus g tedyant-nnes. 

Sɛid At Mɛemmer:
Sɛid At Mɛemmer naγ Essaid At Maamar s tira n Tifinaɣ ⵙⵄⵉⴷ ⴰⵜ ⵎⵄⴻⵎⵎⴻⵔ d amyaru, d amedyaz aqbayli i yettidiren di tmurt n Lalman. Ilul ass n 09 yunyu 1966, deg At Meslayen di Tizi Uzzu.
Tameddurt.
Essaid At Maamar d yiwen umedyaz atrar, d amyaru azwaw i yettidiren di tmurt n Lalman. Yedder u yeqqim d azwaw n tidett.
Tamedyazt ines tgerrez aṭas, u nettaf deg isefra ines yakw ayen yaɛnan tazwawt; yewwi-d af ṭaqa n isental, ger wid yecqan tazwawt. Essaid At Maamar iseqdac tamedyazt-is s uzawan i wakken ad yejbed tamezzuɣt n win a s-id-iḥessen, ur llan ara aṭas i zemren ad xedmen akken. Taẓuri ines meqqret ama di tazwawt iquren i yettmeslay, ama deg umgarad n isental ɣef i d-ittawi deg isefra ines, ama d Tayri, Tawacult, Imdukal, Ineɣmasen d inaẓuren izwawen imucaɛen am Muḥend Arab Besaɛud, Lunis At Mengellat, Lwennas Meɛṭub, Ɛli At Ferḥat (Ideflawen)... atg. Aseḥrireb af tutlay tamaziɣt d tazwawt, i nettaf nezeh di tmedyazt-is. 
Essaid At Maamar issufɣ-ed yiwen uḍebsi usid s w-azal-is, isem-yas : "I kečč a Lunnas". D tajjmilt i ucennay Lwennas Meɛṭub. 
Daɣen Essaid At Maamar yettsuqul-ed si tutlayin tiwerdanin(tiberraniyin), ladɣa seg talmanit, imi yettidir di tmurt n Lalman. ɣef umedya, llant kra n tmucuha yettwasnen di tmurt aki, i yuran watmaten "Grimm". Yerra-tent-id ar tutlayt tazwawt, admega d Hänsel akw d Gretel, iwimi yefka ismawen izwawen: "Ḥmiṭuc d Duduc", ak d Aschenputtel neɣ "Cendrillon", iwimi isemma : "M-iγiγden". Essaid At Maamar, ula d netta yettaru timucuha s tazwawt. Ger tid i yettwasnen d "Tiɣimit deg tiɣilt n wedrar". Essaid At Maamar yettaru aṭas imagraden, isefra, akw d idrisen deg ismal uzeṭa n Internet, ladɣa deg asmel n tasekla : imyura.net. Atnan izwal n kra n tmucuha, tijmilin, idrisen akw d isefra n Essaid At Maamar :

Seřwan:
Seřwan neɣ Selwan (Tamaziɣt n Arrif: Seřwan, s Taɛrabt: سلوان', s Tafṛansist: "Selouane") d yiwet temdint yellan di temnaḍt n Ennaḍor di ugafa n Merruk. Deg useggas n 2004 zedɣen di Seřwan 10.000 imezdaɣ. Akk nsen ssawalen tutlayt Tamaziɣt. 

Aɣbal:
Aɣbal (s tefṛensist: "Aghbal"), d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n Tipaza, zedɣen-t 6.606 n yimezdaɣen.

Baynam:
Baynam (s tefṛensist: Baïnem), d tamdint tamecṭuḥt n ugzedu n Ldzayer (taɣiwant n Lḥemmamat), tezga-d ɣef yiri n yilel (lebḥar), deg utaram (lɣerb) n temdint n Ldzayer. Tamdint-a tesɛa tiẓgi am wakken ay tesɛa asbiṭar.

Angélica:
Angélica Ksyvickis Huck ilul ass n 30 November 1973.

Alan Stivell:
Ilul Alan Stivell ass n di Rium (Riom) deg Auvergne, d-anaẓur, acennay, aẓawan afṛansi yettnaγen iwakken idles abriṭani d tmurt tabriṭanit ad sεun azref deg akal nsen. Yetturar s waṭas n tawilat uẓawan garasen: "bombarde", "biniou kozh", "cornemuse écossaise", "tin whistle" d "harpe celtique".
Aḍebsaru.
Iseγraz inezliyen.
24 Iseγraz :

Agraw i Yidles d Tugdut:
Agraw i Yidles d Tugdut (GDG) (Tafransist: "Rassemblement pour la Culture et la Démocratie (RCD)") d akabar asertan iy yellan di Dzayer. Akabar a yedwes di Leqbayel. Yesbedd-it Dr Saɛid Saɛdi deg 1989 di Tizi Wezzu. 
Amezruy n ukabar agi daɣen yeqqen s amezruy n umalway ines Saɛid Saɛdi.
Agraw i Yidles d Tugdut, am Tirni Iɣallen Inemlayen, wer yekcim ara deg tefrant n tselwit deg 2002.

Tarbaat n tagrawla:
Tarbaɛt n tagrawla tlul-ed di tesdawit n bab ezzouar,deg 1977,snulfan tt id inelmaden di tussnakt : yidir Ɛumar,xlifa,hsen,yerna d ɣursen Belɛid deg 1980,tizlatin nsen : jida,ulerri,nerrez,yuègurten,afrik,fadma n sumer,yemma tedda hafi,ssuffɣen d a CD aneggaru deg 2012 isem is ,acuɣer.

Dante Alighieri:
Dante Alighieri ilul g 22 mayyu 1265, immut g 14 ctambir 1321. D amaru aṭalyan. D netta i d ababat n tutlayt taṭalyant n wassa, imi yella seg imezwura i yuran yess yerna itebbet ilugan-is asmi tella d tantala kan tatuksanit deg tmennaṭ n Florencia n tura. Yettwassen ugar s udlis-is " Tikumidit", ideg i d-yessugen yiwen yinig ɣer Ǧahennama anda i d-yettemlil wid i ixedmen cceṛ i d-yegran di tmes.

Gelasius I:
Gelasius I naγ Gelaz Amezwaru, d-ababat n teknisit wis 49, ilul deg Tefriqt ugafa, yemmut di Ṛrum ass n 21 Wamber asegwas 496.

ESME Sudria:
ESME-Sudria (ex-Ecole spéciale de mécanique et d'électrécité) d yiwet "Grande école" (lakul tamuqrant) tafransist n tusna enjenyer, tella di temdint n Ivry-sur-Seine.
Lakul tellul di useggas n 1905, vava-s d lenjenyer afransi s izuran ikataliyen Joachim Sudria.

Burkina Faso:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">
Burkina fasu d tamurt id yezgan deg umalu n lber n tefriqt zint-as-d setta n tmura ,seg ugafa mali ,seg usamer niǧer ,seg unẓul tugu,binin,ɣana,kut divwar.
Amezruy.
Burkina fasu (vulta taɛlayant) tella d amur deg tgelda n Mali tineslemt, sakin tuɣal d amur deg tgelda n sanfi , sakin teqqel d tagelda n vulta uqbel amnekcem afransi deg useggas 1896,tewwi timunent ines deg useggas 1960.

Igures:
Amezruy.
Aɛmer Ubuyaḥya d yiwen umrabeḍ ,tezdeɣ tarwa-s tama n wasif ddaw Igures , di tgerwla mgal amnekcem afransis (1954) tefka d taddart 32 imeɣraṣen am Akli At Ṭayeb , Tasaɛdit At Ṭayeb , Muḥend Lɛerbi neɣ Busɛad Ujidan. Syina mi yefra ṭrad, ulin atas imezdaɣ d asawen seg wasif mi yuɣen tiferkiwin ɣer taddart n At Mlal id yezgan s ufella n Igures .
Tarakalt.
Taddart Igures tesɛa tilisa nettat dwatas Ljiranis : At Mellal , At Bu Yusef ( tiferdud+tazruts ) iferhounene (ibelqisen+ahduch)
(( Idermans )) 
Taddart igures tebda ɣef 6 Idermans :
1* At Ṭtayeb= ( 4 Ixamen )
2* At Weftis(ait mouffok)
3* Igujilen + At aemar ( Oudjidane )
4* At L'mouhoub 5* At Abderrahmane,6*Ait Idir ____________________________________
Tadert igures tesa 6 n yismawen n twacult:
Tamudi.
Tesɛa taddart azal (983 imezdaɣ) deg useggas 2015 .

Dawed:
Dawed d agellid wis sin n tmurt n Israyil taqburt, iɛac di lqern wis Xe uqbel talalit n lmasiḥ.
Tamedurt-is.
D ameksa n teqbilt n Yahuda mmis amaẓuz n Yasa , Ḍalut agellid n yimir-nni yusem fellas acku yebɣa ad as yekkes tagelda mi i yenɣa Ǧalut ameqran.
Asmi yemmut Ḍalut yuɣal Dawed d agellid yeẓaz tilisa n tgelda n israyil alama timeẓra ( egypte) akked Furat ( Euphrate), mi yemmut dawed ixelf t id Sliman mmis ɣef uqerru n tgelda.

Sami Ameziane:
Sami Ameziane naγ Ṣami Ameẓyan s teqbaylit d anazur urasan (humoriste) aqbayli , d amyaru, d ameskar umezgun n urasan d teḍṣa. Yella daγen d-anadal n Basket-Ball. Ilul ass n deg Saint-Denis Fṛansa.

Aksel (agellid):
Aksel (s Tifinaɣ ⴰⴽⵙⵍ) d yiwen ugellid amaziɣ d amɣar aɣatar n teqbaylit n Awraba, ittwasgnen aṭas ɣ tizi n ukeccem n waεraben s Tmazɣa. 
Iga s tajjedt tamasiḥiyt lli rad ifl i wakken ad ikcem s Islam. Wanag la immiqqir d yiwen uɣella n waεraben Ɛuqba Ibn Nafiε lli rad ttisimẓi izzugz deg watig-is lgddam n ayt ɣur-es. Mayad rad isgerwel tannayt ns f waεraben ig awttas lli rad ittḥi s Islam. Rad ilmma yaf tavarast s tagrawla f kullu maygan aεrab wala anselem. Rad yurri s kirawan ikkist i waεraben. Mac rad imt ɣ tasbaytad zdat n Umeyyaden.

Iman n Saɣru (Saɣru Band):
Iman n Saɣru niɣ Saɣru Band d yiwet deg tirubba na isawaln ɣf tusna tamaziɣt n wanzul-wegmuḍ n Umerruk. Iman n Saɣru sekrent atmaten Mbarek d Xalid Ulɛrbi tsmun inaẓuren Mbarek Ulɛrbi, Xalid Ulɛrbi, Ɛmar, Fuad, Ɛli .
Timdeyazin n tasfift wis krad: Awes i tala.

Ur ngin ula n-kker

Ur ɣurneɣ mayed n-ffer !

Ur nekriz mayed n-megger

Ur nɛeẓẓi ad as nɣer

Abrid-inu !
Ageḍṛuṛ iney-i-id aqmu,
Issencef-i uẓru n leɛlu,
Ur yad yaṭfut umalu,
Iɣef inker ir'ad iddu.

Ad nzel laṭer-inu i tmara;
Sbelyun neɣ d Fransa,
Nekkin yad giɣ ubeṛṛa.

Ur tekkul lḥhukuma,
Ur ibriy lberlaman.

Afɣanistan:
</td></tr>
Tamurt n Afɣanistan, tezga-d g unẓul n Asya,tezga-d ger Pakistan akked Iran.

Ityupya:
Ityupya d tamurt n Tefriqt Tagmuḍant. Tajumma-nnes 1.104.300 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 85.237.338 n yimezdaɣen (Ityupiyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Addis Abeba. 

Iritirya:
Iritirya d tamurt n Tefriqt Tagmuḍant. Tajumma-nnes 117.600 km2. Zedɣen-tt 5.224.000 n yimezdaɣen (Iritiriyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Asmara.
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">

Madagaskar:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">

Muzambik:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">

Togo:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">
Ṭugu neɣ tagduda n ṭugu d yiwet n tmurt id yezgan di tefriqt umalu , tesɛa tilas nettat d tmura
Burkina Fasu,Ɣana,Binin.

Michael Jackson:
Michael Joe Jackson, ilul ass n di Gary Indiana, d-acennay, aceṭṭaḥ, amaru n tezlatin amarikani.

Malawi:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">
Malawi d yiwet n tmurt id yezgan deg unẓul umenẓaw n tefriqt , tesɛa tilisa nettat d Muzambik,Tanẓanya,Zambya.

Eminem:
Eminem neɣ Slim Shady isem aḥeqqani Marshall Bruce Mathers III, ilul ass n 17 Tuber 1972 di Kansas City deg ugezdu n Missouri di tmurt n Marikan. D anaẓur deg uɣanib n rap.

Asif n Mississippi:
Asif n Mississippi d asif ameqran akk deg Tamrikt n Ugafa. Ibeddu-d seg ugelmim n Itasca (deg Minnesota, deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen), yerna aman-nnes ttenɣalen s anẓul arma d Abagu n Miksik. Isafen n Missouri ed Ohio ssenɣalen-d daɣen aman-nsen s asif-a. Mississippi ɣer-s 3.780 n yikilumitren deg teɣzef, yerna tajumma-nnes [2 tuweḍ ɣer 3,1 km2 .
D anaram Hernando de Soto ay d Uṛufi amezwaru ay yuwḍen s asif-a deg 1541. Deg 1673, Ifṛensisen Louis Jolliet ed Jacques Marquette ssaklen [5 deg wasif-a yerna uwḍen armi d asif n Arkansas. Anaram afṛensis La Salle yuweḍ s adelta n wasif-a deg 1682 yerna d netta ay d Afṛensis amezwaru ay d-yesɣerten tama n Mississippi ed Louisiana d ayla n Fṛansa. D aya ay yejjan Fṛansa ad teḥkem tama n ugafa n wasif-nni. Ma d tama n wenẓul-nnes teqqel ddaw udabu n Spenyul seg 1769 d asawen. Deg 1783, Iwunak Yeddukklen rran asif n Mississippi d talast-nsen tutrimt [7, sakkin, deg 1803, Fṛansa tessenz akal-nnes n Mississippi ed Louisiana i Yiwunak Yeddukklen. Deg 1863, deg tallit n Wemgaru Aɣarim deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen, iɣallen imarikaniyen n Tdukli ḍḍfen tamdint n Vicksburg ay d-yezgan ɣef wasif n Mississippi yerna d aya ay ten-yejjan ad sbeɛden iɣallen Ikunfidiṛaliyen ɣef wasif-a. Ass-a, asif n Mississippi yeqqel d abrid ameqran n yiɣerruba deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen.
↑ superficie مساحة
↑ yikilumitren imkuẓen
↑ explorateur مستكشف
↑ voyager سافر
↑ déclarer أعلن
↑ occidentale غربية
↑ guerre civile حرب أهلية

Imilcil:
Imilcil d yiwet temnaḍt tamsedrart iy yellan deg Merruk.
