Canberra d tamaneɣt n Ustralya, tezga-d deg wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 345.000 n yimezdaɣen. D nettat ay d tamdint tameqrant akk deg Ustralya ur d-yezgin ɣef yiri n yilel.

Sydney:
Sydney d tamdint n wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n Ustralya, tezga-d deg uwanak n Tmurt n Yigaliyen n Wenẓul. Zedɣen-tt 4.504.469 n yimezdaɣen. D nettat ay d tamdint tameqrant akk deg Ustralya.

Tamurt n Yigaliyen n Wenẓul:
Tamurt n Yigaliyen n Wenẓul (s tanglizt: "New South Wales"; s tefrensist: "Nouvelle-Galles du Sud"), d awanak n wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n Ustralya. Tajumma-nnes 809.444 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-t 7.238.819 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Sydney.

Tamesgida n Laqṣa:
Tamesgida n Laqṣa (anamek s tmaziɣt: Tamesgida Ibeɛden/Tubɛidt), d amkan imqeddes n wesɣan n Lislam, yezga-d deg temdint n Lquds, deg Falesṭin (yellan ass-a ddaw tuṭṭfa tisrayilit). 
Tamesgida-a d nettat ay d amkan imqeddes wis kraḍ deg Lislam, deffir Lkeɛba (deg Mekka) akk d Tmesgida n Umazun (deg Temdint). Deg wakal n Laqṣa tella tmesgida akk d Tqubbet n Weẓru. Seg wasmi ay yettwaṭṭef weḥric agmuḍan n temdint n Lquds, deg 1967, Israyiliyen bdan sseddayen ddiɛaya ay d-yennan tamesgida-a tettwabna deg wemkan aydeg yella, zik, ufakan (temple) n Sidna Sliman, yerna, deg yiseggasen n 1990 d 2000, bdan qeddcen akken ad kksen amkan-a i Yinselmen imi ay t-ttwalin d amkan imqeddes akk deg wesɣan (ddin) n Wudayen. 
Maca deg Lislam, amkan-a d imqeddes imi Amazun (Nnbi) Muḥemmed yusa-d yerna yeẓẓul deg-s deg Yiḍ n Lisṛa. Nnig waya, d Tamesgida n Laqṣa tella d lqebla tamezwarut wuɣur llan ttẓallan Yinselmen, arma ay d asmi ay ten-yumeṛ Ṛebbi ad rren Lkeɛba d lqebla. Sakkin, asmi ay kecmen Yinselmen ɣer temdint n Laqṣa, Ɛumar ibn Xeṭṭab, axlif n Yinselmen, yebna tamesgida deg wemkan-nni.
Umawiyen smeɣren tamesgida-nni, yerna fukken-tt deg useggas n 705. Deg 746, twet-d yiwet n tzenzelt ay tt-ihudden, dɣa ɛawden bnan-tt Yiɛebbasiyen deg 754. Deg 1033, thudd-itt tzenzelt niḍen, dɣa ɛawden bnan-tt Yifaṭimen deg wemkan aydeg mazal-itt ar ass-a. Deg 1099, Inmudag (croisés) imasiḥiyen ẓedmen-d ɣef temdint n Lquds, snegren imezdaɣen-nnes yerna rran tamesgida-nni d taklizt. Maca, asmi ay ten-yessuffeɣ Ṣlaḥeddin, Inselmen ɛawden rran tamesgida-nni d amjan n tẓallit. 
Deffir ccwal ay inekren deg 2001 deg Falesṭin, Israyiliyen gedlen i wakk Inselmen n umaḍal akken ad ẓẓallen deg tmesgida-a, menɣir Aɛraben n Israyil. Nnig waya, Israyiliyen ttkemmilen leqdicat-nsen n ussekfel ddaw tmesgida-a, ula ma Inselmen ugin aya imi ay yezmer ad ihudd llsisan n tmesgida-nni. Ma d imedḍurfa israyiliyen, ttgallan ad hudden tamesgida-a akken ad bnun deg-s "Afakan".

Baltimore:
Baltimore d tamdint n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg uwanak n Maryland. Zedɣen-tt 620.961 n yimezdaɣen (2.690.886 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).
Baltimore deg Yedles Aɣrefan.
Deg temdint n Baltimore, teḍra wemazrar (série TV) The Wire af yiɣallen n teɣlist (police)deg weɣrem-a agellil, af usgufsu (corruption) ed tinnɣi (criminalité) ay ihudden temdint n Baltimore. 

Ḥasan Wis 2:
Ḥasan II (Ḥasan wis sin) 1929 - 1999, illa zik d agellid n Umerruk si 1961 ar 1999, aseggwas deg immut. Mmi-s Muḥemmed wis 6 idwel d agllid awaren-as. Netta d Aɛalawi.

Muḥemmed Wis 6:
Muḥemmed 6 d agllid n Umerruk si 1999 ar ass-a. Mueḥmmed wis 6 ilul-d di 21 Ɣuct 1963 yuɣal d agellid n Umerruk di Yulyu 1999 awaren imi immut baba-s agellid Ḥasan Wis 2.

Ṭaher Ǧaɛut:
Ṭaher Ǧaɛut d amyaru ilul ass 11 yennayer 1954 di Ulxu (Iγil Ibaḥriyen) zdat n Uẓeffun.
Iwwetet rebreb ass 26 mayu 1993, sin yemmut ass n 2 yunyu 1993, di Zzayer.
=Tameddurt=
=Ayen yura=

Mexluf Nurdin:
Mexluf Nuredin d aselway n tɣiwant n Raḥya (deg Um Lebwaɣi - deg 2007), seg ukabar n Wemsegraw Aɣelnaw Amegday. Ilul deg 1958 yerna yella iqeddec d anemhal n uɣerbaz.

Ljazya:
Ljazya (s tefrensist: "El Djazia"), d taɣiwant n Um Lebwaqi, zedɣen-tt 3.318 n yimezdaɣen.

Awras:
Awras d tama n yidurar i d-yezgan deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tmurt n Ldzayer (gar twilayin n Tbatent, Tixencelt, Um Lebwaqi, Suq Ahras, Tbesset ed Tbeskert. Adrar aɛlayan akk deg Wewras d taqacuct n Celyet ay yesɛan 2.326 n lmitrat. Idraren n Wewras kkan fell-asen yiɣezran d ilqayanen (am Iɣzer Amellal ed Iɣzer n Lɛebdi), am wakken ay llan deg-sen yicerfan d imeqranen am wid n Lqenṭra ay yellan seg zik d abrid gar ugafa (nord) ed uneẓruf (ṣṣeḥra) n Ldzayer.
Amerzuy.
Imezdaɣ n Wewras d Icawiyen, d tagrawt n Yimaziɣen ay mazal ssawalen iles amaziɣ (tacawit). Zik, d taqbilt tamaziɣt n Yeẓnagen ay izedɣen idraren-a, yerna nnuɣen s teqseḥ akked Rruman akken ur ten-ttajjan ad d-kecmen akal-nsen. D acu kan, Ṛṛuman ssawḍen ad bnun snat temdinin timeqranin deg Wewras: Timgad ed Taẓult. 
Deg tallit n Yiwendalen, Imaziɣen n Wewras nnuɣen daɣen akken ad ḥudden akal-nsen. Deg lqern wis 8, tagellidt tamaziɣt Dihya (ay yellan, ahat, tettḍafar asɣan uday), tennuɣ ed Yinselmen. Deg lqern wis 11, asmi ay d-uwḍen Waɛraben imessukal n Banu Hilal (ay yeddren ɣef tlisa n wenẓul n Wewras), snernan azraɛ n taɛrabt deg tama-a, dɣa d aya ay yejjan aṭas n Yimaziɣen ad walin iman-nsen ula d nitni d Aɛraben.
Amezruy Atrar.
Deg tallit n wemgaru n Ldzayer (1954-1962), tama n Wewras d tin aydeg d-yella yimenɣi d ameqran aṭas gar yemjuhad idzayriyen ed yiɣallen ifrensisen. 
Tadamsa.
Tama n Wewras d tin aydeg terbeḥ tfellaḥt n yirden ed temẓin, yerna imesdurar n tama-a sfulluḥen daɣen isekla n yigumma (arbres fruitiers). Ma d timiwa n wenẓul n Wewras, d tikiwanin aṭas yerna imezdaɣen-nsent ddren s tkessawt n tɣeḍḍen ed wakraren.

At Hamla:
At Hamla (s tefrensist: "Ouled Hamla"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Um Lebwaqi, zedɣen-tt 11.019 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist llan ɣɣaren-as "Berteaux".
Usunen.
Usunen i yellan deg tɣiwant n At Hamla llan : 

Sigus:
Sigus (s tefṛensist: "Sigous"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Um Lebwaqi. Zedɣen-tt 14.944 n yimezdaɣen.

At Xlifa:
At Xlifa (FR:Aït Khlifa) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Tacaɛbet:
Tacaɛbet ( Fr: Chabet El Ameur) ( s tifinaɣ: ⵜⴰⵛⴰⵄⴱⴻⵜ) d yiwet n Tγiwant di tmurt n leqvayel (Tamurt n Lezzayer) Tezga deg twilayt n Bumerdas. Tella ar 40 km deg unẓul-agmuḍ n Bumerdas.

50 Cent:
50 Cent neɣ Fifty Cent Isem-is unṣib Curtis James Jackson, illu ass n di temdint n New York, d anaẓur deg uɣanib n Rap.

Anna Rita Del Piano:
Anna Rita Del Piano, s isem-is n ṣṣaḥ Anna Rita Viapiano, taktrist taṭelyanit tlul ass n 26 yulyu 1966 g Cassano Delle Murge.

Ɛezzddin At Judi:
Ɛezzddin At Judi, ilul ass 24 yennayer 1967 di Tebbest (Tbessa), yebda itturar di takurt uḍar asmi yella 7 issewgassen di imezzyanen n jsk, almi yebbi-d 20 issewgassen iruḥ ad iɣar di Ledzayer ISTS

Rafael Nadal:
Rafael Nadal d-amyurar n waddal n Tennis tmurt Spanya, ilul ass n di temdint n Manacor.
Yevda yetturar d tervaɛt tameqṛant asegwas n 2001. Iḥrez ar assa 57 izwilen, garasen 12 n Grand Chelems d 24 n Masters 1000.

Serbya:
Tamurt n Serbya, tezga-d g umenzaw n Turuft. Tamanaɣt d Belgrad.

Paramore:
Paramore d banda amiriki.

Belgrad:
Tamdint n Belgrad d tamanaɣt n tmurt n Serbi.

Ukrayin:
Tamurt n Ukrayin, neɣ Ukrayin, d tamurt tezga-d turuft. Zedɣen-tt 44.000.000 n yimezdaɣen (Ikrayinen). Tamanaɣt-is d Kyib (kiev/kyiv).

Benedicta Boccoli:
Benedicta Boccoli, taktrist taṭelyanit tlul ass n 11 wember 1966 g Milan.

Farid dms debah:
Farid Dms Debah, Iluled 19 di yulyu 1976 di Paris, d Asegbar, d Amseḍru, Yettaru Isura, d Anfaras n Usarug azzayri d tfrancist Yettwassen d amseknaw u daɣen d asertay.

Farid Dms Debah:
Farid Dms Debah, Iluled 19 di yulyu 1976 di Paris (Fransa), d Asegbar, d Amseḍru, Yettaru Isura, d Anfaras n Usarug azzayri d tfrancist Yettwassen d amseknaw u daɣen d asertay.
Tameddurt.
Farid Dms Debah ilul deg useggas n1976 di Paris (Fransa). Iεac tazwara temẓi ines di l zzayer anda iwalef amḍal amizli dɣa mi yessaweḍ 14 n iseggassen yessufeɣ-d akke gma-s Yassine d weltma-s tamuqrant Hadia 45 nnubat.
Iness amenzuMi yuɣal ar Paris, di lεamr-is 16 iseggassen yeldi takubanit tamenzut- ines di tasenselkimt. D awnaf ,d anaεmer di tviεa-s , yeǧǧa tasenselkimt yuɣal d anfaras di lεemr-s 18 iseggassen yakwed d amekfadu di tasgilt n umattaf. Arnou ɣer warmud agi, yiwi-d turagt n uɣemmas n uhanay ,di Paris d wayen id-as d yezzin aṭas n tmaɣriwin n uamaḍal amizli
Tameddurt N Tsertit.
seg wasmi yella tmecṭuḥ ,farid yeṭṭef akfawel n tmetti d Tasertit iḍferen imawlan-is.asmi yesεa 20 di leεmer-is yekcem tidukkla management n inaẓuren ilemẓiyen (AMJA)2013,seg umesɣaru-is amεiwen les talents ifriren ladɣa timura yellan deg ubrid n taneflit. deg akatar n warmud asduklan,yesεa 21 di leεmer-is ,d netta akk id ilemzi id-yevran sɣur uneɣlef n tedyanin tiberayinin zdat n umineg aseqqamu timeḍrit n lzzayer akked leqdic di tesmilt aɣan n tawtilt des binationaux.yetekka ɣer watas n les colloques di lezzayer kra n wagguren akka di tfaska timeḍrit di Lisbonne,amaray amatu n tuddsa nations unies Koffi Annan,leccɣel ɣef tawtilt n ilemẓiyen deg ubrid n teneflit.di 2008 yslaled tadukkla snezwi aslali ameslaẓṛaw timziregt(ADCAI)axeddim n Tamsetla d la convivialité ger Tikerziyin d usniref n tenezwit akked w asmil n usnulfu n ssinima n umaḍal.

Byilurusya:
Byelorusi ,neɣ Tagduda n Byelorusi,d tamurt tezga-d turuft. Zedɣen-tt 9.400.000 n yimezdaɣen (Ibyelorusiyen). Tamanaɣt-is d Minsk.

Ursu Aberkan:
Ursu Aberkan (s tlatinit: Ursus americanus), d Ursu ay yeddren deg Temrikt n Ugafa. Ɣas ma yella semman-as aberkan, tikkal nezmer ad naf ini-nnes (llun) iṛuḥ ɣer udemdam, aras neɣ aẓerwal (bleu). Ursu-a d amecṭuḥ ma nquren-it ɣer waytmaten-nnes niḍen (am wursu aras neɣ Ursu Amellal), yettaweḍ ɣer 1,80 m (lmitra ticcert 80) deg teɣzef, yera iwezzen azal n 70 n yikiluten.

Ameccaksum:
Imeccaksumen (asuf: ameccaksum), d tafesna (ordre) n yiɣersiwen isuṭṭaḍen ay ittetten, s umata, aksum. Iɣersiwen-a sɛan tuɣmas tumsidin ay ten-yettajjan ad ccen aksum n yiɣersiwen niḍen. D acu kan, ɣas ma yella semman-asen yimassanen "imeccaksumen", aṭas seg yiɣersiwen-a zemren ad ccen tiɣawsiwin niḍen menɣir aksum. Ɣef umedya, ursuten zemren ad ccen kullec, am waken ay llan yimeccaksumen ay ittetten ala imɣan, am yipandaten. Tafesna n yimeccaksumen llan deg-s ama d iɣersiwen ay yeddren ɣef wakal (am yemcac, ursuten ed yifisen), ama d iɣersiwen ay yeddren deg yilel (am yidemriyen ).

MO Bgayet:
MO Bgayet tarbaɛt n ddabex uḍar n temdint n Bgayet

Sidna Ɛisa:
Sidna Ɛisa" neɣ Yeccu ' neɣ Yeccu en Nazarit, yettusemman Yeccu Amasiḥ neɣ Aysa neɣ Yeccu Amettumes, d amdan amenzawi n ajjed n tamasiḥit. Ilul ger 8 d sin iseggasen send tazwara n tafada tameɣradant , immut ger 30 d 33 iseggasen umbeɛd. Isem-is daɣen 'Jesus-Christ' neɣ s wudem aḥerfi 'Christ'. S tyunanit taqburt isem-is Ιησούς Χριστός ("Iesous Khristos"). 
Aẓaṛ n wawal Ɛisa neɣ 'Jesus' yusa-d si tutlayt taɛebrit : ישו neɣ - "yešū", a yenṭqen "ⵢⵛⵓⵄ", anamek ines d "Afessi/ⴰⴼⴻⵙⵙⵉ". Ma d Aẓaṛ n wawal "Amasiḥ" neɣ 'Christ' d asuqel ar tagrigit, n wawal n taɛebrit 'Messie' : משיח - "machiakh", neɣ win ɣef d-ters tanebaṭ n Yakuc/ⵢⴰⴽⵓⵛ. 
Imasiḥiyen ḥesben-t d afessi akk d mmi-s n . Wid yellan d 'Ikatulikiyen', d 'urtuduksiyen', akk d 'ibrutistaniyen' ttadren-t-id am wergaz n tidett, u daɣen d Yakuc s tidett. Ɣur yinselmen "Yeccu Amasiḥ" d aneggaru deg wsar beɛd Muḥemmed. Ma d udayen, ur t-ḥsiben ara d , wala d Afessi neɣ mmis n Yakuc. 

Tawrirt Mimun:
Tawrirt n Mimun d taddart n Tmurt n Leqbayel, tezga-d deg tɣiwant n Wayt Yanni (tawilayt n Tizi Wezzu). Deg taddart-a ay ilul Mulud At Mɛemmer.

Buɛednan:
Buɛednan d taddart n Tmurt n Leqbayel (taɣiwant n Yibudraren, ugzedu n Tizi Wezzu). Deg taddart-a ay ilul Ḥmed Uyeḥya (Aneɣlaf Amezwaru n Ldzayer).

Eεli lawwis:
ihi ammek akka ith s walim e3li lawwis dhargaz nel 3ali

Tamacahut s uzenzigh:
Igelden yiwet n tmurt. yes3a tamettut is , s3and arraw nsen :sin warac ! RRAn ades3un taqcict dayen kan,maca tasselttant tehlk! yiwet n tikelt t3adad yiwet n temghart s yina tessutur dgha ldin-as tawwurt. tekcem tecca teswa , dgha ulsen-as tamsalt .Imaren tenteq i ugellid:"A sidi seltan zrigh dacu i-as ilaqen "! yerra as-id sseltan:"Annagh a yema tamghart ma ayi t3awnedh gergham rebi kem adawidh taghawsa ara yessejjin tamettut -iw "!
tamghart teqvel! TErra-as-id :"Yerveh a sidi sseltan", azekka ad d-ughala ad-s-tidawigh imsejji !

Queen:
Queen d icennayen ingliziyen n rock. Zenzen ugar si 300 imelayn n yidisken.

Justin Bieber:
Justin Drew Bieber, ilul ass n 1994 di London Ontario, d-acennay, aceṭṭaḥ, amaru n tezlatin amarikani.

Achères:
Achères d tamdint n Fransa, tella deg ugezdu n Yvelines. Llan xilla iqbayliyen dinna.

Cilmun:
Cilmun d agummu (lfakya) i d-ittak yimγi iwumi qqaren medden ariḥan. Imγi ayi llan daγen wid i yas-iqqaren tacilmunt.
Tineḍwa.
Cilmun, illa win rẓayen, illa win ẓiden. D aẓidan i tteγẓaẓen imeksawen. Ur d-iwwi yara ad astuqqet yiwen deg učči ines, acku itbaddid (iḥettel), yerna isγaray taεebbuṭ.
Imγi ines.
Imγi ayyi n uriḥan iṭṭuqet deg tama n wagrakal (Mediterranean Sea) n wadda d tin n ufella. D ajeğğig-is mellulen, m'ara ad ilal i yettuγalen berrik-it m'ara yaweṭ neγ yew, iwumi qqaren medden cilmun. Taqbaylit tferreq yar uriḥan (imγi) yakkid d cilmun (agummu). Ariḥan itekkar-ed, iman-is, deg teẓgi: Ur ad t-iteẓẓu bunadem ur ad t-ineqqc, ur ad isewway. 
Astenyi inu.
-- () 11:57, 8 Wamber 2013 (UTC)

La Fouine:
La Fouine ilul ass 25 Buǧember 1981 di Trappes di tmurt n Fransa, d ywien ucennay deg uḥric n rap mucaɛen aṭas laṣel-is si tmurt n Merruk. 

Toulouse:
Toulouse d yiwet tɣiwant i d yezgan deg unẓul n tmurt n Fransa deg agezdu Midi-Pyrénées, s imezdaɣ (2010) d nettat d tis 4 deffir Paris,Lyon,Marseille.

Bordeaux:
Bordeaux d taɣiwant id yezgan deg unẓul-ataram n tmurt n Fransa deg agezdu n Aquitaine, tesɛa imezdaɣ (2010).

Lille:
Lille d yiwet tɣiwant id yezgan deg ugafa n tmurt n Fransa teṭṭafar aẓiyen Hauts-de-France, zedɣen-tt (2010), tebɛed kan 20 km ɣef tmurt n Biljik.

Montpellier:
Montpellier d yiwet n tɣiwant id yezgan deg unẓul n Fransa deg aẓiyen Languedoc-Roussillon, teṭṭalay ɣef Illel Agrakal, tesɛa imezdaɣ aseggas n 2012.

Houston:
Houston d aɣrem deg ugezdu Texas deg unẓul n tmurt Marikan,tekseb 2 099 451 imezdaɣ deg useggas 2010 (tis 4 di Marikan).

2 dujamber:
Ass 2 dujamber d ass 336 n useggas (337 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 29 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
1ru dujamber - "2 dujamber" - 3 dujamber

3 Dujamber:
Ass 3 dujamber d ass 337 n useggas (338 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 28 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
2 wamber - "3 dujamber" - 4 dujamber

Ixerban (Friḥa):
Ixerban, d yiwet n taddart i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Friḥa deg ugzedu n Tizi Wezzu. 
Anda tella.
Ixerban llan deg lɛarc n At Jennad. Taddart-a teggug (tbɛed) yiwen 35 km seg weɣrem n Tizi Wezzu. 
Iderman.
Llan aṭas n yederman di taddart-nni. Gar-asen a naf : 

Imaɛtuqen (Taɣiwant):

Nelsun Mandela:
Nelsun Rulihlahla Mandela (susru s xhosa ), ɣef ayed isem n tamadla-s « Madiba », ilul ass di Mvezo (Tadukkli n Tafriqt n Unẓul). Yemmut ass di Johannesburg, d-argaz n Uwanek n Tafriqt n Wenẓul ; yella deg iɣellaten imezrayen n Imenɣi mgal anagraw aserti n apartheid uqbel ad yuɣal aselway n Tagduda n Tefriqt n Wenẓul seg 1994 ar 1999, sakin des tifranin timezwura tiɣelnawin war beḍḍu n iri deg l'umezruy n tmurt agi.
Nelsun Mandela yekcem ar "Uswir Aɣelnaw Aferkan" (ANC) deg ussegwas 1944, iwakken ad i nnaɣ mgal aɣmar aserti n tadersi tamellalt dɣa abeṭṭu n iran i t-seṭṭef taneggarut agi. Yuɣal d-abugaṭu, i ttekki ar ubellen war takriḍt mgal isuḍaf n apartheid, id i yesexdem anabaḍ n Ukabar Aɣelnaw seg 1948. Deg useggwas 1960, ANC yuɣal d-amegdul ; daɣen, abellen Amelwi ur d-yettak ara igmaḍ yelḥan, Mandela yesnulfa-d ageṭṭum aserdas n ANC, "Umkhonto we Sizwe (Uzzal n uxtuc n uɣlan)", deg useggwas 1961. Xedmen timhalin n wesfata mgal isgulaf izuyaz d-iserdasen. Ass n , yetweḥbes sɣuṛ lbulis n Tafriqt n Unẓul s-timula n CIA (Tafullut Talemmast n Umel), daɣen ḥekmen-as i lḥebs d imuhal n tmara alamma d lmut deg uẓmaẓ n Rivunia. Imir, y-uɣal d-azamul n ubellen i tulut n iran dɣa yermes tadhelt tagraɣlant i temɣeren.
Sakin 27 iseggwasen di lḥebs deg tiwtilin tiweɛṛanin, erran-as tilelli i Mandela ass n , sakin, aneggaru-agi yeḥuded amsuɣal d ustug s unabaḍ n uselway Frederik de Klerk. Di 1993, yermes (s de Klerk) arraz Nubel n talwit acku sseḥbesen (sin yidsen) deg talwitanhil n apartheid dɣa ssersen-d llsisan n Tafriqt n Wenẓul tamegdayt tamaynut. 
Sakin tukkit i wɛeṛen anda de Klerk d-netta ssinefen ṭrad taɣarimt gar imuɣlen n apartheid, wid n ANC dɣa wid n Inkhata s-uneɣmar zulu, Nelsun Mandela y-uɣal aselway aberkan amezwaru n Tafriqt n Wenẓul di 1994. Yenheṛ tasertit n umsuɣal aɣelnaw gar iberkanen d-imellalen ; yennaɣ mgal tirgaddiwin tudmisin, lamaɛna yestehzi amennuɣ mgal SIDA, yellan deg tallit n urnay deg Tafriqt n Wenẓul. Sakin lmanda awḥid, yekkes iman-is deg tameddurt tasertit turmidt, lamaɛna i kemmel arfad azayez i Uswir aɣelnaw aferkan maca i kemmel ad i ssiẓer tifuliwin-is.
Yeddukel sakin deg aṭas tiddukliwin n ubellen mgal tileqqi nneɣ sida, yetwerfed ar usertatu n tigemmi tucrikt n talsa, Yeqqim d-yiwen udem deg umaḍal yetsmeḥsesen ɣef usentel n Izerfan n Wergaz dɣa yetwali am baba-s n Tafriqt n Wenẓul agetiri d amegday ummid, semman-as « aɣlan taslit n wenẓar », ɣas ma tamurt yesɛa weṛεad igna n tirgaddiwin tudmisin, tussdiwin timettiyin dɣa tuqqla ɣer timɣiwan.

At Wartilan:
At Wartilan neɣ At Wartiran d yiwet tɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel, tezga-d ar ɣef wenẓul n temdint n Bgayet deg Tawilayt n Sṭif. Tesɛa azal n 12,642 (2008).
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Llan aṭas n tudrin deg At Wartiran, gar-asen ad naf : 

Buselam:
Buselam d taɣiwant n ugafa n ugzedu n Sṭif deg tadayra n Buɛendas. 
Tarakalt.
Llan deg ugafa taɣiwant n Kendira deg ugzedu n Bgayet, deg wenẓul llan At Cebana ed Tala Ifassen, deg wegmuḍ akked tiɣwanin n At Nawal Mezada ed Buɛendas deg utaram akked At Wartilan ed At Muḥli. Deg wakal n tɣiwant illa uqacuc (sommet) n Wedrar n Tqintuct
Tudrin.
Llan aṭas n tudrin gar-asen a naf : 

Los Angeles:
Los Angeles d tamdint n utaram (lɣerb) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg wenẓul-utrim (sud-ouest) n California, ɣef yiri n Ugaraw Amelwi. Los Angeles d nettat ay d tamdint tameqrant tis snat deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen, zedɣen-tt 3.833.995 n yimezdaɣen deg tlemmast-nnes, maca zedɣen-tt 17.786.419 n yimezdaɣen (s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Agaraw Amelwi:
Agaraw Amelwi d agaraw ameqran akk deg umaḍal, yezga-d gar tama tagmuḍant (tacerqit) n Asya ed Usṭralya akked tama tutrimt (taɣerbit) n Temrikt. Tajumma-nnes 165 n yimelyunen km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen).

Ilel Aberkan:
Ilel Aberkan d ilel ay d-yezgan gar Ukrayin, Rrus, Jurjya, Ṭṭerk, Bulgarya ed Rumanya. Yeqqen ɣer Yilel Agrakal s wazza (détroit) n Dardanel. Tajumma-nnes 436.400 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen).

Ilel n Ɛuman:
Ilel n Ɛuman (neɣ Ilel n Waɛraben) d aḥric n Ugaraw Ahendi ay d-yezgan gar Ɛuman, Iran, Pakistan ed Lhend. Tajumma-nnes 3.862.000 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen).

Agaraw Ahendi:
Agaraw Ahendi d yiwen seg yigarawen n umaḍal. Yezga-d gar Tefriqt (ay t-id-iḥudden seg utaram), Asya (ay t-id-iḥudden seg ugafa) akked Usṭralya (ay t-id-iḥudden seg wegmuḍ). Tajumma-nnes 73.556.000 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen).

Agaraw Arkti:
Agaraw Arkti d yiwen seg semmus n yigarawen n umaḍal, yezga-d deg tama n ugafa (nord) n Tegnit, gar Temrikt n Ugafa (Kanada ed Alaska), Rrus ed Skandinavya. Tajumma-nnes 14.056.000 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Deg tegrest, amur ameqran seg ugaraw-a yeddal-it wegris. Tizgelt n ugafa (pôle Nord) tezga-d deg tlemmast n ugaraw-a.

Salvador Dali:
Salvador Dali ("Salvador Domènec Felip Jacint Dalí i Domènech", ilul deg Figueres deg 11 Mayyu 1904 - yemmut deg Figueres, deg 23 Yennayer 1989), d amekla (peintre) mechuṛen n Spenyul. Dali yella d imsuneɣ (dessinateur) igerrzen, d win ay iḍefren aɣanib aflalwaẓri (surréaliste). Iqeddicen-nnes sskanayen-d tugniwin (images) d tiɣwaliyin (bizarres) yerna ssewhament. Leqdic-nnes yettwassnen mliḥ d tafelwit (tableau) n La Persistencia de la memoria (Tiɣimit n Tkatut) ay d-iga deg 1931. Dali iger daɣen iman-nnes deg ssinima, deg tesreɣta (sculpture) akked usseknew (aṣewwer), d inurar aydeg yeqdec ɣer yidis n yinuẓar niḍen.
Dali yella iḥemmel akk ayen yellan d imdehheb, am wakken ay iḥemmel iceṭṭiḍen igmuḍanen (icerqiyen), yerna yella yettwali lejdud-nnes d Imuriyen (d Inselmen n Spenyul). Leqdicat-nnes n teklut (peinture) uwyen-d daɣe cwiṭ seg teklut n tallit n Tsidert (Renaissance), yerna yella yesɛa tasugint (imagination) d tameqrant. 

11 dujamber:
Ass 11 dujamber d ass 345 n useggas (346 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 20 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
10 wamber - "11 dujamber" - 12 dujamber

12 dujamber:
Ass 12 dujamber d ass 346 n useggas (347 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 19 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
11 wamber - "12 dujamber" - 13 dujamber

Ras Lwad:
Ras Lwad (s tefrensist: "Ras El Oued"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Lburj Buɛririj, zedɣen-tt 42.345 n yimezdaɣen yerna tebɛed 30 n yikilumitren ɣef temdint n Lburj Buɛririj. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist llan ɣɣaren-as "Tocqueville".

At Mnaṣer:
At Mnaṣer (s tefresist: "Menaceur"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tipaza, zedɣen-tt 22.684 n yimezdaɣen (amur ameqqran seg-sen ssawalen s tmaziɣt). Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Marceau".

Busmaɛil:
Busmaɛil (s tefrensit: "Bou Ismail"), d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n Tipaza. Zedɣen-tt 38,445 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Castiglione".

Ḥejjuṭ:
Ḥejjuṭ (s tefrensist: "Hadjout"), d taɣiwant n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n twilayt n Tipaza, zedɣen-tt 44.065 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Marengo".

Sidi Ɣilas:
Sidi Ɣilas(s tefrensist: "Sidi Ghiles"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tipaza, zedɣen-tt 12.731 n yimezdaɣen (i wumi qqaren Iɣilasen). Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist llan ɣɣaren-as "Novi".

Hewwari Bumedyen:
Hewwari Bumedyen (ilul seg yisem n Muḥemmed Ben Brahim Buxerruba deg 23 Ɣuct 1932 deg Ɛin Ḥsayneyya, Galma - yemmut deg 27 Dujember 1978 deg temdint n Ldzayer), d aserdas adzayri, d aselway wis sin n tmurt n Ldzayer (deffir uzarug), gar 1965 ed 1976, yerna yeqdec d aselway n Useqqamu n Tegrawla gar 1965 ed 1976. 
Deg tallit n wemgaru (ṭṭrad) n Ldzayer, yefka i yiman-nnes isem n Hewwari Bumedeyn yerna yuweḍ ɣer tfesna (legṛad) n weknaner (colonel). Deg 1959, yeqqel d Imḍebber Aɛlayan n Yigen n Weslelli Aɣelnaw (armée de libération nationale). Asmi ay tuwey Ldzayer azarug-nnes (indépendance) deg 1962, Bumedyen yeqqel d aneɣlaf n temḥaddit ddaw uselway Ḥmed Ben Bella, am wakken ay yeṭṭef amkan n wenmazul n Uneɣlaf Amezwaru (vice-Premier misinitre) gar 1963 ed 1965. Deg wass n 17 Yunyu 1965, Bumedyen yesseɣli Ben Bella seg udabu yerna yeqqel d netta d aselway n tegduda. Deg wass n 20 Yunyu n useggas-nni, yerna yeṭṭef ula d amkan n Uneɣlaf Amezwaru.

13 dujamber:
Ass 13 dujamber d ass 347 n useggas (348 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 18 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
12 wamber - "13 dujamber" - 14 dujamber

Charles Dickens:
Charles John Huffam Dickens (ilul deg 7 Furar 1812 – 9 Yunyu 1870), d netta ay d aneggal (romancier) mechuren akk deg Langliz deg tallit tavictoriant (tallit n Tgellidt Victoria). Aṭas seg wungalen-nnes llan ssawalen-d, ladɣa, ɣef lḥif ay terwa tmetti tanglizit deg tallit-nnes, yerna yella yessuffuɣ-iten-id deg tesɣunin. Tiḥkayin n Dickens ssawalent-d ɣef tɣawsiwin n tmeddurt swaswa kan akken llant deg tilawt, dɣa d aya ay yejjan kra n yimura d imeqranen n tallit-nnes ad t-id-cekren, am George Gissing, Leo Tolstoy ed G. K. Chesterton. 
Ayen yura.
Dickens yettwassen, ladɣa, s sin n wungalen d imeqranen, Oliver Twist akked David Copperfield.

14 dujamber:
Ass 14 dujamber d ass 348 n useggas (349 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 17 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
13 wamber - "14 dujamber" - 15 dujamber

15 dujamber:
Ass 15 dujamber d ass 349 n useggas (350 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 16 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
14 wamber - "15 dujamber" - 16 dujamber

Kirkuk:
Kirkuk d tamdint n ugafa (nord) n Lɛiraq, zedɣen-tt 850.787 n yimezdaɣen.

Jedda:
Jedda d tamdint n utaram (lɣerb) n Tgelda Tasaɛudit, zedɣen-tt 3.430.697 n yimezdaɣen.

Atlanta:
Atlanta, d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen. D tamaneɣt n Georgia. Zedɣen-tt 5.268.860 n yimezdaɣen.

Salt Lake City:
Salt Lake City d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen yerna d tamaneɣt n Utah. Zedɣen-tt 1.124.197 n yimezdaɣen.

Denver:
Denver, d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen. D tamaneɣt n Colorado. Zedɣen-tt 2.552.195 n yimezdaɣen.

Milano:
Milano d tamdint n ugafa (nord) n Ṭṭalyan. Zedɣen-tt 1.314.745 n yimezdaɣen.
Tamnaṭ n Milano zzinased waṭṭas n igelmimen zun Agelmim n Kum, Maǧur, atg.

San Francisco:
San Francisco d tamdint n utaram (lɣerb) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n California, ɣef yiri n Ugaraw Amelwi. Zedɣen-tt 7.427.757 n yimezdaɣen.

Ɛaden:
Ɛaden d tamdint tameqrant n Yamen, tezga-d deg wenẓul n tmurt, ɣef yiri n yilel. Zedɣen-tt 800.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Santa Barbara:
Santa Barbara d tamdint n wenẓul-utrim (sud-ouest) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg uwanak n California. Zedɣen-tt 86.353 n yimezdaɣen (201.058 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Ṣenɛa:
Ṣenɛa (s tanglizt: "Sanaa"), d tamaneɣt n Yamen, tezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 1.747.627 n yimezdaɣen (2.167.961 s tmiwa ay d-yezzin fell-as).

In Ṣaleḥ:
In Saleḥ (s tefrensist: "In Salah"), d taɣiwant n utaram (lɣerb) n twilayt n Tmenɣest. Zedɣen-tt 28.022 n yimezdaɣen. Tamdint-a tezga-d deg yiwet seg tmiwa yesɛan aṭas akk n upitrul deg Ledzayer.

Nagasaki:
Nagasaki d tamdint n Japun, tezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n tegzirt n Kyucu (deg wenẓul n tmurt). Zedɣen-tt 446.007 n yimezdaɣen. Deg 1945, Imarikanen wwten tamdint n Nagasaki s tleffuɣt tabelkamit (bombe atomique), d ayen ay yenɣan 73.884 n yemdanen, yerna yejreḥ 74.909 niḍen. D igiman (luluf) n medden niḍen ay yernan uḍnen yerna mmuten seg uxeṣṣar ay d-tessegra tleffuɣt-nni.

Ajdabiya:
Ajdabiya d tamdint n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Libya, tezga-d deg wenẓul n Benɣazi, ɣef yiri n yilel. Zedɣen-tt 76,968 n yimezdaɣen.

Perth:
Perth d tamdint n wenẓul-utrim (sud-ouest) n Usṭralya, tezga-d ɣef yiri n Ugaraw Ahendi, yerna d tamaneɣt n uwanak n Usṭralya Tutrimt. Zedɣen-tt 1.658.992 n yimezdaɣen.

Baniyas:
Baniyas (neɣ "Banias") d tamdint n utaram (lɣerb) n Surya, tezga-d ɣef yiri n Yilel Agrakal, zedɣen-tt 42.128 n yimezdaɣen.

Brisbane:
Brisbane d tamdint n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Usṭralya, yerna d tamaneɣt n uwanak n Queensland. Zedɣen-tt 2.004.262 n yimezdaɣen.

Queensland:
Queensland d awanak (Etat) n Usṭralya, yezga-d deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tmurt. D netta ay d awanak ameqran akk n Usṭralya seg yidis n wakal. Tajumma-nnes 1.852.642 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-t 4.516.361 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Brisbane.

16 dujamber:
Ass 16 dujamber d ass 350 n useggas (351 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 15 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
15 wamber - "16 dujamber" - 17 dujamber

17 dujamber:
Ass 17 dujamber d ass 351 n useggas (352 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 14 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
16 wamber - "17 dujamber" - 18 dujamber

2014:

18 dujamber:
Ass 18 dujamber d ass 352 n useggas (353 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 13 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
17 wamber - "18 dujamber" - 19 dujamber

19 ctamber:
Ass 19 ctamber d ass 262 n useggas (263 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 103 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.

At Aggwaca:
At Aggwaca d taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel, tezga deg tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu. Teqqen ar taqbilt n At Yiraten. 
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n At Aggwaca tella deg ulemmas n tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n tɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n At Aggwaca tesɛa 11 tudrin :
Taddart ugaren tiyeḍ nniḍen deg temɣer d tixxutert d taddart n Lmiser. Deg tajumma am umezdaɣ. Anamek n isem n "Lmiser" d-anegzum n tafyirt "Mmi yesser", s-tṛmumit : "Mon fils est protégé".

Draɛ Lmizan:
Tacentirt d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit, tella ar deg unẓul-amalu Tizi Uzzu dɣa ar deg unẓul-agmuḍ n Zzayer.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Tacentirt tella deg unẓul-amalu n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Tacentirt tesɛa 19 tudrin :

Tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu:
I Tiɣiwanin nniḍen, zeṛ Umuɣ n tiɣiwanin n Tmurt Leqbayel.
Tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu deg Tmurt Leqbayel tesɛa 67 tiɣiwanin. 
Tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tafelwit agi, tettaked umuɣ n tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu, tettaked i yal taɣiwant : angal ONS ines, isem is, amezdaɣ ines d tajumma-s.

Talalit (Nuwel):
Talalit d tameɣṛa deg iḍ seg 24 ar 25 dujamber dɣa ass n 25 s teɣzef n wass. D tameɣra tamasiḥit, d tajmilt yal asseggwas i Sidna Ɛisa dɣa yesfugel ass n 25 dujamber deg tiswasin tagriguṛit d tayulyiant.

At Waggag:
At Waggag d taɣiwant taqbaylit deg Berǧ Bu Ɛrariǧ. 
At Waggag tura.
Deg-s illa lebni-ines d aqbur , aṭas n yexxamen i mazal bedden akken ttwabnan zik. Ass-agi tuget n At Waggag fɣen, ttidiren deg temdinin am Ledzayer neɣ Berǧ Bu Ɛrariǧ neɣ Sṭif ; wid yeqqimen deg taddart amzun ttwattun imi allalen n tudert ur ten-wwiḍen ara.
Taddart-agi Iwaggagen tezga-d lewhi n 10 Km akin i At Sidi Brahim i d-yezgan deg webrid yettawin ar Sṭif, qbel Lemhir iwumi qqaren zik Imaẓiten. Taddart n At Sidi Brahim daɣen d taqburt u tesεa amezruy meqqren yagi deg Tegrawla n 54, dinna i llant Tiggura n Wuzzal ("Portes de fer").
Tarakalt.
Tezga-d di tama n Yimaẓiten. Ur teggug ara, tamdint n Tamsilt ed tiɣiwanin n Herraza dd Ben Dawed. At Fḍala anida tella Tɣiwant i-ɣer cudden At Waggag. 
Amezruy.
At Waggag fkan azal ameqqran s yiɣallen deg tegrawla n 54, aṭas deg yimezdaɣen-ines mmuten mi ttnaɣen mgal irumiyen i yexlan daɣen aṭas n yexxawen iqburen.
Kra n tuddar ittexlanen acku, imezdaɣ-is akk fɣen rewlen seg rrebrab deg iseggwasen 1990.

31 dujamber:
Ass 31 dujamber d ass 365 n useggas (366 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). D ass aneggaru n useggas.
30 wamber - "31 dujamber" - 1ru yennayer

Tazermemmuyt:
Tazermemmuyt (asget: tizermemmuyin) d aɣersiw agelmaḍ, ittedder deg tẓegwa, deg yelmaten neɣ deg yiɣerban iqburen. Kra n leṣnaf zemren ad awḍen ɣer 60 n yisantimitren.

Izerzer:
Izerzer (asget: izerzren), d aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ seg tfesna n yimegḍaden (artiodactyles). Izerzren sɛan tifenziwin deg yiḍarren-nsen (am tɣeḍḍen ed wakraren) yerna ttarran ifeẓ. Sɛan daɣen acciwen igan am yifurka n yisekla (ttjuṛ), d iquranen, sseɣlayen-ten yerna ttɛawaden meɣɣin-asen-d yal aseggas. Izerzren ddren deg tẓegwa, deg waṭas n tmiwa n ugafa (nord) n umaḍal.

Ilef:
Ilef (asget: ilfan), d Aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ, d azuran yerna yejhed, yesɛa uglan d iɣezfanen, ffɣen-d seg yimi-s yerna ɣɣaren-asen timeɣlin. Iɣef-nnes d ameqran, adamum-nnes d aɣezfan yerna yesseqdac-it akken ad d-yessekfel yes-s ayen yeffren ddaw wakal. Amur ameqran seg yilfan sɛan anzaden d ademdam, tteddren deg tẓegwa, ḥemmlen ad xebḍen deg waluḍ yerna ttarwen aṭas n yimeẓyanen. Ilef d aɣersiw ay ittetten kullec (aksum, ibeɛɛac, imɣan, atg.), yerna kra n tlemsin (espèces) n yilfan ttṛebbin-tent medden ɣef weksum. Ilef seg tfesna (ordre) n yiɣersiwen imegḍaden (artiodactyles).

Ursu amellal:
Ursu amellal (isem alatini: Ursus maritimus), d aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ seg twacult n wursuten, yedder deg tmiwa tugrisin ay d-yezzin ɣef Ugaraw Arkti (deg ugafa n Kanada, Rrus ed Skandinavya). Ursu amellal d yiwen seg yiɣersiwen imeccaksumen (carnivores) imeqranen akk deg umaḍal: yezmer ad yaweḍ ɣer 2,5 n lmitrat deg leɛlu (mi ara tebded ɣef yiḍarren-nnes n deffir), yerna iwezzen azal n 7 n yiqenṭaren. 
Tafekka n wursu-a d tamellalt s lekmal-nnes, yerna aya yettɛawan-it ad yessedreg iman-nnes deg temlel-nni n wedfel ed wegris aydeg yeddren. Seg tama niḍen, cceɛṛ-nnes d yeqquffi (d azuran), yerna d win ay yettarran fell-as asemmiḍ. Ursu amellal yettɛumu deg waman isemmaḍen n Ugaraw Arkti, am wakken ay yezmer ad yazzel s tɣawla d tameqrant ɣef wegris. Yesɛa anzad ula ddaw yiḍarren-nnes i wakken ur ittecceḍ deg wedfel, yerna yettṣeyyid iselman ed yidemriyen (phoques).

Abanɣu:
Abanɣu (asget: ibanɣuten - s tefrensist: hippopotame), d aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ (seg tfesna n yimegḍaden), yedder deg Tefriqt. Abanɣu yesɛa tafekka d tazurant, d tameqrant yerna ẓẓayet. Ittekk amur ameqran akk seg wakud-nnes deg waman, anda ay ittett imɣan. Imi-nnes d ameqqran aṭas yerna yela uglan d imeqranen ayyes yettnaɣ.

Azger:
Azger (asget: izgaren), d aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ seg tfesna (ordre) yimegḍaḍen (artiodactyles) yettarran ifeẓ. Izgaren sɛan acciwen ama ɣer wektem (ddkeṛ), ama ɣer tektemt, yerna acciwen-nsen ur ten-id-ttbeddilen yal aseggas (am yizerzer). Llan yezgaren iweḥciyen (am ubisun, talhamust ed wezger ameski) am wakken ay llan wid ay ttṛebbin medden. Taktemt n wezger isem-nnes tafunast. Llant wazal n 120 n tlemsin (espèces) n yezgaren deg umaḍal.

Usama Ben Laden:
Usama Ben Laden neɣ Usama bin Muḥammed bin Awad bin Laden (ilul deg 10 Meɣres 1957 - yemmut deg 2 Mayyu 2011 Abbottabad, Pakistan), d aserdas aqbur n Tgelda Tasaɛudit yerna d argaz n yiweẓla (homme d'affaires) seg twacult tameṛkantit n Ben Laden ay yesɛan aṭas n yiseftiyen (investissements) deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen. 
Deg yiseggasen n 1980, Ben Laden yella iqeddec (ɣer yidis n Yimarikaniyen) akken ad iɛawen Afɣanen ad ssuffɣen iɣallen isuvyatiyen seg tmurt-nsen. D netta ay d-yesbedden tuddsa timselleḥt n Lqaɛida ay yettekkan deg tenṭagin 11 Ctembeṛ 2001 deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen akked waṭas n tenṭagin niḍen ay d-yellan yimukan niḍen n umaḍal yerna glant s tmeddurin n waṭas n medden. Seg wasmi ay yettekka deg tenṭagin ay iḥuzan tinmuhal (ambassades) timarikaniyin deg Kenya ed Tanzanya (deg 1998), FBI yessers Ben Laden gar 10 n yemdanen imeqranen akk ayɣef yettnadi. Deg 1 Mayyu 2011, iɣallen imsellḥen imarikaniyen ssawḍen ad nɣen Ben Laden deg yiwen n wexxam deg temdint n Abbottabad, deg Pakistan.

Tanebḍit n Tizi Wezzu:

1998:

Buzerriεa:
Buzerriεa d taɣiwant n ugezdu n Dzayer Tamanaɣt, tezga-d tama tutrimt n tesegrwat n Dzayer. 
Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 83 797 imezdaɣen. 

At Muḥli:
At Muḥli d taɣiwant n ugafa n twilayt n Sṭif di tmurt n Leqbayel. Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 8.521 imzedaɣ. Tcudd af twilayt n Bgayet. 

At Cebana:
At Cebana d taɣiwant n ugafa n twilayt n Sṭif di Tmurt n Leqbayel deg tdayra n At Wartilan. Tajumma-nnes d 1.060 km² (ikilumeṭren imkuẓen). Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 13 174 imezdaɣ. 
Tarakalt.
At Cebana teggug azal n 250 km si Dzayer Tamanaɣt i 90 km seg weɣrem (tamdint) n Sṭif. 

Masqaṭ:
Masqaṭ d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Ɛuman. Tezga-d deg ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 1.090.797 n yimezdaɣen.

Ɛemman:
Ɛemman d tamaneɣt n Urḍun, tezga-d deg ugafa-utrim (nord-ouest) n tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 2.800.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Birmanya:
Birmanya d tamurt n wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n Asya. Tajumma-nnes 676.578 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 59 n yimelyunen n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Naypyidaw.

Naypyidaw:
Naypyidaw d tamaneɣt tamaynut n Birmanya (seg useggas n 2005, deg wemkan n Yangun). Tamdint-a zedɣen-tt 925.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Azerbijan:
Azerbijan, d tamurt n wenẓul-utrim (sud-ouest) n Asya, tezga-d deg tama n yedraren n Quqaz. Tesɛa tilisa d Iran, Tturk, Jurjya d Arminya. Tajumma-nnes 86.600 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 9.165.000 n yimezdaɣen (Aziriyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Baku.

Baku:
Baku d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Azerbijan. Zedɣen-tt 2 n yimelyunen n yimezdaɣen.

Brunei:
Brunei d tamurt tamecṭuḥt n Asya n Wenẓul Agmuḍan, tezga-d deg tegzirt n Burnewu. Tajumma-nnes 5.765 km2. Zedɣen-tt 401.890 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Bandar Seri Begawan.

Bandar Seri Begawan:
Bandar Seri Begawan d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Brunei. Zedɣen-tt 140.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Asmara:
Asmara d tamaneɣt n Iritirya. Zedɣen-tt 600.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Namibya:
Namibya d tamurt n Tefriqt Tanẓulant. Tajumma-nnes 825.418 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 2.108.665 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Windhoek.

Windhoek:
Windhoek d tamaneɣt n Namibya. Zedɣen-tt 233.529 n yimezdaɣen.

Maputo:
Maputo d tamaneɣt n Muzambik. Zedɣen-tt 1.244.227 n yimezdaɣen.

Niqusya:
Niqusya (s tefrensist: "Nicosie"; s tegrigt: "Lefkosia"), d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Qubrus. Zedɣen-tt 313.400 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-a tebḍa ɣef sin yeḥricen: win n wenẓul (sud) d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Qubrus, ma d win n ugafa d tamaneɣt n Tegduda Taṭerkit n Qubrus n Ugafa (d tamurt yemsebḍan ed Qubrus, ala Ṭṭurk ay yesteɛrfen yes-s).

Anggun:
Anggun Cipta Sasmi, ilul ass n 1974 di Jakarta, d-acennay, aceṭṭaḥ, amaru n tezlatin Indonesia.

Misipsa:
Misipsa (? - 118 uq. S.-Ɛ.) (s tifinaɣ : ⵎⵉⵙⵉⵒⵙⴰ "Misipsa") neɣ Mekwesen (s tfinaɣ ⵎⴽⵡⵙⵏ "MKWSN"), mmis d usemmezray n Masnsen, yella d-agelli n Numidya. Yekkused sɣuṛ akersi n Numidya deg 148 uq. S.-Ɛ. dɣa yeḥkem deg qrib kraḍt n tmerwin n iseggwasen.
Misipsa d baba-s n Hiempsal d Aḍerbal. Yerna, yeṛbad Yugerten (mmis n gma-s Mastanabal) wagi daɣen ad yuɣal, di nnuba-s, agellid n Numidya.

Austin:
Austin d tamdint di tmurt n Marikan, tamanaɣt n ugezdu Texas tezga-d rrif n wasif n Colorado ,diɣ ssawalen-as Silicon Hills ,zedɣen-tt 790 390.

Agni n Yesɛed:
Agni n Yesɛed (FR:Agouni Issad) d taddart deg tɣiwant n At-Yeḥya

At Ziri:

Iḥamacen:
Iḥamacen (FR:Ihamachène) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n At-Yeḥya

Iṣendlen:

Tafrawt:
Tafrawt (FR:Tafraout) d'taddart deg te ɣiwant n At-Yeḥya

Takemmart n ujmaɛ:
Takemmart n ujmaɛ (s tṛumit : fromage de garde) d takemmart i zemren ad timɣur aṭas iseggwasen deg uderbuz ugar a teqqim, ugar ad tuɣal d-tamellayt. D takemmart yetwaxeddmen s urekti yetttwaderen.

Taxliǧt:
Taxliǧt (FR:Takhelidjt) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Taẓṛutt:
Taẓṛutt (FR:Tazerouts) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

At Ɛdella:
At Ɛdella (FR:Aït Adella) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Tifeṛḍud:
Tifeṛḍud (FR:Tiferdoud) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Werja:
Werja (FR:Ouerdja) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Tizi Umalu:
Tizi Umalu (FR:Tizi Oumalou) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Icelliben:
Icelliben (FR:Icheliven) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Tabuḥsent:
Tabuḥsent (FR:Tabouhcent) d'taddart deg Ta ɣiwant n At Bu Yusef

Michael Ballack:
Michael Ballack (ilul ass 26 Cuṭember 1976 deg Görlitz, Lalman) d amarir agreɣlan alalmani n tkurt n uḍar, yurar di teɣlamin :

Torsten Frings:
Torsten Frings (ilul ass 22 Wamber 1976 deg Würselen, Lalman) d amarir agreɣlan alalmani n tkurt n uḍar, yurar di teɣlamin n (Alemania1994-1997), (Werder Bremen1997-2002), (Borussia Dortmund2002-2004), (Bayern Munich2002-2005), (Werder Bremen2005-2011),(Toronto FC2011-2013). 

Tala Ifassen:
Tala Ifassen d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Sṭif i-d yezgan di Tmurt Leqbayel. 

Miksik:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">

Ajjiwen:
Ajjiwen (s Tifinaɣ : ⴰⴷⵉⵡⴰⵏ) d yiwen taddart n Tmurt Leqbayel deg tɣiwant n Draɛ Lqayed deg twilayt n Bgayet. Tesɛa tamudi azal n 3,000 imezdaɣ. 
Tarakalt.
Ajjiwen llan deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n twilayt n Bgayet, teggug (tebɛed) ɣer 35 km seg weɣrem (tamdint). 
Llan deg wammas n taddart i wumi qqaren Lqenṭra neɣ Tiqenṭert zdat tinezduɣin i wumi qqaren-as ass-agi "La Cité" seg iseggwasen 1970. 
Diɣenni, llan daɣen iderman niḍen am Tala n Meryem, Lmizab, Igudam, At Ɛebbas, Iɛyyaḍen ed Tikerbes. 

Gwatimala:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">

At Fuda:
At Fuda d yiwet taɣiwant di twilayt n Sṭif, di Tmurt Leqbayel, zedɣen-tt azal n 17,667 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 

Ṣaharij:
Ṣaharij d yiwet taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel i-d yezgan deg twilayt n Tubiret. D taɣiwant yettwasnen s yimjhaden-is i wwten uẓẓal af uzarug n Ledzayer. Diɣ teqbreb idurar n Ǧerǧer. 

At Menṣur:
At Menṣur (zikenni ɣɣaren-as daɣen "Tawrirt") d yiwet taɣiwant n Tmurt Leqbayel deg twilayt n Tubiret. Tezga-d ar 46 km seg weɣrem n Tubiret ed 101 km seg weɣrem n Bgayet. 
Tarakalt.
At Menṣur ay d taɣiwant icudden ar Ccerfa, Imceddalen, Aḥnif ed Raffur. Ur teggug ara daɣen seg tiɣwanin tiqbayliyin n Burǧ Bu Aɛrririj ed twilayt n Bgayet. 
Tuddar.
Llan 4 tuddar deg At Menṣur : 
Tadamsa.
Ager (tafellaḥt) igerrez deg wakal n At Menṣur. Llan daɣen aṭas n azara (minérais) i seqdacen. 

At Sidi Sɛid:
At Sidi Sɛid (FR:Aït Sidi Saïd) d'taddart deg Asqif n Ṭmana
