Tracklist

Akon:
Akon isem-is unṣib Alaune Thiam, ilul ass n 16 yebrir 1973 di Saint-Louis deg uwanek n Missouri di Marikan , d anaẓur deg uɣanib R&B.

Booba:
Booba isem-is unṣib Élie Yaffa, ilul ass n 9 Buǧember 1976 deg Boulogne-Billancourt di tmurt n Fransa (maca yesɛa aẓar ɣer tmurt n Senegal), D yiwen unaẓur deg uɣanib n Rap Afransis mucaɛen nezzeh di tmurt n Fransa.

Tala Ɛetman:
Tala Σetman, d taddart ger tudrin n Tamurt n Iqbayliyen, d tin i d-yezgan 15 n ikilumitren ar usamar n tɣiwant n Tizi Wezzu. Angal n Tnazzant-ines (Code Postal) 15144. 
Amezruy.
Deg iseggasen n 30, Tala Σetman tella d taddart d tamecṭuḥt, tesεa drus n imezdaɣ, Iɣil n Ufella, Tadukart d Lexmisllan d iεeṛqyab, keradeg-sen tteẓẓun-ten ma d wiyiḍ kssen deg-sen lmal. 3(Kṛaḍ) n tisutwin(Générations) ɣer deffir, at taddart zedɣen ixxamen yebnan s walim d waluḍ, am ixxamen urkel n Tamurt n Iqbayliyen, di lweqt-nni win yesεan axxam d lεali-t d win yebnan s weblaḍ akked uqeṛmud n leqbayel. Tudert ussan-nni tella qssiḥet mačči d kra.
Lawan n tegrawla, tella-d yiwet n temlilit di Makuda, i g-llan s ddaw n laεnaya n lyuṭnu Amer Bessalaḥ, i wumi qqaṛen "El Bass", igensasen(Représentants) n temnaḍin n At Wagnun d Makuda llan deg temlilit-agi. Tala Σetman tceggeε Mass Mula Ali(Ali Wamer) akked Mass Benziyan Muḥemmed(Ṛebbaṭ). Ssin-agi ttewakelfen ad jemεen isurdiyen d isufar nniḍen i Tirni Tesllullit Taɣennawt(FLN). Mass Aṛezqi Kaceṛ rran-t d aqeṛṛu ɣef umussu-agi, imir yefren(Yextaṛ) wid ara yilin deg umussu-agi : Gawa Ḥend, Benziyan Muḥemmed(Ṛebbaṭ), Ǧemεa Akli, Amer Xeyaṛ, Certuḥa Aṛezqi, Geṭṭab Ali. Wigi ttewakelfen ad jemεen tadrimt akked leslaḥ(Ibeckiḍen, Timeẓyanin...), amussu-agi yeḍmen isufar n wučči d teɣellist(Sécurité) n imenɣan(Imjuhad) ma ara mlilen, neɣ ma ara bedllen amekkan.
Di tazwara n useggas 1955, Tala Σetman teṭṭef amekkan axatar(Important) deg Lwilaya tis 3, i d-yefkkan aṭṭas i waken ad d-tawi temurt n Lezzayer timunent-is(Independence).
Akken kan tefra tegrawla, Lezzayer tewwi-d timunent-is, imezdaɣ bdan tteεawaden lebni n taddart-nsen, ayen iwumi qqaren Abraḥ(Tala) yettwaxdem deg useggas n 1963. Leǧameε, d lebni i g-sεan azal d ameqran di taddart, yettwabna ger 1979 d 1982 di tlemast n taddart, isem-is : Atman Ibn Σaffan.
Tafrayt n tejmaεt n taddart 2011.
Di tuber 2011, tella-d yiwwet n temlilit deg uɣerbaz amenzu i waken ad fernen tajmaεt(Comité) tamynut i taddart. Tajmaεt-agi tettewakellef i wakken ad d-tawi aṭṭas n isenfaren(Projets) i taddart, ger-asen : asufeɣ n waman ur nzeddig ara, asiweḍ n trisiti i ixxamen iḍeṛffen(Isolés), agudṛuni n iberdan, aεiwed n tregwa...
Addal.
Tala Σetman tesεa yiwwet n tidukla n waddal (Association Sportive) i wumi ssawalen USTA "Union Sportive de Tala Athmane", i g-sεan deg teqecwalt-isaṭṭas n waddalen : Dabex n uḍar, Lekarati akked Lkik-buksing.

Acenyal Amaziɣ:
Acenyal Amaziɣ neɣ Asenǧaq Amaziɣ yettwanulfa-d deg iseggasen isamrawen (i70en) sɣur Agraw Imaziɣen (l'Académie berbère). Deg 1998, s ifassen n Agraw Amaḍlan Amaziɣ (GMM) iy gan agraw nsen amenzu deg Tigzirin Tiknariyin deg Tmurt n Spenyul, asenǧaq agi yuɣal d asenǧaq unṣib n Imaziɣen akken ma ttilin ani ttidiren deg umaḍal. 
Ɣur-s krad (3) n yiniten (iklan / "couleurs"): aẓerwal ("blue"), azegzaw ("vert"), awraɣ ("jaune"). Deg tlemmas ines yettwars usekkil s yini (aklu, "couleur") azeggwaɣ (« ⵣ », aza neɣ yaz) s Tifinaɣ. 

Injil s Tmaziɣt:
Ttwagent aṭas n tsuqilin n Yinjil (adlis uɣris n Tmasiḥit) s tutlayt Tamaziɣt, s tintaliwin am Tamaziɣt Tarifit, Tamaziɣt Tacelḥit, d Tamaziɣt Taqbaylit.
Tasuqilt n Yinjil s Tmaziɣt Taqbaylit tella da:
Injil s Tefṛansist - Tamaziɣt Taqbaylit.
Llant tsuqilin Timaziɣin n:
- Arkawal Azayku ("Ancien Testament").
- Arkawal Amaynu ("Nouveau Testament").
- Izlan n Dawud (Psalms)...

Tinduf:
Tinduf (isem amaziɣ aḥeqqani : Tin Ḍuf, anamek-is d "Taɛeṣast") d yiwen weɣrem deg tama wenẓul-utrim n Dzayer deg Uneẓruf Ameqqran. Ɣur-es azal n 45.266 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 
Teqbreb ɣer laɛzib n Garet Jebilet ar 70 km si weɣrem-nni ed win n Icenancen ar wegmuḍ. D akal n At Tejakant ed Rgibat (neɣ At Rgib), d tiqbilin timaziɣin tiẓnagin i yedewwaren iles-nsen di tmuḍi wis 18 et 19 : Ajakan aneggaru i yettmeslay Tmaziɣt yemmut deg useggwas n 1864. 

Jim Morrison:
James Douglas Morrison, ilul ass n di Melbourne Florida, yemmut ass n di Paris (Fransa), d-acennay, aceṭṭaḥ, amaru n tezlatin amarikani.

Nuṛwij:
<table border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" align="right" style="margin-left:0.5em;" width="300px">
<table />
Nurvij d tamurt n Turuft n ugafa. Tajumma-nnes 385.186 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 5.096.300 n yimezdaɣen (Idanen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Oslo.

Sarah Bernhardt:
Sarah Bernhardt (tlul s yisem n Rosine Bernhardt deg 22 Tuber 1844, deg Paris - temmut deg 26 Meɣres 1923), d tasegbart (actrice) tafrensist ay yellan tetturar-d ama deg umezgun, ama deg yisura imezwura n lqern wis 20. 
Amecwar-is.
Sarah tebda-d amecwar-nnes deg umezgun deg Fransa, deg yiseggasen n 1870, yerna dindin kan teqqel mechuret ula deg tmura n Turuft ed Temrikt. Tella tesɛa "taɣect n wureɣ", am wakken ay tella tessen ad turar ledwar ay yessewliwilen ul n yemferrjen. Sarah Bernhardt temmut deg Paris, deg 1923.

Le Quotidien d'Oran:
Le Quotidien d'Oran d aɣmis ayalas (quotidien) imzireg (indépendant) adzayri, yessebded-it-id Muḥemmed Ɛebdu Benɛebbu deg 1994.

Horizons:
Horizons d aɣmis ayallas n uwanak (ddula) adzayri ay d-itteffɣen s tefrensist. Anemhal n weɣmis d Lɛarbi Timizar.

Lɛarbi Timizar:
Lɛarbi Timizar d anemhal amatu n weɣmis ayallas n Horizons. Timizar yella naqal d anemhal n tirawt n weɣmis n El Moudjahid. Deg Yebrir n 2011, yeqqel d anemhal n Horizons deg wemkan n Naɛma Ɛabbes.

Adrar n Ṭariq:
Adrar n Ṭariq (s tanglizit: Gibraltar), d tahrest (colonie) tabriṭanit tamecṭuḥt, tezga-z deg wenẓul (sud) n Spenyul, ɣef Yilel Agrakal. Tajumma-nnes 6,8 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 29.431 n yimezdaɣen.

Alger Républicain:
Alger Républicain d aɣmis ayallas ay d-sbedden Pascal Pia ed Paul Schmitt deg Ldzayer, deg 1938. 
Tallalit.
Aɣmis-a n uzelmaḍ llan qeddcen deg-s aṭas n Yidzayriyen. Gar Tuber n 1939 ed Furar n 1943, yettwagdel (yettwamneɛ) weɣmis-a, sakkin, asmi ay d-yeqqel ɣer tuffɣa, yeqqel d aɣmis asduklan (communiste). 
Deg wemgarru n Dzayer.
Deg Ctember n 1955, imi ay yebded ɣer yidis n Yidzayriyen ay yellan ttnaɣen ɣef uzarug (indépendance) n tmurt-nsen), aɣmis-a yettwagdel tikkelt niḍen, yerna aṭas seg wid ay iqeddcen deg-s ttwaṭṭfen (am unemhal-nnes, Henri Alleg), neɣ ttwenɣen, am Henri Maillot, Georges Rafini, Ɛemar Xaluf, Ɛabdelqader Benaɛmara, Murad At Saɛda ed Abdelkader Choukhal. Deg 17 Yulyu 1962 (sdeffir ma tuwey Ldzayer azarug-nnes), Alger Républicain yeqqel-d ɣer tuffɣa, yerna yeqqel d netta ay d aɣmis adzayri ay d-yessuffuɣen amḍan ameqran akk n tsukan (exemplaires) (75.000 yal ass). 
Sakkin uzarug.
S waya, Alger Républicain yella yugar aɣmis n Le Peuple (n Terni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw). Deg 1964, imḍebbren n Alger Républicain qeblen ad rren aɣmis-nsen d win n Terni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw, sakkin, deg 1965, sdeffir ma tella-d tuttya-nni taserdasit aydeg Hewwari Bumedyen yesseɣli Ḥmed Ben Bella, anabaḍ adzayri yesdukkel iɣmisen n Alger Républicain ed Le Peuple yerna yerra-ten d yiwen n weɣmis umi isemma El Moudjahid. Sdeffir tedyanin n Tuber 1988, Alger Républicain yeqqel-d ɣer tuffɣa, maca ɣef ljal n wuguren ay d-yemlal, yeḥbes deg 1994. Seg yimir-nni, yeqqel itteffeɣ-d seg-a ɣer da, tikkal yal dduṛt, tikkal yal ayyur, ɣas akken mazal yesɛa uguren. Albert Camus ed Kateb Yasin seg wid ay d-yuran imagraden deg weɣmis-a.

Molière:
Jean-Baptiste Poquelin yettwassnen s yisem-nnes n unaẓur n Molière (ilul deg 15 Yennayer 1622 deg Paris - yemmut deg 17 Furar 1673 deg temdint-nni), d amaru n tmezgunin yerna d asegbar (acteur) n umezgun, d yiwen seg wuẓwiren imeqranen n tmellaɣt (comédie) deg tmura tutrimin. 
Timzegunin.
Gar tmezgunin yettwassnen n Molière llant: 
Tameddurt.
Moilère yenker-d deg yiwet n twacult d tamerkantit yerna d aya ay as-igan ifadden akken ad yekcem ɣer umezgun. Yeqdec 13 n yiseggasen d asegbar (acteur) ay itteddun seg wemkan ɣer wayeḍ akken ad yurar timezgunin, yerna aya iɛawen-it akken ad igerrez tamussni-nnes deg usseḍsi n medden asmi ay yebda yettaru.
Imi ay yella yessen kra n warisṭuqraṭen, iṣaḥ-it-id ad d-yurar timezgunin sdat ugellid n Fransa, Louis wis 14 deg leqṣer n Louvre. D aya ay yejjan agellid ad as-yefk yiwet n tzeɣɣa deg Louvre akken ad yetturar deg-s timezgunin. Sakkin, agellid iɛemmed-as i Molière ad yurar timezgunin ula deg Leqṣer Ageldan (Palais-Royal), dɣa d aya ay yejjan Molière ad yeqqel mechur mliḥ gar yimezdaɣen n Paris s tmezgunin-nnes yesseḍsayen, yerna tagrawt n Molière qqlen ɣɣaren-as "Tagrawt n Ugellid du Roi". 
Maca, ɣas ma yella Molière yella yesseḍsay, llan kra ay yebdan kkaten-d deg tmezgunin-nnes yerna ttwalin-tent xulfent imenzayen akked ddin (gar-asen imḍebbren n Taklizt Takaṭulikt). 
Tamezgunt n Tartuffe ou L'Imposteur (Tartuffe Axeddaɛ) iga-tt Molière akken ad d-iwet deg yergazen n wesɣan (ddin) ay ixeddɛen medden, dɣa d aya ay yesserfan taklizt. Seg tama niḍen, Molière yella iqeddec aṭas yerna aya yesseɛya tazmert-nnes, dɣa ɣef waya ay yeḥbes leqdic deg 1667 akken ad yesgunfu. Deg wass aydeg ara yemmet, deg 1671, Molière yella yetturar-d tamezgunt-nnes taneggarut, Le Malade Imaginaire (Amuḍin asugnan), dɣa teṭṭef-it yiwet n tusut d tameqrant (imi ay yella yuḍen tideggirt (tuberculose). Ɣas ma yella ikemmel urar arma ay tfuk tmezgunt-nni, Molière yemmut kra kan n tsaɛtin sakkin.

Talhamust n waman:
Talhamust n waman neɣ talhamust n Lhend (s tlatinit: Bubalus bulalis; s tefrensist: buffle d'eau), d azger seg tewsit n telhamust (buffle), yedder deg Asya yerna d netta ay d ṣṣenf awḥid n telhamust ay yetturebban. Azger-a kessen-t ladɣa deg wenẓul (sud) n Asya, maca ass-a, ttṛebbin-t ula deg Temrikt n Wenẓul.

Igḍaḍ:
Agḍiḍ (asget: igḍaḍ) - Igḍaḍ d iɣersiwen uɣlilen (vertébrés), d iḥmayanen n yidammen, tafekka-nsen idel-itt rric, sɛan afriwen, amur ameqqran seg-sen ttafgen, yerna sɛan aqamum d aquran. Igḍaḍ ttefruruxen s tmellalin. Llan azal n 9900 n leṣnaf n yegḍaḍ deg umaḍal.

Belize:
Belize d tamurt n Temrikt Talemmast. Tajumma-nnes 22.966 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 387,879 n yimezdaɣen (2017). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Belmopan.

Belmopan:
Belmopan d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Belize. Zedɣen-tt 20.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Ikidni:
Ikidni (asget: ikidniyen) d aɣersiw asuṭṭaḍ yettarwen timellalin, yedder deg Ustralya ed Ginya Tamaynut. Tafekka-nnes dlen-tt yisennanen, yesɛa aqamum d aquran, yeɣɣaz imerjan yerna ittett ibeɛɛac. Ikidni seg terbaɛt n yiɣersiwen umi ɣɣaren imunutrimen. Yezmer ad yaweḍ 25 n yisantimitren deg teɣzef.

Tantarktit:
Tantarktit (s tefrensist: "Antarctique"), d yiwen seg yimenẓawen (continents) n umaḍal, d win ay d-yezgan deg wenẓul n Tegnit (lqaɛa). Tajumma-nnes 14.000.000 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Ur llin yimezdaɣen urkiden deg umenẓaw-a, maca llan wazal n 1000 n yimezdaɣen uɛḍilen, amur ameqran seg-sen d imassanen seg tmura yemgerraden n umaḍal.

Amaḍal:
Amaḍal (asget : imaḍalen), deg tarakalt (géographie) netta d Tagnit (lqaɛa) ayɣef nedder s lekmal-nnes. Neɣɣar-as daɣen « ddunit ».
Amaḍal deg-s 6 n yigarawen : Agaraw Amelwi (Pacifique), Agaraw Aṭlasi, Agaraw Ahendi, Agaraw Arkti, Agaraw Antarktik. Deg-s daɣen 6 n yimenẓawen : Asya, Tamrikt, Tafriqt, Turuft, Tukyanust ed Tantarktit.
Igarawen ed waman dlen 70,8% seg tjumma (superficie) n umaḍal. Tajumma-nnes 510.072.000 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Gar-asen 148.940.000 km2 d akal (28,8%) ed 361.132.000 km2 n waman. Amaḍal zedɣen-t 6,8 n yimelyaṛen n yemdanen.
Llant deg umaḍal 194 n tmura timzirgin (indépendantes).

Kosovo:
Kosovo d akal ay d-yezgan deg wenẓul (sud) n Serbya. Ugar n 88% seg yimezdaṣen n Kosovo d Albaniyen inselmen, ma d 7% seg-sen d Iserben. 
Amezruy d Tlallit n Kosovo.
Deg 1999, nnuɣen ed Yiserben akken ad awin timunnent-nsen (indépendance), d aya ay yejjan iɣallen n Temsisit Taṭlasit (Alliance Atlantique) akked Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen ad d-gren iman-nsen. Deg 2008, anabaḍ (lḥukuma) n Kosovo tesseɣret-d (déclarer) timunnent, maca aṭas n tmura deg umaḍal ur steɛṛfent yes-s yerna Serbya mazal-itt tettwali-t d aḥric seg wakal-nnes yellan ddaw udabu n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen. Tajumma-nnes 10.908 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-t 1.804.838 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Pristina.
Tasertit.
Aselway: Atifete Jahjaga (2011).
Aneɣlaf Amezwaru: Isa Mustafa (2014).

Pristina:
Pristina d tamaneɣt n Kosovo, tezga-d deg tlemmast tagmuḍant (centre-est) n tmurt, zedɣen-tt 550.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Bolivia:
Bolivia d tamurt n Temrikt n Wenẓul. Tajumma-nnes 1.098.581 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 10.907.778 n yimezdaɣen (Iboliviyen). Timunaɣ-nnes d La Paz akked Sucre.

La Paz:
La Paz d tamaneɣt n tedbelt (administration) n tmurt n Bolivia. Zedɣen-tt 877.363 n yimezdaɣen.

Sucre:
Sucre, d tamaneɣt n Bolivia (deg tmenḍawt ). Zedɣen-tt 225.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Kingston (Jamaica):
Kingston d tamaneɣt n Jamaica. Tezga-d deg wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n tmurt yerna zedɣen-tt 651.880 n yimezdaɣen.

Addis Abeba:
Addis Abeba d tamaneɣt n Ityupya. Zedɣen-tt 3.384.569 n yimezdaɣen.

Xerṭum:
Xerṭum d tamaneɣt n Sudan. Zedɣen-tt 639.598 n yimezdaɣen (5.274.321 s tmiwa ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Iɣef Azegzaw:
Iɣef Azegzaw d tamurt n tegzirin ay d-yezgan deg utaram n Tefriqt (deg Ugaraw Atlantik). Tajumma-nnes 4.033 km2 (ikilimitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 567.000 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Praia.

Praia:
Praia d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Yiɣef Azegzaw. Tezga-d deg tegzirt n Santiago. Zedɣen-tt 127.832 n yimezdaɣen.

Cardiff:
Cardiff (Tagalict : Caerdydd) d tamdint n Briṭanya Tameqrant, d tamaneɣt n Tmurt n Yigaliyen. Zedɣen-tt 324.800 n yimezdaɣen (amelyun n yimezdaɣen s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Tamurt n Yigaliyen:
Tamurt n Yigaliyen (s tgalict: Cymru; s tanglizit: Wales; s tefrensist: "Pays de Galles"), d aḥric n Tgelda Yeddukklen, yezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n Langliz. Tajumma-nnes 20.779 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Tamurt n Yigaliyen zedɣen-tt 2.999.300 n yimezdaɣen (Igaliyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Cardiff.

Tirana:
Tirana d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Albanya, tezga-d deg utaram n tmurt, ɣef yiri n Yilel Aderyati. Zedɣen-tt 811.649 n yimezdaɣen (2016). Tamdint-a teqqel d tamaneɣt n tmurt di 1920.

Tayemmat:
tayemmat d tinn i yettawin mis-s deg uεebbuḍ-is 9 n lechur, maca tettrebbi-t akken ilaq, tessahfaḍ-as ayen yelhan, ayen ara t-inefε ɤer sdat, di ddunnit-is...
maca tayemma tesεa amur ameqqran di ddunnit-ik.
ɤef waya i ilaq ad nettqadar tiyemmatin nneɤ, maca ma temmut, ad as-nessawad dduεat n lxir anda ma tella akken diɤ ad tt-yerḥem Rebbi Ameεzuz

Tabulgart:
Tabulgart (s Tebulgart : "Bălgarski") d tutlayt i meslayen di Bulgarya, anẓul n Ukrayin, anẓul n Muldavya, anẓulagmuḍ n Serbya, agafagmuḍan n Legrig, Ṭṭerk, anẓul d utaram n Rumanya, Hungarya, Masidunya. Yerna d iles unṣib n tmurt n Bulgarya anida tettwaḥsab d tadersi taɣerfant.
Azal n Imsiwlen.
Meslayen azal n 8.500.000 yemdanen di Bulgarya (8.100.000); anẓul n Ukraynana (seg 165.000 ar 275.000); anẓul n Muldavya (seg 65.000 ar 100.000); anẓulagmuḍ n Serbya (31.000); agafagmuḍan n Legrig (30.000); Ṭṭerk (27.000); anẓul d utaram n Rumanya (10.000); Hungarya (3.000) ed Masidunya (2.000).
Amezruy.
Iles atrar, illa ibdan itban deg idlisen n lqern 17 d 18, iṭṭef ixef-nnes seg uzgen n lqern 19. 
Tabulgart meslayen-tt di Bulgarya d tmura niḍen ( ), kkes kan tifuɣalin n Ifumaken. Di Bulgarya, tella iman-is d tutlayt tunṣibt, maca di tmura niḍen, sqqaren yis-s yiwet tutlayt n tsekla, ak uɣezdis n tutlayin tiyaḍ.

Tadanict:
Tadanict (isem aneṣli : "Dansk") d yiwet tutlayt tagermanikt i meslayen di tmura n Danmark, ugafa n Lalman ed wenẓul n Sswid ed tegzirt n Grönland. Meslayen-tt azal n 5.200.000 n yemdanen deg Danmark (5.100.000), Lalman (50.000) ed Sswid. D tutlayt tunṣibt n tgelda n Danmark ed tama ugafay n Lalman (deg uland n Schleswig-Holstein)ed Grönland aked Tinwit.
Amzeruy.
Amezruy n tutlayt adanict tebda deg sin n wakuden: tin n tadanict taqburt (seg lqern wis 13 ar lqern wis 16) d win n tadanict tatrart (si lqern 16 ar ass-a). Tutlayt-agi tebda tettwari di lqern wis 13. Talmanit tebda tettaɣ deg-s seg uwettay alemmas. 
Ak tikli n umezruy, Danmark texṣar aṭas n wakal-nnes. Skanen, i tella deg tama wenẓulan n Sswid, tella si lebda d tadanict, maca di 1658, tekkes-tt Sswid. Aḥewwes-a izzuɣar ar uḥewwes aseklan d ilsawan imɣaren, alemma tura, tadanict tadigant, ur ɣur-es iqqim usqari ula d umsawaḍ ak iles asmagnu n Danmark. 
Tettwḥsab d yiwet tantala niḍen seg wawalen n Sswid. Ula d tutlayin ammen it-teḥṣaben. Ɣur-es iteqqnen arwas gar tadanict d taswidit. Imezdaɣ n temnaṭ-nni ur ɣar-sen iqqim laṣel adanic.
Tadanict tella deg-es kraḍ (3) n tantalwin : tutrimt, talemmast d tunegmuṭ (anda iccden tilisa aked Sswid). Maca ass-a, tantalawin-a ttmettan, teqqim kan yiwet.

Talsasit:
Talsasit (isem aneṣli : "Elsässisch") d yiwet tutlayt i meslayen di Fransa di temnaṭ n Elsass. 
Amezruy.
Tigti deg imezdaɣ inaṣliyen ilimanen n Elsass meslayen-tt, kkes kan kra n tuddar deg utaram d wadday aydeg meslayen tafransist. Tutlayt-a tesegdel i udabu afrensis i weɣref d tenbad't di twala. 

Tafinit:
Tafinit (isem anesli : "Suomi") neɣ "Tafinlandit", "tasuwumit" d tutlayt i meslayen deg Finland(4.800.000), agafagmuḍ n Sswid, agafataram n Rrus, Agafa n Nurwij, Agafa n Isṭunya. D tutlayt tunṣibt ak iles niḍen n Finland.
Tettwaḥsab d tadersi tagherfant: Agafagmuḍ n Sswid, Agafataram n Rusya.
Comentaris
Infinlanden, qqimen aṭas qqnen a Sswid d tsekla tugmiḍt. Taswidit, tutlayt n waṭas imsuggen i yezedɣen deg iftisen ifinlandiyen, tuɣal d tutlayt tameqqrant n Finland. Maca, tafinit ur twattu akk, di lqern wis 15, llan kra i yettarun-t, yerna adlis amezwaru i iqqimen yura s tutlayt-a nettat n tizi n lqern wis 16, asmi tebda tkennawt
Iles asmagnu itwasexdmen zi lweqt-nni, immers x wawalen anz'ulagmud'an. Di lqern 17 d lqern 18, taswidit tuɣal d tutlayt tunṣibt, n tsekla d tɣuri tameqrant. Mi tekcem Rrus f Finland di 1809, ibeddel lḥal. Tafinit, illan d awal n uzgen ameqran n medden, tebda th'ewwas igran usexdem deg ill n lqern wis 19. Di lweqt d yiwet, ak taneflilt n tseklant tafinit, s tmessna n wensay n wegmuḍ n uwanek, tebda imessel tutlayt tasmagnut, illan d tamunt (compromís) gar awalen inẓuligmuḍan d win utrimen.
Deg tfinit, iles irewsen di testunit, nettaf sin n waggayen n wawalen.

The Doors:
The Doors d icennayen Iwunak Yedduklen n rock. Zenzen ugar si 100 imelayn n yidisken.

Jean-lmuhub Ɛamruc:
Jean Ɛamruc, seg isem-is n tidett Jean lmuhub Ɛamruc, iluled ass n deg yiwet taddart n tɣiwant n Iɣil Aɛli di Tmurt Taqbaylit, yemmut ass n di Paris, d amaru, aneɣmas aseklan dɣa argaz n ṛṛadyu aqbayli-aṛumi yetmeslayen s tṛumit.
D mmi-s n Faḍma At Manṣur Ɛamruc dɣa d gma-s n tameṭṭut n isekkilen Ṭawes Ɛamruc.

Tumast:
Snuflen Tumast g iseggwasen n 90, umezwar-is d Musa Ag Keyna. Deg 1993, sakkin iseggwasen n imenɣi d isental. Musa ittut gar tayti, yunag s Fransa, sakkin ad-as tedukkel yes-s tacennayt Aminitu Gumar. 
Anmuggar-is deg Paris ed yiwen anaẓur s yisem n Dan Levy yefka talalit i twuri-nes. D tanagit af iseggwasen n imenɣi d tixedεet i Yimucaɣ. Arun af isental ay ḥemlen aṭas Imucaɣ deg uẓawan (tamdanit n tudert tillelit deg tneẓruft), af tayri, tudert irzagen ed ufran asertan.

Zin Lɛabidin Ben Ɛli:
Zin Lɛabidin Ben Ɛli d aselway aqbur n Tunes. Yennejla deg wass n 15 Yennayer 2011 yerna d Fuɛad Mebazɛa ay yeqqlen d aselway uɛḍil deg wemkan-nnes. Ben Ɛli ilul deg 3 Ctember 1936 deg temdint n Ḥemmam Susa.

Albrecht Dürer:
Albrecht Dürer neɣ s telmant "Albrecht Dürer der Jüngere" (ilul deg Nürnberg, Bayern, deg 21 Mayyu 1471 - yemmut deg 6 Yebrir 1528), d amekla (peintre) yerna d amusnak (mathématicien) almani. Leqdicat-nnes n tẓuri rran-t mechur deg Turuft qbel ad yaweḍ 30 n yiseggasen deg tmeddurt-nnes, yerna ass-a, ttwalin-t d anaẓur ameqran n tallit n Tsidert (Renaissance) deg tmura n ugafa (nord) n Turuft. 
Leqdic-is.
Dürer iga-d tugniwin yeqqnen ɣer wesɣan (ddin), am wakken ay d-yekla (peindre) tugniwin n wudmanen n yemdanen ay yettwassnen, yerna iga-d tugniwin i yiman-nnes ula d netta. Dürer yella daɣen ineqqec-d tugniwin ɣef yiɣir (nnḥas), am wakken ay inejjer tugniwin ɣef wesɣar. 
Deg yenqacen-nnes n wesɣar umi semman Amazrar n Tneggarut (deg 1498), Dürer yella mazal-it yettḍafar aɣanib aguti aqbur deg leqdic-nnes. Maca, deg leqdicat ay iga sakkin, yeḍfer aɣanib d amaynut. Tifelwiyin-nnes (tableau) mechuren am Amnay, Tamettant ed Uciṭan (deg 1513), San Hieronymus deg Tezrawin-nnes (1514) akked Melencolia I (1514) jebdent-d lwelha n yizaɣanen (critiques) yerna aṭas n wawal ay d-yellan fell-asent deg wayen yerzan inumak-nsent. 
Dürer iga-d daɣen tikla s waman. Tifelwiyin-nnes n waman d tid aydeg d-iṣewwer imeẓriyen (paysages), yerna Dürer d yiwen seg yinuẓar uṛufiyen imezwura ay d-iṣewwren imeẓriyen. Daɣen, iqeddicen-nnes deg wenrar n wenjar n wesɣar d wid ay yesnernan mliḥ taẓuri-a deg leqrun ay d-iḍefren. Dürer yella yessen inuẓar iṭalyanen ed yelsaẓriyen (humanistes) almanen, dɣa d aya ay as-iledyen abrid akken ad d-yessekcem aɣanib aṭalyani n tẓuri deg Tsidert (Rennaissance) n tmura n ugafa n Turuft. 
Seg tama niḍen, Dürer yura-d daɣen iqeddicen ɣef tusnakt. Albrecht Dürer yemmut deg temdint n Nürnberg.

Wichita:
Wichita d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg uwanak n Kansas, zedɣen-tt 357.698 n yimezdaɣen.

Wellington:
Wellington d tamaneɣt n Ziland Tamaynut, tezga-d deg wenẓul-utrim (sud-ouest) n Tegzirt n Ugafa. Zedɣen-tt 389.700 n yimezdaɣen.

Auckland:
Auckland d tamdint n Ziland Tamaynut, tezga-d deg ugafa-utrim (nord-ouest) n Tegzirt n Ugafa. D nettat ay d tamdint tameqrant akk deg tmurt. Zedɣen-tt 1.354.900 n yimezdaɣen.

Burbank:
Burbank d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg tama n Los Angeles (deg California). Zedɣen-tt 103.340 n yimezdaɣen.

Nanjing:
Nanjing d tamdint n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Ccinwa yerna d tamaneɣt n temnaḍt n Jiangsu. Zedɣen-tt 7.713.100 n yimezdaɣen.

Jiangsu:
Jiangsu d tamnaḍt (province) n wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Ccinwa. Tajumma-nnes 102.600 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 77.245.000 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d Nanjing.

Belleville (Ontario):
Belleville d tamdint n Kanada, tezga-d deg wenẓul n temnaḍt n Ontario. Zedɣen-tt 48.821 n yimezdaɣen (91.518 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Ontario:
Ontario d tamnaḍt n Kanada, tezga-d deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n tmurt. Tajumma-nnes 1.076.395 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 13.210.667 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d tamdint n Toronto. Deg temnaḍt n Ontario ay d-tezga Ottawa, tamaneɣt n Kanada.

Ottawa:
Ottawa d tamaneɣt n Kanada. Tezga-d deg wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n tmurt, deg temnaḍt n Ontario. Zedɣen-tt 812.129 n yimezdaɣen.

Boston:
Boston d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen yerna d tamaneɣt n Massachusetts. Zedɣen-tt 4.522.858 n yimezdaɣen.

Ṭrables (Lubnan):
Ṭrables d tamdint n ugafa (nord) n Lubnan, zedɣen-tt 192.572 n yimezdaɣen (530.000 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Sacramento:
Sacramento, d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen. D tamaneɣt n California. Zedɣen-tt 2.527.123 n yimezdaɣen.

Santa Fe:
Santa Fe d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen yerna d tamaneɣt n Miksik Amaynut. Zedɣen-tt 183.732 n yimezdaɣen.

Memphis:
Memphis d tamdint n tlemmast n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg uwanak n Tennessee. Zedɣen-tt 676.640 n yimezdaɣen (1.280.533 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Portland:
Portland d tamdint ay d-yezgan deg ugafa-utrim (nord-ouest) n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, deg uwanak n Oregon. Zedɣen-tt 582.130 n yimezdaɣen.

Nashville:
Nashville d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen, tezga-d deg uwanak n Tennessee. Zedɣen-tt 635.710 n yimezdaɣen (1.666.566 s yegmamen ay d-yezzin fell-as).

Hartford:
Hartford, d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen. D tamaneɣt n Connecticut. Zedɣen-tt 1.212.381 n yimezdaɣen.

Lansing:
Lansing d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen yerna d tamaneɣt n Michigan. Zedɣen-tt 464.036 n yimezdaɣen.

Saint Paul:
Saint Paul d tamdint n Yiwunak Yeddukklen yerna d tamaneɣt n Minnesota. Zedɣen-tt 3.502.891 n yimezdaɣen.

Sung Jae-gi:
Sung Jae-gi(Takurit:성재기, Ccinwa:成在基, ilul di 11 ctamber 1967 deg Daegu, g tmurt n Tutrict – yemmut di 26 yulyu 2013 deg Mapo, Seoul) yella d Human right activists ay afilusuf, aselway n Kurya n Wenẓul. Yeḥkem s ukabar i t-ixelqen deg 2008, d Association of Korean male(남성연대 男性連帶).

Trojany:
Trojany d taddart deg wanẓul-agmuḍ n Lapologne. D daxel n Masovian Voivodeship. 490 yemdanen zedɣen deg-s (aseggas : 2014).

Raffaello:
Raffaello Sanzio, d anaẓur aṭelyani.

Marco Reus:
Marco Reus(ilul ass 31 magu 1989 di Köln , Lalman ) d amarir agreɣlan alalmani n tkurt uḍar yetturaren deg umḍiq umentag deg tarbaɛt n Borussia Dortmund akked tarbaɛt taɣennawt n tmurt Lalman.

André Schürrle:
André Schürrle (ilul ass di Ludwigshafen, Lalman) d amarir agreɣlan alalmani ytturaren deg umḍiq umentag di tarbaɛt taglizit Chelsea akked tarbaɛt taɣennawt n Lalman.

Ronald Reagan:
Ronald Wilson Reagan ilul ass n - .

U2:
U2 d icennayen n rock. Zenzen ugar si 170 imelayn n yidisken.

Uzzal:
Uzzal ḍ Aferdis Cemik s u-zamul (Fe) aked utton atomik 26 , ḍ asdal igtsilin s xilla deg Dduniṭ yetswassen s ṭqala ines aked unejbhuḍ amentadh arnuyas ytsawi trisiti ḍ urɣu .

Jaber ben hayyan:
Ǧaber Ben Hayyan ("jaber ben heyyan جابر بن حيان") d Amusnaw inslem ilul-d di Surya aseggas n 721 yetswassen belli d netta id-yesnulfan Ccimya ( al Ximya'e الخمياء) tamaynutt , yeǧad aṭas n itsaftsaren ɣef ayagi ,yemmuth di Lɛiraq deg useggwas n 815.

Ameskan:
=Amudlif, anagraw n uglam n tmudmin=
=Amudlif=
Amudlif (imudlifen), d awal i d-neddem seg umawal n tesnilest yura Mass BERKAÏ Abdelaziz "Lexique de la linguistique Français-Anglais-Tamazight", agdazal-is s tutlayt tafransist d "Diagramme". Deg tẓuri n wurigami ila anamek n unagraw n uglam n telkam n uḍfas n tmudemt. D aɣawas ideg ara yaf umurigam akk tilɣutin ara as-yemmlen amek ara as-d-yales i uḍfas n tmudemt akken tella yakan. D netta ara aɣ-iwelhen akken ad neḍfes iḍefsen-nneɣ yiwen yiwen, akken d-mmizwaren, alamma tekfa tmudemt. Nezmer ad nini llan ukuẓet (4) tɣariwin i yes-s nezmer ad nesseɣnew ameskan. Yalla umeskan asunɣan, ameskan n tewlafin, ameskan asinan akked wayen i umi nettini asaru awezlan. Ɣas temgared talɣa-nsen iswi-nsen yiwen, d awelleh n umurigam akken ad yezmer ad yales i yiḍefsen n tmudemt neɣ amek ara tt-id-yeglem mi ara tt-id-yesnulfu. Yal ameskan yesɛa isem-is akked wanda i yessefk ad t-nessemres.
=Amezruy awezlan n umudlif=
Takti tamezwarut n umudlif teffeɣ-d deg udlis d-nudder usawen i umi ttinin : Aḍfas n wagim iɣernuqen "Senbazuru Orikata" yura Rokoan Gido i d-yeẓreg deg useggas 1797 deg tmurt n Jjapun. Nnan-d fell-as inmezrayen, d netta i d adlis amezwaru deg umḍal i d yemmeslayen s yiwet n tmuɣli yemmden ɣef tẓuri n wurigami. Deg isebtar-a, yedda-d deg-s wunuɣ n tmudem, iwenniten akked yiɣawasen imeẓyanen n wamek ara neḍfes tamudem.
S umata d unuɣen ur nesɛa ara assaɣ gar-asen. Ulac win i d-yefkan amek ara neḍfes iḍefsen n tmudemt seg umezwaru alamma d aneggaru. Maca akken yebɣu yili, d netta i d ababat n umeskan atrar i ssemrasen tura yimurigamen. 
Sakin, deg tallit tartar, rnan-d yedlisen nniḍen i d-yessumren inagrawen i ɛerḍen ad mmlen amek i d-yettili umussu n uḍfas. D inagrawen ẓẓayen acku ggten deg-sen izamulen akked wunuɣen, yal aḍefs ssunuɣen-as aɣawas. Llan wid d yessumren ahdum n tewlafin i uḍefs… Ulac anagraw n uḍfas i qeblen yimurigamen n umḍal d amudlif. Armi d Aseggas n 1954 i d-yessumer umurigam Akira Yoshizawa yiwen n unagraw afessas i yes-s nezmer ad neglem tamudemt. Yessufeɣ-it-d deg tirawt i umi isemma : Taẓuri n wurigami amaynut ‘’Atarashi Origami Geijutsu’’ (New Origami Art) deg useggas n 1954. Yessemres aderrir s tneqqiḍin akken ad yemmel amek ara d-yili, ɣef umedya, uḍefs adrar akked uḍefs iɣzer. Yerna-as kra izamulen amedya n uzamul ‘’taneccabt n ucuffu’’...
Anagraw-a, iger-as tamawt Mass Samuel Randlett akked Robert Harbin imarikaniyen, segmen-t ugar, rnan-as kra izamulen amedya n uzamul ‘’tineccabin n tuzzya’’… Akka i d-yeffeɣ umudlif neɣ ayen i umi ttinin anagraw Yoshizawa-Randlett. Anagraw-a, yettwaglem-d i tikkelt tamezwaru, s wudem unṣib deg udlis n Samuel Randlett i umi isemma : Taẓuri n Wurigami, Aḍfas n Ukaɣeḍ, seg Unsayan ɣer Utrar (The Art of Origami; Paper Folding, Traditional and Modern). Iẓreg-d deg tmura yedduklen n temrikt, deg useggas n 1961. 
Seg d-yeffeɣ unagraw-a, msefhamen akk fell-as, qeblen-t merra yimurigamen akked tmuriganin n umḍal. D win i d yeggran ar ass-a nessemras-it, nettini-as amudlif asunɣan. Sakin rnan sɣenwen-d amudlif nniḍen ideg ssemrasen tiwlifin, ttinin-as amudlif n tewlifin. Yerna iḍfer-it-id usaru awezlan i nettaf s umata deg Youtube (Anternet). Ɣer taggara-a, yeffeɣ-d umudlif nniḍen i umi ttinin amudlif asinan. D amudlif ssemrasen i tetwilt n wurigami azegriran.

Akaɣeḍ:
Tabadut n yisem Akaɣeḍ
Akaɣeḍ, nettini-as daɣen lkaɣeḍ, d awal i d-yekkan seg tutlayt taɛrabt, ttarunt akka : (الكاغد). D isem n yimɣi-nni i yes-s xeddmen zik-nni akaɣeḍ deg tmurt n Beɣdad. Asegget n wawal akaɣeḍ nettaru-t akka : ikaɣḍen ɣas akken deg ususru nettini-as ‘’Lekwaɣeḍ’’. Mi ara ten-sers deg uddad amaruz ad t-naru akka : ukaɣeḍ (yikaɣḍen). Neslugen awal-a acku mi t-id-newwi, neǧǧa-t akken deg talɣa-s tanaṣlit ur yedda ara d talɣiwin n tjerrumt n tutlayt-nneɣ. Seg tama nniḍen, aslugen ad aɣ-yeǧǧ nezmer ad nessuddem awalen nniḍen amedya n yisem n umdan yeznuzun akaɣeḍ, isem n tḥanut-is...

Amuran:
Tabadut n wawal amuran 
Amuran, s tutlayt tafransist ttarunt akka: "Mauresque", d arbib yesɛan amalay akked wunti. Nettaru amalay-is akka : Amuran (imuranen). Ma nsers-it deg waddad amaruz, ad t-naru akka : Umuran, yimuranen. Ma d unti-s nettaru-t akka : Tamurant (timuranin). Ma nsers-it deg waddad amaruz, ad t-naru akka : Tmurant (tmuranin). Amuran d awal i d-yekkan seg yisem Amuri yesɛan ula d netta amalay akked wunti. Asegget-is nettaru-t akka : imuriyen. Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, ad ten-naru akka : Umuri (yimuriyen). Ma d unti-s nettaru-t akka : Tamurit (Timuriwin). D awal i d-yekkan seg yisem Amur.
Amur, anamek-is d akal, d ayla, d aḥric… Nettini : Wa d amur-iw, d ayla-w, d aḥric-iw…” Mi ara ad as-nernu ‘’t’’ n wunti yettuɣal akka : t + amur + t = tamurt” . Zik timetti-nneɣ, am akk timttiwin n yiɣerfan n umḍal, tella tebḍa ɣef sin. Llan wid i umi nettini Imuriyen (at Umur, wid yesɛan amur n wakal), d imdanen yedren deg yiwen n umḍiq. Ttidiren yimuriyen deg tiɣremt, bennun ixxamen-nsen s weẓru, xedmen tafellaḥt… Llan daɣen wid i umi ttinin Imaziɣen, d imdanen ilelliyen yedren deg ugar n yiwen umḍiq, leḥḥun seg temnaḍt ɣer tayeḍ. S umata, Imuriyen dren deg ugafa n tmazɣa, ma d Imaziɣen deg unẓul. Igelliden amedya n Gaya, Masensen, Sifaks, Yuba amezwaru, Yuba wis sin… d Imuriyen. Takfarinas… d Amaziɣ. Tura d isem Amaziɣ i newwi d isem-nneɣ, ad yili ahat imi anamek-is d tilelli… Akka i d amdan, yezga yettnadi ɣef wayen i t-ixuṣṣen.

Urigami azegriran:
D acu i d urigami azegriran ?
Urigami azegriran d tawsit seg ger tewsatin n tẓuri n wurigami. D aḍfas n tmudemt s wugar n yiwet n tferkit. Yal tiferkit d aferdis ara nesdukel akked wiyaḍ i as-yeččabin s uḍefs neɣ s usmikcem n wa deg wa alamma tekfa tmudemt. Aferdis-a nettini-as azegrir, asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Izegriren. Akk izegriren s umata kifkif-iten. Asnulfu n tmudemt s yizegriren yebḍa ɣef sin yeswiren. Aswir n usnulfu amezwaru, yers ɣef usnulfu n tmudemt n uzegrir sakin ad neḍfes ssegsen aṭas. D azegrir-nni ara nessemres d azadur i usnulfu n tmudmin yesɛan talɣa i nebɣa amedya n talɣa n uɣersiw, n umdan, n tɣawsiwin nniḍen… Akken tebɣu tili talɣa n tmudemt i nebɣa ad nesnulfu, yessefk ad nheggi aṭas n yiferdisen neɣ ayen i umi nettini : Izegriren. Izegriren yellan deg unrar aẓuran n wurigami azegriran mmeẓlen, seg wa ɣer wa. Llan kra sɛan tazmert akken ad nesnulfu yes-sen aṭas n tmudmin yemmeẓlen deg talɣa amedya n uzegrir ‘’ Akedis uslig bu 4 leǧyub’’. Nezmer ad nini fell-as d azegrir ara yefken tilelli tameqqrant i umurigam ad yesnulfu tamudemt i yebɣa akken tebɣu tili talɣa-as... Llan daɣen izegriren nniḍen amedya n uzegrir ‘’Amkuẓ uslig n wudmawen’’, snat talɣiwin kan ara nezmer ad neḍfes yes-s, tamudemt takurant neɣ tin n ugasas. Ɣef umedya, ur nzemmer ara ad nesnulfu tamudemt n walbaɛḍ iɣersiwen… Yezmer ad yili uzegrir d asnulfu-nneɣ, am wakken yezmer daɣen ad yili yekka-d ansi nniḍen. Ulac deg-s aɣilif ma nerḍel-it-id ɣur umurigam nniḍen akken ad nesnulfu tamudemt-nneɣ. 
Aswir wis sin, d asnulfu n tmudemt i nebɣa s usemdey neɣ asali n yizegriren. Asemdey yettili-d s useḍfes neɣ s usmikcem n wa deg wa akken ad nessileɣ talɣa i nebɣa ad as-tt-nefk i tmudemt-nneɣ. D wa i d iswi ayiwen n uzegrir. Ugur yellan deg tewsit-a n wurigami, d ameskan. Aglam n usemdey neɣ asali n tmudemt deg wurigami azegriran akken ad yezmer menwala ad as-d-yales, taswiɛt-a, mazal i as d-nufa iɣef-is akken ilaq. Yal amurigam yettaɛraḍ ad d-yessumer ameskan ara yefrun ugur-a.
Amezruy awezlan n tẓuri
Adlis amezwaru i d-yemmeslayen ɣef wurigami azegriranr yura-t ujapuni Hayato Ohoka, iẓreg-d deg useggas 1734, azwel-is : Ranma Zushiki. Ad naf deg-s yedda-d ugasas n ukaɣeḍ yesɛan 6 izegriren yemmeẓlen deg yiniten. D agasas i umi fkan isem n tamatebaku (tamatebako).
Deg useggas 1993 i d-yenna Yasuo Koyanagi belli agasas-a d win akken i umi ttinin Tamatebaku deg tenfust n useyyad iselman. Sakin d mass Masao Okamura, anmezray n wurigami i d-itebten ayen i d-yenna yakan Yasuo Koyanagi. Ɣas akken ulac ameskan n ugasas-a, Masao Okamura yules-as-d i tmudemt.

Tamatebaku:
Tanfust n ugasas Tamatebaku (Tamatebako)
Les historiens ont récemment découvert le modèle perdu du Tamatebako (boîte de Pandore), un objet tiré d’un conte folklorique japonais l'Urashima Tarō, dans un livre publié en 1734, le « Ranma-Zushiki ». Il contient deux images identifiées en 1993 par Yasuo Koyanagi comme modèle du Tamatebako. Masao Okamura, un historien de l'origami, a réussi à recréer le modèle, qui, contrairement à la théorie de l'origami traditionnel, implique du découpage et du collage.
Hippocampe
Tamatebako d tafniqt neɣ d ayen i umi nettini tabwaḍt n ukaɣeḍ, tedda-d deg yiwet n tenfust taqburt n tmurt n Japun. D tanfust n yiwen n uṣeyyad n yiselman isem-is Urashima Taro (asusru-s d wa : Uracima Taru). Ass-nni yella yettmerriḥ ɣef yiri n yillel, iteddu ɣef yejdi armi yufa igurdan tturaren s yiwet n tefkert n wanan, ssulin-as tasawent… Asmi iwala lbaṭel sɛeddan fell-as, yekker yekkes-asen-tt, yerra-tt s aman, truḥ. Maca tifkert-nni d tageldunt, d yellis n ugellid n yillel
I wakken ad as-ter lxir, tageldunt Otohim (asusru-s d wa : Uṭuhim), akka i d isem-is, tenced-it-id ɣer tgelda-s yellan ddaw waman akken ad as-terr tajmilt. Mi yewweḍ ɣer teɣremt Ryugu-jo (asusru-s d wa : Ryugu-ju) yellan ddaw waman n yillel, yewhem, iɣil d targit i yettargu seg waken tecbeḥ. Yeqqim din kraḍ (3) wussan, ixaq, icedha ad yuɣal s axxam-is, ad iwali imeddukal-is… Yekker yessuter i tgeldunt Otohim ad terr ansi d-yekka. Asmi twala akken, qbel ad t-id-err s akal n tmurt-is, tefka-as asefk, d tabwaḍt ireqmen s ureɣ akked yeẓra ɣlayen, maca tweṣṣa-t tenna-as : “Ḥader ad teldiḍ tabwaḍt-a”. 
Mi d-yuɣal Urushima s akal, yufa ziɣ mačči 3 wussan i d-yesɛedda maca 300 iseggasen. Kullec ibeddel, ixxamen, iberdan, imeddukal-is akk mmuten, ulac win i t-yesnen. Iteddu weḥd-s armi d-yemlal d yiwen wemɣar yesteqsat, yenna-as ma yella wasmi i yesla ttmeslayen-d medden ɣef yiwen wemdan isem-is Urashima Taro. Yerra-as-d wemɣar-nni, yenna-as ih, sliɣ nnan-d fell-as iruḥ s illel, 300 iseggasen aya, seg wass-nni ur d-yuɣal.
Ɛeddan wussan, ur yufa ara iman-is. Yemmekta-d tabwaḍt-nni i as-d-tefka tgeldunt, yeddem-it-id yeldi-tt, yebɣa ad iẓer d acu i yellan daxel-is. Dɣa, yeffeɣ-d wabbu amellal, am tagut yers fell-as. Din din icab, yuɣal d amɣar awessar yesɛan deg leɛmer-is 300 iseggasen. Cwiṭ akka yesla i taɣect n tgeldunt Otohim as-d-sbecbuc s ameẓẓuɣ-is, tenna-as ; “Yak nniɣ-ak ur leddi ara tabwaḍt-nni acku yella deg-s leɛmer-ik n tidet”. I lmend n tmacahut-a i d-snulfan tamudemt n ugasas i umi ttinin : Agasas Tamatebaku.

Urigami n tusnakt:
Urigami n tusnakt
Urigami n tusnak d timlilit n tussna d tẓuri. Ayen iceɣben inaẓuren n wurigami n tusnakt, d asemres n talɣiwin tinzegganin, amedya n umkuẓ, asrem, akerdis… S umata d timudmin timadwanin. D tamzizzelt n wanwa ara iḍefsen tamudemt yesɛan ugar n yiḍefsen ɣef tayeḍ. D asnulfu n tmudmin ideg gten iḍefsen, d tid iweɛren aṭas. Ttwalin daɣen taẓuri-a d allal i yes-s zemren ad zerwen talɣiwin n telwiḥin n ugensa amek i tezmer ad tili tigawt n tuldi deg igenni; ḍefsen-tent deg tazwara s ukaɣeḍ.

Urigami addayan:
Urigami ameẓradday
Urigami ameẓradday, s tutlayt tafransist ttarunt akka "Origami minimaliste". D aḍfas n tmudmin ur nesɛa ara aṭas n yiḍefsen. Tatwilt-a d tanemgalt n tetwilt n wurigami n tusnakt yesṭuqquten iḍefsen, yessemrasen tussna i usnulfu n tamudemt. S umat, d timudmin ur nesɛa ara ugar n ukuẓ (4) neɣ semmus (5) n yiḍefsen. Maca temgared tmuɣli seg umurigam ɣer wayeḍ, kra ttinin-ak aḍfas n tmudemt ur yessefk ara ad ilin deg-s ugar n sa (7) n yiḍefsen.

Aḍefs:
=D acu i d aḍefs ?=
Aḍefs s umata d izirig-nni iɣef ara tili tigawt n uḍfas neɣ d win akken ara d-yeǧǧ uḍefs mi ara yeldi. D aḥric-nni yettin ɣef yiman-is n ukaɣeḍ neɣ n ubeḥnuq… Yettak deg taggara i tɣawsa-nni tuzert tusligt amedya n yiḍefsen n tsebbaḥrut. Deg tẓuri n wurigami, iḍefsen merra yellan sɛan isem d wamek i yessefk ad ten-neḍfes. Aḍefs yezmer ad yili d aḥerfi amedya n uḍefs iɣzer neɣ adrar. Am wakken i yezmer ad yessegrew ugar n yiwen n uḍefs amedya n uḍefs Zad, yesɛa sin. Iḍefsen yesɛan ugar n yiwen, nettini-as aḍefs uddis. Yalla daɣen uḍefs uɣḍim, d win akken ara neḍfes sakin ad t-neldi. Yeǧǧaǧǧa-d izirig iɣef nettawi lewhi akken ad neḍfes iḍefsen nniḍen.
Mi ara tegrem tamawt, ad tafem llan yiḍefsen yewwin ismawen n uzamul i ten-id-yemmalen. Amedya n Za, d isem n uḍefs, d isem daɣen n uzamul i t-id-yemmalen. Ɣef way-a i nettwali iḍefsen, deg tẓuri n wurigami, amzun akken d iluɣma ara ken-iɛiwnen akken ad tecfum ɣef yizamulen. I waken ad tishil tɣuri n umeskan asunɣan, ad negzi iwenniten i d-iteddun yid-s, yessefk ad nissin ismawen akked wamek i d-iḍerru uḍfas n yakk iḍefsen yellan. Ttini-ak : Simmal nettales-d i tɣawsa, simmal nlemmed-d seg-s kra.

Urigami aẓuran:
=Urigami aẓuran=
D amurigam Yoshizawa Akira i d-inejren tawsit i wurigami aẓuran i nessen tura. D tawsit yersen ger usreqqet akked uḍfas s usemres n tetwilt n usebzeg n ukaɣeḍ. Tawsit-a temla-aɣ-d belli taẓuri n wurigami d anrar i deg yezmer yal anaẓur ad d-yessenfali akk iḥulfan-is. 
Tatwilt-a d asebzeg n ukaɣeḍ qbel ad yebdu uḍfas akked umsal. Aya yettak i uḍefs talɣa yezzin. Ayen yekka yedder, Yoshizawa Akira, yesnulfa-d ugar n 20 000 n tmudmin. Ala 100 tmudmin i d-yettwaẓergen deg 18 yedlisen.

Kusudama:
=Tabadut n yisem Kusudama=
Kusudama d awal i d-yekkan seg tutlayt tajapunit. D isem yesdduklen sin wawalen, awal = Tasnajya akked wawal [dama = Takurt.
Kusudama d tawsit seg tewsatin n wurigami. D urigami akuran ansayan n Japun. Ttinin-ak d netta i d ababat n wurigami azegriran. Acu kan tawsit-a ur tquder ara yiwen n umenzay seg yimenzayen n wurigami atrar, d asemlili n yizegriren s uxiḍi akked usemlili s usentaḍ. Zik ttarran-as i tkurt n kusudama ddwa neɣ rriḥi sakin ad tt-ɛellqen deg uxxam. Ma d tura, ḍefsen tikurin n ukaɣeḍ i tedlegt n uxxam.

Urigami amadwan:
=Urigami amadwan=
Tqelleɛ tleslalit n tẓuri n wurigami ɣef tewsit-a. D asnulfu n tmudmin timadwanin. D tid yesɛan s umata talɣa tanzeggant neɣ tikwal ur t-ttban ara d acu-tt.

Ḍfes:
=Ḍfes=
Ḍfes d amyag i nezmer ad t-nessefti deg akk ikuden yellan deg tjerrumt n tutlayt tamaziɣt. Ma neddem-d amedya ad nini : Ḍfes tiferkit-nni n ukaɣeḍ; d netta i iḍefsen abeḥnuq-nni; ur yeḍfis ara... Anamek-is d tigawt-nni n uḍfas n kra.

Ameḍfas:
=Ameḍfas=
Ameḍfas d amalay n tmeḍfast, sɛan yiwen unamek. Isem-a yesɛa asegget-is, nettaru-t akka : Imeḍfasen. Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, ad ten-aru akka : Umeḍfas / yimeḍfasen. Deg tẓuri n wurigami d isem n umdan-nni iḍefsen akaɣeḍ. Isem "Ameḍfas" deg wurigami yesɣa aknaw, nettaru-t akka : Amurigam. Asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Imurigamen.

Tameḍfast:
=Tameḍfast=
Tameḍfast d unti n umeḍfas, sɛan yiwen n unamek. Isem-a yesɛa asegget-is, nettaru-t akka : Timeḍfasin. Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad 
amaruz, ad ten-aru akka : Tmeḍfast / Tmeḍfasin. Deg tẓuri n wurigami, d isem n tin akken i la iḍefsen akaɣeḍ. Isem "Tameḍfast" deg wurigami tesɣa aknaw, nettaru-t akka : Tamurigamt. Asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Timurigamin.

Aḍfas:
=Aḍfas=
Aḍfas d isem n tigawt. Anamek-is d asemmi n tigawt-nni mi rara neḍfes kra. Isem-a yesɛa asegget-is, nettaru-t akka : Iḍfasen. Mi rar ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, nettaru-ten akka : Uḍfas / yiḍfasen.

Uḍfis:
=Uḍfis=
Uḍfis d arbib, asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Uḍfisen. Uḍfis d amalay n "tuḍfist". Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, nettaru-ten akka : Wuḍfis / wuḍfisen. Anamek n wawal uḍfis, yemmal-d neɣ yettak-d udem n tɣawsa-nni mi ara teḍru fell-as tigawt n uḍfas. Ma neddem-d amedya, ad nini : Asaber d abeḥnuq uḍfis.

Tuḍfist:
=Tuḍfist=
Tuḍfist d arbib, asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Tuḍfisin. Tuḍfist d unti n wawal "uḍfis". Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, nettaru-ten akka : Tuḍfist / tuḍfisin. Anamek n wawal tuḍfist, yemmal-d neɣ yettak-d udem n tɣawsa-nni mi ara teḍru fell-as tigawt n uḍfas. Ma neddem-d amedya, ad nini : Tamudemt deg tẓuri n wurigami d tiferkit tuḍfist.

Amurigam:
=Amurigam=
Amurigam d isem n unaẓur n tẓuri n wurigami. D amalay n wawal "Tamurigamt". Asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Imurigamen. Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, nettaru-ten akka : Umurigam / yimurigamen.
=Tamurigamt=
Tamurigamt d isem n tnaẓurt n tẓuri n wurigami. D unti n wawal "Amurigam". Asegget-is nettaru-t akka : Timurigamin. Mi ara ten-sers deg waddad amaruz, nettaru-ten akka : Tmurigamt / tmurigamin.

Urikatar:
=Tabadut n yisem urikatar=
Urikatar d awal yebnan ɣef sin wawalen. Awal amezwaru d amyag, nettaru-t akka yekka-d seg tutlayt tajapunit. Anamek-is d wa : Ḍfes. Awal wis sin d isem, nettaru-t akka [Akatar, yekka-d seg tutlayt tamaziɣt. Anamek-is d iran-nni n usɣar akked urelluc ideg nettarra tawlaft sakin ad t-nɛelleq deg uxxam. 
=D acu i d urikatar ?=
Urikatar d urigami n yikataren. D taẓuri yesgerwen aḍfas n ukaɣeḍ akked ukatar.

Tagduda tačekit:
d tamurt n tmura n turuft, tamanaɣt-is Prag

Tafekka n wafrux:
d ayen yaɛnan tafekka n wafrux,

Bochotnica:
Bochotnica (API [bɔxɔtˈnit͡sa]) ɖ taddart deg wanẓul-agmuḍ n Pulunya, ger Puławy, s tama n wasif Wisła. Ɖ ixf s daxel n Lublin Voivodeship. 1,500 yemdanen zedɣen deg-s (aseggas : 2010).

Microsoft:

Philipp Lahm:
Philipp Lahm (ilul ass 11 wember 1983 deg Munich, Lalman) d amarir n tkurt uḍar alalmani ,yetturar deg umḍiq n umaḥadi di teɣlamt Bayern Munich akked tarbaɛt taɣennawt n tmurt Lalman seg useggas 2004.

Laguiole (takemmart):
Laguiole (nṭeq-it "layul"), d tasiwelt n uẓar n takemmart (neɣ aguglu) taṛumit n uẓi n Aubrac s uyefki afraray n tfunast. Isem-is yekkad seg taddart n Laguiole deg ugezdu n Aveyron di Fransa.
Iẓuṛan n takemmart agi tettalin-d ar , asmi imunaken n ugni n Aubrac, deg amnaḍ n ansay n takemmart adigan aqdim, sneflan asiweḍ (n iseksaten) n izegrawen uyefki dɣa bedden aɣraf ines. Tafarest-is tesɛa deg asfari d-ameqran aṭas, daɣen ula d-tisellat ines tesɛa. Tisellat nni ttwassebded ɣef ajmaɛ n tanzagt uɣzifen dɣa ɣef yiwet taɣara n ifarisen yecudden aṭas s wakal adigan : anezwu aweɛran, tiferdi tuzzigt n idurar, tifunasin n iri azegraw. 
Takemmart laguiole qrib tenger deg talemmast n , ɣef ljal n atigen n uɣraf aɣlayen dɣa ilɣiten ad afen ixeddamen i uɣraf n takemmart deg ixxamen imensayen "buron". Yuɣaled, seg iseggwasen 1960, s tallalt n infarasen idiganen, yebɣan ad snernin tukkest n timiḍiwin yezwiren. Tafarest tesniled seg iseggwasen 1980 ɣer taɣara d tikemmarin n ujmaɛ dɣa gweḍen-d seg taggara n iseggwasen 1990 ar tasmekta talemmast yetṛuḥun gar 700 d n laguiole yenzan yal aseggwas.
Tasiwelt agi yettwaḥerzen sɣur ticraḍ AOC seg useggwas 1961 d AOP seg 2008. Tafarest n uyefki, tafarest d umesel n tikemmarin ilaq ad yetwexdem deg taɣzut tamaḍlarant n aẓi agmawi n Aubrac i bεuẓẓelen ɣef 73 timdinin n igezda n Aveyron, n Cantal dɣa n Lozère.

1515:

686:

23 ctamber:
Ass 23 n ctamber d-ass 266 n useggwas. Llan 99 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggwas.

1976:

1890:

Ɣana:
Ɣana d tamurt n Tefriqt tutrimt. Tajumma-nnes 238.535 km2. Zedɣen-tt 23.837.000 n yimezdaɣen (Iɣaniyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Akra.

2001:

Igen aɣelnaw aɣerfan (Lezzayer):
Igen aɣelnaw aɣerfan d isem n igen azzayri seg azarug n tmurt ass n 5 yulyu 1962. Tettwasuddes s inzaḍen n iɣallen n wakal, n ilel, n yigenni dɣa tamḥaddit tagenwant n wakal, daɣen état-major amasay n amres akkw d assewjed n iserdasen ar imenɣi. Taqacuct n umyellel aserdasi tettaweḍ srid ar aɣella n Uwanak, deg tamenḍawt d aɣella anafella n Iɣallen imsellḥen d aneɣlaf n Tamḥaddit taɣelnawt.

Taɣewwaɣt:
Taɣewwaɣt d tameskant tumant, s umata tukriḍt, tella d agmuḍ n tawliwelt tamazdayt. Widak ittekkin ar tiɣewwaɣint n semmasen iɣewwaɣen.

Tafsut taɛrabt:
« Tafsut taɛrabt » d tagrumma n tagayin timeẓwiyin yedran deg kra n timura n umaḍal aɛrab d Tafriqt ugafa seg dujamber 2010. Tanfalit « Tafsut taɛrabt » t sawel-d ar « Tafsut n iɣerfan » n 1848. Iwliwlen agi igrawalen iɣlanen semman-asen daɣen tigrawliwin tiɛrabin, tinekriwin tiɛrabin, neɣ daɣen « ankar aɛrab », kra qaren-as tagrawla Facebook, tagrawla Twitter daɣen tagrawla 2.0 skud asseqdec n iẓeḍwan imettiyen yexater. S wukud, asget « Tifsutin tiɛrabin » yeqqim d tanfalit tamenyaft iwakken ad seknen tuggta n iwliwlen i ssegrewen ddaw isem agi.

Olea:
Irem Olea yaɛqel tamessartut, tawsit "Olea", tagrumma n leḥcawec yesɛan tiɣariwin tucrikin. Kraḍ adu-tiwsatin ttwexleqen-d sakin imuhal n uceggeṛ yenheṛ amesnacek P.S. Green, Yegweḍ ar ad yaɛqel dɣa ad yessegrew 33 tilmas d 9 adu-tilmas gar aṭas n igdawalen i erkden s kraḍ timiḍiwin n tasnacekt d usnirem n umaḍal.

François Hollande:
François Hollande' d aselway n Fransa seg 2012 ar 2017 seg Ukabar Anemlay n Fransa. 

Buεziz At Cebbib:
Buεziz At Cebbib ilul-d ass n di At Saɛda deg tɣiwant n Iɛeṭṭafen . D aselway n Umussu n Timanit i Tmurt n Iqbayliyen seg wass n 9 dujamber 2011 . 
Ass n 3 ɣuct 2013, Buεziz At Cebbib yessuddes, s imeɣnasen iqbayliyen nniḍen, imekli azayez (mgal l'inquisition islamiste en Kabylie) ass n uremḍan ayen werjin yella di Lezzayer.

Asarir n 1ru-Wamber-1954 (Tizi-Wezzu):
Asarir n 1ru-Wamber-1954 d asarir n tkurt n uḍar d atletaẓri yezgan ar ugmuḍ n temdint n Tizi-Uzzu. Taẓunẓut ines tedra-d ass n 12 meɣres 1978. Yeṭṭfed isem-is seg azmez n ussenker n tagrawla tazzayrit. Anrar ines n urar yezga i ilugan n FIFA, yesɛa tamusayt taneɣruft n tsuta 5. Asarir yesɛa akettur n 20 000 imeshanayen.

Akli D:
Akli D d acennay aqbayli

Yusef Zirem:
Yusef Zirem d aneɣmas d umaru aqbayli, ilul ass n 16 ɣuct 1964 di tɣiwant n Akfadu
Tameddurt.
Ajenyuṛ n uwanak deg ilukaṛbiṛen (ɣef assileɣ), agurdis n IAP n Bumerdas, yebdda amecwaṛ awezlan deg uḥric n tamguri uqbel ad yuɣal d aneɣmas sakin tidyanin tikesnanin n tuber 1988. Yusef Zirem yettekki ihi ar tirawt n aṭas iɣmisen izzayriyen am Le Quotidien d'Oran, la Nation, l'Opinion, Libre-Algérie neɣ daɣen " La Tribune". yeḍebber daɣen deg useggwas 2003 tazrawt n umalsan "le Kabyle de Paris". Yerked di Paris, Yusef Zirem yettekki ar aṭas n imidyaten iṛumiyen d igraɣlanen.
Daɣen di Paris, Yusef Zirem yeqeddem tasgilt tamalsant, "Graffiti", ɣef BRTV.
Amahil.
D ameskar n du uṛuman, "la Vie est un grand mensonge". Tasugna agi teḥkud amezruy n Lezzayer seg tazzwara n iseggwasen 1980 armi d ass agi. Yetwaru war tasnimirt, aṛuman agi yeččur tisummal, tikriḍin timeẓliyin akkw d tayriwin tiwezɣiyin. Abrid n sin ibusinen ɣef qrib snat n tmerwin n iseggwasen yetweglem. 
"La Vie est un grand mensonge" yekemmel inadiyen id yebdda yakan ameskar deg "les Enfants du brouillard" (ammud n isefra yeffeɣed di Paris deg 1995 ar Éditions Saint-Germain-des-Prés).

Timettanin deg tuber 2014:

Arthur von Ramberg:
Arthur von Ramberg, yelule-d Arthur Georg Ramberg as n 4 ctamber 1819 di Vienne dɣa yemmut ass n 5 fuṛaṛ 1875 di Muncen, d ameklay utrici d amaslaḍ n ugaru n Muncen daɣen yexdem aṭas di Lalman.
Tameddurt.
Ramberg yekka-d seg tawacult n ifesyanen, baba-s Georg d agenses-marechal n igen utrici. Tawacut t-awey-d azwel n baron deg useggwas 1849. Gma-s d ajiniṛal-baron Hermann von Ramberg (1820-1899). Ramberg ula d netta yawey-d azwel n baron n tagelda n Bavaria deg useggwas 1875, yettssiwen ar taǧǧalt-is d arrawen is deg useggwas 1878.
Yeɣer di Hanover dɣa yexdem Grand Tour ines di Ṭṭalyan, di Majaṛ daɣen di Styria. Yekcem deg useggwas 1840 ar tasdawit n Prag. Yuɣal d abalmud n Julius Hübner deg takadimit n tiẓuriyin tucbiḥin n Dresde deg useggwas 1842. Deg tallit agi yesbeɣe-d "Zzwaǧ n ikeḍwanen" (ɣef leḥsab n Goethe) d "Amenkad Henri deg taḥemla di Majaṛ".
Ramberg yeṛuḥ deg useggwas 1850 ar Muncen, anda yesseḍru tikla n tawsit dɣa yessuqqel imuhal n Schiller. Yetwasem aselmad deg ugaru n tiẓuriyin tucbiḥin n Weimar deg useggwas 1860 daɣen sḍis iseggwasen sakin ar takademit n tiẓuriyin tucbiḥin n Muncen. Yessemter i Albert Keller ad yuɣal d-ameklay. Ramberg yesbeɣ sakin "Tasenbert n Frédéric II di Palermo", "Hermann d Dorothée" (ɣef leḥsab n Goethe), d "Louise" (ɣef leḥsab n usefru n Voss). Ramberg yella daɣen d ameskar n tafreskut n taxxamt n Luther deg Tiɣremt n Wartbourg.
Ramberg yella daɣen d imsuneɣ, am i "Ageldun n imqerqren", yetssutren sɣur grande-duchesse n Saxe-Weimar. Yesɛa-d am abalmud Wilhelm Georg Ritter.
Arthur von Rambert d ayyaw-amecṭuḥ n umeklay (1763-1840) dɣa d ɛemmi-s n umeklay n tagriwa, (1866-1947)

Timibrikt n Liṭṭunya:
Timibrikt n Liṭṭunya d iri azegraw aliṭṭuni. Isem-is agraɣlan d ' dɣa isem-is aliṭṭuni d ' neɣ "buraïa latviskaïa" s trusit.
Taneṣlit.
D iri aqdim, ixelqe-d seg usegraw n tijlibin tidiganin tiqdimin n taciṭṭa tazegwaɣt n Baltik. Teḍḍfed tazrirt n angeln deg uqbel alday n usaklas asutwalan deg useggwas 1885 dɣa teḍḍfed isem-is amiran deg useggwas 1922. Seg zik, nettat d iri n uyefki deg aẓi, mazal t-genses aqrib 75 % n uctal azegraw aliṭṭuni. Iri yettwebḍa s kuẓ ifurkawen yettweṛebban yal yiwen deg umkan is iwakken ad ssineḍen imeccir asiwan. Afurk BL-1 yettwefren s tixxutert taɛlayant deg isubxuzen. Tettaked tikessawin n tafarest n uyefki am imzufɣawen. Tafest n iketmen tesgader. Seg deg useggwas 1980, Tagrawt yeṣṣub ar deg useggwas 1990. Deg useggwas 2000, amḍan n imzufɣawen BL-1 yessiggezen ɣef asaklas yella d tifunasin d 300 iramulen.
Tasnalɣa.
Telsa taqendurt tazegwaɣt s tisignayin timibriktin ugar-neɣ-ddaw tibuḍḍlamin. Ini n mukus ines d ini n uksum dɣa ur tesɛa ara acciwen. Tafunast taɛlay ar 130 cm deg timezsmeḍt i 520 kg dɣa aramul 140 cm i 800 kg.
Iketturen.
D iri i mmizweren i uyefki. Tettfaras 5200 kg s usuḍeḍ n uyefki yesɛan aṭas n tinegwa uzuren (4,16 %) d tifṛutinin. (3,45 %)

Laɛzib n Ccix:
Laɛzib n Ccix (Tafrensist : "Baghlia", Taɛrabt : "بغلية", semman-as tura : Beɣleyya) d taɣiwant n Bumerdas, zedɣen-tt 15.854 n yimezdaɣen deg 2008. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Rébeval".
Tarakalt.
Tuddar.
At Ḥmida
ath arus 
Igufaf
At Ḥemza

Tanebḍit n Bumerdas:

1ru wamber:
Ass 1 wamber d ass 305 n useggas (306 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 60 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
31 tuber - "1 wamber" - 2 wamber

2 wamber:
Ass 2 wamber d ass 306 n useggas (307 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 59 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
1ru wamber - "2 wamber" - 3 wamber

Timeẓrit:

Umuɣ n tiwilayin n Tmurt Leqbayel:
Tamurt n Iqbayliyen tefraq s sa (7) timazdayin tizayezin tiɣzutin i neqqar tiwilayin.
Tiwilayin Tid sat n Tmurt Taqbaylit.
Tajumma.
Tawilayt ugaren tiyeḍ nniḍen : 
Tawilayt ddaw tiyeḍ nniḍen : 
Umuɣ n 7 tiwilayin n Tmurt n Iqbayliyen.
Tafelwit uḍfiṛ i t-efk umuɣ n tiwilayin tiqbayliyin dɣa, i t-efk daɣen, i yal tawilayt, tangalt is, isem is (d isem n tamdint yellan amḍiq-aɣella n tawilayt), amḍan n igezda (d afraq adbel n tawilayt), amḍan n timdinin, tajumma-s, d imezdaɣ is.
!Code 
!Tawilayt 
!Amḍan n igezda 
!Amḍan n timdinin 
!TajummaKm 
!Imezdaɣ(uddun n 2008) 

Tutlayt tasenselkimt:
Neqqar-as tutlayt tasenselkimt i tutlayt talɣawit ur llan ara Turing-ummid yettweseqdacen deg usnulfu, assaley, neɣ ammud n unagraw n talɣut. Yiwen deg-sen isem-is ASCII.

Ass n 2 fuṛaṛ d-ass 33 n useggwas. Llan 332 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas, 333 deg iseggasen "bisekstil".

28 fuṛaṛ:
Ass n 28 fuṛaṛ d-ass 59 n useggwas. Llan 306 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas, 307 deg iseggasen "bisekstil".
27 fuṛaṛ - "28 fuṛaṛ" - 29 fuṛaṛ

29 fuṛaṛ:
Ass n 29 fuṛaṛ d-ass amsircey. Dass 59 deg iseggasen "bisekstil".
Llan 306 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
Yella ass n 29 fuṛaṛ deg iseggwasen 2000, 2004, 2008, 2012, win i d-yetteddun d win n useggwas 2016 umbeɛd deg useggwas 2020, dɣa deg useggwas 2024 etc.
Ass n "29 fuṛaṛ" yettili yal kuẓ iseggwasen (anya n iseggwasen bisekstil) n tafada julien.
28 fuṛaṛ - "29 fuṛaṛ" - 1 meɣres

Agwni Ggeɣran:
Agwni Ggeɣran (neɣ Ag°ni n Yeɣran), s tifinaɣ ) d taɣiwant n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit.
Tamaḍlarut.
Asideg (timella).
Taɣiwant n Agwni Ggeɣran tella deg unẓul n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant.
Taɣiwant n Agwni Ggeɣran tesɛa 14 tudrin :
Tadamsa.
Taɣiwant tesɛa taneɣraft tameqrant n tilebbiḍin n waman. Agraw Cevital yeldi aqbrib taɣbalut agi zdat taddart n Agwni Ggeɣran taneɣraft n 23 000 m² id ttaken 2,5 imelyunen n tilebbiḍin deg wass n ticreḍt de la marque Lalla Xediǧa (ticreḍt).

Icerriḍen:
Icerriḍen d yiwet taddart taqburt i-d yezgan deg tɣiwant n At Aggwaca deg Tmurt n Iqbayliyen. 
Ay dagi i yeḍran Imenɣi n Yicerriḍen mgal igen arumi deg wass wis24 n Yunyu 1857. 

Kamal Ɛawis:
Kamal Ɛawis (ilul deg deg temdint n Ldzayer - yemmut deg deg Umafag n Orly di Fransa), d amarir n tkurt n uḍar adzayri. Yurar deg teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel gar 1972 ed 1973.

Racid Dali:
Racid Dali (ilul deg 30 Dujember 1953), d amarir adzayri n tkurt n uḍar. Yurar d amenṭag (attaquant) deg teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel (gar 1972 ed 1973).

Muḥemmed Yuc:
Muḥemmed Yuc (ilul deg 3 Meɣres 1947 deg Ɛin Benyan, tawilayt n Ldzayer), d amarir adzayri n tkurt n uḍar. Yurar deg teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel (deg 1972-1973).

Ɛumar Zeɣdud:
Ɛumar Zeɣdud (ilul deg 14 Yebrir 1952 deg twilayt n Tizi Wezzu), d amarir adzayri n tkurt n uḍar, yurar d alemmas deg teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel gar 1971 ed 1973.

Ɛumar Belḥusin:
Ɛumar Belḥusin yella d aselway n teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel deg tsemhuyt n 1972-1973.

Rabaḥ Mengelti:
Rabaḥ Mengelti (ilul deg 28 Wember 1951 deg twilayt n Tizi Wezzu), d amarir n tkurt n uḍar adzayri. Yurar d amḥaddi deg Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel gar 1971 ed 1973.

Suq n Letniyen:

Tadayṛa:
Tadayṛa (s taɛrabt : دائرة = taẓayert ; asget "dawaa'ir") d adutaẓunt n twilayt deg tadbelt tansakalant. 
Tamurt Taqbaylit.
Tadayṛa tssegrew aṭas n tɣiwanin. Tettaked ipaspuṛen igraɣlanen, issirgen n unheṛ d tikarḍiwin tiɣelnawin n tmagit i iɣermanen izedɣen ɣef akal is, daɣen aswaḍ n imuhal yettwexedmen sɣur imeẓla ideblanen am tɣiwanin, imeẓla itekniyen, etc.
Lezzayer.
Tadayṛa tssegrew aṭas n tɣiwanin. Tettaked ipaspuṛen igraɣlanen, issirgen n unheṛ d tikarḍiwin tiɣelnawin n tmagit i iɣermanen izedɣen ɣef akal is, daɣen aswaḍ n imuhal yettwexedmen sɣur imeẓla ideblanen am tɣiwanin, imeẓla itekniyen, etc.

Muḥemmed Weld Ɛabdelɛaziz:
Muḥemmed Weld Ɛabdelɛaziz d ajiniṛal yerna d aselway n Muriṭanya seg 2009. Ilul 20 Dujembeṛ 1956 deg temdint n Akjujt.

Tidayṛiwin n Tmurt Taqbaylit:
Tadayṛa (s taɛrabt : دائرة = taẓayert (asun); asget "tidayṛiwin") d adutaẓunt n twilayt deg tadbelt tansakalant. 
Tetssegrew aṭas n tɣiwanin. Tettaked ipaspuṛen igraɣlanen, issirgen n unheṛ d tikarḍiwin tiɣelnawin n tmagit i iɣermanen izedɣen ɣef akal is, daɣen aswaḍ n imuhal yettwexedmen sɣur imeẓla ideblanen am tɣiwanin, imeẓla itekniyen, etc.
Llant deg aɣrud 102 tidayṛiwin.

Tidayṛiwin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu:
Tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu di Tamurt Taqbaylit tesɛa snat n tmerwin d yiwet tidayṛiwin, yal yiwet tesɛa aṭas n tiɣiwanin, i uɣrud n sḍiset n tmerwin d sat n tiɣiwanin.
Tidayṛiwin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tafelwit ddaw agi tettaked umuɣ n tidayṛiwin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu akkw d tiɣiwanin ines.

Ijqiwalɣiwen:
Ijqiwalɣiwen (Passeriformes s tṛumit) d ammizwer n usmil n ifrax ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen. Taxon agi, yettssegrew ugar n azgen n tilmas n ifrax. Ifrax n ummizwer agi, tettwasemmen ijqiwen, maca tettwasemmen daɣen am ifrax icennayen ɣef leḥsab n isem i-s-effkan angliziyen « "songbirds "». Zik semman asen "ifrax trusit".

Ayyur (itri):
Ayyur d tafekka tubrint ay ittezzin ɣef Tegnit (lqaɛa). 
Ayyur yebɛed ɣef Tegnit s wazal n 384.000 n yikilumitren. Deg yiḍ, yettakf-d ayen umi nettini tafat n tziri (d tafat n tfukt ay d-yekkaten deg-s). Mi ara yekk wayyur sdat tfukt, yeddal tafat n tfukt, dɣa d ayen umi ɣɣaren "afsax n tfukt" ("éclipse lunaire s trumit"). 
Medden ed Ayyur.
Ayyur sseqdacen-t seg zik medden akken ad ḥesben ayyuren n useggas n wayyur (am Yinselmen ed Yicinwaten). Arma ay d asmi ay d-yennulfa utiliskup, deg lqern wis 17, ay bdan yemdanen ttwalin ṣṣifa n tidet n wakal n wayyur. Deg Yulyu n 1969, imdanen rsen i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣef Wayyur, yerna kemmlen rezzun fell-as arma d 1972.

Tagnit:
Tagnit (neɣ Lqaɛa), d amtiweg (planète) n Unagraw Afukan (système solaire), yebɛed s wazal n 150 n yimelyunen n yikilumitren ɣef Tfukt ayɣef ittezzi. Tagnit d nettat ay d amtiweg awḥid aydeg yetbet tella tmeddurt. Tettezzi ɣef tfukt s tazzla n 108.000 n yikilumitren i tsaɛet yerna tettɣimi 365 n wussan akken ad teg tuzzya yemmden (d tin umi neɣɣar aseggas n tfukt). Tagnit tettezzi daɣen ɣef yiman-nnes yerna tettɣimi 23 n tsaɛtin ed 56 n tedqiqin akken ad tfak tuzzya-nnes (d tin umi neɣɣar ass). Tagnit tesɛa kan yiwen n Wayyur ay ittezzin fell-as deg wazal n 27 n wussan, yerna yebɛed fell-as s 384.000 n yikilumitren.

Anagraw Afukan:
Anagraw Afukan (s tefṛensist: système solaire), d tafukt akked yemtiwgen (planètes) ay d-yezzin fell-as: Merkur, Wines, Tagnit (lqaɛa), Meɣres, Yebṭer, Asturn, Neftun akked Uranus. Llan daɣen yemtiwgen ikeḍwanen (planètes naines) ay ittezzin ɣef Tfukt am Pluto akked yizunyuren (astéroïdes).

Tanebḍit n Bgayet:
Tanebḍit n Bgayet (s tefṛensist: Wilaya de Béjaïa), d tawilayt n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Ldzayer, deg wegmuḍ n Tmurt n Leqbayel. Tajumma-nnes 3.268 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 953.953 n yimezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-nnes d tamdint n Bgayet.

Tanebḍit n Jijel:
Jijel d tanebḍit n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Ldzayer, tezga-d ɣef Yilel Agrakal, deg wegmuḍ (ccerq) n Tmurt n Leqbayel. Tajumma-nnes 2.577 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 659.301 n yimezdaɣen (Ijijliyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d tamdint n Jijel.

Ḥmiduc:
Ḥmiduc, isem-is n tidet Ḥmiduc Xeddim, d acennay azzayri s tutlayt n teqbaylit. 
Tudert-is.
Ilul ass n 14 ɣuct 1956 deg wakud n tegrawla deg Agni n Waklan deg taddart n Ɛeṭṭuc, taɣiwant n Makuda, tawilayt n Tizi wezzu, deg tmurt n yiqbayliyen (deg yiwen n useggas netta d Lwennas Meεṭub). 
Yemmut ass n 05 yunyu 2002,deg-wakud n tefsut taberkan. Ssebba n lmut-is, d yiwen waṭṭan n diri i t-yettfen aṭas aya (aṭṭan n tgeẓẓal).

Napoleon:

Sitta taqbaylit:
Sitta taqbaylit (Sitta ledanti), tetwasem daɣen Sitta n Ledant, d talmest n ifrax n twacult n Sittidae. D yiwet sitta s tiddi talemmast, teɣzzif amenni . Imuren ufella sɛan ini ademdam-azzegzew, imuren imazdaren sɛan ini "taɣaḍt udrar imiwriɣ" yettṛuḥun ɣer ademdam. Awtem yesɛa amgerrad s tawtemt, zdat n tacacit-is d aberkan. Talmest agi d turkidt ; tettečč iɣlifḍaren deg unebdu, ifsan deg tagrest. Tasemhuyt n ufrurex tettili ɣer mayyu-yunyu. Agdef, yettwebna deg axbuc n ttejṛa (uruz), yesdari asḍar n Kraḍ neɣ kuẓ timellalin, i tsedel tawtemt. Isrifgen ttwaseččen sɣur sin imarawen nsen.
Sitta taqbaylit d talmest tawḥidt n ifrax amuɣel n Tmurt Taqbaylit, anda ur tesegdud kan (tura) kra n tiẓegwa n de taydiwin n ugafa n tmurt. Isem-is ussnan yettak tajmilt i Jean-Paul Ledant, amussan amaswaḍ abiljiki i d-yuffan afrux nni deg waggur ; aglam n ufrux yetwexdem sɣur amesnafrux aṛumi Jacques Vielliard. Isali n tagrut agi yessewhem aṭas amaḍal n tasnafruxt daɣen isali agi yexdem tuzzya n umaḍal (imediaten). Sitta taqbaylit tella taqribt s Sitta n Krüper ("Sitta krueperi"). Sitta taqbaylit yeqqim-as yiwen kan azwu n uzuzer (i ufrurex d tudert), yettwaggezen sɣur times, arad d tigawt talsant ; talmest tettwali dɣa am « deg umihi » sɣur Tadukli tagraɣlant i tagaẓt n ugama.

Talmest:
Deg tussniwin n umuddir, talmest (s tlatinit "", « tawsit » neɣ « lḥeṭṭa ») d taxon llsas n tanagrawant. Llant ugar n snat n tmerwin n tibuda n talmest deg tasekla tussnant maca deg akkw tijṛa talmest d takti mačči d tilawt : tilawt tasnudrant tagmawit d tin n imezdaɣen, dɣa d imanayen ilsanen id ttaken ifranen, tilisa d abriɣer. Tabadut yettwadagen ugar tiyaḍ nniḍen d tin n takti tasnudrant n talmest id yefka Ernst Mayr deg useggwas 1942 : talmest d amezdaɣ neɣ tagrumma n imezdaɣen ayɣef iterrasen zemren s tidet neɣ "ahat" ad frurxen gar asen dɣa ad sɛun tarwa taydirt d tazulbut, deg lḥalat tigmawiyin. Aka, talmest d aferdis ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen n umezdaɣ aydeg asuddem asnukksan yezmer ad yilli dɣa iterrasen n yiwet talmest uɛzilen s usnukksan ar tigrummiwin nniḍen tinmeɣrayin deg ṛṛay n ufrurex.

Ixef n Usuf:
Ixef n Usuf (s teqbaylit : "Ixf n wasif") d yiwet tala n waman isemmaḍen i-d yezgan di tɣiwant n Mɛafa deg twilayt n Batent (Batna). Mecɛuret s waṭas, llan medden si Sṭif ed Tbeskert i yezzuren fell-as deg unebdu. 

Bazer Saxra:
Bazer Saxra d taɣiwant n twilayt n Sṭif deg tdayra n Lɛelma, ɣur-es 27 996 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 

At Buḥini:
At Buḥini d taddart taqbaylit deg tɣiwant n Yiɛekkuren deg Tawilayt n Tizi Wezzu. D nettat ay meqqer akk deg tɣiwant s tjumma-s. 
Amzeruy.
Deg At Buḥini ay ilul Arezqi U Lbacir deg useggwas n 1857, yennaɣ mgal inekcamen irumiyen deg lawan-agi. 

Ǧimla:
Ǧimla d yiwet taɣiwant taqbaylit n twilayt n Jijel, i-d yezgan ar 45 km si tɣiwant n Ǧiǧel, tesɛa 17,373 imezdaɣ deg useggwas n 2008. 

Aswir asnafrux agraɣlan:
Iswiren isnifrax igraɣlanen llan d timyagrin gar imesnifrax tiqburin akkw d tigraɣlanin ugaren tiyaḍ nniḍen. Ttwassuddsen sɣur Aseqqamu asnafrux agraɣlan, tagrawt tesɛa azal n 200 imesnifrax. Aswir amezwaru yettwassuddes deg useggwas 1884. Arma 1926, assides nsen yella d arlugan armi ɛzemen ad ssuddesen yal kuẓ iseggwasen (tasureft deg tallit n Umgaru amaḍlan wis sin).
Umuɣ n iswiren.
Imir (2014) COI yessumer aseggi s lqem 4.2 :

Tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Jijel:
I Tiɣiwanin nniḍen, zeṛ Umuɣ n tiɣiwanin n Tmurt Leqbayel.
Tawilayt n Jijel deg Tmurt Leqbayel tesɛa 28 tiɣiwanin. 
Tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Jijel.
Tafelwit agi, tettaked umuɣ n tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Jijel, tettaked i yal taɣiwant : angal ONS ines, isem is, amezdaɣ ines d tajumma-s.

Iṣuḥan:
Iṣuḥan d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Leblida deg tdayra n Larebɛa N At Musa. Ɣur-es azal n 260 imezdaɣ deg 2008. Tḥudd ar tiwilayin n Tubiret ed tin n Lemdeyyet yerna tezga-d di wul n Waṭlas Ablidi.

Amnakel (tasnudert):
Amnakel (s tlatinit « "regnum" ») d, deg tamessartut amagnu, aswir n useggi aɛlayan ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen n udusen imuddiren, ɣef ljal n ḍḍbayeɛ ucriken. Deg aseggi amaynu s kraḍ tiɣula, amnakel d aswir wis sin n useggi.
Yal amnakel yettwabḍu s phyla. Isukfal imeẓliyen n useggi n tamessartut : tameddurt, taɣult, amnakel, astirf, asmil, ammizwer, tawacult, ṣṣenf d talmest.
Aceggeṛ n useggi yetwassumer sɣur Carl Woese deg useggwas 1990 sakin yunni-d imgerraden imeqranen deg uswir alayan ɣur Bakteria d Archaea ɣas ma snat tigrawin nni ttwassuddesent s udusen brukaryuta. Woese yebɣa ad yexdem anagraw n useggi s kraḍt tiɣula : Bakteria, Archaea d Eukaryuta, tis kraḍt agi llan deg-es Leḥcawec, Iɣersiwen, Brutista d Igersalen. Aseqdac amiran n unagraw s sḍis imnukal yella d asemlili n unagraw amagnu s semmus imnukal d unagraw s kraḍt tiɣula n Woese. Anagraw agi s sḍis imnukal anda Monères qedderen s Bakteria d Archaea yuɣal d alugen deg aṭas n imuhal.

Astirf (tasnudert):
Deg anagrawan, 'astirf (neɣ phylum) d aswir wis sin n aseggi amagnu n tilmas timuddirin.
Astirf yetsbadu deg aẓar am d-anmeɣray ar aɣawas n ussudes amaẓlay.
Astirf d taẓunt d igdawalen maca ttusseqdecen deg imnukal imeẓliyen.
Anagrawan alinnian yetsseqreb ar anagrawan irasnukksan ittases ad yilli uqrib n izdayen isnukksanen n umyili gar tilmas.

Buɛendas:
Buεendas d taɣiwant taqbaylit n twilayt n Sṭif. Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 15,600 imezdaɣ yerna d adeg-aɣella (chef-lieu) n tdayra n Buɛendas deg ugafa n twilayt n Sṭif. 

Draɛ Qabila:
Draɛ Qabila d taɣiwant taqbaylit deg ugafa n twilayt n Sṭif. Tezga-d deg tdayra n Walma Waklan, tesɛa deg 2008 azal n 14,492 imezdaɣ. Yerna adeg-aɣella-ines (chef-lieu) yezga-d deg taddart n At Aɛli U Ɛetman. 
Tarakalt.
Asideg.
Draa Kebila tezga-d ar 70 km si temdint n Sṭif, deg ugafa (au nord) n twilayt deg idurar leqbayel. 
Tudrin.
Draa Kebila tesɛa 17 tudrin ay deg ad naf : 
Tudrin timezyanin :

Ibetrunen:
Ibetrunen d yiwen n lɛarc i-d yezgan ar 1km ar unẓul n temdint n Tizi Wezzu deg tɣiwant-nni. 
Si Tizi, ad naf s tazwara taddart n wassif u s taggara s taddart n Imezdaten i tettḥudd af tɣiwant n Imaɛtuqen. 
Tarakalt.
Tuddar.
Llan aṭas di laɛrc n Iqemmuden : 

Larbeεṭac:
Larbeεṭac (tafrensist : "Larbatache") d yiwet taɣiwant n twilayt n Bumerdas i tebɛed si 35 km n Dzayer Tamanaɣt di wegmuḍ yerna teggug ar 25 km si temdint n Bumerdas. 

Asmil (tasnudert):
Deg tasnudert, asmil d aswir wis kraḍ n useggi amagnu n tilmas timuddirin (ẓeṛ anagrawan).
Tigariwin tilatiniyin i ttaken asertatu.
Isem n ismilen yettfuk s udfir -opsida ɣur leḥcawec, -phyceae ɣur adalen dɣa -mycetes ɣur igersalen.
I umnakel n uɣersiw, idfiren s lexṣas ersen kan ddaw asertatu n afel-tawacult (ICZN amagrad 27.2).
Imedyaten :

Ammizwer (tasnudert):
Deg tasnudert, ammizwer d aswir wis kuẓ n useggi amagnu n tilmas timuddirin (ẓeṛ anagrawan).
Tigariwin tilatiniyin i ttaken asertatu.
Isem n immizewren yettfuk s udfir -ales ɣur leḥcawec, adalen dɣa igersalen.
I umnakel n uɣersiw, idfiren s lexṣas ersen kan ddaw asertatu n afel-tawacult (ICZN amagrad 27.2). D acu kan, isem n immizewren yettfuk aṭas s udfir -alɣiwin ; anamek : ammizwer yettssegrew tilmas yetcaben deg timeẓri.
Imedyaten :

Tawacult (tasnudert):
Deg tasnudert, tawacult d taxon i tssegrewen leṣnaf i qeddemen aṭas n tilmas d icabiyen gar asent. D aswir wis semmus n useggi amagnu n tilmas timuddirin (ẓeṛ anagrawan).
Tigariwin tilatiniyin i ttaken asertatu.
Ayen yerzan Tigariwin tilatiniyin i ttaken asertatu, isem n twaculin yettfuk s udfir -aceae ɣur leḥcawec, adalen d igersalen dɣa -idae ɣur iɣersiwen.
Imedyaten :

Ṣṣenf (tasnudert):
En systématique, le genre est un rang taxinomique (ou taxonomique) qui regroupe un ensemble d'espèces ayant en commun plusieurs caractères similaires.
Deg anagrawan, ṣṣenf d asertatu n tamessartut yetssegrewen tagrumma n tilmas yesɛan aṭas ḍḍbayeɛ icabiyen ucriken.
Ṣṣenf d asertatu wis sḍis n unagrawan amagnu n tilmas timuddirin. Aqrib ttusseqdacen deg umnakel aɣersiw (deg-es aqrib 10 % n iferṭeṭṭuten).
Assissen.
Akkw talmest tamuddirt neɣ yettidiren (aɣersiw, imɣi, agersal, bakteria…) tettweqqen ar yiwen ṣṣenf, ɣef leḥsab n agerwisem binominal yettwassissenen sɣur Carl von Linné. Isem n ṣṣenf d isem alatini s isman asuf.
Asekkil amezwaru n isem n ṣṣenf dima yettili d asekkil ameqran. Ilaq ad yettwaru s ugemmay alatini (war afeskil).
Yal talmest tezmer at sɛu aṭas adu-tilmas : tuggtiwin neɣ talɣiwin 
S umedya, awerɣil amenkad (isem alatini : "Aptenodytes forsteri") d uwerɣil ageldan ("Aptenodytes patagonica") llan sin yidsen deg ṣṣenf "Aptenodytes", n twacult n iwerɣilen.
Kra n tugrinin, am tasnagersal, steɛṛefen abeṭṭu arqaq n ṣṣenf ar Adu-leṣnaf, Tigezmi , Adu-tigezmi .
Ṣṣenf alsan semman-as Homo.

Jacques Vielliard:
Jacques Vielliard, isem-is ummid Jacques Marie Edme Vielliard, d amesnafrux aṛumi id lullen di Paris ass n dɣa yemmut ɣef ljal n waṭṭan n iraggwen n wakal (malaria) ass n , di Brizil. D imseḍru n tasmekta tameqrant n iklasen n ifrax.
D ameskar n imuhal ɣef Aɣbub amectuḥ ameskil (bécasseau variable).
Amankal "Proceratophrys vielliardi" yettwasem aken am tajmilt i Jacques Vielliard.

Aɣersiw:
Aɣersiw d, ɣef leḥsab n useggi amagnu, amuddir ameẓlazzug, yetečč tinegwa tigemnawin. Neḥeṛṛ tura irem i timiliyin i xnezen d ageticenbit, ɣas ma necukk brutuzuwar am iɣersiwen ayenticenbit. Am akkw imuddiren, yal aɣersiw yesɛa ikniwen wukud yessileɣ tagrawt tamsarit, i nsemmi talmest. Platon yefka-d tabadut agi n awal deg "Épinomis" : .

Kkurdata:
Kurdi (Kkurdata) d astirf n iɣersiwen imsidisen deuterostomianen. Kraḍ adu-istirfen ttwassemlilen deg tagrawt agi : Ixefkkurdiyen, Urukkurdiyen d Kraniyiyen, sin ineggura agi ttwassemlilen ddaw taxon Ulfaktures.

5 yunyu:
Ass 5 yunyu d ass 156 n useggas (157 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 209 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
4 yunyu - "5 yunyu" - 6 yunyu

17 yulyu:
Ass 5 yulyu d ass 198 n useggas (199 deg iseggasen "bisekstil"). Llan 167 wussan deffir-es ar taggara n useggas.
16 yulyu - "17 yulyu" - 18 yulyu

Wiki:
Awiki d asnas web i ɛemmeden asnulfu, abeddel d usumen imazdayen n isebtar deg yiwen asmel web. Yetseqdec tutlayt n tarusi n ticraḍ dɣa agbur ines yezmer ad yetbeddel s iminig web. D afecku n ussefrek n ugbur.

César ilaq ad yemmet (César doit mourir):
Cesar ilaq ad yemmet ("") d asaru aṭalyani yettwasseḍrun sɣur Paolo d Vittorio Taviani, yeffɣed deg useggwas 2012. Yetwebren am afetasugna, yettwassefru sɣur inekrufen ddaw tisunḍiwin n umssebded ɣer asayes Fabio Cavalli, dɣa yetwexdem s umur s aberkan d umellal.
Agzul.
assebded ɣer asayes "Yulyu Qiṣer", n William Shakespeare, sɣur inekrufen n agmam taɣellist taɛlayant n takurmut n Rebibbia, di Roma.

Tuddsa n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen:
Tuddsa n Yeɣlanen Yedduklen (neɣ "Iɣlanen Yeddukklen", "Lejnas Yeddukklen"), d tuddsa tagraɣlant ay iqeddcen i lmend n wemɛawen gar tmura deg yinurar n lqanun, n laman, n tdamsa, n tmetti, n yizerfan n wemdan akked lebni n talwit deg umaḍal. Tuddsa-a sbedden-tt-id deg 1945, asmi ay ifuk Wemgaru Amaḍlan Wis Sin, deg wemkan n Temɣunt n Yeɣlanen, i lmend n weḥbas n yimenɣi gar tmura. Ass-a, llant 192 n tmura ay yettekkan deg Tuddsa n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen. Tuddsa-a tesɛa daɣen aṭas n tuddsiwin ay yeqqnen ɣer-s, yal yiwet tqeddec deg wenrar-nnes. Axxam n Yeɣlanen Yeddukklen yezga-d deg temdint n New York, deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen.

Tagraɣlant Tanemlayt:
Tagraɣlant Tanemlayt (s tefṛensist: Internationale Socialiste), d tuddsa tagraɣlant aydeg yettekka umur ameqran n yikabaren inemlayen (socialistes) n umaḍal.

Nijir:
Nijir d tamurt n Tefriqt. Tajumma-nnes 1.267.000 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 15.306.252 n yimezdaɣen (Inijiriyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Niamey.

Ferḥat Ɛebbas:
Ferḥat Mekki Ɛebbas (ilul deg wass n 24 Tuber 1899 deg Ṭahir, Jijel - yemmut deg 24 Dujember 1985, deg temdint n Ldzayer), d argaz n tsertit aqbayli yerna d ameɣnas ay iwten i lmend n ussuffeɣ n Fransa seg Ldzayer. Deg 1946, yesnulfa-d Tadukli Tamegdayt n Teskint Tadzayrit (Union démocratique du manifeste algérien). 
Deg tallit n wemgaru (ṭṭrad) n Ldzayer, Ɛebbas yettekka deg Terni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw (Front de Libération Nationale). Deg 1958, yeqqel d aselway amezwaru n Unabaḍ Uɛḍil (gouvernement provisoire) n Tegduda tadzayrit, yerna yeṭṭef amkan-a arma ay d 1961, asmi ay t-id-yexlef Benyusef Benxedda. Deg 1962, yettwafren d aselway n Wegraw Aɣelnaw (amni ) amezwaru n Ldzayer. Deg 1963, yeffeɣ seg wemkan-a ɣef ljal n yiwen n umennuɣ akked unabaḍ n Ḥmed Ben Bella. Ɣef ljal n waya ay yettwaḥbes deg Wedrar. Deg 1965, cwiṭ kan qbel ad d-tili tuttya-nni taserdasit n Hewwari Bumedyen, Ɛebbas bran-as-d seg lḥebs, maca yejbed iman-nnes seg tsertit.

Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw:
Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw (s tefrensist: "Front de Libération Nationale") d akabar adzayri. Asmi ay tuwey Ldzayer azarug-nnes (indépendance) deg 1962, akabar-a yeṭṭef adabu yerna yeqqel d netta ay d akabar awḥid deg Ldzayer arma d 1989. Ar ass-a mazal akabar-a yetturar ddur d ameqran deg tsertit n Ldzayer. Deg 2005, Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw terra Ɛebdelɛaziz Butefliqa d aselway n ukabar, ma d Ɛebdelɛaziz Belxadem yeqqel d amaru amatu n ukabar-a. Deg useggas-nni daɣen, Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw teddukkel akked yikabaren n Wemsegraw Aɣelnaw Amegday (n Ḥmed Uyeḥya) ed Umussu n Tmetti n Talwit (n Bugerra Ṣṣeltani) akken ad d-sbedden tamsisit (alliance) ara ibedden ɣer yidis n uselway Ɛebdelɛaziz Butefliqa.

Agraw n Euro:
Agraw n Euro (neɣ Euragraw) d timlilit tamaggurt (dɣa awarseklant) n n Iwunak imaslaḍen n asun euro, deg iẓri n ussemyuddes n tasertit tudmist nsen. 
Yetwexleq sɣur Aseqqamu uṛufi deg useggwas 1997, Agraw n Euro yeswerwer "de facto" deg tanga-s Aseqqamu n ineɣlafen n teẓraf uṛufiyen yettilin azekka-nni n timlilit n Agraw n Euro, ayɣef yesismur iɣtasen. Aselway yettwafren i anna n sin iseggwasen d wezgen (taynayt id yernan sɣur amtawa n Lisbun).
Ahulandi Jeroen Dijsselbloem, 46 iseggwasen, aneɣlaf n teẓraf, yettwafren ass n arim (letniyen) 21 yennayer 2013 aselway n Euragraw.
Deg useggwas 2008, Euragraw yesfaydi ibeddilen imaynuten, imi id yetwajmeɛ ass n 12 tuber, deg uswir n iɣellaten n Uwanak d wid n unabaḍ, dɣa yemmager i uzgen n ssaɛa Gordon Brown, Aneɣlaf amezwaru aqdim n Tagelda Yeddukklen, yiwet tamurt ur llan ara deg asun euro.

Qasi Tizi-Uzzu:
Qasi Tizi-Uzzu, Hamid Lourari deg isem-is idetti. Yeluled deg useggwas 1931 di At Wartilan di Tmurt Taqbaylit dɣa yemmut ass n 19 wamber 2014 di Zzayer sakin aḍḍan aɣezfan. Qasi Tizi-Uzzu d azeffan n umezgun d tiliẓri tazzayrit. Yettwassen i ubusin id yexdem s Krikec neɣ Salaḥ Saɛdawi.

Taberlinit 2012:
Taberlinit 2012 d taẓrigt 62 n Tafaska n usaru n Berlin, yedran seg ar . Mike Leigh, amssebded ɣer asayes n umezgun dɣa amseḍru anglizi, d netta id aselway n umgalaw.
Isura ttwafrenen.
Deg timenyagert.
Isura ddaw agi kecmen ar timenyagert i Ursu n ureɣ :

Wad Ccerfa:
Wad Ccerfa (Tafrensist : Oued Chorfa) d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Ɛin Ddefla, deg wammas-ataram n tmurt Ledzayer di tmurt n Iznaten (Iznaten). Deg useggwas n 2008, tesɛa azal n 13,353 imezdaɣ. 

Buraced:
Buraced d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Ɛin Ddefla. Deg 2008, ɣur-es azaz n 29,680 imezdaɣ. 

Tiberkanin:
Tiberkanin (s Tifinaɣ :ⵜⵉⴱⴻⵔⴽⴰⵏⵉⵏ d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Ɛin Ddefla. Deg 2008, ɣur-es azal n 16,384 imezdaɣ. 

Sidi Lexḍer (Ɛin Ddefla):
Sidi Lexḍer (s tefrensist : "Sidi Lakhdar") d yiwet tɣiwant n twialyt n Ɛin Ddefla, tezga-d ar 120 ikilumitren ar utaram n temdint n Ledzayer Tamanaɣt. Deg 2008 ɣur-es azal n 20,970 imezdaɣ. Di lawan n temhersa tafrensist, llan ɣɣaren-as s yisem n "Lavarande".

Mendas:
Mendas d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Yiɣil Izzan. Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 15,127 imezdaɣ. 

Wlad Buɣalem:
Wlad Buɣalem (tamaziɣt taneṣlit : It Buɣalem neɣ "Ah Buɣalem") d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Mestɣanem. Deg useggwas n 2008, ɣur-es azal n 13,761 imezdaɣ.
Tamaziɣt deg Wlad/It Buɣalem Zik.
Ɣef wayen yenna René Basset, d amnadi af tmaziɣt n zik, llan zik imaziɣen i yesawalen (yemeslayen) Janat (Znatiya) ar 1900 di teqbilt n Ɛacaca ("Étude sur la Zenatia de l'Ouarsenis et du Maghreb central"). 

Mahdi Serbaḥ:
Mahdi Serbaḥ (ilul deg deg temdint n Ldzayer) d amarir adzayri n tkurt n uḍar. Yella d aɛessas n ucebbak n teɣlamt n Yilemẓiyen Inaddalen n Leqbayel (gar 1972-1973).

Ḥamid Tibuci:
Ḥamid Tibuci (ilul deg 12 Furar 1951 deg Bgayet), d amedyaz adzayri yessefruyen s tefrensist yerna d amekla (peintre). Yuwey-d turagt (licence) n tanglizit yerna yezdeɣ deg Fransa seg useggas n 1982. Gar yedlisen-nnes: Mer ouverte (Ilel iledyen, 1973) akked Soleil d'herbe (1977).

Sidi Bu Sɛid:
Sidi Bu Sɛid d tamdint n ugafa-agmuḍan (nord-est) n Tunes, zedɣen-tt 5.409 n yimezdaɣen.

Fuɛad Mebazɛa:
Fuɛad Mebazɛa d aselway uɛḍil n Tunes seg wass n 15 Yennayer 2011 (deg wemkan n Zine El-Abidine Ben Ali ay yennejlan seg tmurt). Mebazaa ilul deg wass n 16 Yunyu 1933 deg temdint n Tunes.

Baji Qayed Ssebsi:
Baji Qayed Ssebsi (ilul deg deg Sidi Bu Saɛid), d aselway n Tegduda n Tunes. D argaz n tsertit yerna d abugaṭu atunsi. Deg wass n , aselway Fuad Mebazaɛ yerra-t d Aneɣlaf Amezwaru n Tunes deg wemkan n Muḥemmed Ɣennuci. Sakkin, yesnulfa akabar Nida Tunes deg 2012, i yernan aṭas n isutal deg Tifranin Tisnagalanin n 2014 deg Tunes (élections législatives). 

Abu Lḥasan:
Abu Lḥasan d taɣiwant n Cclef, zedɣen-tt 20.164 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Cavaignac". 
Aẓar n wawal.
Asmi ay tuwey Ldzayer azarug, semman-as Abu Lḥasan, akken ad rren tajmilt i yiwen n wemjahed ɣɣaren-as Abu Lḥasan (isem-nnes n tidet d Ɛebdelqader Lbaqi, ilul deg tama n Remci, deg Tlemsan). 
Amezruy.
Deg 11 Nwember 1992, taɣiwant n Abu Lḥasan iḥuza-tt uḥemmal d ameqran. Taɣiwant-a tenḍerr mliḥ deg tallit n ccwal ay inekren deg tmurt n Ldzayer gar 1992 ed 2002, maca seg 1999 ar ass-a, yebda tebda tetteqqal-d talwit ɣer tɣiwant-a cwiṭ, cwiṭ.

Wlad Sidi Brahim:
Wlad Sidi Brahim d ywiet tɣiwant n twilayt n Temsilt, deg tdayra n Wlad Sidi Brahim, yerna adeg-aɣella-s d Ɛin Ddis. Deg 2008, ɣur-es azal n 10.716 imezdaɣ.

Ɛin Benxlil:
Ɛin Benxlil d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Nnɛama. Tesɛa 3.720 km2 deg tjumma-s, yerna deg 2008 ɣur-es azal n 12.632 imezdaɣ. 

Negrin:
Negrin d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Tebbest, deg 2008 ɣur-es azal n 9.445 imezdaɣ. Amɣiwan-nnes d Xaled Lexḍar seg Tirni n Weslelli Aɣelnaw. 

Ḥasi Lefḍul:
Ḥasi Lefḍul d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Jelfa, deg 2008 ɣur-es azal n 13.171 imezdaɣ. 

Ḥemmamat:
Ḥemmamat d yiwet tɣiwant n twilayt n Tebbest, tesɛa deg 2008 azal n 20.148 imezdaɣ. 

Lexmis n Tmelyant:
Lexmis n Tmelyant (s tefrensist: "Khemis Miliana"), d taɣiwant n Ɛin Ddefla. Zedɣen-tt 74.349 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafrensist, llan ttinin-as "Affreville".

Lexmis n Lxecna:
Lexmis n Lxecna (s tefrensist: "Khemis El Khachna"), d taɣiwant n twilayt n Bumerdas, zedɣen-tt 58.573 n yimezdaɣen. Deg tallit n tuṭṭfa tafṛensist, llan ɣɣaren-as "Fondouk".

Mumbay:
Mumbay (s tefrensist: "Bombay"), d tamdint tameqrant akk deg Lhend, tezga-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n tmurt, ɣef yiri n Ugaraw Ahendi. Zedɣen-tt 13.830.884 n yimezdaɣen.

Swaziland:
Swaziland d tamurt n Tefriqt Tanẓulant. Tajumma-nnes 17.364 km2 (ikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 1.185.000 n yimezdaɣen (Iswaziyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Mbabane.

Mbabane:
Mbabane d tamaneɣt n Swaziland. Zedɣen-tt 95.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Buṭaleb:
Buṭaleb d yiwet tɣiwant n wenẓul n twilayt n Sṭif. Deg 2008, ɣur-es azal n 9.456 imzedaɣen.

2015:

1917:

Tazɣent n umerwas azayez n Legrig:
Tazɣent n umerwas azayez n Legrig tussa-d seg tugdi n iserwasen n Legrig ɣef tazmert-is i uɣrem n amerwas azayez ines dɣa d uxelleṣ n ainsi que de payer les nnfeɛ n umerwas.

Ṭaṭa:
Ṭaṭa (s teɛrabt : "طاطا", s Tifinaɣ : ⵟⴰⵟⴰ) d amda n wenẓul n Umerruk i-d yezgan deffir Mgal-Aṭlas. Tḥudd af iɣerman n : Assa, Tarudant, Tiznit, Agelmim ed Warzazat. 

Ursu n ureɣ:
Ursu n ureɣ ("Goldener Bär") neɣ Ursu n ureɣ n usaru ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen ("Goldener Bär für den besten Langfilm") d arraz n cciɛa ugaren wiyaḍ nniḍen yettunefken deg Tafaska n Berlin seg 1951. Yettunefk sɣur amgalaw unṣib i asaru aɣezfan n timenyagert tagraɣlant. Ursu d azamul n tamdint n Berlin. 
Ursu n ureɣ yetsreɣɣet sɣur Renée Sintenis. 
Ar ass agi, ala imseḍru ataywani Ang Lee i rebḥen ursu n ureɣ snat tikkwal (deg 1993 d 1996).

Aytmaten Taviani:
Aytmaten Paolo d Vittorio Taviani d Imseḍra dɣa imessiyas iṭalyaniyen i lulen 20 ctamber 1929 d 8 wamber 1931 di San Miniato di Pisa deg Ṭṭalyan. Zmelen sin yidsen yal asaru.

Christian Wulff:

1974:

Hashima:
Hashima yezmer ad yilli :

Bulgarya:
Bulgarya d tamurt n Turuft Tagmuḍant. Tajumma-nnes 110.993 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 7.364.570 n yimezdaɣen (Ibulgariyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Sofia.

Sofia:
Sofia d tamaneɣt n Bulgarya. Zedɣen-tt 1.270.000 n yimezdaɣen.

Santiago:
Santiago d tamaneɣt n tmurt n Cili. Zedɣen-tt 200.792 n yimezdaɣen.

Butswana:
